story:
Save up to 90% on electricity with same beautiful bright lighting as the old style incandescent bulbs. Savings go on indefinitely

THE FOREVER LED LIGHT: SETTING A NEW STANDARD WHAT IS THE FOREVER LED LIGHT?


It is the only LED light bulb offered with a lifetime guarantee.

INSTALLATION

With The Forever LED Light, customers will never, ever have to drag out the ladder again. Once installed, you are simply ONE AND DONE.

WE NEED YOUR HELP

The Forever LED Light is our most ambitious undertaking to date. We have spent countless hours on developing the new product and it’s time to bring it to the marketplace. But, we need your help.

LED LIGHTS – THE TIME IS NOW


LED lights have arrived. Clearly, they are the best alternative to incandescent light bulbs for energy efficiency. Now, with the reveal of The Forever LED Light, you can add a very important element – HUGE COST SAVINGS.

SAVING THE ENVIRONMENT

With The Forever LED Light, no longer will our landfills be overrun with unusable incandescent light bulbs that spew mercury. As a result, our soil and waterways will become a lot cleaner and future generations can enjoy their surroundings without any health fears.

THE FOREVER LED LIGHT AND BUSINESSES

Simply stated, it will save on electricity costs – as in upwards of 20 percent.

WHAT YOU GET

Given the extensiveness of your pledge, we will provide one bulb, a pack of bulbs or even multiple packs of bulbs.

PRODUCT LINE

The most common Forever LED Light will likely be the A19, which most resembles an incandescent bulb one would see in a lamp. However, The Forever LED Light product line will accommodate just about every need for any business.

story:
Keep Your Packages Safe with KEEPER™

 

Introduce

 

Apera KEEPER™ Gives Online Shoppers Peace Of Mind

PREVENT DELIVERED PACKAGES FROM BEING STOLEN, LOST OR DAMAGED

 

Online shopping is no longer a novelty but the norm. When you need something, you log into an e-commerce store, order it, and expect it at your front door within a day or two.

When a package goes missing or ends up destroyed, you feel bothered, frustrated, perturbed. We have all experienced this.

 

Porch pirates are cashing in on the popularity of online shopping, and if you’re like us, you are starting to ask: are online deals worth the risk and hassle?

 

 

My packages were always going missing or ending up destroyed. It seemed like every other thing I ordered either got stolen or rained on, and I had had enough.

 

If you have experienced it more than once, then you have probably tried to devise a solution to the problem. In one way or another, however, each of these solutions is flawed - inconvenience, unreliability, annoyance.

 

I went looking for solutions, and it seemed like everyone had one to offer. “Use a security camera,” “require a signature on delivery,” “send the package to your office.” Inconvenient or unreliable, every solution I found seemed flawed in some way.

 

That’s why my team and I developed KEEPER.

 

KEEPER™ Is The DIY Solution

That Is Convenient, Reliable, And Always Stress-free

PUTS YOU BACK IN CONTROL AND SENDS THIEVES AWAY EMPTY HANDED

 

 

 

 

Too Good To Be True?

 

HEAR IT FROM USERS WHO HAVE USED THE KEEPER™

 

 

 

What is KEEPER™?

 

Mechanical Operation Concept and Prototype

 

  • KEEPER™ ON MY MOM'S KITCHEN CABINET WITH HINGED DOOR

​​

 

  • KEEPER™ ON MY MOM'S SHOES CABINET WITH SLIDING DOOR

​​ 

Let the packages be received on your porch box, securely, smoothly, and conveniently until you’re at home.

 

  • WHY KEEPER™ BE DESIGNED WITH THE SINGLE BUTTON?

We know the delivery driver always don’t have much time, and they would not waste a lots of time to help you open and close a box or hiding your packages.

 

KEEPER™ IS FRIENDLY FOR DELIVERY DRIVERS

The only thing the delivery driver needs to do is to press the button and make the ARM be closed and locked. Making it so simple and time-saving that all drivers are willing to use KEEPER™. This is a big thing for making KEEPER™ useful.

 
 

The Concept of Innovative Logistics

 

 

 

Apera KEEPER™ Achievements

 

KEEPER™ is the DIY solution that is convenient, reliable, and always stress-free. This is a home automatic recipient machine that you can use to receive your package by smartphone.

✅ Easily attach to the storage bench, package box or any existing cabinet.
✅ Peace of mind with instant feedback from the smart app.
✅ Delivery drivers can save time and prefer to use KEEPER™ with the single button design.
✅ Receive packages remotely anytime, anywhere.
✅ Secure and super power lock.
✅ Hidden the package without padlocks and keyholes.

Suitable for 4-type port usage, KEEPER™ can attach to an outdoor storage bench, a parcel box, or even a cabinet.Using the smart app, you can keep track of the recipient machine and the package, pressing a single button to close the machine (with the package inside) remotely until you arrive. 

No more worrying about thieves, rain, or anything else that may get between you and your package: KEEPER™ is here to offer you ultimate package security once and for all! 

 

KEEPER™ is a home automatic recipient machine that you can use to receive your package by smartphone. You can really enjoy the sunbathing time of  the holiday.

 

 

 

 

Feature

 

CONVENIENT CLOUD CONTROL

 

 

Receive Home Delivery Anytime, Anywhere

Easily manage and remotely receive your home delivery in the most comfortable way. You can stop spending time and effort to drive far or ask someone to help for receiving packages.

 

 
 

HANDY MULTIPLE MODE

 

How To Control KEEPER™

KEEPER™ has multiple control mode - by your voice, as your schedule, by your mobile device, using remote controller or back to the manual mode.

 

 

 

FRIENDLY FOR DELIVERY

 

Make It Simple, Make It Useful

We try to share our love with every hard working delivery driver. KEEPER™ can be the best partner with them and make them willing to use. Just let Mr. Express leave as soon as he presses. ☺☺☺SAVE TIME☺☺☺

 

 

 

PEACE-OF-MIND INSTANT FEEDBACK

 

Be Bold Enough To Go Somewhere

Instant feedback on the status!

How long have you been trapped at home? You can finally enjoy every journey, leisure activity and exercise with peace of mind. 

LET'S GO ✈✈✈✈✈

 

 

 

SECURE POWERFUL LOCK

 

 Hidden the package without padlocks and keyholes with super powerful lock.

☟

Secure & Lowkey Super Lock

The Apera KEEPER™ features a built-tough actuator that serves both to open and close your package locker, as well as preventing unauthorized forced entry. 

 

 

 

LOW-KEY

JUST LIKE YOU HAVE NEVER INSTALLED

 

No One Will Put A Safe on The Porch

The more beautiful the mailbox or lock, the more likely it is to cause unexpected trouble. 

If you put a product containing a sophisticated electronic system outdoors for a long time, you will directly face the product as a target of thief stealing, or start worrying about how to keep the product from raining, even if it advertises IP rating. Obviously, The porch and bench, without keyholes and locks, are the best partners for everyone and can hide the package without being suspicious.

 

 

 

HIGHLY FLEXIBLE INSTALLATION

 

Easy for first time DIYers, yet flexible to let you take it wherever your imagination roams, from unique installation locations to Alexa integration.

♔❤♕     Become A Family Magician     ♕❤♔

Please enjoy KEEPER™ the kit that Apera has prepared for you, so that you can purchase your needs at once. Easy to install and can be mounted in a wide range of pre-fab or homemade boxes. A fun installation experience makes it easy for you to become a magician at home. And use magical operations to help families optimize their online shopping experience and improve their quality of life.  ✌✌✌✌✌

 

 

 

STEP-BY-STEP IMAGE INSTALLATION GUIDE

 

All-in-one & Step-by-step

Full pictorial instruction booklet is provided. Follow the cool guide to create your own DIY secure package locker. Once the kit is connected to Wi-Fi, open and close the locker from wherever you are via the app. The DIY Kit comes with all the components needed for basic installation including motorized actuator, controllers, remotes and cables. Mounting bracket and system stabilizer for most basic applications is also included. ☕☕☕☕☕

 

 

 

MORE CONVENIENT SCHEDULING CONTROL 

 

Appointment for Delivery

If you are really inconvenient or unable to get in touch with the delivery driver, use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service. 

 

☏     Make special services more effective.     ☏

 

 

 

INTEGRATES WITH YOUR CONNECTED HOME

 

Voice Control Makes Life More Comfortable

Kick back and relax, spent time lying on a reclining chair, leaning back, and putting your legs up or hands behind your head to stretch out. Let's use voice to control KEEPER™ to receive your package with Echo & Alexa.

Use existing security cameras and selected IoT smart devices like Amazon Echo to receive your package. Allows you to receive your package no interruption, even at home.

 

 

 

SO EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN

HOW TO CLEAN UP THE KEEPER™

 

Easy to clean and maintain, it is a very important item for home equipment. We have made a lot of efforts to achieve this goal and we are proud of it.

Simple shape, superior protection level, quick release and plug-and-play design, the goal of construction: Easy Cleaning Work - Take It Down, Flush It, Dry It and Put It Back.

Please note that the plug must be removed before cleaning. Also note that the adapter does not have a waterproof rating.

 

 

Look Who's Talking About

Apera KEEPER™

 

 

 

 

The Perk

 

Apera KEEPER™ Is The Affordable All-in-one Solution

ANY SIZE, ONE PRICE & FREE SHIPPING

 

Early bird discount is only on INDIEGOGO, Buy it now and start enjoying it right away. Special Limited Edition only 30 sets! Get it when it is still here!

More perks,

Indiegogo Special: 1 X KEEPER™ | US$289 (39% OFF)

Indiegogo Special: 2 X KEEPER™ | US$558 (41% OFF)

Indiegogo Special: 4 X KEEPER™ | US$1,036 (45% OFF)

In addition, we will continue to confirm with you the size of your product, related shipping information and provide you 1-year warranty & online service.

 

 

What Is The Largest Packages

That Can Receive?

 

KEEPER™ on ARM with

Hinged Door

 

 

 

KEEPER™ on ARM with

Sliding or Single Hung Moving Door

 

 

 

 

 

The Apera KEEPER™ comes flat-packed, perfect for online shoppers of all levels of experience.

 

 

 

KEEPER™ has excellent flexibility.

KEEPER™ allows you to install on packages locker that you think are cooler or more desirable. We have to admit that our homemade package boxes look a bit weak. 

Can you do better than us?

 

 

Give a different surprise at special festivals!

"I want to give you something special." You told her gently with your sexy voice. You unexpectedly gave her a pure white remote with a pink bow. She pressed the button lightly and suddenly the colorful balloons flew out  from the box that was opening. Finally, what is left in the empty box is a car key with a pattern of bulls on it...

 

 

Share the ARM space with your neighbors.

Receiving the package is now something you can effortlessly, securely and remotely do. Why not share some ARM space with friends and neighbors. The DIY results are actually transformed into a shared economy that can help neighbors and friends. Maybe You can also create airbnb in the parcel world - parcelbnb (parcel box and bench).

 

 

Package theft brings awareness to the safety of express delivery.

Porch pirates don't like spending so much time on a front porch as the GIF shows above, which tends to expose themselves to great risks. Instead, they would rather spend more time driving a car and looking for quick targets in the community.

Shorr Packaging Corp. has conducted a series of questionnaires on the package theft and outlines the appearance of packages that are more likely to attract porch pirates. Shorr Packaging Corp. said: "We also asked respondents what makes packages so appealing to porch pirates. Their top three answers: Location of the box after arriving (33 percent), branded packaging (31 percent) and descriptive text on the box (20 percent)."

 

What makes packages appealing to porch pirates?

So we set out to find the most fundamental reasons for the package theft and did the research and development. We believe in the assumption: when a package is seen, it will be stolen. And KEEPER™ is positioned and focused on helping to hide the package. It must keep the package low-key hidden near the porch, lock and protect the package inside the package box, can be remotely opened and receive deliveries when not at home, and any action should give the user instant notification...

In any case, we have succeeded, and the fluency of the operation far exceeded our goal! Awesome!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute KEEPER™ on a global scale. Our funding goal is $1,000, and every dollar that we raise toward that goal helps tremendously. To show our appreciation for your support, we are offering KEEPER™ DIY kits at a significant discount exclusively through this campaign.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Although KEEPER™ is a DIY kit, we will need to partner with a manufacturer in order to put together the parts in bulk. If that causes any delays in our production schedule, we will be sure to keep all our contributors updated.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what KEEPER™ is and why it is so valuable, the smoother our launch will go. We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time!

 

 

About Apera

 

Apera is built for your convenience.

Finding ways to upgrade your living space through modern and unique innovations, we let you live your life uninterrupted, allowing you to focus on the big things in life.

Don't get up, let us handle it.

 

The founders of Apera have been in the electric motion system design and application space for years and boast more than 20 years of combined experience specifically working with small industrial design grade motion system in Japan, Korea, Singapore, Australia and Taiwan. We focus on bringing the electric motion system to the home , and guaranteeing you with innovative things truly reliable and powerful.

We fully believe that with the support of Indiegogo and all of our loyal backers we are bringing the innovative logistic to the world.

 

 

​Manufacturing Ready 

 

 

KEEPER™ Motor MP

 

KEEPER™ Gear Motor MP

 

KEEPER™ Control Part MP

 

KEEPER™ Electronics Part MP

 

KEEPER™ MP at Apera Linkou Industrial Park

in the area of WFP - Waiting For the Packaging area 3

(#LKWFP03)

 

KEEPER™ MP @APERA Linkou Industrial Park

in the area of WWP - the Worldwide Packaging Area

(#LKWWP)

 

KEEPER™ MP @APERA Linkou Industrial Park

in the area of LKS - the Storage Area

#LKS

 

 

​Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

 

We are constantly adding more KEEPER™ FAQs to our website here, please check that for the latest information / questions on Apera KEEPER™.

What do I need to use KEEPER™?

To use KEEPER™, you need some things:

  • 5V/1A USB power adapter
  • Micro USB cable
  • Smartphone or tablet and minimum system require - iOS version 2.5 / or Android 2.4
  • 2.4GHz Wi-Fi router connected directly to the internet (does not support 5GHz)
  • 1x LR27A battery, 1x LR23A battery, 2x AAA batteries
  • Basic tools just for installation (drill and drill bit, measuring tape, Phillips#2 screwdriver , cotton thread and scissors)

After I receiving KEEPER™, what is the first step to confirm?

  • Please check the contents according to the contents of the installation manual.
  • Download the app and App Step-by-step Setup Guide on Apera website.
  • Follow the App Step-by-step Setup Guide to confirm if your home Wi-Fi and KEEPER™ can work together.
  • Please confirm that the above steps are correct before proceeding with the official hardware installation.

OK, so my packages are in the storage box, how is this going to stop someone from stealing both the box and my package?

Most package thefts are a crime of opportunity, if the thief can't see the package they won't know it's there, as far as they are concerned your storage container is probably empty most of the time. In addition, the parcel will be stored in a common wooden box or ordinary bench storage container, without any locks and keyholes outside and cannot be opened by human power.

For the more determined thieves, we strongly recommend bolting your storage container to your house and/or porch from inside the container so thieves can't access the bolts.

How strong is KEEPER™? Can't it just be busted open or open with manpower?

We understand your concern with the package box be opened by powerful guys. The majority of packages are a crime of opportunity and are stolen in the grab-and-dash way. That being said, if you see something suspicious, report it!

KEEPER™'s rated locking force is 1400 lbs and passed the 4,400 lb. destructive test. This means that it is not easy to open by human power.

4400 lbs. Destructive Testing

But have to say, we use 7 to 8pcs of SUS316 screws to fix the box and the front and rear brackets stabilizers. This involves the strength of the box itself, and we recommend a more sturdy storage container to enhance protection.

This is going to add time to my delivery driver’s already busy schedule. Why would they take the extra time to use KEEPER™?

We know how valuable your delivery driver's’ time is, and have designed KEEPER™ to be as simple as possible for them to use quickly and efficiently. In the best ideal, let the delivery driver took the initiative to contact you is necessary. You can force the delivery driver to contact you by:

  • Show your contact number on the courier label.
  • Use the special service of the courier.
  • Install Webcam or Doorbell (products from companies like Ring or Blink).

After connecting with the delivery driver, use the mobile app to open ARM. Next, the delivery driver has to do just put the package into the package box and press the single button. It takes only a few seconds to complete a truly safe delivery.

If you are really inconvenient or unable to get in touch with the delivery driver, use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service. 

What if I get deliveries from multiple carriers in one day?

In the best ideal, let the delivery driver took the initiative to contact you is necessary. You can force the delivery driver to contact you by:

  • Show your contact number on the courier label.
  • Use the special service of the courier.
  • Install Webcam or Doorbell (products from companies like Ring or Blink).

After connecting with the delivery driver, use the mobile app to open ARM. In this case, there is no problem to get deliveries from multiple carriers in one day.

The second choice is to arrange your home delivery appointment. use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service.

What if I get multiple packages in a single delivery?

It depends on the size of the package box, bench storage or cabinet you decide to be the ARM and the size of  packages you purchase.

About the largest package that the Apera KEEPER™ can receive, we suggest you refer to the following websites:

ARM with Hinged Door

ARM with Sliding Door and Single Hung Moving Door

In general, KEEPER™ only limits the height of the package you can receive. The length and width of the package are individually limited by the length and width of the ARM. The height of the package is not only affected by the KEEPER™ opening ARM port size, but also affected by the depth of the ARM.

In my area, the delivery driver usually does not contact me actively, so what should I do?

We can understand that we are not fully aware of the service quality of each express delivery company. In the case of a delivery driver who insists on not contacting the customer in advance, we can open the package box directly and wait for him to put the package into the box and induce him to press the single button. Of course, this will lose the function of collecting multiple packages a day.

In the best ideal, let the delivery driver took the initiative to contact you is necessary. You can force the delivery driver to contact you by:

  • Show your contact number on the courier label.
  • Use the special service of the courier.
  • Install Webcam or Doorbell (products from companies like Ring or Blink).

After connecting with the delivery driver, use the mobile app to open ARM. In this case, there is no problem to get deliveries from multiple carriers in one day.

The second choice is to arrange your home delivery appointment. use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service.

If you use any method, Fedex, USPS, UPS and Amazon delivery drivers all not contact you or give you the delivery notify. The more suggestions is that you can build four ARMs and open them before going out every day, so that each ARM can receive the package sent by corresponding logistics provider.

I get many different size packages. How big is the box (or ARM)?

We do not sell boxes or cabinets. We specialize in KEEPER™, the kit of DIY home Automatic Recipient Machine (ARM). The purpose is to enable each user to modify the existing or self-made cabinet through KEEPER™ to achieve the purpose of remote receiving, collecting and monitoring packages.

Can I only use KEEPER™ on a storage container?

KEEPER™ can be used just about anywhere, such as with hinged, sliding or single hung moving door or lid. Generally used in bench storage containers, cabinets, bins, boxes and windows and even chicken door. 

Will I know if there's a package in my storage box or will I have to keep checking?

You will receive the app notification on your mobile device as soon as the ARM has been opened or closed so that you don't have to spend all day guessing if your package has arrived.

How much is KEEPER™?

KEEPER™ retail price is $399, and now on sales and offer a discount on Indiegogo for our backers.

When will KEEPER™ be available?

KEEPER™ is in the stage of mass production now. We have a small amount of stock available for direct shipment. The new production batch requires some preparation time. Our production lead time is estimated to be 45 days.

Will KEEPER™ work internationally?

At this time we are still working on our plan for an international release. Currently KEEPER™ is shipped only to the US, Canada, Mexico, Australia and the UK. We will be releasing on a region by region basis based on demand, if you would like to see KEEPER™ in your area, please let us know. We hope to be available worldwide and securing packages around the globe in the near future!

How do I know if I need KEEPER™ sizes?

KEEPER™ products come in 7 sizes depending on your needs. You can find out what you need by referring to the links below.

KEEPER™ Sizing Chart

KEEPER™ from XS to XXXL is designed for most one-family homes and small businesses with one location.

Do I need to pay a monthly fee for using KEEPER™ products?

It will be available with all KEEPER™ purchases with no monthly costs.

No One Will Put A Safe on The PorchThe more beautiful the mailbox or lock, the more likely it is to cause unexpected trouble. If you put a product containing a sophisticated electronic system outdoors for a long time, you will directly face the product as a target of thief stealing, or start worrying about how to keep the product from raining, even if it advertises IP rating. Obviously, The porch and bench, without keyholes and locks, are the best partners for everyone and can hide the package without being suspicious.   
HIGHLY FLEXIBLE INSTALLATION
 
Easy for first time DIYers, yet flexible to let you take it wherever your imagination roams, from unique installation locations to Alexa integration.♔❤♕     Become A Family Magician     ♕❤♔Please enjoy KEEPER™ the kit that Apera has prepared for you, so that you can purchase your needs at once. Easy to install and can be mounted in a wide range of pre-fab or homemade boxes. A fun installation experience makes it easy for you to become a magician at home. And use magical operations to help families optimize their online shopping experience and improve their quality of life.  ✌✌✌✌✌   STEP-BY-STEP IMAGE INSTALLATION GUIDE All-in-one & Step-by-stepFull pictorial instruction booklet is provided. Follow the cool guide to create your own DIY secure package locker. Once the kit is connected to Wi-Fi, open and close the locker from wherever you are via the app. The DIY Kit comes with all the components needed for basic installation including motorized actuator, controllers, remotes and cables. Mounting bracket and system stabilizer for most basic applications is also included. ☕☕☕☕☕   MORE CONVENIENT SCHEDULING CONTROL  Appointment for DeliveryIf you are really inconvenient or unable to get in touch with the delivery driver, use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service.  ☏     Make special services more effective.     ☏   INTEGRATES WITH YOUR CONNECTED HOME Voice Control Makes Life More ComfortableKick back and relax, spent time lying on a reclining chair, leaning back, and putting your legs up or hands behind your head to stretch out. Let's use voice to control KEEPER™ to receive your package with Echo & Alexa.Use existing security cameras and selected IoT smart devices like Amazon Echo to receive your package. Allows you to receive your package no interruption, even at home.   SO EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAINHOW TO CLEAN UP THE KEEPER™ Easy to clean and maintain, it is a very important item for home equipment. We have made a lot of efforts to achieve this goal and we are proud of it.Simple shape, superior protection level, quick release and plug-and-play design, the goal of construction: Easy Cleaning Work - Take It Down, Flush It, Dry It and Put It Back.Please note that the plug must be removed before cleaning. Also note that the adapter does not have a waterproof rating.  Look Who's Talking About 
Apera KEEPER™    The Perk Apera KEEPER™ Is The Affordable All-in-one SolutionANY SIZE, ONE PRICE & FREE SHIPPING Early bird discount is only on INDIEGOGO, Buy it now and start enjoying it right away. Special Limited Edition only 30 sets! Get it when it is still here!More perks,Indiegogo Special: 1 X KEEPER™ | US$289 (39% OFF)Indiegogo Special: 2 X KEEPER™ | US$558 (41% OFF)Indiegogo Special: 4 X KEEPER™ | US$1,036 (45% OFF)In addition, we will continue to confirm with you the size of your product, related shipping information and provide you 1-year warranty & online service.  What Is The Largest PackagesThat Can Receive? KEEPER™ on ARM withHinged Door   KEEPER™ on ARM withSliding or Single Hung Moving Door   

  The Apera KEEPER™ comes flat-packed, perfect for online shoppers of all levels of experience.   KEEPER™ has excellent flexibility.KEEPER™ allows you to install on packages locker that you think are cooler or more desirable. We have to admit that our homemade package boxes look a bit weak. Can you do better than us?  Give a different surprise at special festivals!"I want to give you something special." You told her gently with your sexy voice. You unexpectedly gave her a pure white remote with a pink bow. She pressed the button lightly and suddenly the colorful balloons flew out  from the box that was opening. Finally, what is left in the empty box is a car key with a pattern of bulls on it...  Share the ARM space with your neighbors.Receiving the package is now something you can effortlessly, securely and remotely do. Why not share some ARM space with friends and neighbors. The DIY results are actually transformed into a shared economy that can help neighbors and friends. Maybe You can also create airbnb in the parcel world - parcelbnb (parcel box and bench).  Package theft brings awareness to the safety of express delivery.Porch pirates don't like spending so much time on a front porch as the GIF shows above, which tends to expose themselves to great risks. Instead, they would rather spend more time driving a car and looking for quick targets in the community.Shorr Packaging Corp. has conducted a series of questionnaires on the package theft and outlines the appearance of packages that are more likely to attract porch pirates. Shorr Packaging Corp. said: "We also asked respondents what makes packages so appealing to porch pirates. Their top three answers: Location of the box after arriving (33 percent), branded packaging (31 percent) and descriptive text on the box (20 percent)." What makes packages appealing to porch pirates?So we set out to find the most fundamental reasons for the package theft and did the research and development. We believe in the assumption: when a package is seen, it will be stolen. And KEEPER™ is positioned and focused on helping to hide the package. It must keep the package low-key hidden near the porch, lock and protect the package inside the package box, can be remotely opened and receive deliveries when not at home, and any action should give the user instant notification...In any case, we have succeeded, and the fluency of the operation far exceeded our goal! Awesome!  What We Need & What You Get 

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute KEEPER™ on a global scale. Our funding goal is $1,000, and every dollar that we raise toward that goal helps tremendously. To show our appreciation for your support, we are offering KEEPER™ DIY kits at a significant discount exclusively through this campaign.
 
 
Risks & Challenges
 
Although KEEPER™ is a DIY kit, we will need to partner with a manufacturer in order to put together the parts in bulk. If that causes any delays in our production schedule, we will be sure to keep all our contributors updated.
 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
 
In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what KEEPER™ is and why it is so valuable, the smoother our launch will go. We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time!
 
 


About Apera
 

Apera is built for your convenience.Finding ways to upgrade your living space through modern and unique innovations, we let you live your life uninterrupted, allowing you to focus on the big things in life.Don't get up, let us handle it. The founders of Apera have been in the electric motion system design and application space for years and boast more than 20 years of combined experience specifically working with small industrial design grade motion system in Japan, Korea, Singapore, Australia and Taiwan. We focus on bringing the electric motion system to the home , and guaranteeing you with innovative things truly reliable and powerful.We fully believe that with the support of Indiegogo and all of our loyal backers we are bringing the innovative logistic to the world.  

​Manufacturing Ready 
 

 
KEEPER™ Motor MP

 
KEEPER™ Gear Motor MP

 
KEEPER™ Control Part MP

 
KEEPER™ Electronics Part MP

 
KEEPER™ MP at Apera Linkou Industrial Park
in the area of WFP - Waiting For the Packaging area 3
(#LKWFP03)

 
KEEPER™ MP @APERA Linkou Industrial Park
in the area of WWP - the Worldwide Packaging Area
(#LKWWP)

 
KEEPER™ MP @APERA Linkou Industrial Park
in the area of LKS - the Storage Area
#LKS

  
​Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
 
We are constantly adding more KEEPER™ FAQs to our website here, please check that for the latest information / questions on Apera KEEPER™.What do I need to use KEEPER™?To use KEEPER™, you need some things:
5V/1A USB power adapter
Micro USB cable
Smartphone or tablet and minimum system require - iOS version 2.5 / or Android 2.4
2.4GHz Wi-Fi router connected directly to the internet (does not support 5GHz)
1x LR27A battery, 1x LR23A battery, 2x AAA batteries
Basic tools just for installation (drill and drill bit, measuring tape, Phillips#2 screwdriver , cotton thread and scissors)
After I receiving KEEPER™, what is the first step to confirm?
Please check the contents according to the contents of the installation manual.
Download the app and App Step-by-step Setup Guide on Apera website.
Follow the App Step-by-step Setup Guide to confirm if your home Wi-Fi and KEEPER™ can work together.
Please confirm that the above steps are correct before proceeding with the official hardware installation.
OK, so my packages are in the storage box, how is this going to stop someone from stealing both the box and my package?Most package thefts are a crime of opportunity, if the thief can't see the package they won't know it's there, as far as they are concerned your storage container is probably empty most of the time. In addition, the parcel will be stored in a common wooden box or ordinary bench storage container, without any locks and keyholes outside and cannot be opened by human power.For the more determined thieves, we strongly recommend bolting your storage container to your house and/or porch from inside the container so thieves can't access the bolts.How strong is KEEPER™? Can't it just be busted open or open with manpower?We understand your concern with the package box be opened by powerful guys. The majority of packages are a crime of opportunity and are stolen in the grab-and-dash way. That being said, if you see something suspicious, report it!KEEPER™'s rated locking force is 1400 lbs and passed the 4,400 lb. destructive test. This means that it is not easy to open by human power.4400 lbs. Destructive TestingBut have to say, we use 7 to 8pcs of SUS316 screws to fix the box and the front and rear brackets stabilizers. This involves the strength of the box itself, and we recommend a more sturdy storage container to enhance protection.This is going to add time to my delivery driver’s already busy schedule. Why would they take the extra time to use KEEPER™?We know how valuable your delivery driver's’ time is, and have designed KEEPER™ to be as simple as possible for them to use quickly and efficiently. In the best ideal, let the delivery driver took the initiative to contact you is necessary. You can force the delivery driver to contact you by:
Show your contact number on the courier label.
Use the special service of the courier.
Install Webcam or Doorbell (products from companies like Ring or Blink).
After connecting with the delivery driver, use the mobile app to open ARM. Next, the delivery driver has to do just put the package into the package box and press the single button. It takes only a few seconds to complete a truly safe delivery.If you are really inconvenient or unable to get in touch with the delivery driver, use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service. What if I get deliveries from multiple carriers in one day?In the best ideal, let the delivery driver took the initiative to contact you is necessary. You can force the delivery driver to contact you by:
Show your contact number on the courier label.
Use the special service of the courier.
Install Webcam or Doorbell (products from companies like Ring or Blink).
After connecting with the delivery driver, use the mobile app to open ARM. In this case, there is no problem to get deliveries from multiple carriers in one day.The second choice is to arrange your home delivery appointment. use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service.What if I get multiple packages in a single delivery?It depends on the size of the package box, bench storage or cabinet you decide to be the ARM and the size of  packages you purchase.About the largest package that the Apera KEEPER™ can receive, we suggest you refer to the following websites:ARM with Hinged DoorARM with Sliding Door and Single Hung Moving DoorIn general, KEEPER™ only limits the height of the package you can receive. The length and width of the package are individually limited by the length and width of the ARM. The height of the package is not only affected by the KEEPER™ opening ARM port size, but also affected by the depth of the ARM.In my area, the delivery driver usually does not contact me actively, so what should I do?We can understand that we are not fully aware of the service quality of each express delivery company. In the case of a delivery driver who insists on not contacting the customer in advance, we can open the package box directly and wait for him to put the package into the box and induce him to press the single button. Of course, this will lose the function of collecting multiple packages a day.In the best ideal, let the delivery driver took the initiative to contact you is necessary. You can force the delivery driver to contact you by:
Show your contact number on the courier label.
Use the special service of the courier.
Install Webcam or Doorbell (products from companies like Ring or Blink).
After connecting with the delivery driver, use the mobile app to open ARM. In this case, there is no problem to get deliveries from multiple carriers in one day.The second choice is to arrange your home delivery appointment. use KEEPER™ scheduling mode with Fedex Appointment Home Delivery®, UPS My Choice® or USPS daily almost exactly fixed home delivery time. And let ARM open and close at the specified time to achieve fully automated delivery service.If you use any method, Fedex, USPS, UPS and Amazon delivery drivers all not contact you or give you the delivery notify. The more suggestions is that you can build four ARMs and open them before going out every day, so that each ARM can receive the package sent by corresponding logistics provider.I get many different size packages. How big is the box (or ARM)?We do not sell boxes or cabinets. We specialize in KEEPER™, the kit of DIY home Automatic Recipient Machine (ARM). The purpose is to enable each user to modify the existing or self-made cabinet through KEEPER™ to achieve the purpose of remote receiving, collecting and monitoring packages.Can I only use KEEPER™ on a storage container?KEEPER™ can be used just about anywhere, such as with hinged, sliding or single hung moving door or lid. Generally used in bench storage containers, cabinets, bins, boxes and windows and even chicken door. Will I know if there's a package in my storage box or will I have to keep checking?You will receive the app notification on your mobile device as soon as the ARM has been opened or closed so that you don't have to spend all day guessing if your package has arrived.How much is KEEPER™?KEEPER™ retail price is $399, and now on sales and offer a discount on Indiegogo for our backers.When will KEEPER™ be available?KEEPER™ is in the stage of mass production now. We have a small amount of stock available for direct shipment. The new production batch requires some preparation time. Our production lead time is estimated to be 45 days.Will KEEPER™ work internationally?At this time we are still working on our plan for an international release. Currently KEEPER™ is shipped only to the US, Canada, Mexico, Australia and the UK. We will be releasing on a region by region basis based on demand, if you would like to see KEEPER™ in your area, please let us know. We hope to be available worldwide and securing packages around the globe in the near future!How do I know if I need KEEPER™ sizes?KEEPER™ products come in 7 sizes depending on your needs. You can find out what you need by referring to the links below.KEEPER™ Sizing ChartKEEPER™ from XS to XXXL is designed for most one-family homes and small businesses with one location.Do I need to pay a monthly fee for using KEEPER™ products?It will be available with all KEEPER™ purchases with no monthly costs.

story:
What are GarageSkins™ real wood garage door overlays?

 A brand-new, ingenious, do-it-yourself way to dramatically improve the exterior of your nice home.  Our incredibly lightweight panels attach magnetically to your existing metal garage door to transform it into a high-end custom carriage-house styled wood door.  In less than an hour you can dramatically upgrade the exterior of your home for under $1000!

Here's the basic issue:

Millions of Americans own nice, modern homes.. but almost all of those homes have that basic, stamped-metal overhead garage door that's been the staple of the building industry for the past 30 years.  That's because until recently the only other option was to purchase a high-end, real wood garage door, which can cost up to $10,000.  So builders took the easiest and cheapest way out, and just ignored the garage door in the overall architectural planning of most homes, even very high-end ones.  That has resulted in millions of beautiful homes that are stuck with a boring, stamped metal overhead door.

And of course homeowners aren't going to go to the time and expense of replacing a perfectly good garage door... so they just turned a blind eye to their boring garage doors, even though that garage door is frequently the largest single structure on the front of their homes... There's just been no cost-effective way to improve it.....


Until now!


GarageSkins LLC is bringing the patent-pending GarageSkins real wood garage door overlay systems to market.  This system of incredibly lightweight panels attaches magnetically to your existing overhead metal garage door with no adhesives or screws to give it the look of a high-end custom carriage-house styled garage door, but for a fraction of the price. 

You install it!  Just take our panels out of the box, attach them in order to your garage door, and stand back and admire the change.  The strong magnets inside the panels keep it firmly in place, even in high winds.  And the entire installation will take less than an hour to complete, making this amazing upgrade something that almost anyone can do!


-Check out these before and after shots of the dramatic change our GarageSkins real wood garage door panels can add to your home:







GarageSkins™ panels –

  • Will transform any home to look like a custom-designed high-end residence.
  • Allow anyone to install the system in just under an hour with no modifications needed.
  • Will be available in several wood species to complement the architecture and design of any home.
  • Will be designed to interact with your existing framing and header so that no alterations are necessary to your existing structure.
  • Are just over one pound per panel, allowing installation on almost any modern overhead metal garage door.
  • Will magnetically attach to any standard metal overhead garage door, meaning no goop or glue needed.
  • Are indistinguishable from a solid-wood $10,000 garage door, meaning thieves won’t be able to tell them apart from the real thing and will leave them alone.
  • Will come in a multitude of overlay designs to match the style of your home.
  • Select either square or arched tops for each overlay pattern.


Patterns Available -


-multiple overlay patterns available to complement your home's design style


Have windows in your existing garage door?

Check out our patent-pending WindowSkins™ panels!  These polycarbonate panels are clear with black vinyl covering the back.  This allows you to peel off the vinyl where your windows are to let the light into your garage's interior while maintaining the great look of your GarageSkins™ system.  


GarageSkins™ and WindowSkins™ prototype panels before installation

GarageSkins™ and WindowSkins™ prototype panels after installation


  • Want to be the talk of your neighborhood? 

  • Make the neighbors green with envy?

  • Increase the curb appeal and value of your home?

  • Looking for a great, easy home improvement project? 


Look no further!  By pre-ordering you will be guaranteed to be the first on your block to have this innovative and remarkable system on your home.  No need to tell the neighbors that you didn't have a custom-designed $10,000 garage door installed, it will be our secret.



PLEASE CONTRIBUTE TO OUR CAMPAIGN!


Where we are at:

GarageSkins was founded in November, 2012 in Creswell, Oregon (Eugene area) to get the development ball rolling.  The owner and product developer, Rick Medlen, has invested his life savings of $100K to begin the development of this great idea.  While significant progress has been accomplished, including 2 utility patent applications, and proof of concept has been reached with several introductory sales, final adhesive and finish development is necessary to get this amazing product out to the home improvement world.


Here’s a timeline and costing of what still needs to be done:


This means that a total of $150,000 still needs to be invested to get this amazing system on the market.  We’re asking the online crowd to help fund $75,000 of this so that we can get the ball rolling as soon as possible.  With this funding we can secure the remaining $75,000 from private investors.


What your contribution will do:

Have a nice home?  Want to help get a product out there that can dramatically enhance its appearance?  Want to save some money on a new GarageSkins™ system?  Check out the Perks to the right for some great ways to contribute and pre-order your system now!  If you are pre-ordering, the expected delivery dates will be early 2015, but no later than May 2015.  Please view the measuring video in the "Gallery" section to make sure that your garage door is of standard size. 

Here's a quick way to tell: 

  • If your garage door is 4 panels high, each panel should be around 20 7/8" high.
  • If your garage door is 5 panels high, each panel should be around 19 1/8" high.

That's it!  We appreciate any help you can give, and ask for your support of this and all great projects here on Indiegogo.




Other Ways You Can Help


Even if you can't contribute, we need your help!


  • Spread the word. Post pictures on social media.

  • Send email to friends and family who would love a GarageSkins™ so that they can contribute.

  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!



FAQ’s

Are a bunch of magnets really going to hold these panels securely on my door?  Short answer is "yes."  Long answer is that there is a huge difference between magnetic attachment (dynamic) and adhesive attachment (static.)  With static adhesion should the adhesive become brittle over time (most will) then a slight impact could dislodge the panel and it would fall off.  But with dynamic adhesion, there is a constant force (magnets never wear out) holding the panel to the metal door underneath.  Think of a hand constantly pushing the panels against the door all the time.  Even if there is a slight jarring or a high windstorm, there is a constant force fighting to keep the panels in place.  Plus should you need to repair them or want to completely change the look, a good tug will pull them off.

I’m concerned that since the panels aren’t permanently attached, they may be stolen.  This is definitely a concern if you live in an area that has a high theft rate.  While a thief would have to know that these were GarageSkins™ panels and not an actual garage door (not many thieves out there stealing garage doors) they could theoretically take all 16 or 20 panels off your door and transport them away.  A small dab of pure silicone placed at each corner of  each panel  before installation would suffice to make it difficult to just pop off an individual panel.  However be aware that should you need to replace a panel or remove it, there is a potential for damage to the GarageSkins™ panel, which would void the warranty.  We have yet to have a report of one of our systems being stolen.

I have a garage door opening that has an arched/beveled top.  Will a GarageSkins system still work?  Yes!  However, the track will need to be recessed approximately 3/4" back into the garage to provide the necessary clearance for the overlays to clear the edges of the bevel/arch.  By the time we launch we will have a national network of garage door professionals contracted to perform this task for you.

Why aren’t GarageSkins™ compatible with wooden garage doors?  Most wooden garage doors are manufactured to that specific opening that they are intended for, and therefore aren’t a standard size.  

I have a dent/ding in my metal garage door.  Will the GarageSkins system repair this?  Only in the case of the smallest dings in your garage door will the GarageSkins™ system actually work.  This system was designed to embellish a functional, multi-panel modern metal garage door, and our strong magnets will force the panels to mold to the shape of your garage door.  If there is no damage, the panels will lay flat, but if there is a significant ding/dent, the Garageskins™ system will conform to that dent and will not mesh well with the other panels.  Best to have that individual panel replaced before adding the GarageSkins™ system.  Contact your local garage door provider for your best options.

I need to order a couple of replacement panels.  It happens.  Junior has the car in drive instead of reverse, and BAM, bumper meets garage door.  While there is some flexibility in our panels, should they be damaged we can replace them individually.  Our modular system and standardized sizing means we can manufacture a panel that matches both pattern and stain. 

Is a GarageSkins™ system paintable?  No, however products are being developed that will provide a paintable surface.  The original GarageSkins™ system were developed to simulate the look of a high-end solid wood carriage house styled door and all of our R and D has been around providing a beautiful wood exterior.  We have been contacted many times by people looking for a product like ours that is also paintable so those systems are in development. 

My garage door has a security handle in the center.  Can I still install a GarageSkins™ system?  Yes, but the outer portion of the security handle will have to be removed.  Typically these are held on with a small set screw in the side that will release the handle.  If any portion of the mechanism underneath sticks out from the front of the metal garage door, it will also have to be removed.  There is no way to anticipate the location of your security handle, so there is no way for us to provide a through-hole during manufacturing.  Simply drilling a hole through your GarageSkins™ system will void the warranty an expose your GarageSkins™ panel to the possibility of water damage.

Can I custom order a GarageSkins™ system?  Our GarageSkins™ systems are designed to fit the majority of garage doors installed in the past 30 years.  While there are some garage doors that are of a different size or configuration, we are not yet large enough to be able to accept custom orders.  With our 4 initial patterns fitting most doors, and 4 more patterns in development, we feel that there is a design that should be pleasing to almost anyone looking to upgrade the appearance of their garage door.

I live in “Tornado Alley.”  Will the GarageSkins™ system be safe on my garage door?  We have tested our Garageskins™ panels on a steel door up to an 80 mph wind and the adhesion held fine. Please see our Warranty as Acts of God are unpredictable and therefore can’t be designed for.  However opening and closing your garage door in high winds should produce no noticeable effects.

My garage door has a high sun exposure.  Will these panels fade over time?  What normally fades over time in the sun isn't the wood, but the applied stain.  The resins crystallize and break down.  But since we use real wood that has been chemically aged, there is no stain to break down and therefore your Garageskins™ panels will darken into that rich look of sun-aged real wood.  Each finish coat also includes a UV-protectant that should keep your GarageSKins system looking new for years to come.

I’m not able to lift heavy objects.  How heavy is the entire system and each panel?  Each panel weighs just over a pound, and even with having to lift the upper panels over your head to install, there should be no weight issues.  Our complete systems ship out at 28 pounds maximum, about the weight of a large bag of dog food.

Are there any special tools needed to install a GarageSkins™ system?  No, however you will need a small step-stool and a wide-blade putty knife to assist in repositioning the panels during installation. If you have ordered a decorative hardware package you will need a medium Phillips-head screwdriver to install.

My garage door opener is pretty old.  Will it handle the extra weight?  We have tested the GarageSkins system on a 2-car garage door, eight feet tall with a 1/3 HP garage door opening motor with no problems. However, should you wish to check simply take a couple of full paint cans (or something with similar weight) and using a wire coat hanger, open the garage door to a height that allows you to hang the paint cans from it.  Then move the garage door up and down to see if there is any issue with the added weight.

Want to be the talk of your neighborhood?  
Make the neighbors green with envy? 
 Increase the curb appeal and value of your home?
 Looking for a great, easy home improvement project?  
Look no further!  By pre-ordering you will be guaranteed to be the first on your block to have this innovative and remarkable system on your home.  No need to tell the neighbors that you didn't have a custom-designed $10,000 garage door installed, it will be our secret.PLEASE CONTRIBUTE TO OUR CAMPAIGN!Where we are at:
GarageSkins was founded in November, 2012 in Creswell,
Oregon (Eugene area) to get the development ball rolling.  The owner and product developer, Rick Medlen, has invested his life savings of $100K to begin the development of this great idea.  While significant progress has been
accomplished, including 2 utility patent applications, and proof of concept has been reached with several introductory
sales, final adhesive and finish development is necessary to get this amazing product out to the home improvement world. 
Here’s a timeline and costing of what still needs to be done:This means that a total of $150,000 still needs to be
invested to get this amazing system on the market.  We’re asking the online crowd to help fund
$75,000 of this so that we can get the ball rolling as soon as possible.  With this funding we can secure the remaining $75,000 from private investors.
What your contribution will do:

Have a nice home? 
Want to help get a product out there that can dramatically enhance its
appearance?  Want to save some money on a
new GarageSkins™ system?  Check out the
Perks to the right for some great ways to contribute and pre-order your system
now!  If you are pre-ordering, the expected delivery dates will be early 2015, but no later than May 2015.  Please view the measuring video in the "Gallery" section to make sure that your garage door is of standard size.  Here's a quick way to tell:  
If your garage door is 4 panels high, each panel should be around 20 7/8" high.
If your garage door is 5 panels high, each panel should be around 19 1/8" high.
That's it!  We appreciate any help you can give, and ask for your support of this and all great projects here on Indiegogo.
Other Ways You Can Help
Even if
you can't contribute, we need your help!

Spread the word. Post pictures on social media.
Send email to friends and family who would love a GarageSkins™
so that they can contribute.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
FAQ’s
Are a bunch of magnets really going to hold these panels securely on my door?  Short answer is "yes."  Long answer is that there is a huge difference between magnetic attachment (dynamic) and adhesive attachment (static.)  With static adhesion should the adhesive become brittle over time (most will) then a slight impact could dislodge the panel and it would fall off.  But with dynamic adhesion, there is a constant force (magnets never wear out) holding the panel to the metal door underneath.  Think of a hand constantly pushing the panels against the door all the time.  Even if there is a slight jarring or a high windstorm, there is a constant force fighting to keep the panels in place.  Plus should you need to repair them or want to completely change the look, a good tug will pull them off.I’m concerned that
since the panels aren’t permanently attached, they may be stolen.  This is definitely a concern if you live in
an area that has a high theft rate. 
While a thief would have to know that these were GarageSkins™ panels and
not an actual garage door (not many thieves out there stealing garage doors) they
could theoretically take all 16 or 20 panels off your door and transport them
away.  A small dab of pure silicone
placed at each corner of  each panel  before installation would suffice to make it
difficult to just pop off an individual panel. 
However be aware that should you need to replace a panel or remove it,
there is a potential for damage to the GarageSkins™ panel, which would void the
warranty.  We have yet to have a report
of one of our systems being stolen.I have a garage door opening that has an arched/beveled top.  Will a GarageSkins system still work?  Yes!  However, the track will need to be recessed approximately 3/4" back into the garage to provide the necessary clearance for the overlays to clear the edges of the bevel/arch.  By the time we launch we will have a national network of garage door professionals contracted to perform this task for you. 
Why aren’t GarageSkins™
compatible with wooden garage doors? 
Most wooden garage doors are manufactured to that specific opening that
they are intended for, and therefore aren’t a standard size.   
I have a dent/ding in
my metal garage door.  Will the
GarageSkins system repair this?  Only
in the case of the smallest dings in your garage door will the GarageSkins™
system actually work.  This system was
designed to embellish a functional, multi-panel modern metal garage door, and
our strong magnets will force the panels to mold to the shape of your garage
door.  If there is no damage, the panels
will lay flat, but if there is a significant ding/dent, the Garageskins™ system
will conform to that dent and will not mesh well with the other panels.  Best to have that individual panel replaced
before adding the GarageSkins™ system. 
Contact your local garage door provider for your best options.
I need to order a
couple of replacement panels.  It
happens.  Junior has the car in drive
instead of reverse, and BAM, bumper meets garage door.  While there is some flexibility in our
panels, should they be damaged we can replace them individually.  Our modular system and standardized sizing
means we can manufacture a panel that matches both pattern and stain.  
Is a GarageSkins™
system paintable?  No, however
products are being developed that will provide a paintable surface.  The original GarageSkins™ system were
developed to simulate the look of a high-end solid wood carriage house styled
door and all of our R and D has been around providing a beautiful wood
exterior.  We have been contacted many
times by people looking for a product like ours that is also paintable so those
systems are in development.  
My garage door has a security handle in the center.  Can I still install a GarageSkins™
system?  Yes, but the outer portion of
the security handle will have to be removed. 
Typically these are held on with a small set screw in the side that will
release the handle.  If any portion of
the mechanism underneath sticks out from the front of the metal garage door, it
will also have to be removed.  There is
no way to anticipate the location of your security handle, so there is no way
for us to provide a through-hole during manufacturing.  Simply drilling a hole through your
GarageSkins™ system will void the warranty an expose your GarageSkins™ panel to
the possibility of water damage.
Can I custom order a
GarageSkins™ system?  Our GarageSkins™
systems are designed to fit the majority of garage doors installed in the past
30 years.  While there are some garage
doors that are of a different size or configuration, we are not yet large
enough to be able to accept custom orders. 
With our 4 initial patterns fitting most doors, and 4 more patterns in
development, we feel that there is a design that should be pleasing to almost
anyone looking to upgrade the appearance of their garage door.
I live in “Tornado
Alley.”  Will the GarageSkins™ system be
safe on my garage door?  We have
tested our Garageskins™ panels on a steel door up to an 80 mph wind and the
adhesion held fine. Please see our
Warranty as Acts of God are unpredictable and therefore can’t be designed
for.  However opening and closing your
garage door in high winds should produce no noticeable effects.
My garage door has a
high sun exposure.  Will these panels
fade over time?  What normally fades over time in the sun isn't the wood, but the applied stain.  The resins crystallize and break down.  But since we use real wood that has been chemically aged, there is no stain to break down and therefore your Garageskins™ panels will darken into that rich look of sun-aged real wood.  Each finish coat also includes a UV-protectant that
should keep your GarageSKins system looking new for years to come.
I’m not able to lift
heavy objects.  How heavy is the entire
system and each panel?  Each panel
weighs just over a pound, and even with having to lift the upper panels over
your head to install, there should be no weight issues.  Our complete systems ship out at 28 pounds
maximum, about the weight of a large bag of dog food.
Are there any special
tools needed to install a GarageSkins™ system?  No, however you will need a small step-stool
and a wide-blade putty knife to assist in repositioning the panels during
installation. If you have ordered a decorative hardware package you will need a
medium Phillips-head screwdriver to install.
My garage door opener
is pretty old.  Will it handle the extra
weight?  We have tested the
GarageSkins system on a 2-car garage door, eight feet tall with a 1/3 HP garage
door opening motor with no problems. However, should you wish to check simply take
a couple of full paint cans (or something with similar weight) and using a wire
coat hanger, open the garage door to a height that allows you to hang the paint
cans from it.  Then move the garage door
up and down to see if there is any issue with the added weight.

story:
Now available: https://yakgrills.com

At YAK Grills™ we set out to redesign the outdoor charcoal hibachi and create the world's most social grill.

  • Crafted from 100% Stainless Steel
  • Grill up to 750ºF (400ºC)
  • Pre-Built Skewer Notches
  • Smart Airflow for a Cool Table
  • Easy to Clean & Dishwasher Safe
  • Portable Modern Design

`

Memories are made while cooking together – it's how we form bonds and make new traditions. But grills became sprawling in size and pushed further away from the action, and so was the host – banished to cook alone and miss out on the fun.

It's time to end grilling loneliness and transform outdoor cooking from a solo activity into a shared one – with YAK Grills.

 

 
We combined the best elements of traditional hibachi, a ceramic konro grill, and stainless cookware to create a virtually indestructible and versatile grill. YAK Grills were vigorously tested by professional chefs to ensure they perform for years to come.
 
Simply add your favorite lump charcoal, or try binchotan-style hardwood charcoal logs, and enjoy hours of grilling time. Did someone say yakitori or tapas?
 
 
 

100% Stainless steel. Made to last.

YAK Grills are crafted exclusively with stainless steel, making them rust resistant, easy to clean, and dishwasher safe. No plastic, no screws, no flimsy parts. We believe products should be designed to last, so we back ours with a standard 5-year warranty.

Tabletop safe.

YAK Grills won't damage your outdoor table or tailgating setup. Extensive testing at temperatures exceeding 700ºF results in no heat transfer to the table surface. And thanks to our hands-free airflow design, your table will stay cool, hour after hour.

Right sized.

Our portable charcoal grill weighs 15 lbs makes traveling with it effortless while ensuring tabletops stay cool, and the grill stays put during grilling. A cooking surface of 105 sq. inches (15" x 7") is perfect for 2-6 people. And with a smaller footprint and efficient airflow design, you'll burn less charcoal per cook... solo steak night? Why not!

High temperature. Perfect sear.

With YAK Grills you can easily grill and sear your favorite protein at temperatures over 700ºF (371ºC). Fast cooking times means less char with more flavor, and you can quickly grill a wide variety of small plate dishes or thick steaks in just minutes.

More flavor. Less smoke.

YAK Grills makes it easy to grill with natural charcoal. Enjoy more flavorful food in ways that gas and electric grills simply can't match. By combining binchotan-style charcoal with our efficient airflow design, you can reach higher temperatures, with less char, better sears, and more delicious plates with no little smoke and fewer flare-ups.

Grill how and what you want.

Grill grate or no grate – you decide. We included skewer notches directly into the housing to easily grill yakitori, kabobs or your favorite skewers directly over the coals. Or maybe you want to try coal-roasting... caveman steak anyone?

From yakitori, kabobs, skewers, seafood, veggies, steaks, hot dogs and burgers – enjoy grilling a wide variety of food and create a fun and unique dining experience. Try a grilled peach or pineapple slice atop your favorite ice cream for dessert.

Portable. Sturdy. Versatile.

 

YAK Grills will help you enjoy al fresco cooking and make memories wherever you want. From parks, picnics, beaches, visiting friends or camping trips, our grill is compact yet sturdy enough to take anywhere. YAK Grills are a perfect fit for your balcony, patio, or next tailgating party. And it's easy to carry at 15 lbs (6.8 kg).

Hands-free air flow control.

No need to fuss with air vents. The charcoal grid and burning chamber were designed to allow for a perfect balance air flow. Grill at searing temperatures above 700ºF, or at medium heat with less charcoal, for longer cooking times to keep the party going.

Easy to clean. Dishwasher safe.

Unlike most grills, you can clean YAK Grills with steel wool or just pop any component into your dishwasher. Couldn't be any easier.

 

Looking for the best tabletop charcoal grill, hibachi style or otherwise? So were we – and we realized we had to build it.

 


 

Please note: Add-Ons on mobile devices are not supported by Apple and Google Pay. Use another payment or use a desktop browser. Add-Ons are visible below the "Checkout button. See our FAQ for more details.

 

At YAK Grills™ we're on a mission to take outdoor cooking from a solo activity into a shared one. 

YAK Grills founder, David Sypniewski is an entrepreneur and home chef that in 2012 founded and led a successful performance running shoe brand. I've taken my passion for grilling and launching premium consumer products to make YAK Grills a reality. All I need now is your support to begin production. I have full confidence that along with your support, we can end grilling loneliness.

The idea for YAK Grills was born after visiting Japan a few years ago where I discovered and fell in love with yakitori (grilled chicken skewers) – where the grilling is an immersive dining experience. This led to a year-long journey to create YAK Grills. Eating with friends and loved ones should be a shared and interactive experience, where everyone participates.

By launching on Indiegogo and with your support, we'll turn gatherings into memorable cooking experiences. Grill, socialize, and YAK on!

 

Where will we ship?

We will ship to the US (only $10 to the Lower 48), Alaska and Hawaii, and internationally to Canada, Australia, UK, France, Germany, Netherlands, New Zealand, Taiwan, and Japan

When will we ship?

We are on-target to ship by the end of November, 2020. We will keep you updated on our progress and the estimated shipment window of your order. Within the US shipping will be with UPS and international orders will go out via DHL Express.

Why order now?

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first YAK Grills at a price that will never be seen again.

 

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles when bringing a new product to life. There are many moving parts to manage. However, the founder has over a decade of global supply chain, consumer product development, and manufacturing experience. We can confidently say that after working with our factory for a year making samples, we have the right partner and systems in place to mitigate the risk that arise from production and shipping. 

However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards. Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

Backing YAK Grills on Indiegogo now means you get an exclusive backer discount that will not be repeated on yakgrills.com. Be the first to get YAK Grills and start creating lasting memories.
