story:
A design module with a characteristic appearance in its essentiality. An eco-sustainable choice to reconnect with nature in our homes and fight indoor air pollution for a healthier indoor environment. Mini IQ is able to purify the air and, thanks to the ProSystem N2Smart device by Nuvap, detect the levels of pollutants in your rooms.

Progettiamo per il benessere. Un modulo di design dall’aspetto indimenticabile nella sua essenzialità. Una scelta ecosostenibile per ristabilire il nostro legame spirituale con l’ambiente. Da una parte, Mini IQ è un punto di partenza per creare comfort zone dinamiche e d’impatto, in cui respirare a pieni polmoni e meditare sulla semplice bellezza del mondo vegetale. Dall'altra, è in grado di purificare l’aria e, grazie al dispositivo ProSystem N2 Smart, di rilevare i livelli di inquinanti delle nostre stanze.

Mini IQ is able to improve the air quality of your homes through a symbiotic bio-filtration process, in which the Bromeliaceae air-plants, characterized by the no-need of soil, draw most of nourishments by absorbing air pollutants, particulate matter (PM) and volatile organic compounds (VOCs). These substances are usually suspended in the air of our apartments.

Mini IQ was born with the support of the indoor pollution team of the University of Bari. Working with this team, we conducted experiments on the abilities of the plants in the absorption of harmful substances (PM, VOCs). The team is coordinated by Gianluigi De Gennaro, Professor of Environmental Chemistry.

For more information on indoor air pollution and health, please see the World Health Organization (WHO) research.

La scienza dietro Mini IQ. Mini IQ è in grado di intervenire sulla qualità dell’aria delle nostre case attraverso un processo simbiotico, in cui l’infrastruttura vegetale assorbe le particelle di inquinanti, particolato e composti chimici volatili. Le Bromeliacee selezionate per Mini IQ hanno infatti una grande particolarità: non hanno bisogno di vivere a contatto con il terreno, poiché traggono nutrimento direttamente dalle particelle sospese nell’aria. In questo modo, eliminano le sostanze nocive presenti negli ambienti indoor.

Mini IQ nasce con il supporto del team sull’inquinamento indoor dell’Università di Bari, con cui conduciamo esperimenti sulle capacità del mondo vegetale nell’assorbimento delle sostanze nocive. Il team è coordinato dal professor Gianluigi De Gennaro.

 

 

In this infographic, you can track the forecast of the pollutants in your house with and without Mini IQ. A recent research, conducted with NUVAP*, produced the important result of a 43% decrease in air pollutants thanks to Mini IQ biofiltration work. Especially during this historical period, where we spend more than 90% of our time indoor, it is essential to improve indoor air quality as much as possible. 

* NUVAP is a partner of Mini IQ and a company focused on environmental data collection and analysis technologies.

In questa infografica è possibile tracciare la previsione degli inquinanti presenti in casa con e senza Mini IQ. Una recente ricerca condotta con Nuvap* ha prodotto l'importante risultato di una dimunzione del 43% degli inquinanti atmosferici grazie al lavoro di biofiltrazione Mini IQ. Soprattutto in questo periodo storico, in cui trascorriamo più del 90% del nostro tempo al chiuso, è fondamentale migliorare il più possibile la qualità dell'aria interna

*Nuvap è partner di Urban Symbiosis per il progetto Mini IQ e si occupa di inquinamento indoor attraverso tecnologie di raccolta e analisi dei dati ambientali

 

Mini IQ is the first system that can host a multisensor device capable of detecting environmental quality: ProSystem N2Smart, developed in partnership with Nuvap, making the most of its experience in the design and development of solutions for environmental monitoring.

The device contains the technology used in Nuvap’s high-range products, including algorithms for rationalizing, processing and validating the collected data. This solution includes a tool called Nuvap Index, which allows you to quickly and effectively identify the healthiness of your indoor environments.

The data collected by the Nuvap solution is available to the user through a smartphone application, designed to ensure immediacy in the user experience.

The parameters monitored by ProSystem N2Smart are:

La tua casa sotto controllo. Mini IQ è il primo sistema in grado di ospitare un dispositivo multisensore capace di rilevare la qualità degli ambienti in cui viviamo: ProSystem N2 Smart, elaborato in partnership con l'azienda Nuvap, forte della sua esperienza nella progettazione e nello sviluppo di soluzioni per il monitoraggio ambientale. Il dispositivo porta con sé la tecnologia utilizzata nei prodotti di alta gamma di Nuvap, tra cui gli algoritmi per la razionalizzazione, elaborazione e validazione dei dati raccolti. Questa soluzione include uno strumento chiamato Nuvap Index, che permette di identificare in modo rapido ed efficace il livello di salubrità degli ambienti indoor. I dati raccolti dalla soluzione Nuvap sono disponibili all’utente tramite una applicazione per smartphone, progettata per garantire semplicità ed immediatezza nell’esperienza di utilizzo.

DESIGN CONSIDERATIONS

ADD-ON SPECIAL FOR INDIEGOGO 

Once you have selected your favorite perks, you can add this add-on to your order. The Led Cricket kit is a lighting system designed only for Mini IQ and Mini Green. It is simple, easy to assemble, and solves the problems of low light environments or winter seasons.
It can be used during the day or night. Light with a slight pink dominance that replicates the sunlight.

Consumption 7W/h
No extra shipping cost

Una volta selezionato la tua station preferita, puoi aggiungere il kit Led Cricket che è un sistema di illuminazione progettato unicamente per Mini IQ e Mini Green. E’ semplice, di facile assemblaggio e risolve i problemi di ambienti poco luminosi o  stagioni invernali con poca luce solare, come nel Nord Europa.

Può essere utilizzato durante il giorno o la notte. Luce con una leggera dominante rosa (così viene letta dal nostro occhio) che replica la luce solare.

Consumo 7W/h, colegamento con la rete di casa.

WHO WE ARE

We are Urban Symbiosis Design, a company start-up with experience in creating natural modules for indoor air purification. We call these modules Cleaning Stations. With the introduction of the Mini IQ Cleaning Station, we want to give everyone the opportunity to welcome one of our products in your domestic environments. Mini IQ is a module with reduced size and price and the smart air quality monitoring meter that helps you keep track of pollutants in your home.

Our approach is transdisciplinary: art, social research, scientific studies. Everything becomes inspiration and material for our creative work. We form organic and heterogeneous teams interested in cooperation on specific projects. These teams work together, experimenting in the design of eco-sustainable objects following most recent scientific research on indoor air quality and human health. Follow us, spread this campaign and help us bring nature back into everyday life!

Chi siamo. Siamo una startup innovativa con esperienza nella creazione di moduli naturali per la purificazione dell’aria indoor, chiamati Cleaning Station. Con l’introduzione della Cleaning Station Mini IQ vogliamo dare a tutti la possibilità di accogliere uno dei nostri prodotti tra le pareti di casa. Mini IQ è infatti un modulo con dimensioni e prezzo ridotti, con una caratteristica di cui andiamo molto fieri. Può contenere infatti un innovativo rilevatore per tenere sotto controllo i livelli di inquinanti.

Il nostro approccio è transdisciplinare: arte, design, ricerca sociale, studi scientifici. Tutto diventa ispirazione e materia per il nostro lavoro creativo. Formiamo team organici ed eterogenei interessati alla cooperazione su progetti specifici. Questi team sperimentano approcci originali alla progettazione dell’oggetto di design ecosostenibile e alla comunicazione scientifica sui social media. Seguici, diffondi questa campagna e aiutaci a portare la natura nella vita di tutti i giorni!

PARTNERS

Risks and challenges

Urban Symbiosis Design has been designing, manufacturing and selling its sustainable air purification design modules for 4 years. We can count on proven and reliable production partners. We have received national recognition as an innovative design startup in wellness.

Urban Symbiosis Design progetta, produce e vende i propri moduli di design sostenibili per la purificazione dell’aria da 4 anni. Possiamo contare su partner di produzione già testati ed affidabili. Abbiamo ricevuto un riconoscimento nazionale come startup innovativa di progettazione in ambito wellbeing.

We rely on a trusted suppliers, with whom we have worked in past manufacturing and distribution experiences. Nel lancio di Mini IQ, verranno utilizzati unicamente fornitori di fiducia, con cui abbiamo lavorato con ottimi risultati nelle scorse esperienze di produzione e distribuzione. Covid 19 Depending on how the Covid 19 pandemic evolves, unforeseen events may occur within the supply chain and in the delivery calendar. However, we have taken all possible measures to ensure that this situation does not lead to excessive delays. We will keep in touch with all our supporters to communicate any news!

A seconda di come evolverà la pandemia da Covid 19, all'interno della catena di fornitura e nel calendario delle consegne potranno verificarsi imprevisti. Abbiamo tuttavia preso tutte le misure possibili perché ciò non generi ritardi eccessivi. Ci terremo in contatto con tutti i nostri sostenitori per comunicare tempestivamente ogni novità!

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

We have always believed in products designed to last over time, which can truly become an integral part of your homes and live with you for a long time. The same plants contained in Mini IQ regenerate through suckers. In this way you can reuse the same module for many years, reducing consumption and waste.

Design di lunga durata. Da sempre, crediamo in un design pensato per resistere nel tempo, che possa diventare davvero parte integrante delle vostre case e accompagnarvi a lungo. Le stesse piante contenute in Mini IQ si rigenerano attraverso i polloni. In questo modo potrete riutilizzare lo stesso modulo per molti anni, riducendo così consumi e sprechi.

Reusability and recyclability

The essential design of Mini IQ combined with your creativity will allow our products to be reinterpreted and reused. Once the use cycle is finished, they can be recycled as the materials are easily disassembled in order to give them a new life and purpose.

Riuso e riciclo. Il design essenziale di Mini IQ unito alla vostra creatività permetterà ai nostri prodotti di essere reinterpretati e riutilizzati. Una volta terminato il ciclo di riuso, vengono smaltiti velocemente, essendo progettati in modo da poter essere smontati e riciclati in maniera estremamente semplice.

Sustainable materials

We have chosen to use only materials such as aluminum and iron sheet, 90% recycled, combined with ecological and biodegradable raw materials such as natural rubber.

Materiali sostenibili Abbiamo scelto di utilizzare solo materiali di recupero come alluminio e lamiera di ferro, riciclati al 90%, uniti a materie prime povere, ecologiche e biodegradabili come la gomma naturale.

Environmentally friendly factories

For us it is essential to ensure a production that protects the environment and is completely Made in Italy. We carefully select our suppliers from local craftsmen and companies. We only work with companies that fully comply with environmental and social responsibility regulations. The creation of the components and the assembly of our products require a very low electric consumption.

Fabbriche che rispettano l’ambiente. Per noi è fondamentale garantire una produzione che tuteli l’ambiente e sia completamente Made in Italy, selezionando con cura i nostri fornitori tra artigiani e produttori locali. Collaboriamo unicamente con aziende che rispettano in pieno le normative in materia ambientale e di responsabilità sociale. La creazione dei componenti e l’assemblaggio dei nostri prodotti richiedono un consumo bassissimo di energia elettrica.

Sustainable Distribution

We choose totally recyclable packaging, made up of a high percentage of recycled materials. We are committed to offsetting the CO2 emissions generated by our transport delivery of the products. In doing so, we are working with an NGO that offers reforestation solutions for carbon sequester. We commit to communicate the details of this agreement as soon as possible.

Consegna e distribuzione sostenibili. Scegliamo imballaggi totalmente riciclabili, composti da un’alta percentuale di materiali riciclati. Ci stiamo impegnando per arrivare alla data di distribuzione dei prodotti con un accordo con una Ong che si occupi di forestazione, in modo da azzerare le emissioni di CO2 generate dal trasporto. Ci impegniamo a comunicare al più presto la definizione di questo accordo.
story_txt:
A design module with a characteristic appearance in its essentiality. An eco-sustainable choice to reconnect with nature in our homes and fight indoor air pollution for a healthier indoor environment. Mini IQ is able to purify the air and, thanks to the ProSystem N2Smart device by Nuvap, detect the levels of pollutants in your rooms.Progettiamo per il benessere. Un modulo di design dall’aspetto indimenticabile nella sua essenzialità. Una scelta ecosostenibile per ristabilire il nostro legame spirituale con l’ambiente. Da una parte, Mini IQ è un punto di partenza per creare comfort zone dinamiche e d’impatto, in cui respirare a pieni polmoni e meditare sulla semplice bellezza del mondo vegetale. Dall'altra, è in grado di purificare l’aria e, grazie al dispositivo ProSystem N2 Smart, di rilevare i livelli di inquinanti delle nostre stanze.Mini IQ is able to improve the air quality of your homes through a symbiotic bio-filtration process, in which the Bromeliaceae air-plants, characterized by the no-need of soil, draw most of nourishments by absorbing air pollutants, particulate matter (PM) and volatile organic compounds (VOCs). These substances are usually suspended in the air of our apartments.Mini IQ was born with the support of the indoor pollution team of the University of Bari. Working with this team, we conducted experiments on the abilities of the plants in the absorption of harmful substances (PM, VOCs). The team is coordinated by Gianluigi De Gennaro, Professor of Environmental Chemistry.For more information on indoor air pollution and health, please see the World Health Organization (WHO) research.La scienza dietro Mini IQ. Mini IQ è in grado di intervenire sulla qualità dell’aria delle nostre case attraverso un processo simbiotico, in cui l’infrastruttura vegetale assorbe le particelle di inquinanti, particolato e composti chimici volatili. Le Bromeliacee selezionate per Mini IQ hanno infatti una grande particolarità: non hanno bisogno di vivere a contatto con il terreno, poiché traggono nutrimento direttamente dalle particelle sospese nell’aria. In questo modo, eliminano le sostanze nocive presenti negli ambienti indoor.Mini IQ nasce con il supporto del team sull’inquinamento indoor dell’Università di Bari, con cui conduciamo esperimenti sulle capacità del mondo vegetale nell’assorbimento delle sostanze nocive. Il team è coordinato dal professor Gianluigi De Gennaro.  In this infographic, you can track the forecast of the pollutants in your house with and without Mini IQ. A recent research, conducted with NUVAP*, produced the important result of a 43% decrease in air pollutants thanks to Mini IQ biofiltration work. Especially during this historical period, where we spend more than 90% of our time indoor, it is essential to improve indoor air quality as much as possible. * NUVAP is a partner of Mini IQ and a company focused on environmental data collection and analysis technologies.In questa infografica è possibile tracciare la previsione degli inquinanti presenti in casa con e senza Mini IQ. Una recente ricerca condotta con Nuvap* ha prodotto l'importante risultato di una dimunzione del 43% degli inquinanti atmosferici grazie al lavoro di biofiltrazione Mini IQ. Soprattutto in questo periodo storico, in cui trascorriamo più del 90% del nostro tempo al chiuso, è fondamentale migliorare il più possibile la qualità dell'aria interna*Nuvap è partner di Urban Symbiosis per il progetto Mini IQ e si occupa di inquinamento indoor attraverso tecnologie di raccolta e analisi dei dati ambientali  Mini IQ is the first system that can host a multisensor device capable of detecting environmental quality: ProSystem N2Smart, developed in partnership with Nuvap, making the most of its experience in the design and development of solutions for environmental monitoring.The device contains the technology used in Nuvap’s high-range products, including algorithms for rationalizing, processing and validating the collected data. This solution includes a tool called Nuvap Index, which allows you to quickly and effectively identify the healthiness of your indoor environments.The data collected by the Nuvap solution is available to the user through a smartphone application, designed to ensure immediacy in the user experience.The parameters monitored by ProSystem N2Smart are:La tua casa sotto controllo. Mini IQ è il primo sistema in grado di ospitare un dispositivo multisensore capace di rilevare la qualità degli ambienti in cui viviamo: ProSystem N2 Smart, elaborato in partnership con l'azienda Nuvap, forte della sua esperienza nella progettazione e nello sviluppo di soluzioni per il monitoraggio ambientale. Il dispositivo porta con sé la tecnologia utilizzata nei prodotti di alta gamma di Nuvap, tra cui gli algoritmi per la razionalizzazione, elaborazione e validazione dei dati raccolti. Questa soluzione include uno strumento chiamato Nuvap Index, che permette di identificare in modo rapido ed efficace il livello di salubrità degli ambienti indoor. I dati raccolti dalla soluzione Nuvap sono disponibili all’utente tramite una applicazione per smartphone, progettata per garantire semplicità ed immediatezza nell’esperienza di utilizzo.DESIGN CONSIDERATIONSADD-ON SPECIAL FOR INDIEGOGO Once you have selected your favorite perks, you can add this add-on to your order. The Led Cricket kit is a lighting system designed only for Mini IQ and Mini Green. It is simple, easy to assemble, and solves the problems of low light environments or winter seasons.It can be used during the day or night. Light with a slight pink dominance that replicates the sunlight.Consumption 7W/hNo extra shipping costUna volta selezionato la tua station preferita, puoi aggiungere il kit Led Cricket che è un sistema di illuminazione progettato unicamente per Mini IQ e Mini Green. E’ semplice, di facile assemblaggio e risolve i problemi di ambienti poco luminosi o  stagioni invernali con poca luce solare, come nel Nord Europa.Può essere utilizzato durante il giorno o la notte. Luce con una leggera dominante rosa (così viene letta dal nostro occhio) che replica la luce solare.Consumo 7W/h, colegamento con la rete di casa.WHO WE AREWe are Urban Symbiosis Design, a company start-up with experience in creating natural modules for indoor air purification. We call these modules Cleaning Stations. With the introduction of the Mini IQ Cleaning Station, we want to give everyone the opportunity to welcome one of our products in your domestic environments. Mini IQ is a module with reduced size and price and the smart air quality monitoring meter that helps you keep track of pollutants in your home.Our approach is transdisciplinary: art, social research, scientific studies. Everything becomes inspiration and material for our creative work. We form organic and heterogeneous teams interested in cooperation on specific projects. These teams work together, experimenting in the design of eco-sustainable objects following most recent scientific research on indoor air quality and human health. Follow us, spread this campaign and help us bring nature back into everyday life!Chi siamo. Siamo una startup innovativa con esperienza nella creazione di moduli naturali per la purificazione dell’aria indoor, chiamati Cleaning Station. Con l’introduzione della Cleaning Station Mini IQ vogliamo dare a tutti la possibilità di accogliere uno dei nostri prodotti tra le pareti di casa. Mini IQ è infatti un modulo con dimensioni e prezzo ridotti, con una caratteristica di cui andiamo molto fieri. Può contenere infatti un innovativo rilevatore per tenere sotto controllo i livelli di inquinanti.Il nostro approccio è transdisciplinare: arte, design, ricerca sociale, studi scientifici. Tutto diventa ispirazione e materia per il nostro lavoro creativo. Formiamo team organici ed eterogenei interessati alla cooperazione su progetti specifici. Questi team sperimentano approcci originali alla progettazione dell’oggetto di design ecosostenibile e alla comunicazione scientifica sui social media. Seguici, diffondi questa campagna e aiutaci a portare la natura nella vita di tutti i giorni!
PARTNERSRisks and challengesUrban Symbiosis Design has been designing, manufacturing and selling its sustainable air purification design modules for 4 years. We can count on proven and reliable production partners. story:
What is Robotics U?

Robotics U is the intersection of decades of experience in both robotics development and education.  With Robotics U kids and parents will explore the world of Robotics through a variety of fun builds, games, and activities; as well as, a full video curriculum to teach the foundational elements behind a series of robotics applications.  Each set is designed to teach the basics of robotics, engineering, and programming to better prepare kids for their science and math courses, careers, and interests.

We worked tirelessly to develop a product that will help parents and kids better understand the world around them in a fun and engaging way. Together, families will discover the wonder of building, programming and bringing all kinds of robots to life. 

Robotics U is a platform for experiential learning. Our robotics sets aren't a one-off building experience. They encourage children to innovate while walking them through a series of lessons that teach them the fundamentals of robotics. Children build, play, learn, and innovate.

 

4 Distinct Robotics Builds

The Balance Bot is the hero build. Building this robot teaches kids all about the science behind self-driving cars and relates each element to real world applications outside of Tesla and other luxury cars.

The Scorpion Bot uses a variety of sensors and motors!

Arcade Bot lets kids build 2 different games. Build a tennis game and play with a friend or against the computer. Build a memory game that uses touch sensors and the built-in computer to play a single player game! Automated action using touch sensors to show computer interaction!

The rescue bot works in two ways: movement can be programmed using the app and sensors for obstacle avoidance, or bot can be driven like an RC car using the app!

Extensive App Interface

The Robotics U system is easy to use with a fantastic user interface. 

 

Product Availability

Robotics U is already manufactured and units are on their way to our fulfillment facilities across North America. We will begin shipping right away!

Team

 

FAQ

 

Have a question?

Want to dive deeper into the fascinating world of Robotics U? Check out our FAQ and indulge your curious mind.

  • Do I need to know anything about robotics or programming?
  • Not at all! Robotics U is designed to be fun and educational for everyone. So relax and have fun!
  • How old does my child need to be to enjoy Robotics U?
  • The recommended age range for Robotics U is 8-14, but it’s fun for just about everyone.
  • What will my child learn?
  • RoboticsU teaches kids the basic robotics and programming skills needed to better prepare them for STEM (science, technology, engineering, and math) careers and interests.

story:
ABOUT

We strive and make it our above all goal to enrich the local communities with quality entertainment and advertising through the means of film, radio, and other web-based outreach.

Our main goal is to support the local community through our documentary, film, and podcast services. For those who may not know, a “Podcast” is a streamable and downloadable Internet radio/video show. Podcasting is the foundation of Castwave Studios.  Through some years, our podcast “Boldly Going Nowhere” has seen various changes through structure, hosts, guests, and others. Now we have adapted to the fast-paced world that is Internet culture. We realize that short segments of episodes not only boost the numbers but provide listeners a variety of categories of their choosing.

 

 

 

CastWave Studios is also a creator of films and an outlet as well. We take considerable satisfaction in being a host for local films as well as other art. Certain positive stories in the community could, otherwise, be hidden and only be handled by word of mouth. Naturally, this can lead to the spreading of untruth. We at CastWave Studios want and need to be truthful. A Documentary film can deliver your message to the millions upon millions on the web. A picture may be worth a thousand words. Imagine the informational value that a Documentary video can bring.

 

IMPACT

Our main goal is to bring more awareness to local businesses (Frederick/Baltimore/DC area). Advertising in segments through our podcast can help these local businesses reach a wide and diverse audience. We realize that mainstream advertising can be somewhat costly.  CastWave Studios offers affordable and effective advertising even for the smallest of business operations. 

What would happen if we don't get funding? Nothing. The previous positive statements about helping communities and local businesses will be reduced to a existential primordial goop that is without change.

 

 

BUDGET

Audio and video equipment is not cheap. We need these tools to provide professional media. Please take a look where the donated money will go.

Equipment Category

YOU CAN HELP!

Please TELL YOUR FRIENDS!!!  Even if you don't donate, spread the word about this page! Don't let us make sad puppy faces at you. Pa pa ...pwwweeezzzee!?!?

story:
The SageMyLife Story

I have an idea about how to make life easier, more satisfying and successful by making personal networks work better.

The idea was catalyzed by Robert Downey, Jr., who was quoted in an article as saying that he had a yoga teacher, a psychiatrist and a Sensei in his life because he was, after all, not a Model T; he was a Ferrari. He had a point. None of us are Model T’s. Not in today’s complex, 24/7, ‘always on’ world. We all need a pit crew to help keep us going. In fact, we need several. We call them networks. We’re born into five networks. As we enter the work world, we gain even more.

I’ve been thinking about this since 2007. (I had a day job and was traveling globally. This was good material for long flights and late night discussions.) You know what? Not one person could name all the people in their networks. People willing to try to list them all found it took close to eight hours and even then, they missed 20% on average. No one was consciously aware of how they built, managed or used their networks. Most people felt they were victims of the demands the networks placed on them. Only rarely did I meet someone who’d strategically managed their networks and when I did, they wanted help to do it better.

I think I can help. In fact, I know I can because of the impact that SageMyLife has already had in the personal, family and work life of so many people.

What is the status of the project?


What are the features of the app?
  • Language neutral – any language
  • Android, IOS
  • Guided data entry
  • Attractive data display
  • Reflections for network management
  • Reminders of network support
  • Allows you to add additional information (phone numbers)
  • PDF or print versions
  • Copy function for children in family
  • Archived year-to-year
  • Deal for parents of multiples
  • Special applications for adoptions and foster care
  • Expected time to map: 5 Min


    Here’s my request: help us take the next step.  That means helping us fund:

    • An explainer video for users
    • Private beta testing, including refining the look of the map, assuring it is fast, easy and intuitive
    • Translation of all materials into Spanish and testing with Hispanic parents
    • And for our stretch goal, we have two projects in mind. The first integrates our platform with 3D printers or other methods so that children ages 10 and older can build their own 3D network maps. The second builds a game we’ve designed for toddlers and parents through children age 7. 

    To get this far, I’ve bootstrapped the business and had lots of help from friends who used the first three generations of the tools.  I’ve also had some help from folks working ‘on spec’ anticipating we’d make it to market. Lots of people have believed in this along the way.

    Now, we need you! Please support our campaign and claim the awesome perks we’re offering to our backers. 

    SageMyLife Reach

    We’ve worked globally and want to offer SageMyLife to anyone who’d like to use it. The web is going to make that easier. Many people around the world speak English and since our networks are global, we anticipate that some English-speaking people outside the US will benefit. Our Spanish translation will help Spanish-speaking people wherever they live as well.

    Our platform is not language dependent and is immediately responsive in whatever language we provide. It’s only a matter of time before we find the partners to help us assure that SageMyLife is available to people in all the major world languages. 

    About the perks!

    You can be part of the first-ever App to help parents better manage their child’s networks.

    The program you’d be supporting is going to do a lot.

    It will help people name everyone in their personal network and track how the network changes over time. This is relevant as children grow up and as parents try to manage those networks over time.

    Our tool will help parents create maps to quantify and qualify people in their children’s networks now. 

    It will help them see how complex those networks become when families blend. And, it will help all families manage better.  

    Why Start with Young Children’s Networks?

    ¿Por qué empezar con las redes de los niños pequeños?

    Personal networks are an important part of life. Networks affect health, wealth and happiness. In fact, we could not survive without them. Yet, networks can be problematic if they are too complex or poorly managed. 

    Las redes personales son una parte importante de la vida. Redes afectan la salud , la riqueza y la felicidad. De hecho, no podríamos sobrevivir sin ellos. Sin embargo, las redes pueden ser problemáticos si son demasiado complicados o manejadas mal.

    Parents are responsible for managing their children’s networks. Children are born into networks and as they grow, create networks of their own. Parents are responsible for assuring the people in a child’s network will help keep the child healthy, safe and developing well, especially when the parent is not there to supervise. 

    Los padres son responsables de manejar las redes de sus hijos. Los niños nacen en las redes ya al medio que crecen, crean sus propias redes. Los padres son responsables de asegurar a la gente en la red de un hijo le ayudará a mantener al niño sano, seguro y desarrollando así , sobre todo cuando el padre no está allí para supervisor.  

    There are no robust tools to help parents understand or manage children’s networks. Children’s networks are largely ignored, even in parenting literature and classes. As people pursue their personal and career-life goals and then add parenting to the mix, their network “bandwidth” is stretched to the breaking point far too often. This can add to a parent’s sense of overwhelm.

    No hay herramientas sólidas para ayudar a los padres a entender o manejar las redes de los niños. Redes de los niños son ignorados , incluso en la crianza de la literatura y clases . Como la gente persigue sus metas personales y de la vida profesional y luego añadir la paternidad a la mezcla, su red se estira hasta el límite con demasiada frecuencia. Esto puede añadir a la sensación de los padres de abrumar.

    People lose touch with their own networks when children are born. Networks provide important social support during times of stress. Losing touch with personal networks is now known to be a major reason why marital and job satisfaction decline with the birth of a child. It is also a major cause of post-partum depression and has been implicated in child abuse.

    Las personas pierden el contacto con sus propias redes , cuando nacen los niños. Las redes proporcionan un importante apoyo social durante momentos de estrés. Perder contacto con las redes personales ahora se sabe que es una razón importante por la disminución de la satisfacción marital y trabajo con el nacimiento de un niño. También es una causa importante de depresión post -parto y se ha implicado en el abuso infantile.

    Parents face new management challenges with the birth of each child. A second child does not add “just one more” person to a family. Each new child adds an exponential number of teachers, coaches, friends and friends’ parents to the network management tasks that parents face.  If a child becomes seriously ill or has a special need – or special talent – the numbers grow larger still. Then, if unplanned events or crises (e.g., job relocation, divorce) occur, the stresses and network management demands become all the greater.

    Los padres se enfrentan a nuevos retos de gestión, con el nacimiento de cada hijo . Un segundo hijo no es " sólo uno más " a su familia . Cada nuevo niño agrega un número exponencial de profesores, entrenadores, amigos y padres de los amigos. Si un niño se convierte se enferma o tiene una necesidad especial - o talento especial - los números se hacen más grandes todavía. Entonces, si se producen acontecimientos imprevistos o situaciones de crisis (por ejemplo , reubicación laboral, divorcio), el estrés y las exigencias de gestión de la red se convierten en aún mayor.

    It’s easy for parents to misdiagnose the stresses they feel. Lacking awareness of how complex their relationship network management tasks can be, parents can wrongfully blame themselves and each other for the fatigue and stress they feel. Network management will not solve all of a parent’s problems, but can help.

    Es fácil para los padres no entender las tensiones que sienten. Al no concer la complejidad de sus tareas de gestión de red relación pueden ser, los padres erróneamente pueden culparse a sí mismos y entre sí por el cansancio y el estrés que sienten. Gestión de la red no va a resolver todos los problemas de los padres, pero puede ayudar.

      Final Push

      We need your help to cross the finish line and make SageMyLife a reality.


      Our Crowdfunding Campaign

      Prototypes: We have working prototypes for children’s maps. The photos posted in this campaign are based on those prototypes. Our task now is to do additional testing in a closed beta to be certain the instructions are easy to follow and the process is efficient. Our second task is to translate the materials into Spanish to ease SageMyLife access for the Hispanic Communities in the US.

      Production: At launch, we’ll offer PDF versions of SageMyLife Network Maps for everyone who purchases access to the app. We’ll continue to do that in the future, and add various sizes of large printed maps since parents have told us they’d liked them for framing.

      Delivery: We believe that understanding networks is important, even for children. We also know from research that SageMyLife Network Maps for Children will be a hot gift item. It’s one that will be unique for each child and unique for each year in a child’s life. We are confident that we can meet the schedule for holiday gifts in 2014. We will keep our contributors posted as we move forward and hit the milestones between the end of the campaign and our launch before the holidays. 

      The SageMyLife Network 


      Learn more at our website: www.sagemylife.com
      Contact me with questions: glenna@sagemylife.com
story_txt:
The SageMyLife StoryI have an idea about how to make life
easier, more satisfying and successful by making personal networks work better.
The idea was catalyzed by Robert Downey,
Jr., who was quoted in an article as saying that he had a yoga teacher, a
psychiatrist and a Sensei in his life because he was, after all, not a Model T; he was a Ferrari. He had a point. None of us are Model T’s. Not in today’s complex,
24/7, ‘always on’ world. We all need a pit crew to help keep us going. In fact,
we need several. We call them networks. We’re born into five networks. As we
enter the work world, we gain even more. 
I’ve been thinking about this since
2007. (I had a day job and was traveling globally. This was good material for
long flights and late night discussions.) You know what? Not one person could name
all the people in their networks. People willing to try to list them all found
it took close to eight hours and even then, they missed 20% on average. No
one was consciously aware of how they built, managed or used their networks.
Most people felt they were victims of the demands the networks placed on them.
Only rarely did I meet someone who’d strategically managed their networks and
when I did, they wanted help to do it better. 
I think I can help. In fact, I know I can
because of the impact that SageMyLife has already had in the personal, family
and work life of so many people.
What is the status of the project?What are the features of the app?

Language neutral – any language


Android, IOS


Guided data entry


Attractive data display


Reflections for network management


Reminders of network support


Allows you to add additional
information (phone numbers)


PDF or print versions


Copy function for children in family


Archived year-to-year


Deal for parents of multiples


Special applications for adoptions
and foster care


Expected time to map: 5 Min



Here’s my request: help us take the next step.  That means helping us fund:

An
explainer video for users


Private
beta testing, including refining the look of the map, assuring it is fast, easy
and intuitive


Translation
of all materials into Spanish and testing with Hispanic parents


And
for our stretch goal, we have two projects in mind. The first integrates our
platform with 3D printers or other methods so that children ages 10 and older
can build their own 3D network maps. The second builds a game we’ve designed
for toddlers and parents through children age 7.

benefit. Our Spanish translation will help Spanish-speaking people wherever
they live as well.

help parents better manage their child’s networks.

those networks become when families blend. And, it will help all families
manage better.

could not survive without them. Yet, networks can be problematic if they are

story:
WE ARE...

Portuguese,Stupid,Ridiculous,Not Funny,In love,Passionate,Equal,Strong,Foodies

We are Lorenzo and Pedro

SHORT STORY!

We love life, we love each other and food is our third boyfriend! We like to dance, sing and get naked while we cook, so why not make a cooking show about that. Sexy Funny Kitchen was created, and a Sexy Family was born. The Kitchen was ugly, and it was time to make it beautiful! We build it with our hands, and now we are stuck in a phase where we need help to finish it. Do you wanna help? We will totally make it worth it! Promise! 

ps: for the LONG version read bellow!


LONG VERSION!

We are Lorenzo and Pedro, a really happy couple from Portugal. We meet in 2012 in a very unusual way and the first think we found in common was our HUGE passion for food! But eating it was not the best part, the process of cooking was definitely the CLIMAX! 

We always had so much fun on our cooking marathons. We couldn't stop singing, dancing and destroying the Kitchen at the same time. But all of this always happened in a very "undressed way"...

Every time we were watching our favorite cooking shows, we always found them a bit boring and old fashioned! Nothing against it, but there was something missing.
Food is Life, and Life is supposed to be Funny and Sexy! So why couldn't exist a cooking show where the recipes were explained step by step, but with a pinch of Sexiness and a Funny flavor? There's no reason why! 
So we created SEXY FUNNY KITCHEN! A homemade cooking show, a place where we could share our favorite recipes, but with the same energy and excitement as we did when we were alone at home! 

Of course the energy was always high, the fun was always present and the sexiness become a must, but we never forgot about the food! The food is like our main actor! Its where we spend most of our time, we don't just cook it. We think about it, we try it once, twice and we make it perfect. And when its ready we press the record button! And usually the result is food porn!

After the first 10 episodes, we realize there were a lot of people that couldn't wait for the next Thursday, to have their weekly dose of Fun, Sexiness and Foodporn!

We called them, our Sexy Family! And its not only a cool name, its what describes them! They are all Sexy, not physically talking, they are Sexy because they share the same passion for life as we do, they have sense of humor and they love food! They made us smile SO much with all the pictures they sent from their food creations, and the way they interact with us, it made us feel a real connection, not as friends, as a Family, a Sexy Family!

We had a really intense and crazy 2015!!! But not only for everything that happened. Most of all, due to our little secret from our Sexy Family! We were building a new Kitchen for them. We couldn't afford to buy it, or to pay for someone to build it, so we started a slow process of cleaning our garage, design a new kitchen, find wood on the forests near home, buying construction materials, learn about pluming and electricity, and after 6 months, of intense days working on it, it was finally Perfect! Our little baby! The NEW Sexy Funny Kitchen!

 Now we got to a point where we need help to finish this. We really can't afford all the missing parts. And that is why you are reading all of this in the 

Indiegogo website :) 


We need but We also give <3

To make this Kitchen fully functional and 100% ready we need more than what we are asking, the 2000$ . But this number its enough to start recording on it and give a fresh face to our baby, Sexy Funny Kitchen!
This money will be used to buy a second hand stove, oven, microwave, some appliances, plates, glasses, simple cool decoration, some lights, and to fix a old fridge we have.

But when you receive you should always give back, and that's why we created some really cool incentives! From postcards from Portugal, to a box full of tradicional goodies or having your picture or quote in the New Kitchen wall or you can just have awesome holidays in our cosy beach home! And if you are wild enough you can even fly us to your city, and we will be your personal Sexy Chefs!

But there is more...


Sexy Funny Kitchen BIGGEST achievement! 

The biggest dream would just be able to do this! Cooking is our biggest hobby, and we really would love to make this project a way of living, because there is nothing better than do what you love the most, full time!

And its not only about the food, we also like the cinematographic side of it!

We really love all the processes of making a cooking show, from having the ideia, , buying the ingredients, testing it, filming it, doing nice shoots, editing, and we always like to watch the final result in our TV screen, like if it was a movie time!

But there were a couple of times, where Sexy Funny Kitchen was not on our TV screen because we were plugging a cable on it. We got a really nice surprise when the biggest channel of our country invited us to go there and share one of our recipes! And we did it, and we loved it! The feedback was also amazing, and after that we were invited to a couple more.

It was not only positive because of the food, but also due to the fact that in our Country, you don't see a open gay couple on television. Most of all, dancing, singing, cooking and losing some pieces of clothe! :D 

We feel that by doing this passion we have, we are also helping others, to feel more free, to lose fear and to believe that any relationship, no matter what is the sexual orientation, can be Happy. Genuinely happy!

That was one of the many reasons why ILGA gave us an award in January 2016.

Because they know, what we know, Love is to beautiful to be inside a closet, or should we say, inside a kitchen cabinet <3 


Other Ways You Can Help

As that gorgeous lady said in our Indiegogo Video Campaign, if you can't donate, no problem! We love you the same way as we did before! And if you are new to us, we totally understand it, you can just sit down and enjoy the show.
That would be already a big smile in our faces!
But if you would like to help anyway, just help us sharing our words and use the indiegogo share tools, so we can make this Kitchen gorgeous, and this Sexy Family, even bigger! 
And of course, if you like what you see, and you still haven't subscribe, you can join the Sexy Family now, by clicking here <3


And as we always say, no matter what, NEVER FORGET TO SMILE!!!

YOU NEVER SAW IT BEFORE??? HERE IT IS:

Here bellow, we leave you 5 random episodes we did:
3 AWESOME ZUCCHINI SUSHI ROLLS!!!

TO CELEBRATE THE INDIA INDEPENDENCE DAY WE DID CRAZY SAMOSAS!!!

ARE YOU A CHOCOLATE PERSON??? TRY TO MIX OREOS WITH REESES!!!

ONE OF OUR FAVORITES! WE CALL IT: BEST MEAL EVER!!!

WHO DOESN'T LIKE CUPCAKES??? EASY, TASTY AND RAINBOW CUPCAKES!!!


FOLLOW US:

@lorenzoandpedro (facebook and twitter)

@lorenzoandpedrolove (instagram)

Snapchat - lorenzoandpedro


OUR HASHTAGS:
#lorenzoandpedro
#SFKepisode
#SexyFamily

story:
iC1 mini, Minimalist Alexa-Enabled Alarm Clock     


For only $29, iC1 mini is an Alexa-enabled alarm clock with customizable screen brightness, alarm dial set, and smartphone App control.


After the success of our previous C1pro, and C2 Kickstarter Projects, we're ready to take a step forward to make the Smarter Homtime iC1 mini based on valuable feedback from the Homtime community. It’s a handy Alexa-enabled Alarm that you can control with your voice! With the unique patterned button on top, iC1 mini allows you to set an alarm quickly, and adjust the clock to the perfect brightness.

iC1 is smart, compact, and combines all bedside essentials in an attractive, modern minimalist design, that keeps perfect time, wakes you up reliably and helps you start your morning out right.  

iC1 mini is controlled via an Alexa skill from any Amazon Echo device, you can talk to your Amazon Echo, or Echo spot to set alarms, change time settings, or enable/disable alarms. iC1 mini provides you an ultra-affordable smart home option for timekeeping.

iC1 mini uses a custom, Alexa-enabled “skill”, a specially programmed interface with Amazon’s powerful Alexa conversational AI system.  It’s smart and simple to control with just your voice! It’s compatible with all Amazon Echo devices and makes a convenient addition to any smart home.

 

Homtime Patterned Button

The Homtime Patterned Button is a smooth and accurate rotary dial that makes it simple to set an alarm. Simply rotate to the desired wake up time, press ‘Set’ button and you are done. At the desired time, iC1 mini will wake you up.

 

Customize Screen Brightness

Create the perfect light ambiance in any room. The clock’s LCD can be set to your desired level for any time of day or night. iC1 mini lets you adjust and customize 4-levels of brightness to achieve the perfect lighting level and get a better night’s sleep.

 

Smart App Control

iC1 mini comes with an intuitive, user-friendly App interface. It’s super easy to set alarms, times, or change time zones for multiple clocks! It’s your family’s accurate and reliable timekeeper, helping the whole household stay organized and on-time to make the most of the day!

 

2 USB Charging Ports

iC1 mini features two USB charing ports and charging indicators, it’s capable of safe, fast, dual simultaneous charging of phones and mobile devices so you will always start your day with full power.

 

 Tech Specs  

The iC1 mini combines a sleek, modern minimalist design with smart & user-friendly technology. 

We’re a tight group of friends with varied areas of expertise, including industrial design and home audio equipment. We’re young (well, most of us!), dynamic and creative. Through our previous products, C2 & C1pro, we have gained a great deal of experience with successful consumer audio product design and manufacturing.    

We share a common goal: to create brilliant devices that make time at home more relaxing and enjoyable, whether it’s spent quietly or with family and friends. We are excited to bring you iC1 mini and share our vision with the world.

story:
The New and Improved VentiFresh ECO is available for Pre-Order NOW!

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Introducing space technology to our homes may start at a place so small that most people didn’t realize it can be done. Those smelly containers like cat litter boxes or trash cans. According to market research, what bother people the most about home litter storage is the lingering odors. And the most advanced technology to address this problem? We bet what worked at the Space Station can do the job.

To make it even better, it’s granted to come with these good features: no masking chemicals, nature and safe process, no harmful by-products, extremely low energy consumption, and eco-friendly. Wouldn’t it be great if it’s also maintenance free, no filter replacement required, and super affordable?

Of course, something this ideal works beyond trash cans. VentiFresh gets rid of residual odors from any small storage spaces and containers in the house.

Help us to bring the million-dollar tech to your homes!

 

 

How To Use Ventifresh?

FEATURED ON

VENTIFRESH  VS.  GAS

 

 

BREATHE EASY WHEREVER YOU GO

VentiFresh takes only seconds to install and you can use it anywhere you need it. Designed to use continuously with an USB power plug or for short-term portable use with a power bank, it works by plugging in the power as you would recharging a mobile phone. Place it in the lid of your trash can, cat litter box, inside a locker, drawer, or shoe closet, and enjoy a feel-good living environment that would make your nose truly happy!

 

 

 

 

MAKE AN INSTANT VENTED CAT LITTER BOX

 

TURN YOUR TRASH CAN INTO AN ODOR KILLER

 

WORKS ON DIFFERENT LIDS
 

 

NO FILTER NEEDED

 

HOW IT WORKS

VentiFresh combined the semiconductor deodorizer technology and air ventilation techniques, in such a compact function that has never been seen before.

The applied semiconductors consisted of photocatalyst and UV LED. A photocatalyst is a natural or synthetic substance that accelerates the rate of a molecular reaction using energy from light, without consuming itself. Chlorophyll of plants is a typical nature photocatalyst. We used a compound mainly consisted of titanium  dioxide (TiO2).

Simply speaking, our technology reversed the process of how plants breathe, and was used  to deodorize stinky molecules in the air.

While chlorophyll captures sunlight to convert water and carbon dioxide into oxygen and glucose, our nano-grade substance at contact breaks down volatile organic compounds (VOCs), or odors in gas form, into carbon dioxide and water. Using a dust-resistant, low-noise motor fan, bad odor molecules in the air are pressured to flow inside an air compartment, get processed with a photocatalyst energized by UV light, then clean air flows out of VentiFresh through air vents on the sides. Since the reaction is chemistry at molecular level, odor compounds here are decomposed rather than captured by a filter, so there’s nothing to be replaced or refilled. Only needs energy from UV light to activate the cleaning process.

 

The use of effective ventilation with photocatalyst and UV lighting for indoor air treatment has been a mature application used in many places such as factories, hospitals, labs and homes. Such systems usually cost thousands of dollars to start with, and often are installed inside the existing air ventilation with professional services.

NASA has also adopted this type of technology to keep the environment clean on the International Space Station**(ref: NASA Spinoff Page). Now with UV LED delivering higher power output to enable commercial sales, we're able to reform the concept, made a compact and portable unit, and applied this proven technology to address small storage spaces in our households. VentiFresh proved what used to be a million-dollar technology can become useful home products. And with no consumables and very low power consumption, VentiFresh demonstrated our committment to contribute to sustainable lifestyles with technical advancements.

**VentiFresh is not an affiliate or associates with NASA and Spinoff. All trademarks, names and service marks mentioned herein belong to their respective owners.**

 

The motor fan used in VentiFresh features dust-resistance and S&C (Seal and Clip) technology. The advantage of this design is to prevent the stator and impeller from moving, providing better dust-resistance, higher reliability, and longer life expectancy.

 

 

LAB TESTED

We took VentiFresh on a test of performance using ammonia. As you know, ammonia is a colorless, highly irritating gas with a pungent, suffocating odor. This is a perfect example for us to test on how well VentiFresh performs.

In the video below, we had it tested in a 40L can filled with ammonia. You can see how VentiFresh successfully processed the ammonia odor only within 10 minutes.

 

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

*Available in EU and US plugs

 

 

 

Design Inspiration

VentiFresh is our latest innovation applying opto-semiconductor technology to solve an everyday problem. Inspired by the fact that the same technology was used at the International Space Station, we're encouraged to bring the high-tech benefits to everyone's home.  For this reason, special attention was given to product design to balance functions with aesthetic appearance.  For example, the front air inflow vent was designed with a pattern of geometrical triangle vector that moderates air flow speed, allowing gas but not dust to enter the air cycle compartment.

 

The progress of the UV LED developments in recent years also made the production of VentiFresh for personal uses technically and financially viable. VentiFresh is another evidence of "possibility turns into reality" because of nonstop efforts and imagination.

 

 

FAQ

 

Q: Can I use any USB power bank with VentiFresh?

For short-term portable use, all retailed USB power banks (sorry, no lightning connector) may work with VentiFresh as long as the power current of the battery output is DC5V, just like using power bank to charge a mobile phone. We would like to remind our backers to use good-quality power banks only. Since we cannot know the quality of your power bank, thus have to state that the performance of VentiFresh may vary depending on the power bank of your choice, and any damage caused by the third party product cannot be covered by our standard warranty.

Q: How long do I need to turn it on every day? 

Depending on where you use VentiFresh, the time needed to deodorize the air varies and can be decided by yourself. VentiFresh is designed to process air in small enclosed spaces, and it runs at power on. Just plug in when you feel the need to freshen up. For more stinky places, you may keep it running for more than 10 hours a day, no problem.  

Q: Can it really remove all the odor? To what extent? 

The current model of VentiFresh is designed to process odors in normal household, like the trash cans that you may throw a bit of everything inside, such as leftovers or product wraps. The stench that you usually smell are mainly ammonia, some types of sulfide compounds, etc., and we collectively called them “volatile organic compounds”. The more active they are, the easier for you to smell them, and the faster VentiFresh can process them. The technology we used has been proved effective on several types of organic compounds (odors), and different compound may react at different pace. Generally speaking, as long as the smelly material is present, the odors will be there, and VentiFresh works to neutralize the active odors, thus reducing the concentration you can sense. In some of our tests, the ammonia odor concentration was removed more than 80% after a 10min cycle.       

Q: Does the product need maintenance? How do I clean it? 

VentiFresh is hassle free, just plug in the power and a build-in light sensor controls the on/off. There is nearly no maintenance required, there’s no replacing filter or refill parts.  

See the Product Specs above for care instructions.   

Q: Why do I need it? How is it better than other products? 

VentiFresh does not use chemicals to mask odors, add fragrance to a pool of already staled smells, or produce harmful by-products. It’s easy to use, easy to install and is energy-efficient. You can use it until the end of it’s life, which by design is estimated to be 10,000 hours. 

Q: Will it use much electricity? 

If you keep a VentiFresh running for 24 hours, it would cost less than $0.40 (residential rate) per month in most American states. Power costs refer to the latest average price of electricity by the US Department of Energy.   https://www.eia.gov/electricity/monthly/epm_tab... 

Q: Does it work on all kinds of trash can? 

Yes, long as the can is within our recommended size limit of 45L and has a lid. VentiFresh is designed to fit pedal bins. 

Q: How strong is the magnet? Will it fall easily? 

We run some tests in open/close cycles of pedal bins by stepping on the cans with reasonable force and the VentiFresh stayed attached. 

There is one magnet at the bottom of the VentiFresh, and one with the included accessory Mag Dot. Mag Dot is designed so that VentiFresh can work with plastic lid by sandwiching the lid in between the VentiFresh and the Mag Dot.  

Q: Is it harmful for human body? 

UV

The product has passed Photobiological Safety Testing (IEC62471), which tested UV lighting reaction with animal eyes. Our product is classified as no hazard “exempt class”. It is safe to you and your pets.

Our team is expert in handling opto-semiconductor products. Opto-semiconductor deals with quantum mechanical effects of light. We used UV LED, a type of opto-semiconductor, in the VentiFresh as light source, which offers just the right amount of energy to activate the process. The UV light power is sealed inside the VentiFresh housing, preventing direct viewing and exposure. In addition, since the product is designed to work in a dark space (inside an enclosed container), the build-in light sensor turns off the product when you open the lid or door of the container, further reduce the chance seeing the UV light.

In the figure of the speech, the peak energy of the UVA module inside VentiFresh is about 20% of the strength of what we experience under a regular sunny day in the open air.

By-Products 

There are speculations on various types of photocatalyst products producing harmful by-products (chemicals) in the industrial environments. It is not related to our product design and usage for the following reasons: 

  1. VentiFresh is used and designed for household use, not industrial environments where toxic chemicals are already present, and by-products may be possibly generated from processing these chemicals.   
  2. VentiFresh uses low-power (DC 5V) driving current for the UV light source, same for the USB power adaptors used by a mobile phone. We don’t use high-voltage electrical-discharge based ionization technology, which may produce a small amount of by-product, ozone. There is no ozone presence throughout our process.  
  3. The UV photocatalyst process of VentiFresh mainly converts odor compounds into water vapor and carbon dioxide, in very small, almost undetectable amounts. The capacity of VentiFresh yields less than the same by-products compare with a regular adult human activity for the same period of time. Animals also breathe in air (a mixture of compounds) and exhale mainly water vapor and carbon dioxide.  

Q: Does installing VentiFresh to my trash can means that I can keep the garbage in house longer? 

We still recommend that you take out the trash daily or when needed. After all, there may be other issues in concern other than smells.  

VentiFresh works in a way that it helps to reduce some bad odors by decomposing them into harmless air, so not only it would smell better, but also freshen up your indoor air. The odors don’t just get released from a container and become diluted by your room air, thus escaping your smell sense. They’re transformed into part of nature air compounds. 

However, if the bad-odor materials piling up inside the container got to a point that exceed the processing capacity of the product, it would take much longer to reduce the smell and affect its performance.  

 

Have any questions not listed here? 

Send us a message through the Ask a Question link above.

Interested in writing about us?

Our press kit is available for download here.

 

Risks and Challenges

Our team has been working with opto-semiconductor and electronic product development for more than 10 years, and we teamed up with equally experienced factory partners. We have completed production-scale planning and initial material investments. However, even for a team with a lot of experience, we are aware that we could be faced with unexpected situations along the way, such as production control and logistic delays. That being said, our team’s experience and confidence in our manufacturer make us confident that we can deliver the VentiFresh to you on time. We will continuously inform you of the latest progress along this path made possible with your supports.

 

Thanks to all of our wonderful backers, VentiFresh has successfully launched production, and is now shipping worldwide!   

 

 **All orders placed on Indiegogo are collected and shipped monthly. **

Our press kit is available for download here. Risks and ChallengesOur team has been working with opto-semiconductor and electronic product development for more than 10 years, and we teamed up with equally experienced factory partners. We have completed production-scale planning and initial material investments. However, even for a team with a lot of experience, we are aware that we could be faced with unexpected situations along the way, such as production control and logistic delays. That being said, our team’s experience and confidence in our manufacturer make us confident that we can deliver the VentiFresh to you on time. We will continuously inform you of the latest progress along this path made possible with your supports. Thanks to all of our wonderful backers, VentiFresh has successfully launched production, and is now shipping worldwide!     **All orders placed on Indiegogo are collected and shipped monthly. **

story:
Available now at www.wearespruce.co

Single-use plastic packaging and toxic chemicals in everyday cleaning products are hurting you and the planet. At Spruce, our mission is to make eco-friendly, non-toxic cleaning products that are convenient to use and beautiful to look at. Our Eternity aluminium bottles can be refilled endlessly. Concentrated refills come in plastic-free packaging. Refill with tap water at home. Zero plastic waste sent to the oceans. Zero water shipped.

We'll also remove 25 bottles worth of ocean-bound plastic waste for each pledge. 

 

Our circular design gets rid of single-use plastics and the need to ship water. We're starting by making cleaning clean. Our refillable products are convenient, safe and environmentally-friendly.   

Three simple steps for you - a giant leap in ending single-use plastic pollution. Get your endlessly refillable Eternity bottle once and plastic-free refills delivered to your door.   

 

No need to shake or shimmy. Clean within minutes.

 

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co

The Bottle: Use our Eternity aluminium bottles for over hundreds of cleanings and send absolutely zero single-use plastic waste to landfills. Aluminium is the world's most recycled material. 80% of aluminium in use today is recycled. Our bottles won’t break or leach toxic chemicals into the contents. 

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co
 

 

The Refills: Our lightweight refill pack weighs only 4 grams. That is 140 times less than a typical cleaning bottle that weighs 560 grams. 

Zero water shipped. Our refills fit through your letterbox and get delivered with significantly low carbon footprint.  

 

Do Non-Toxic Cleaning Products Work?

The safe, plant-based surfactants we use in our formulations are effective against common viruses and bacteria as they attack and dissolve the fatty layer that holds the virus particles together, or in the case of bacteria, they dissolve the cell membrane. As a result the microbes fall apart and become deactivated.

This is the same principle as washing your hands with soap and water, without the need to use antibacterial products. In effect surfactants work differently from toxic antibacterial agents (pesticides) that kill the bacteria (note: antibacterials are effective against bacteria not viruses).

Our safe ingredients such as Citric Acid and organic essential oils contain antimicrobial properties. We don’t and will never use pesticides and harsh antibacterial agents in our products as research shows they do more harm than good. We have shared more data in our FAQ’s if you are interested in learning more about this topic.

The Product

Here are the products we are launching with, with lots more on the horizon.

Cleans limescale and soap scum from bathroom surfaces. Good for sinks, tiles and tubs. 

Get rid of grease and grime. Use on tiles, countertops, stone, wood and most sealed surfaces. 

And there is much more in the pipeline to make your home a single-use plastic-free zone.  But we want to launch our campaign with these two products and incorporate your direct feedback in our future product launches. Be part of our journey. 

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co
 

We made it on the Dezeen Awards 2020 shortlist in the Sustainable Design category! There is nothing as chic as a clean conscience and a Spruce bottle.   

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co
 

The environmental impact and carbon emissions of shipping packaged water is a serious issue. Did you know:  

We only ship active ingredients in our refill packs which you can dilute in tap water at home. This dramatically lowers our carbon footprint. Our refill packs weigh just 4 grams vs. 560 grams of a typical cleaning product.

Cleaning products aren’t well-regulated. Manufacturers get away with selling cocktails of harmful ingredients without the need to declare them. And it’s making us sick. When everyday cleaning ingredients like chlorine and ammonia mix together, they react and release toxic fumes that can be fatal.  

If your everyday home cleaning product requires you to wear protective gear (masks, gloves?), you can be sure that it is not a safe choice for your family. Need we say more? It's time to stop paying for that extra streak-free shine with your health.  

We tried the existing "eco" options, but they don't really work. Eco-friendly products are useless if they come in single-use plastics (there should really be a law against labelling single-use plastics as "eco"). We all know that recycling is broken (less than 9% of all plastic has ever been recycled), bioplastics are still an enigma, and who doesn't love carrying bulky liquids from zero-waste refill stores?  

Safe for Humans & for the Planet: We only use non-toxic and environmentally friendly ingredients. All our ingredients rate highly on the EWG.org healthy cleaning guide and are food or cosmetic-grade. We use 100 percent natural and organic essential oils for their antibacterial properties and natural fragrance. 

The Spruce Banned Ingredients List: Being plastic-free is not enough. Our products are free from SLS, Phthalates, Phosphates, Triclosan, Quaternium-15 DMDM Hydantoin, Parabens, Ammonia, EDTA, Chlorine, Formaldehyde, Palm-oil, nuts, Petrochemicals, Bleach, VOCs, Ethanolamine Compounds (DEA, TEA, MEA), harsh chemical antibacterial agents and pesticides.  

Zero Plastic Sent to the Oceans: Our refill packaging is certified plastic-free made from cellulose. It will decompose into biomass as opposed to plastic bottles that will live on in our ecosystem for centuries. 

Zero Water Shipped: We only send you active ingredients that you can dilute in tap water at home. Not shipping water will dramatically lower our carbon footprint.

 

For the occasional spill... 

 

Spruce & Spritz

 

Clean up kitchen mess..

 Get your bathroom sparkly clean. Clean up soap scum on tubs, tiles and ceramics.   

 

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co
 

People & Planet before Profit. We're a Certified B-Corp Pending. B Corporations are businesses that balance purpose and profit. They’re legally bound to consider the impact they make on the planet, community and environment, and not prioritise profit.  

Always Give Back: With every order placed, we'll contribute towards collection of ocean-bound plastic waste with the help of our partner Plastic Bank, a social enterprise.  We'll collect and remove 1kg of ocean-bound plastics with every order.   

Support United Nations Sustainable Development Goals:  We're aligned with the UN SDG's below to promote responsible consumption and production, prevent climate change and protect our oceans.

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co
 

I first got exposed to the hazardous chemicals in both plastics and everyday personal care and cleaning products 10 years ago, after suffering from back-to-back health issues. I realised we are surrounded by hidden toxins in most products from our food to cookware to personal care and home cleaning products. I swapped daily products and where I couldn’t find alternatives, I made my own. My journey so far had been driven by a focus on healthy living. 

I also became aware that despite considering myself “eco-aware”, I still had a significant plastic-footprint from everyday use items that just don’t come plastic-free. So, I decided to fix a problem that I faced. Our mission is to make eco-friendly accessible, without compromising on quality and convenience - Mahira, Founder.

Proudly Female-led

 

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co

Please help us prevent single-use plastic pollution and further damage to our precious planet by spreading some love. Share with your mum, dad, friends, neighbours and exes. Everyone deserves an easy plastic-free and non-toxic swap. Share on Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn or Facebook. 

 

Our packages will ship 100% plastic-free starting November 2020. We plan to use low-carbon shipping where possible. Shipping costs vary by region.

Get Yours Now at www.wearespruce.co

story:
WHY BANDERBOX?

 

BANDERBOX FEATURES

  • Raised grooves for easy stacking and lock in to prevent sliding of stacked boxes.
  • Collapsible walls will easily scoop up building briks to the center of the box for effortless    clean up and storing.
  • Recessed walls provide added strength and allow for an even surface when fully collapsed.
  • Aluminum rivets provide a firm hold and prevent sides from snapping off after multiple uses.

  • Built in bracket slots for secure placement of accessory pouches.
  • The build zone allows ability to save mid-build and protect your creations.
  • Sizeable sorting surface to easily spread sets, find special bricks, parts or minfigs.
  • Multiple living hinges designed specifically for repeated opening and closing.  This design will not allow LEGO® bricks to escape through or get caught in the hinges.

 

 

WANT MORE THAN OUR 1 OR 3 PACK?

Email us through Indiegogo or at hello@snark22.com and we'll be happy to discuss options.

BUYING A SET OF 3? DON'T WORRY, YOU CAN SELECT THE COLORS YOU WANT!

After your purchase, we will email you shortly after to discuss what colors you'd like to select. Be it 3 of one color, 2 of one and 1 of another or 3 completely different colors, you'll get to mix and match however you want.

 

Become a Banderbox Backer and you automatically qualify for Backer Rewards.

Share and promote the campaign with Indiegogo's share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.  Using the share tools will create your unique ID which must be attached to any resulting orders for tracking purposes. At the end of the campaign, we will tally your referred orders and you will be notified of your Reward.  It's just that simple!

 

MEET THE FOUNDERS

 

 

TOOLING IS COMPLETE!

 

FUNDING NEEDS

Tooling is completed with modifications currently in process.  We are raising funds on Indiegogo to pay for production units, packaging, freight and import costs.  

 

RISKS

Our team is experienced in operations, manufacturing, freight and importation.  Over the years we have worked with Best Buy, Target as well as Apple globally maintaining high ratings for on time delivery.  Of course, we will be as prepared as possible for the unexpected and have contingency plans in place.  More important, we will communicate with our backers every step of the way from dock to door.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't purchase now.  Please do help us to get the word out about our product and Benefit Banderbox. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to compete for rewards!
