story:
Upgrading your house to the convenience of home automation is a daunting task. Different protocols and different compatibilities for every device or appliance makes the transition difficult. Replacing all the existing appliances with IoT devices is possible, but it is extremely costly. Imagine if there was a way to enjoy the benefits of customized smart home automation at a fraction of the cost…

 

Today, it's no longer a problem. We created Fingerbot, the world’s smallest robot which can remotely & mechanically control all the buttons, switches, and toggles anywhere in your home through voice and app. A quick, simple and affordable way to retrofit your existing devices into IoT devices. 

 

We believe that instead of replacing your existing devices, adapting them for smart control is a more affordable, sustainable, and simple way to create a smart home! 

Prepare your coffee automatically when you wake up every morning. 

 

One-touch on your phone to turn off all your lights without leaving the comfort of your warm bed.

 

Open the door remotely for your visitors while you're busy preparing dinner in the kitchen.

 

  • Apps & Downloads

 

Adaprox Controller app is a powerful portal to all the functionalities available for your fingertips including remote turn on/off; set wake-up lighting alarms; make SOS alert and other personalized functionalities. In addition, the convenient OTA provides an enhanced user experience by the regular Fingerbot firmware updates.

 

  • Wireless Control Through App

 

Enjoy the ability to turn on/off all devices remotely at your fingertips. Figerbot connects seamlessly using Bluetooth and provides total control through our official Adaprox App.

 

 
  •  Free up your hands, Voice control it all 

 

Adaprox App can integrate with your smartphone's voice assistants such as Siri and Google Assistant. You can control each Fingerbot simply by activating your voice assistant.

  • Modular Design 

 

With a modular design, you can replace the robot arm to adapt a button, touch screen, wall switch, wall toggle and more with the Fingerbot Tool Pack. So now you can control your traditional fan, kettle, coffee machine, and almost any traditional appliances remotely. 

 

 

 

  •  Physical Plug-in for Video Game Lovers 

 

Fingerbot can even tap the touch screen like your finger and help you to finish tasks that require repeated motions.

 

  • Customize Your Own Robot Arm

 

For those who have special requirements, the customized robot arm can also be 3D printed to fit your needs! 

 

  •  Remotely Control While Away from Home 

 

The Adaprox Bridge brings all your Fingerbots online, allowing you to control them from anywhere, at any time. Using Adaprox Bridge will bring a wider range of applications for your Fingerbots. Retrofitting all your electronics for IoTs, lets you remotely control various devices even when you're not at home.

  •  Works with Google Home, Alexa or other Smart Devices 

 

Adaprox Bridge can connect Fingerbot to popular smart devices such as Google Home and Amazon Alexa. With the Adaprox Bridge, you can simply use your voice to control Fingerbot without launching the app. 

 

  •  Connect to IFTTT 

 

IFTTT represents “If This Then That”. We've added IFTTT integration to empower Fingerbot. You can define any IFTTT rules to fit your needs and Fingerbot will help you to finish all the pre-set routines. The IFTTT functionality of Fingerbot is supported by Adaprox Bridge. 

 

  • Super Easy to Install

 

Fingerbot is easy to install without the need for special tools. It attaches using strong 3M tape to secure it in place near the desired switch. Or you can get creative and do-it-yourself using magnets, Velcro, and more. You can easily remove the Fingerbots without damaging walls or appliances and reuse them again on a different device.  

 

  •  Adjustable Spacers for Different Switch Types 

 

Add a spacer according to your switch type, or replace the robot arm based on your needs. It is as simple as that.

We will also publish Adaprox SDK for programmers to control Adaprox devices. With Adaprox SDK and Fingerbot, you can customize your program to interact physically with the real world.

Consider a situation where you need to connect your server with a local client program. When the server crashes for some reason, sometimes you have to manually reboot the server by pressing the power button, which is very troublesome and annoying.

Kindly follow us on Github, https://github.com/Adaprox, and you will be notified once we publish the repository.

The following is a simple programming example that shows how easy it is to utilize Fingerbot… 

 

Now you can make Fingerbot as a physical rebooter and integrate it into your server code. You can simply define and register the action as follows:

 

Where "click" and "wait" are the names of predefined actions and "reboot_action" describes a sequential robot action:

 

  1. Click and hold the button for 10 seconds to force shut down the server
     
  2. Wait for 5 seconds
     
  3. Click the power button to restart the server

 

After registering the robot action, you can call it when you need it:

 

When the client program detects that the server has crashed, Fingerbot will help automatically reboot it.

 
  • Long battery life

 

Fingerbot comes with a built-in rechargeable battery that can last 6 months depending on the usage. 

 

Fingerbot comes with a USB Type-C charging technology that fully charges the Fingerbot within 1 hour. Then it can get back to work for another half year!

 

  •  Practical and helpful

 

Fingerbot can be a friendly and useful assistant for elderly and disabled people, giving them more independence in the home.

 

 

The Adaprox team is a group of designers, engineers and programmers dedicated to creating user-friendly smart home hardware and software. The story of Fingerbot begins with the desire to create convenience and control and a better smart home user experience.   

 At some point in our life, we all wish we could remotely turn off the light switch before bed, remotely turn on the water boiler to get a hot shower once you reach home during the cold winter, or there might be a lamp switch that is out of reach for disabled people and elderly. Plus, upgrading IoT devices are costly, and obsoleting the old appliances which still works perfectly is a big waste. 

 

Fingerbot was created as a cost-effective way for consumers to retrofit their traditional appliances for smart home control.  Fingerbot is a practical, exciting and fun-to-use IoT solution we developed that makes your home more intelligent and your lifestyle more convenient.

Consider a situation where you need to connect your server with a local client program. When the server crashes for some reason, sometimes you have to manually reboot the server by pressing the power button, which is very troublesome and annoying.
Kindly follow us on Github, https://github.com/Adaprox, and you will be notified once we publish the repository.
The following is a simple programming example that shows how easy it is to utilize Fingerbot… 
 

 
Now you can make Fingerbot as a physical rebooter and integrate it into your server code. You can simply define and register the action as follows:
 

 
Where "click" and "wait" are the names of predefined actions and "reboot_action" describes a sequential robot action:
 

Click and hold the button for 10 seconds to force shut down the server 
Wait for 5 seconds 
Click the power button to restart the server

 
After registering the robot action, you can call it when you need it:
 

 
When the client program detects that the server has crashed, Fingerbot will help automatically reboot it. 
 
Long battery life
 
Fingerbot comes with a built-in rechargeable battery that can last 6 months depending on the usage. 
 

 
Fingerbot comes with a USB Type-C charging technology that fully charges the Fingerbot within 1 hour. Then it can get back to work for another half year!
 

 
 Practical and helpful

 
Fingerbot can be a friendly and useful assistant for elderly and disabled people, giving them more independence in the home.
 

  
 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 
 
 

 

 

 
 
The Adaprox team is a group of designers, engineers and programmers dedicated to creating user-friendly smart home hardware and software. The story of Fingerbot begins with the desire to create convenience and control and a better smart home user experience.   

 At some point in our life, we all wish we could remotely turn off the light switch before bed, remotely turn on the water boiler to get a hot shower once you reach home during the cold winter, or there might be a lamp switch that is out of reach for disabled people and elderly. Plus, upgrading IoT devices are costly, and obsoleting the old appliances which still works perfectly is a big waste. 
 

 
Fingerbot was created as a cost-effective way for consumers to retrofit their traditional appliances for smart home control.  Fingerbot is a practical, exciting and fun-to-use IoT solution we developed that makes your home more intelligent and your lifestyle more convenient.

story:
Vision, allows you to create a home management center without destroying the walls in your home, and will turn the traditional home into the house of the future. Now you have everything in one place. Now you have an impact on the full personalization of your home and the settings of the appearance of Vision - Your electronic friend.


We had a dream to create something that will be able to be defined according to our own preferences. We wanted to create something that would give us joy of use and relief in everyday activities. This is how Vision was created which combines possibilities of home and office friend as well as our communication center with other devices and online access to knowledge.

Vision is a system that allows for any personalization starting from the appearance, this what he says and how he says. We can connect him with other devices and give him many other possibilities.

Download the FREE version NOW and try the trial.




A real smart home without making holes in walls and pulling cables. Vision is a cheap and effective solution available to anyone who has a smartphone or tablet.

 



 




Controlling lights and devices in home or office by voice have never been so easy. Add devices that integrate with Vision and feel the comfort. Your smartphone or tablet will gain new great features. They will become intelligent.
 


In order to get the full Vision voice range at home, we can set several devices with the installed application.


You will make your Smart home quickly, cheaply and impressively.


You can easily pair many devices in one big system. 
 


Rescue option - Vision can call for help in truly need situation. This option is intended for critical life-saving situations, as well as older people who urgently need to contact a senior care assistant. All they need to do is say "Vision help me".




 

 


 


Vision also plays the role of a home entertainment center, paired with a Bluetooth speaker
works as a voice controlled music player (useful when bathing in a bathtub or in the shower).

It also works great as a children's fairy-tale player. Children can open their favorite stories by voice, which we add to the playlist.



Presentation of the music function.

 
 
 


Vision is easy to install and can be done in three easy steps.


1. Take a smartphone or tablet with Android version 5.0 or higher to connect to the Internet.
2. Install the application of Vision and configure to your personal configuration.
3. Put the device in the stand.


Done, have a nice usage.
 

Download the FREE version NOW and try the trial.



 

Vision has the ability to freely define your own commands and their meanings. We can add different types of commands, for example, commands that work when they hear the name given to the device (we can give any name to the device) or commands that he will respond to when he heard when we talk to him. 

It gives you unlimited possibilities to develop conversational and personalization skills for our needs. The ability to add and learn commands will give you much joy.

Done, add any more commands.
 



Presentation of the use of calendar and clock.


 


 








 



 

Vision in realize tasks related to learning information about our favorite preferences uses AI algorithms. This is an area on which we place a strong developmental pressure and in the area of which a significant one is foreseen and long-term development.


 

 

When you use the full Visiona capability, starting with giving him own name, appearance, voice, him development command system and voice management capabilities of control other devices.

Vision will become your new real friend always ready for action and cooperation.
 


Infinite number of possibilities of individual visual personalization.

Create and enjoy the wide possibilities of configuration.
 



Give him any voice, male or female, choose the tone of the voice.

 
Give him your own name and style.

The advanced Vision configuration allows you to free the creativity hidden within each person.

Done, your personal desk friend is with you.





Founded in 2016, Turbo Trade is formed by a team of creative designers and entrepreneurs. We love practical and forward thinking solutions. We like simple and useful designs. We are passionate about solutions that make our everyday life more convenient, that is why we create the things that are a reflection of the approaching future.



We solve problems using innovative technological solutions. We are of aware the need for increased ecology of products and we focus on solutions that improve the natural environment. Every day we try to be better at what we do. That is why the Turbo Trade team is always ready to offer products of the highest technological quality and the most innovative.
 


 







 





The most difficult step is already behind us. The bring of ideas to the real project is the most labor-intensive. This is a real adventure for the whole team. Prototype, production and testing of the application, choosing a model that is convenient for the user. We can confidently say that Vision is a solution that in itself,  it minimizes many risks, such as shipping costs (which we do not have because we will send everything by e-mail) or no customs duty. We can send applications freely for the whole world. Vision is in the final stages of production and testing. We can say that even at the current stage of the project is satisfactory. In the day you receive Vision, it will be even better!

Thanks for supporting us!
 



 

  • Does Vision work on all tablets and smartphones?
    Vision works on all tablets and smartphones with system Android 5.0 or higher.

  • How will I receive Vision application?
    Soon, the application will be available in the Play store. After the premiere, you will receive a special license key that will allow you to gain access to all Vision functions.

  • Does Vision require internet access?
    Yes, to get from Vision full possibilities, it needs the Internet.

  • Where else can I use Vision's capabilities?
    Vision has a wide range of uses, and the only limitation is our creativity and time. It can works as an automatic adviser in a hotel or restaurant, in our office and of course at home.

  • Will there be later updates of the Vision application?
    Yes, we are planning continuous development of the project.

story:
Short Summary

This is a Two Minute Turtle Timer.  It helps children, and grown-ups, visualize time-- and gives them ownership over their daily tasks. After our child's first dentist appointment, she had 9 cavities.  She was one of the 42% of American children ages 2-11 with cavities.  We needed help motivating her to take time to brush teeth at bedtime--but she was tired and we were tired too.  This timer helped and she hasn't had cavities since--she presses the timer button and the first LED light blinks, for 30 seconds and off she goes, brushing each part evenly until her whole mouth is brushed.  No downloading! No iphones in the sink! No plugging in!  Just a child quietly brushing on her own for 2 minutes.

 

 

The timer is 2 diameters long and 1/2 inch thick.

 

How Does The Timer Work?

The timer fits in a child's hand.  It can stick to the mirror (but does not leave a mark on the mirror) or rest on the sink.  The child pushes the button and the first LEDs blinks, representing one quadrant of the mouth. After 30 seconds the 2nd LED light blinks.  The child will focus brushing on the part of his or her mouth that matches the part of the turtle that's blinking.  The circuit board is visible.   The children love to push the button to get the lights started.  The LED colors are: red, yellow, orange and green.  

“I love the timer.  After 2 month of using the timer, it exceeded my expectations.  My kids are brushing better because of it!!  I’m very pleased with the results.”

Dr. Ian McLaughlin, McLaughlin Family Dentist, father of 5 young children.

 

"Is the timer a good product? No. It's an excellent product! "

Dr. Michelle Chiu, orthodontist Bay State Orthodontics

 

The 4 Zones of your mouth

 

Children Like it; Parents Need it

We have tested the timer with children ages 3-14 across America and those who did said the timer helped them to brush.  It gives them a way to take charge and do a good job.

 

"My children love the Turtle Timer and prefer it to the 2 minute tooth brushing app on my phone.  When it's not where we left the timer, they will go looking for it."  Rory, father of boys age 5 and 8  

 

"It's been months now of our children using the timer and they still like to use it every night together." Katie, mother of 3 and 5 year old

 

endorsed by:

McLaughlin Family Dentists


 

Next Steps

With you, and two hundred others, we will be able to manufacture these first timers from beyond our basement. We will invest in a mold and work with a US manufacturer.  

cousins enjoy sychronized toothbrushing 

 

What will you get?  

 

1. A Two Minute Turtle Timer with the 4 LED lights, blinking in 30 second intervals and a Victory Lap of lights at the end.  Plus you'll be an original Invent Boston Supporter and help a small startup get off the ground.

A peek at the software for the Turtle programming board. 

What Other Ways to Use the Turtle Timer?

 

Yoga poses 

 

Count-down to end screen time 

 

For showers

 

How will we manufacture?

In order to make the timers, we need to get a full batch, at least 200 pre-orders.  If we don't get that we will not make the timers. If we get 200 or more orders, we will make them this Fall and then ship to all who have ordered by early December, in time for stocking stuffers of your family and friends.  


"My son loves the timer.  He takes initiative brushing his teeth now and uses the timer every night!" Mother Anya and her 8 year old son, above.

FAQ:

How long will the battery last? 

If it's pushed twice a day every day, about 1.5 years.

Do you sell  a kit so we can make a timer ourselves?  

Not yet.  Is your child the kind who likes to take things apart or learn how they work?  Do-It-Yourselfer friends have told us they would like to engage their kids to make their own timer.  If there is enough interest in a kit, then in our next version of the timer we will develop a kit to make a timer at home.  It will not be a turtle shape. It will be a rectangle - and the case won't be water-resistant, so that you will easily make this in your home. We will provide parts including a pre-programmed chip and step-by-step instructions, and you provide: soldering iron, the solder, and three AAA batteries.  Please email me if you would be interested in a kit in the future, at vberman@inventboston.com. 
 

Roslindale children enjoyed a Brush with Fame, with City Councilor Michelle Wu who encouraged them as they demonstrated how to brush with the turtle timer. 

 

 

Who are we? 

I, Virginia, spent 20 years building a US employee-owned cooperative trading organic coffee and cocoa with small scale coffee farmer cooperatives.  While there we grew from working with 4 farmer coops to 28 farmer coops. I loved working directly with small scale growers to help them sustain their farms. And then, raising kids, I needed more in my own home. It was my love of a well placed gadget in a commuting mother's day mixed with my love of connecting with others that compelled me to explore sharing these gadgets.

 

Dr. Michael Reinhardt, father and mechanical engineer, builds useful gadgets to solve problems at home. For this cavity problem, he designed, built, tested again and again the timer for children.  After hearing your responses from the prototypes, it is ready to share.   Watch his fascination with science and desire to add whimsy to daily tasks, intrigue you.

 

 

 

 

To get these manufactured we need you!   

We know you will enjoy your original turtle timer.  Remember, timing is everything.   There's no time like the present to invest in your daily two-minute practice of something good!

 

*Who is the timer for? 

athletes Stretches

parents A moment of order at bedtime goes beyond those 2 minutes. 

children of all ages For distracted ones it quietly shows them. For independent ones they get to brush alone. For determined children it's a way to know they completed their daily task thoroughly. For tired children it keeps track of where they are. For children who like routine, it provides that.

Share with families or grown-ups to help them visualize two minutes every day.

story:
About

We were tired of owning a million towels and doing endless loads of laundry. Between the two of us we owned around 30 towels! Of those, only 5 were useable, the other 25 were just too musty to dry off with.

The solution to our problems was the self-cleaning Kanso Towel, featuring a waffle weave design and Polygiene Stay Fresh technology.

Polygiene’s permanent textile treatment is bluesign® approved which means it meets rigorous independent environmental and product life cycle standards. It is also Oeko-tex tested and certified.

Lifetime Stay-Fresh Guarantee: If your Kanso Towel (through normal use) begins to smell musty, you can send it back for a new towel or a full refund.

The Kanso towel is self-cleaning, fast drying and anti-microbial, meaning you can dry off with a fresh, odor-free towel every time; no added laundry required.

Adjusting Your Pledge and Add-ons

Adding additional towels to your pledge can be done by simply adding the price of the additional products to your current pledge amount.

To adjust your reward tier all together click the "manage" button then click "change your pledge" and select your desired reward.

Perfect for the Holidays

We've got you covered this holiday season. We'll send a holiday card with proof of purchase and special note, the perfect gift for any friend or loved one.

Timing and Process

We are working with experienced factories to make sure we get our customers the best product possible in a timely manner. All of our timelines have been vetted and given a buffer, so with any luck you should received your reward earlier than expected! We look forward to sending you your very own Kanso Towel.

November Kickstarter Launch

December Kickstarter complete - begin production

January Finish production and begin Polygiene treatment

February Towels are shipped to fulfillment center and checked for quality

April All Indiegogo rewards shipped! Thank you for backing!

 

Risks and challenges

As always, when dealing with product manufacturing delays can occur. Although we do not anticipate any delays, they are always a possibility.

 

Environmental commitments

Visit our Environmental Resource Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.

Sustainable materials

 

Kanso towels are made from bamboo fiber which needs 1/3 the water as cotton making it a much more sustainable textile.

story:
Your WiFi Network Devices can be hacked!

 
Security Cameras, Ip Cameras, Smart Tv and any other device connected to your WiFi  leaves an open window. 

 


 

 

 

Connected to a LAN port on your router, Akita scans your network for any unusual activity and immediately shuts it down. All-the-while letting you know an attempt was made to invade your privacy. Akita uses military-grade security protection that’s been retrofitted for the home. Then, if you run into any issues, we can remotely preserve and restore your privacy with the help of  our experts at Axius.

Akita uses threat intelligence, behavioral analysis, machine learning and doesn't slow your connection at all. Importantly, it doesn't use deep packet inspection.

 

 

 

 

Every Akita Kickstarter Reward comes with security updates for free, for life.  Each backer will also receive a month of free security expert assistance when you upgrade to the Axius Full Service Support Plan.

    

  

 

 

 

What is that? The IPS security method means that Akita analyses sources that IoT devices should be communicating with and instantly flags any anomalies. If anything comes up, our experts at Axi.us are on standby for any of your security concerns. Unlike some riskier solutions, we don't utilize DPI (Deep Packet Inspection). 

  

 

  Check out the Akita app by downloading it from Google Play here

 

 

   

 

 

 

After a few weeks, you'll notice Akita improves in many different ways. Akita learns your habits and utilizes them to better protect you and your network. That way, Akita suits itself to your specific privacy and security habits and needs.

 

 

  

  

 

  

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q: What’s included with the Axius support subscription?
A: With an optional plan, you get access to the help desk and help to manage the setup, configuration, and security of your Smart Home devices, networks, and assist and answer ANY general tech question. Some other examples of service are:

  • Wi-Fi & Home Network Assistance 
  • Identity and Password Protection 
  • Setting up an Email Account 
  • Social Media Assistance & Security 
  • New Tablet or Smartphone Setup 
  • Troubleshooting Applications 
  • Smart Home Product Recommendations 
  • Smart Phone App Suggestions

Q: What is the subscription price?
A: The first month is free and it will be between $15 - $29. You can always use the device and app on your own. The subscription is an optional upgrade.

Q: What’s the difference between Akita and home firewalls?
A: The biggest difference is Akita comes with full support and help desk monitoring powered by Axius (www.axi.us). The other significant difference is other firewall customers only receive an alert. With Akita, we do something about the problem. We have automatic disconnects to stop the hack. It's very similar to this commercial for Identity Protection: https://www.ispot.tv/ad/wfAa/lifelock-bank.

Q: Where does the Akita device get placed on the network?
A: This device connects to a LAN port on your home router (not inline).

Q: Can I choose the device color I want?
A: Yes, at the end of the campaign you will be able to choose between black and white.

Q: How does Akita work, exactly?
A: It uses a custom form of WiFi sniffing to detect questionable packets and send them to our servers to be analyzed (this is why the hardware can run on low memory/CPU, because it's mainly a cloud-based system). Once the packets are determined to be malicious, a command is sent from our servers back to the Akita device; this includes custom protocol commands to disconnect the device from the network router. Keep in mind, this packet monitoring is high-level and does NOT include any personal information, nor does it require any credentials for specific IoT devices.

Q: Why doesn’t Akita have a gigabit port?
A: Because this device is not inline (between the modem and router), a gigabit port is not needed and will not affect the speeds of any customer currently using gigabit connections.

Q: Does Akita monitor all network devices or just those connected via Wi-Fi?
A: Currently, Akita only monitors and protects against WiFi devices. We are actively developing to include hard-wired devices and there will be a firmware update in the future once finished. No new hardware will be required for this. We do not have an ETA on this update but will keep every backer posted as it progresses.

Q: Can Akita be hacked?
A: We are actively testing against hacks on the Akita device; we hired one of the strongest Israel-based cyber companies (CyberInt) that have been using a team of ‘white’ hackers to try and hack the device for 3 months. Any vulnerabilities found are reported to R&D and fixed.

Q: How do you know where to ship my Akita to?
A: All backers will receive an email regarding shipping info at the end of the campaign. You can also specify the device color at that time.
story_txt:
Your WiFi Network Devices can be hacked! Security Cameras, Ip Cameras, Smart Tv and any other device connected to your WiFi  leaves an open window.  

   Connected to a LAN port on your router, Akita scans your network for any unusual activity and immediately shuts it down. All-the-while letting you know an attempt was made to invade your privacy. Akita uses military-grade security protection that’s been retrofitted for the home. Then, if you run into any issues, we can remotely preserve and restore your privacy with the help of  our experts at Axius.Akita uses threat intelligence, behavioral analysis, machine learning and doesn't slow your connection at all. Importantly, it doesn't use deep packet inspection.    Every Akita Kickstarter Reward comes with security updates for free, for life.  Each backer will also receive a month of free security expert assistance when you upgrade to the Axius Full Service Support Plan.         What is that? The IPS security method means that Akita analyses sources that IoT devices should be communicating with and instantly flags any anomalies. If anything comes up, our experts at Axi.us are on standby for any of your security concerns. Unlike some riskier solutions, we don't utilize DPI (Deep Packet Inspection).      Check out the Akita app by downloading it from Google Play here         After a few weeks, you'll notice Akita improves in many different ways. Akita learns your habits and utilizes them to better protect you and your network. That way, Akita suits itself to your specific privacy and security habits and needs.              Tross is a data-driven crowdfunding company         Q: What’s included with the Axius support subscription?A: With an optional plan, you get access to the help desk and help to manage the setup, configuration, and security of your Smart Home devices, networks, and assist and answer ANY general tech question. story:
WindPax are portable wind turbines that can be transported and used as needed. They can be used to run LED lighting, charge electronic devices or run any other low energy devices. It takes minutes to set up to run lighting or charge and run devices around the clock.  

Your power outlet….Something we all take for granted in this modern age.  We all just plug-in, charging what we need, without thinking of the amount of effort needed to power our favorite toys and tools needed for everyday life and emergency situations.  What if you could bring this type of comfort and peace of mind to people living halfway across the globe in near-destitute conditions?

Here at WindPax we are striving to create meaning and make a difference in the future of energy accessibility.  There around 1.5 billion people living without any access to electricity and a billion more living with electricity that at times is either broken or simply inaccessible. Sadly, these statistics - provided by the International Energy Agency - also predict that 16 percent of the world’s population will still be short of electricity in 2030. Known as, “energy poverty,” the IEA defines this crisis as “a lack of access to modern energy services.” These statistics do not sit well with us here at WindPax and we feel that we have a tremendous opportunity to make a difference.  With your help we can bring electricity into the lives of villages in Africa, communities in India, and even help light up your world when emergencies arise.

WindPax are innovative new Wind Turbine designs that are not only inexpensive, but fully collapsible, able to be shipped and distributed easily to individuals in even the hardest to reach places.  Our designs are lightweight and easily deploy-able, taking mere minutes to set up and begin enjoying renewable power for lights, electronic devices and more.  

WE NEED YOUR HELP! This campaign will help us raise funds for mass production, connect with partners and organizations and get our wind turbines to developing countries. We are partnering up with charity organizations that are helping us ship WindPax where they are most needed, but we need your help to manufacture the turbines that will literally light up people’s lives.  Your donations will allow us to give others access to safe, renewable energy. With your help WindPax can bring a source of renewable energy to areas with severe energy poverty and places that are hindered in social and economic development due to this lack of electricity. 

Our Pledge Levels

Why WindPax?

Wind is an excellent source of renewable energy.  Along with solar power it is one of the most abundant renewable energy sources available.  Our wind turbine designs offer personal wind turbines that are simple, durable, lightweight and easily configured for transportation and usage.  Windpax can outperform and compliment solar energy with a more cost effective option while at the same time being easier to manufacture, distribute and install.  WindPax features turbines that have blades with an exclusive geometry, and a vertical axis design unlike traditional wind turbines on the market optimized for performance and functionality at this scale.

Why is WindPax the clear solution for renewable energy sources in any situation? The answer is life altering – self-sustainability.  What allows WindPax' portable wind turbines to be better suited for electricity generation in remote locations is the fact that we can offer on average three times more power, roughly the same physical packaged size and comparable weight to that of the other energy devices, at the same price point, given average wind speeds.  Each WindPax unit is self-sustaining, meaning the turbines do not need user input to add fuel or intervene during usage.  Even solar panels may need to be adjusted periodically to follow the sun.  Unlike other devices being used, WindPax offers the ability to charge or run around the clock - 24/7 - given that average wind speeds are present, with the ability to run all night.  Lastly, WindPax wind turbines offer an internal battery storage system so that even if the wind is low, or the turbine is packed up, devices can still be ran off of the internal battery pack.

Other uses for Windpax

Although the initial proposed use for our portable wind turbines are to provide energy in remote locations around the world. WindPax can be utilized other places not only as a luxury but a backup safety device or for use emergency preparation.  

Emergencies:

Natural disasters can wreak havoc on local power supply and disable communication which is critical for survival and rescue.  WindPax collapsible wind turbines can be stored for such occasions or simply dropped in by rescue personnel to provide enough energy for communication and small luxuries such as LED lighting.  

Camping:

Today many hikers and campers rely on electronics devices for navigation, communication and safety.  With a finite battery life each device must be recharged or replaced.  This can be supplemented with a collapsible wind turbine to extend the usage of the devices and reduce the amount of batteries that are required to carry on the expedition.  In extreme cases this could provide a safety net for unexpected accidents or in time of need for communication and rescue.  

At home:

WindPax can be used around the home to run LED lighting along walkways, within a shed or any other application where a self-sustaining energy is required.

   

Our Team

We are a group of talented engineers and designers that have spent many years working and researching in energy related fields, more specifically renewable wind turbine technologies.

Founder-Justin R Chambers, BSME

Senior Advisor-James E Smith, PhD

Financial Advisor-James E Smith II, CPA

Electronics Design-Drew Lowery, PhD

Aerodynamics Design- Chad Panther, PhD

Designer-Ephraim Pittore

We have partnered up with some great people and organizations.  We have an experienced manufacturer  that is eager to help produce these and several outreach organizations are ready to help us distribute the turbines.  We are working to make more links and partnerships with anyone that is willing to help.  If you or your organisation would like to get involved then please contact us.

Please help us by sharing and getting the word out.   We want to make this a successful approach to alleviating energy poverty.  Please visit our website at windpax.com and use the indiegogo share tools and share with us on social media and online.  Thank you for your time and donations and please connect with us with any questions or comments.  We welcome your insights and ideas to help make these devices better and how to better utilize our technology for a greater good.  

Justin R Chambers, President


Note: All donors that are receiving a WindPax themselves will receive the "Wisp" (Clear Windpax wind turbine featured in this description).

story:
Short Summary

There are over 60,000 kids living on the streets of Nairobi, Kenya. They have left home for a variety of reasons, anything from being abused to being orphaned to just being very very hungry. For whatever reason they leave home and try to make a better life for themselves living on the streets. Street life is a very hard life. These children give up their childhood in order to survive. They face drug addictions, rape, malnutrition, and violence. Made in the Streets offers hope. Through this program street kids find a supportive and stable environment. They are given an education and skills training and the opportunity to overcome poverty. Most importantly they are shown love. They are shown that they matter. They are shown that they can make a difference in the world.

All of this would not be possible without the Team. The staff at MITS makes daily sacrifices in order to invest in the children that the rest of society has rejected. The Team inspires, encourages, and supports the children stil living on the streets and the students that are enrolled in the program.

In order to show appreciation for the Team as well as provide an opportunity for some rest and rejuvenation I would like to send them on a short retreat. Each of the Team members is wholly dedicated to this ministry and to investing in the kids. It is important that we invest in the Team.

story:
Back Altifarm on Indiegogo  and the next time when you replicate your favourite chef's mouth-watering recipe, you'll be able to pluck fresh produce from your farm, just like him! If that doesn't convince you, its fabulous and well-thought-out options and features will!  

If you are viewing this on the app, some of the illustrations below might not be visible. If so, we recommend using a browser for the complete experience.

The Ultimate Urban Farm

Altifarm is the first product which lets you grow serious amount of fresh produce at home with minimal effort - farm-fresh vegetables, leafy greens, herbs, micro-greens, fruits etc. It takes care of essential aspects of watering, light, space, plant care etc mostly on its own. Altifarm comprises of 4-tiers (with integrated self-watering system) resting on a heavy-duty steel frame. We also have many Expansion Packs for you to "Grow like a Pro''.

Plenty of space to grow a variety of fresh herbs, vegetables and fruits.

A unique patent-pending design, takes minimal floor space but provides massive grow area and allows for adequate sunlight and air to plants. 

 Inbuilt self-watering system stores water for almost a week and takes care of routine watering without any guess work, letting plants decide how much water they need.

The Grow light Pack provides complete autonomy from sun, providing all the necessary light wavelengths for all plant functions with minimal power consumption.

The Mobility Pack lets you move Altifarm within the house for convenience and to gain sun-light access.

The Greenhouse Pack empowers you to grow fresh produce around the year, even in extreme weather.

 

Herbs, Fruits and Vegetables - Altifarm can grow it all!

 

Perfect For Everyone At Home

 

Comes in two sizes

Praises All Around

In the Media

 

The Value Proposition

*$199 is only applicable for the first 100 Altifarm Solo units, Expansion Packs not included.

 

Stretch Goals are here!!!

Give Us A Shout-out

Use Anywhere

In the Living Room

 

In the Kitchen

 

In the Balcony

 

In the Garden

 

Efficient Yet Attractive Design

 

How It Works

Grow light Expansion Pack

  • Custom designed grow lights with unique wavelength recipe defined for Altifarm's grow area.
  • Maximum productivity across plant growth stages and between multiple plant varieties.
  • High PAR value from 3W high power chip LEDs with secondary optics, power efficient and long lasting
  • IP65 waterproof rating, extruded aluminum body with excellent heat-dissipation and long life.

Greenhouse Expansion Pack

  • Protect your precious plants in extreme climate
  • Controls temperature and humidity
  • Unique roll-up doors with zipper and velcro closures

Soil-less Cultivation on Altifarm

As demonstrated above by our mentor C.V. Prakash from The Petbharo project, it is possible to do soil-less culture on Altifarm directly without any modification. All you need to do is use a sterile medium like coco-peat in place of soil and add nutrients through water via the self watering system. This passive hydroponic system has multi-fold benefits.

  1. quick plant growth and superior productivity
  2. minimal possibility of weeds, plant diseases and pests
  3. far less total weight

    Design features

    Color Options

    Specifications

    What's in the box?

    • Heavy-duty all-weather powder-coated steel frame
    • Food-grade BPA-free-ABS tiers +HIPS inner trays
    • Self-watering spouts with water level indicator
    • Rubber end caps, over flow plugs and other allied components
    • Warranty documents, assembly manual, safety instructions

     

    Do It Your Way on Altifarm

    Altifarm is the first system which gives total flexibility

    • soil/soil-less modes of cultivation
    • grow almost anything (ony limitations being height, depth of roots in some cases)
    • indoor/outdoor usage, in all climates and locations
    • grow from seeds/seedlings/transplants, without need for any subscription
    • autonomy from electricity/water connection, with no moving parts, pump or motor.

    *Growlight Pack needs electricity connection to work, although power requirement is minimal.

     

     

     

    We are ready! All we need is your support..

    Indiegogo Order Fulfillment

    Packing and dispatch of North American Orders (June 2017)

     

    Container stuffing at sea port prior to export (July 2017)

     

    Why Homegrown food?

    Do you know that the loss of nutritive value of certain food items is more than 50%, from farm to fork? Or that food travels for over 1500 miles on an average and has a significant carbon footprint?  Also that the crop varieties in commercial farming are prioritized for shelf life and not for taste and nutrition?
    When you grow your own food, it's as fresh as it can get. With local produce, your meals are always crisp, juicy and bursting with flavor. There's only the joy, pride and delightful consumption with no chemicals, pesticides or GMO to worry about.

    Why Altifarm?

    Although most of us has dabbled with growing plants at some point, we gave up when plants die due to incorrect watering or inadequate nutrition. Others are too busy to take care of plants. Those living in apartments might not have adequate space or sunlight, while climate extremities make it difficult for those in colder regions.

    Altifarm was designed to take these challenges head-on. Its unique patent-pending design, takes minimal floor space but provides massive grow area and adequate sunlight and air. Inbuilt self-watering system stores water for almost a week and takes care of routine watering without any guess work, letting plants decide how much water they need.

    Altifarm blends into your home and grows fresh produce, without getting you tied down to intricacies of plant care. Altifarm does not involve in-line electricity/water connection, apps or any subscription. 

    *growlight pack needs power connection to work.

    Why Expansion Packs?

    Our Expansion packs lets you make the most of Altifarm.

    The Grow light pack provides complete autonomy from sun, providing all the necessary light wavelengths for all plant functions with minimal power consumption. 

    The Mobility pack lets you move Altifarm within the house for convenience and to gain sun-light access.

    The Greenhouse pack allows for year-round cultivation with protection from weather extremities for outdoor use in colder regions.

    visit our website to learn more about expansion packs.

     

    Our Team

    Risks and Challenges

    We produce most of Altifarm inhouse or in close vicinity, barring grow lights. All our production tooling, assembly line and fixtures are ready. As we move into flow production from small batch production, we do anticipate minor difficulties. However, if we hit any major roadblocks or delays in production, we would ensure transparent communication. Likewise, we had done full container shipping(FCL) to Europe in the past and necessary paper work has been sorted out. If we face delays while shipping to newer regions, the same would be duly communicated to backers.

    Final Word

    Enverde is a spin-off of Primusdesign, a boutique Product Design studio, with a string of successful projects across multiple domains.  All the past learning from our hundreds of projects of varying magnitudes, along with blessings of our mentors and support of our partners, have helped us pull this project over the last 3 years - from a hobby to an enterprise. In our quest for perfection, we had wiped the slate clean more than once and we believe we gave it our best shot. If you have suggestions or complaints, please write to info@enverdeworld.com. 

     

    FAQs

    1. Does it come with seeds and soil?

    Altifarm is a product which simplifies gardening and make it easy for anyone to grow produce at home. The idea is to give you the flexibility to decide what kind of plants you want as per your wish and regional climate. That’s why, we do not provide seeds and soil.

    2. If the goal is not met, will I still get my Altifarm?

    We will process all orders and deliver them regardless of the meeting of the goal. We are already in batch production and higher number of pledges help us scale our production and go to market sooner.

    3. Is there a warranty?

    Altifarm comes with one year warranty against manufacturing defects.

    4. You seem to be in a good shape, why are you doing a crowdfunding campaign?

    Our aim is to start an urban farming movement. To motivate people around the world to eat and live healthy in an easy and fuss-free manner. By gaining initial pre-orders and backers’ support through Indiegogo, we wish to the validate the thought behind Altifarm, which will help us take the product to retail distribution on a larger scale.

    As a backer, you could help us improve the product with realtime user feedback across regions/conditions. We are keen to develop more expansion packs if needed and make Altifarm a comprehensive product platform. As a self-funded start-up, we are appreciative of all the support and funding we can get.

    5. What are the payment options available?

    Indiegogo accepts payment through Credit Cards.

    6. This looks big and my apartment is not! Will it fit?

    Although it has a massive cultivable area, the footprint of Altifarm is comparable to an office chair. Turn an unused corner into a home-farm or a green space and reap the benefits.

    7. What growing medium can we use with Altifarm?

    Use good ole’ garden soil. You may enrich it with home-made compost with food scraps from kitchen. Or go completely soil-less with coco-peat medium, along with added nutrients. Write to us to know more on this or follow our blog for more info.

    8. How much weight can the frame withstand? What happens if the frame is exposed to moisture and water?

    Altifarm's sturdy steel frame poweder-coated to avoid corrosion. We have tested it for up to twice the maximum loaded weight of soil and water.

    9. I’m going to use it outdoors, will the colors fade?

    All the tiers are made in durable ABS thermoplastic and UV-treated for sunlight protection. However, we have learned that after extensive use over the years, they tend to gradually fade in color without any loss in strength. We recommend choosing white color if you have excessive sunlight in your region and if color fading is a concern.

    10. Is the product safe to grow edibles?

    The grow tiers and inner trays are made of BPA-free food-grade ABS and HIPS respectively, making it completely safe for growing edibles. They are also completely recyclable.

    11. How often do I have to water the plants?

    The watering spout has a level indicator, which lets you know when reservoir is low.This varies from plant to plant, also depends on weather, humidity, growing medium and other variables. While testing outdoors in good sunlight near 35 °C, we typically get a 5-7 day watering cycle and get 7-9 days cycle while testing indoors.

    12. What if I pour more water than required or use it in the rain ?

    The tiers have built in overflow nozzle through which the excess water is drained to the next lower one. The lower most tier is elevated from the floor by a few inches making it easy to mop or vacuum. 

    13. Is this Hydroponics- with pump and motor etc.?

    Technically, Altifarm employs passive hydroponics. There is no pump, motor or electric connection involved in watering here. It happens solely through capillary action of growing medium.

    14. Do you have an app?

    No, we hate apps!

    15. How do I set-up my Altifarm?

    It takes 10-15 minutes for setting up, once wraps are taken off - no screwdrivers, spanner or other tools needed! An assembly manual is included and will be available for download on the website. You could always to write to us in case of any difficulties.

    16. Does Altifarm provide gardening assistance?

    Yes, we provides tips and advice via our blog and through our influencer partners.

    17. What can I grow with Altifarm?

    You can grow majority of vegetables and herbs with Altifarm - brocolli, eggplant, cabbage, kale, lettuce, basil, oregano, chives, pak choi, aloe, mint, peppers, tomatoes, radish, strawberry, etc.

    18. How much quantity can I grow with Altifarm?

    Produce cannot be quantified as it is subjected to the type, care, weather conditions, etc. However, with a grow area of over 1m2, Altifarm has space to grow dozens of plants at once. We usually have more than 50 plants on ours.

    19. How easy is to move around?

    With the help of our Mobility Expansion Pack you can move a fully loaded Altifarm with just a push. It also has an ingenious locking mechanism to arrest movement when it shouldn't be. 

    20. Tell me about your growlights?

    We have developed custom grow lights with our OEM partner who has decades of experience in the industry. The wavelength recipe, PAR, LUX, wattage and other parameters have been finalized after extensive trials to provide all the right wavelengths for each stage of plant growth - germination, tissue development, photosynthesis, flowering etc. It is highly power efficient, has secondary lens/optics, superior heat dissipation for a very long life, is IP65 rated for water protection, has daisy chain connections and comes with an automated on-off timer for everyday use. Jargons aside, it's a mini sun to take care of your precious plants, for total indoor use.
story_txt:
Back Altifarm on Indiegogo  and the next time when you replicate your favourite chef's mouth-watering recipe, you'll be able to pluck fresh produce from your farm, just like him! If that doesn't convince you, its fabulous and well-thought-out options and features will!  If you are viewing this on the app, some of the illustrations below might not be visible. If so, we recommend using a browser for the complete experience.The Ultimate Urban FarmAltifarm is the first product which lets you grow serious amount of fresh produce at home with minimal effort - farm-fresh vegetables, leafy greens, herbs, micro-greens, fruits etc. It takes care of essential aspects of watering, light, space, plant care etc mostly on its own. Altifarm comprises of 4-tiers (with integrated self-watering system) resting on a heavy-duty steel frame. We also have many Expansion Packs for you to "Grow like a Pro''.Plenty of space to grow a variety of fresh herbs, vegetables and fruits.A unique patent-pending design, takes minimal floor space but provides massive grow area and allows for adequate sunlight and air to plants.  Inbuilt self-watering system stores water for almost a week and takes care of routine watering without any guess work, letting plants decide how much water they need.The Grow light Pack provides complete autonomy from sun, providing all the necessary light wavelengths for all plant functions with minimal power consumption.The Mobility Pack lets you move Altifarm within the house for convenience and to gain sun-light access.The Greenhouse Pack empowers you to grow fresh produce around the year, even in extreme weather. Herbs, Fruits and Vegetables - Altifarm can grow it all! Perfect For Everyone At Home Comes in two sizesPraises All AroundIn the Media The Value Proposition*$199 is only applicable for the first 100 Altifarm Solo units, Expansion Packs not included. Stretch Goals are here!!! Give Us A Shout-outUse AnywhereIn the Living Room In the Kitchen In the Balcony In the Garden Efficient Yet Attractive Design How It WorksGrow light Expansion Pack
Custom designed grow lights with unique wavelength recipe defined for Altifarm's grow area.
Maximum productivity across plant growth stages and between multiple plant varieties.
High PAR value from 3W high power chip LEDs with secondary optics, power efficient and long lasting
IP65 waterproof rating, extruded aluminum body with excellent heat-dissipation and long life.
Greenhouse Expansion Pack
Protect your precious plants in extreme climate
Controls temperature and humidity
Unique roll-up doors with zipper and velcro closures
Soil-less Cultivation on AltifarmAs demonstrated above by our mentor C.V. Prakash from The Petbharo project, it is possible to do soil-less culture on Altifarm directly without any modification. All you need to do is use a sterile medium like coco-peat in place of soil and add nutrients through water via the self watering system. This passive hydroponic system has multi-fold benefits.
quick plant growth and superior productivity
minimal possibility of weeds, plant diseases and pests
far less total weight
Design featuresColor OptionsSpecificationsWhat's in the box?
Heavy-duty all-weather powder-coated steel frame
Food-grade BPA-free-ABS tiers +HIPS inner trays
Self-watering spouts with water level indicator
Rubber end caps, over flow plugs and other allied components
Warranty documents, assembly manual, safety instructions
 Do It Your Way on AltifarmAltifarm is the first system which gives total flexibility
soil/soil-less modes of cultivation
grow almost anything (ony limitations being height, depth of roots in some cases)

indoor/outdoor usage, in all climates and locations
grow from seeds/seedlings/transplants, without need for any subscription
autonomy from electricity/water connection, with no moving parts, pump or motor.
*Growlight Pack needs electricity connection to work, although power requirement is minimal.   We are ready! All we need is your support..Indiegogo Order FulfillmentPacking and dispatch of North American Orders (June 2017) Container stuffing at sea port prior to export (July 2017) Why Homegrown food?Do you know that the loss of nutritive value of certain food items is more than 50%, from farm to fork? Or that food travels for over 1500 miles on an average and has a significant carbon footprint?  Also that the crop varieties in commercial farming are prioritized for shelf life and not for taste and nutrition?When you grow your own food, it's as fresh as it can get. With local produce, your meals are always crisp, juicy and bursting with flavor. There's only the joy, pride and delightful consumption with no chemicals, pesticides or GMO to worry about.Why Altifarm?Although most of us has dabbled with growing plants at some point, we gave up when plants die due to incorrect watering or inadequate nutrition. Others are too busy to take care of plants. Those living in apartments might not have adequate space or sunlight, while climate extremities make it difficult for those in colder regions.Altifarm was designed to take these challenges head-on. Its unique patent-pending design, takes minimal floor space but provides massive grow area and adequate sunlight and air. Inbuilt self-watering system stores water for almost a week and takes care of routine watering without any guess work, letting plants decide how much water they need.Altifarm blends into your home and grows fresh produce, without getting you tied down to intricacies of plant care. Altifarm does not involve in-line electricity/water connection, apps or any subscription. *growlight pack needs power connection to work.Why Expansion Packs?Our Expansion packs lets you make the most of Altifarm.The Grow light pack provides complete autonomy from sun, providing all the necessary light wavelengths for all plant functions with minimal power consumption. The Mobility pack lets you move Altifarm within the house for convenience and to gain sun-light access.The Greenhouse pack allows for year-round cultivation with protection from weather extremities for outdoor use in colder regions.visit our website to learn more about expansion packs. Our Team Risks and ChallengesWe produce most of Altifarm inhouse or in close vicinity, barring grow lights. All our production tooling, assembly line and fixtures are ready. As we move into flow production from small batch production, we do anticipate minor difficulties. However, if we hit any major roadblocks or delays in production, we would ensure transparent communication. Likewise, we had done full container shipping(FCL) to Europe in the past and necessary paper work has been sorted out. If we face delays while shipping to newer regions, the same would be duly communicated to backers.Final WordEnverde is a spin-off of Primusdesign, a boutique Product Design studio, with a string of successful projects across multiple domains.  All the past learning from our hundreds of projects of varying magnitudes, along with blessings of our mentors and support of our partners, have helped us pull this project over the last 3 years - from a hobby to an enterprise. In our quest for perfection, we had wiped the slate clean more than once and we believe we gave it our best shot. If you have suggestions or complaints, please write to info@enverdeworld.com.  FAQs1. Does it come with seeds and soil?Altifarm is a product which simplifies gardening and make it easy for anyone to grow produce at home. The idea is to give you the flexibility to decide what kind of plants you want as per your wish and regional climate. That’s why, we do not provide seeds and soil.2. If the goal is not met, will I still get my Altifarm?We will process all orders and deliver them regardless of the meeting of the goal. We are already in batch production and higher number of pledges help us scale our production and go to market sooner.3. Is there a warranty?Altifarm comes with one year warranty against manufacturing defects.4. You seem to be in a good shape, why are you doing a crowdfunding campaign?Our aim is to start an urban farming movement. To motivate people around the world to eat and live healthy in an easy and fuss-free manner. By gaining initial pre-orders and backers’ support through Indiegogo, we wish to the validate the thought behind Altifarm, which will help us take the product to retail distribution on a larger scale.As a backer, you could help us improve the product with realtime user feedback across regions/conditions. We are keen to develop more expansion packs if needed and make Altifarm a comprehensive product platform. As a self-funded start-up, we are appreciative of all the support and funding we can get.5. What are the payment options available?Indiegogo accepts payment through Credit Cards.6. This looks big and my apartment is not! Will it fit?Although it has a massive cultivable area, the footprint of Altifarm is comparable to an office chair. Turn an unused corner into a home-farm or a green space and reap the benefits.7. What growing medium can we use with Altifarm?Use good ole’ garden soil. You may enrich it with home-made compost with food scraps from kitchen. Or go completely soil-less with coco-peat medium, along with added nutrients. Write to us to know more on this or follow our blog for more info.8. How much weight can the frame withstand? What happens if the frame is exposed to moisture and water?Altifarm's sturdy steel frame poweder-coated to avoid corrosion. We have tested it for up to twice the maximum loaded weight of soil and water.9. I’m going to use it outdoors, will the colors fade?All the tiers are made in durable ABS thermoplastic and UV-treated for sunlight protection. However, we have learned that after extensive use over the years, they tend to gradually fade in color without any loss in strength. We recommend choosing white color if you have excessive sunlight in your region and if color fading is a concern.10. They are also completely recyclable.11. While testing outdoors in good sunlight near 35 °C, we typically get a 5-7 day watering cycle and get 7-9 days cycle while testing indoors.12. What if I pour more water than required or use it in the rain ?The tiers have built in overflow nozzle through which the excess water is drained to the next lower one. The lower most tier is elevated from the floor by a few inches making it easy to mop or vacuum. 13. Is this Hydroponics- with pump and motor etc.?Technically, Altifarm employs passive hydroponics. There is no pump, motor or electric connection involved in watering here. It happens solely through capillary action of growing medium.14. Do you have an app?No, we hate apps!15. How do I set-up my Altifarm?It takes 10-15 minutes for setting up, once wraps are taken off - no screwdrivers, spanner or other tools needed! An assembly manual is included and will be available for download on the website. You could always to write to us in case of any difficulties.16. Does Altifarm provide gardening assistance?Yes, we provides tips and advice via our blog and through our influencer partners.17. What can I grow with Altifarm?You can grow majority of vegetables and herbs with Altifarm - brocolli, eggplant, cabbage, kale, lettuce, basil, oregano, chives, pak choi, aloe, mint, peppers, tomatoes, radish, strawberry, etc.18. It also has an ingenious locking mechanism to arrest movement when it shouldn't be. 20. The wavelength recipe, PAR, LUX, wattage and other parameters have been finalized after extensive trials to provide all the right wavelengths for each stage of plant growth - germination, tissue development, photosynthesis, flowering etc. It is highly power efficient, has secondary lens/optics, superior heat dissipation for a very long life, is IP65 rated for water protection, has daisy chain connections and comes with an automated on-off timer for everyday use. story:
Welcome to caché district! We are so excited to have you here!  

caché district is an online boutique  offering organic, luxurious, cotton linens to suit your lifestyle.

Benefits from our linens

  • Organic cotton for a reduced chemical lifestyle

  • Long staple cotton and high thread count weave for a silky feel

  • 100% cotton for breathability and durability

  • Modern, simple designs that mesh with today's style

  • Affordable prices for today’s family

Our Mission

caché district refers to a hidden find.  We are on a mission to bring you an exclusive collection of pure, organic, luxurious cotton linens for your home that are attractively priced to fit the needs of today’s family.

Our caché district Family

 

Jana Nataraj:  Our Chief Executive Officer (CEO) and the creator of our exclusive design collections.  Jana is a University of Virginia and Boston University School of Law Alum, loves all things fashion and food, and most of all, spending time with her two little ones.

Deepak Nataraj:  Our Chief Operating Officer (COO) and proponent of a clean and healthy lifestyle.  Deepak is a Virginia Tech Alum and a Marine Corps veteran.  He loves traveling and molding two new Hokie football fans!

Doraiswamy Sundar:  Our Chief Information Officer (CIO) and the inspiration behind starting caché district.  Sundar is a VCU Alum and enjoys home decor, watching cricket, and most of all, spoiling his grandchildren.

Our Journey

The genesis of caché district can be traced back to a few situations – together, they created the perfect set of circumstances to bring our vision to reality.

Jana & Deepak received high quality cotton sheets made of pure, high quality Indian cotton for their wedding, which appealed to their love of luxurious home furnishings.

Later, having a son that suffered from environmental allergies in addition to Deepak’s respiratory asthma issues from his deployments to Iraq led them to research how organic cotton may be a better choice for cleaner living.  However, our search for organic cotton sheets at an affordable price proved fruitless. All we could find was either lower quality sheets, sheets deceptively advertised with high thread counts, or organic cotton sheets that were not only expensive, but only available in very limited designs.

Having identified a gap in the marketplace, Jana and Deepak partnered with their CIO, Sundar, who had experience and contacts in the textile industry of India.

The team of three then found the right fit in a supplier and decided to set up shop online, with a community focus in their hometown of Richmond, VA.  A portion of our earnings will be donated to local causes as well as to veterans' causes. 

Our Cotton

India is the original source of long-staple cotton, the luxurious fiber used in sheets commonly found labeled “Egyptian cotton.”  Organic cotton is grown without the use of pesticides, herbicides or other chemical fertilizers.  

Advantages of organic cotton:

  • Feel - Fabrics made from organic cotton have the feel of linen without the weight. Since organic cotton is not chemically stripped of its natural wax, it maintains its characteristic smoothness.

  • Moisture Absorbent - Organic cotton is useful in textile production due to its natural absorption properties, absorption of dye color and its ability to stabilize other fibers.

  • Environmental Foot Print - Organic cotton is grown using methods and materials that have a low impact on the environment. Organic production systems replenish and maintain soil fertility, reduce the use of toxic and persistent pesticides and fertilizers, and build biologically diverse agriculture, making natural cotton an eco-friendly fabric.

Our Designs

To start, we’ve created four modern, timeless collections of bedding.

Our White Collection features pure white organic cotton sheets for those looking for the luxurious feel and benefits of organic cotton without any ornamentation. 

Our Classic Collection features our signature paisley motif representing life and eternity onto classic white bedding with a colorful border for a modern aesthetic.  This statement piece is available in Classic Bold Orange or Classic Shimmering Gold.

Our Print Collection features our modern twists on two classic patterns, the herringbone and the pinstripe.  We’ve emboldened a typical herringbone with a bigger pattern to create a more dramatic effect in a classic mix of black and white.  We’ve made our pinstripe pop with our bold signature orange color for a perfect mix of sophistication and fun.  

Our Blended Collection features pattern mixing of modern designs for an intricate and unique look.  Our polka dot design is a preview of what is to come with our Blended Collection in the future.  The polka dot design mixes two modern patterns: a classic polka dot pattern in our vibrant cache orange and our bold black herringbone, resulting in a modern take on ornate bedding that meshes well with our other existing designs. 

We have created our collections so the pieces work well together to create either understated and elegant combinations, or bolder and more colorful looks.

 

Our Manufacturing Partner

Our manufacturing partner has 30 years of experience in both woven and knit textiles.  Our partner has been making fine quality and high end fashion garments catering to Europe and US markets.

Our Goals

We have spent the last couple years meticulously working on our business model and ensuring that we keep true to our mission, which is to offer everyone the option to own pure, 100% organic, luxurious cotton linens in modern, desirable designs at accessible prices.  

Our research indicated that the high prices of quality cotton linens are due to numerous middlemen who do not add any value. We have put a lot of time into finding the right supplier, using our background and contacts in India to ensure quality.  We are now working directly with our manufacturing partner to source pure, organic cotton.

While we are starting with sheets for standard sized beds, we envision turning caché district into a one stop shop for all your home textile furnishings in the near future.  Our next steps are to expand to infant’s and children’s bedding and accessories, and sleepwear for the whole family.  If there’s anything you want to see, we want to hear from you!

Your Help

If you believe in us and our mission, please consider supporting our campaign by contributing and trying out one of our products yourself at discounted prices.

You can also help us by spreading the word to your family and friends.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

We stand behind our product 100%.  To ensure the highest quality standards, we put our linens through rigorous testing by North Carolina State’s College of Textile Materials Lab.  

We offer an unconditional happiness guarantee. If you are not satisfied with our products, we will be happy to send you a replacement or a refund.

Risks and Challenges

We have already produced a sample run of our organic, luxurious, cotton linens and our close friends and family are getting a good night’s sleep using our sheets.  We have also simplified some of our designs to ensure perfection.

Our team has been test running our website and our operations to make sure your orders are fulfilled accurately and timely.  Our factory partners are ready and have committed to delivering your orders in time for the holiday season, making caché district linens a perfect gift for your loved ones.
