Isn’t it obvious?! Ok, maybe not. A Swash is an advanced electronic bidet toilet seat that uses a remote control to position and spray a fresh and hygienic stream of water from stainless steel nozzles when you’re finished using the bathroom. It comes with loads of other cool features, too… just check out our Feature Section!
How does the Swash Luxury Bidet Seat work?
Have a toilet? Awesome – you’re halfway there! Just lose the seat…because the Swash replaces your existing toilet seat. It delivers a warm-water wash through two self-cleaning, positionable nozzles that spray with different temperatures, pressures - all controlled by the included remote. One nozzle’s spray is directed at your behind, and the other is targeted at a more “frontal” position (this is sometimes called the feminine wash). Together they make sure that no spot on your…erm, undercarriage is left unclean. Oh, and the seat’s heated. Cause no one like a cold tushy on a winter night, amiright?
Where is the Swash Luxury Bidet Seat manufactured and serviced?
The Swash bidet seat is manufactured in our existing factory in South Korea. All of Brondell’s products are serviced in San Francisco, CA, USA. (No cable cars are harmed in the servicing of our products).
What is your Warranty policy?
The Swash 1400 comes with a three-year limited warranty.
When will I receive my order?
We expect to ship and deliver orders to our backers by the end of March, 2017 – giving you a whole ‘nother meaning of “spring cleaning!”
How will you ship the product to me and where will this ship from?
Your new best friend….I mean new bidet seat will ship by UPS Ground (US shipments) directly from our warehouse in Effingham, IL and by the best method available for shipments in Canada directly from our Canadian warehouse in Toronto, ON.
Will the Swash Luxury Bidet Seat fit my toilet?
Absolutely! The Swash 1400 comes in both an Elongated and a Round size, and is designed to fit on 98% of residential toilet fixtures in North America.
What size bidet seat do I need?
To determine the size of your toilet, just consult the Toilet Fit Guide. And if you’re still unsure, what’s wrong with you!?
Kidding. If, after measuring your toilet setup while consulting the Toilet Fit Guide, you still can’t determine whether you have an Elongated or Round toilet, give our customer service line a call at (888)542-3355 and we’ll sort you out. Our customer service agents will also be able to help you determine the size of your toilet should measurements prove tricky.
When do I choose my size?
At the end of the InDemand campaign, we’ll send a survey to you asking for your shipping address, choice of size (Round or Elongated), and choice of color (White or Biscuit).
What installation is required?
Standard installation is quick and easy. And we’re not just saying that so you’ll buy it, only to be left in the toilet lurch once you get it home. No, we really mean it.
The vast majority of our customers do the installation themselves, without needing to hire a plumber or handyman. Standard installation involves a few simple steps that are shown in the Installation Video in the section above. Please note that a standard grounded outlet is required to power the Swash. (Unless you possess the power of electrokinesis, in which case we want to be your friend).
I have a skirted toilet with no access to the tank or the toilet seat mounting bolts of my toilet.
How do I install the Swash?
Let’s start with the good news - The Swash 1400 comes with all of the plumbing and mounting hardware necessary to install the bidet seat on a traditional toilet. Now for the not-so-bad news: your super-fancy modern toilet could pose a couple difficulties during installation, but (probably) nothing you can’t handle!
In these instances, we recommend purchasing our alternate T-valve option, found on the Brondell website. The T-valve will connect at the shut-off valve at the wall, instead of under the toilet tank. If your fixture also only has top-side access to the toilet seat mounting bolts, you will likely need top-mount hardware, which can be found on the Brondell website.
See? Not so bad! Plus, these items can be purchased in advance of the delivery of your new Swash 1400.
What are the plumbing requirements of the Swash Luxury Bidet Seat?
Swash Luxury Bidet Seats are compatible with most residential toilet fixtures in the USA... which means it’ll probably feel right at home on yours. All that’s required to connect your Swash to water is a toilet with a tank or access to a water supply valve at the wall. Keep in mind that wall-mounted toilets require a separate water connection to be installed in order to provide water for your Swash (in this case, hiring a reputable plumber is recommended).
The Swash includes everything that you need to provide fresh water to your bidet utilizing the existing water supply. In the rare case that your water supply line is inflexible, you will need to purchase a flexible water line either online or at any local hardware store to complete the installation (as in many cases, bendy is better).
Do I need an electrical outlet?
Yes. You will need a standard three-prong grounded GFCI outlet. GFCI outlets with an internal safety breaker are common and required in all kitchens and bathrooms. If your outlet is more than three and a half feet from the toilet, all you will need is a grounded extension cord to operate your Swash. (When you choose the right extension cord for your bathroom, it does blend in well, promise).
For those customers interested in installing a new outlet specifically for the Swash, let your licensed electrician know that the optimum location when facing your toilet fixture is to the left side of the fixture underneath the toilet tank. The Swash 1400 operates on a standard 120 volts AC and requires a minimum 15amp circuit.
Can I use this bidet seat outside of North America?
Yes and No. (Best answer ever, right)? CE-certified 220V seats are not part of this campaign, but they will be available for purchase directly from Brondell next year after we launch our 110V version. Due to the complex technology inside the product, you are not able to use our 110V seats with a power converter unless the frequency also matches (60HZ). For this reason, we don’t suggest using the product with any kind of converter.
How much electricity does the bidet use?
The Swash 1400 consumes a maximum draw of 1200 watts (less than an electric kettle!) when heating and spraying water during the bidet functions with all the other functions on the highest settings. When the Swash is not spraying water, but the heated seat is on, power consumption is around 60 watts (about the same as a medium-strength light bulb) and we have an energy-saving Eco Mode to reduce electrical consumption even more.
How much water does this use and isn’t that wasteful?
Actually the Swash uses a very small amount of water – about a tenth of a gallon per use. When you consider that it takes up to 37 gallons of water to produce a roll of toilet paper – you are actually saving water when you use a bidet seat!
How long is the power cord? On which side of the Swash is the power cord?
The power cord is 3.5 feet long, and extends from the left side of the bidet seat when facing the toilet (standing in the “urinal position,” if you will). It is next to the water connection.
Is the Swash compatible with seat elevators or toilet seat risers?
Yup, the Swash is compatible with certain riser styles. You can buy a riser that is for sure compatible with the Swash (complete with all additionally required hardware) on the Brondell website.
What colors are available for the Swash?
The Swash 1400 is available in White and Biscuit (not like the golden, buttery biscuits that sit on Southern tables. Think elegant and understated beige). After ordering your Swash, the email you’ll receive at the end of the InDemand campaign will help you decide which color will best match your existing toilet.
When do I choose my color?
At the end of the InDemand campaign, we’ll send a survey to you asking for your shipping address, choice of size (Round versus Elongated), and choice of color (White versus Biscuit).
How do you operate the Swash Luxury Bidet Seat?
You operate the Swash 1400 by using the wireless remote. (Yep, it’s 2016. Your toilet seat has a remote control). The remote comes with a magnetic dock that can mount to a surface using the adhesive on the back of the dock, or with the provided mounting screws.
Can a Swash be used by children, seniors, and people with disabilities?
Absolutely! Children love using the Swash, and they are wonderful for parents with children who are potty-trained but not yet able to clean themselves. (Parents going through that stage – you know exactly what we mean. And we feel for you). Those who are elderly, or who have limited mobility or other limitations, can especially benefit from using the Swash. It’s no fun having to ask for help to wipe – the Swash lets anyone with mobility issues preserve their bathroom dignity.
Does the seat stay heated at all times?
The heated seat function is controlled by the user. It can be set to one of three temperature settings, or simply turned off (but why would you do that? In the middle of the night, a warm seat is like a cozy butt hug). The Swash 1400 also features an optional Eco Mode, which automatically turns the seat heat down to Low after 10 minutes of inactivity.
What is the duration of the wash?
Pressing the “Rear” or “Front” button on the remote control starts a two-minute wash cycle. Pressing this button once again at any point in that cycle starts the two-minute cycle from the beginning. Pressing the “Stop” button will stop the cycle at any point. Any questions?
How long does the warm water last? Forever you say?
The Swash 1400 uses a ceramic-core on-demand heating system which provides "endless" warm water washes, unlike tank systems that run out of warm water before you’re ready and give a shocking blast of cold water exactly where you don’t want it. The standard, uninterrupted wash time for either the Front or Rear wash is two minutes, but can be extended by simply pressing the wash button during the cycle (no judgment here if it takes you twenty minutes to get out of the bathroom).
What is the difference between “Front” and “Rear” on the Swash remote control?
The Front Wash provides a feminine hygienic cleanse (which our lady customers find particularly useful), while the Rear Wash offers a posterior wash for both men and women (after all, everybody poops!).
Do the nozzles ever "get in the way?”
No way! The nozzles are only extended during the wash cycle. At all other times they are housed inside the unit and out of the way. As a further safeguard, the wands self-clean themselves with a high-pressure spray of water before and after each use.
For an extra level of hygiene and peace of mind, the Swash 1400 also features on demand nozzle sterilization, which you can activate at the touch of a button.
Is the Swash safe and reliable?
The Brondell Swash is cETL certified for both the US and Canada for electrical safety standards and is also cUPC certified for both the US and Canada for plumbing safety standards.  The Swash 1400 is covered by a limited three-year warranty.
With proper usage, Brondell products will provide years of reliable use. Owners should read and follow all safety precautions in the literature provided with the product. Pretty standard, you know?
What is the weight limit of the Swash Luxury Bidet Seat?
The Swash lid has a weight limit of 270 pounds. The seat has a weight limit of 330 pounds.
What prevents the Swash from spraying water when someone isn’t on the toilet?
The Swash Luxury Bidet Seat will not work unless someone is sitting on it (we did that on purpose). There is a skin conductivity sensor on the seat that detects contact from your skin. Triggering that sensor is what activates the Swash. We kinda figured you didn’t want some bidet newbie playing with the remote and triggering a Bellagio-like fountain in your bathroom.
What maintenance is required?
Swash seats are made of germ-resistant plastic, and can be cleaned with a soft, wet cloth and a mild detergent. For complete cleaning (hey, we all need it from time to time), the Swash 1400 features a quick-release button to separate the seat from the mounting bracket.
Although Swash nozzles are self-cleaning, we recommend that they be cleaned with a soft brush as needed, and that the removable mesh filter be cleaned every 6-8 months and the carbon deodorizer should be replaced once every 6 months.

story:
Maintenant disponible sur www.wopilo.com

Now available on www.wopilo.com

 

There are two types of pillows out there, you’ve probably met them both. Your classic pillows - sometimes they’re comfortable, sometimes they aren’t and they get harder over time and do not support your neck properly. And also your memory foam pillows, they’re not very comfortable and retain heat, causing unbearbly hot sleeping conditions.

Wopilo will revolutionize your nights by offering the comfort of a traditional pillow, the neck support of an ergonomic one while letting you choose your desired comfort level, firm or fluffy!

A SIMPLE CONCEPT

With a unique design that combines the best of a comfortable pillow and memory foam, Wopilo was developed with the help of an osteopathic expert, specialized in pain.

A SUPER COMFORTABLE, LATEST GENERATION MICROFIBERS PILLOW

Just 0.8 decitex in diameter (the thinnest on the market), our microfibers provide the same feeling and comfort as down feathers (without allergies and the savage process of feather removal). Soft, enveloping material, it’s the highest quality synthetic packing on the market. We also preferred the down microfiber for its versatility, strength and easy maintenance.

LATEST GENERATION MEMORY FOAM CORE

Wopilo’s core is made of the best memory foam currently available on the market. Certified Oekotex foam with a density of 40kg / m3 and firmness of 2.0Pa / kg will relax tense muscles and perfectly supports your neck.

The Wopilo core is not thermo-sensitive, unlike traditional polyurethane foams that tend to be firmer when the room is cooler and softer when the room is warm.

Our memory foam maintains the same level of firmness, no matter what temperature the room is. Your neck will be sure to thank us! Even better, it won’t retain body heat and prevents sweating. Another added bonus is that it has a longer lifetime than conventional foams.

CHOOSE YOUR COMFORT WITH ITS TWO DIFFERENT POCKETS

You can choose your side, firm or fluffy! Wopilo adapts to the sensitivity of your neck, it has one pocket with 200 grams of microfibers and another with 450 grams so that you can choose:

  • a softer comfort if you sleep on the thickest pocket
  • a firmer comfort if you sleep on the thinnest pocket

ALL YOU COULD EVER WANT FROM A PILLOW... AND MORE

SHARE WOPILO

Follow us on social networks and if you know someone who loves to sleep, tell them about Wopilo!

Wopilo was developed with the help of an osteopathic specialist, keenly aware of how important a pillow is for back and neck health, as well as for sleep quality. From a medical point of view, your pillow needs to fulfill two roles while you sleep.

The first is to provide proper neck support when you are lying down to prevent the development of neck problems including cervicalgia, cervical lordosis, curvature inversion or even scoliosis. This also helps reduce symptoms (which can be very painful and therefore prevent you from sleeping) of many neck and back disorders such as cervical sprain, torticolis, herniated discs and cervical spondylosis.

The second role is to allow the sleeper to be comfortable in a position that is sufficiently relaxing so that they produce serotonin, the well-being hormone that will trigger the release of melatonin, the sleeping hormone…

By design, Wopilo fulfills both roles perfectly. As icing on the cake, Wopilo encourages sleepers to position themselves either on their side or on their back, the two most restorative positions you can sleep in.

A suitable pillow should allow for proper vertebrae alignment and release pressure points on your neck. The majority of the American population is aware that having a good pillow is vital (more than 60% of the population).

USING WOPILO

Wopilo adapts to your personal desired comfort level. To ensure you are properly using Wopilo and to benefit from optimal neck support from the memory foam core, the Wopilo tag should always be located at the top of your pillow and the core under your neck. 

Wopilo is the story of Thomas, 32, a poor sleeper who was regularly afflicted with morning neck pain.

Thomas came up with a solution simply because he could not find the ideal pillow. He found himself constantly folding traditional pillows, which resulted in a sore neck, and he simply could not sleep on the ergonomic ones. With the help of an osteopathic disorders specialist, he worked for months on the design and selection of materials. This is how Wopilo was born.

“Pillows are associated with comfort, yet paradoxically, they are the reason behind so many different aches and pains, especially for the neck. We developed Wopilo because we personally needed a solution to sleep better and we ended up developing an innovative pillow that will improve the nights of thousands of people”.

A SPECIAL MESSAGE TO YOU BACKERS

Since the beginning of this project, we thought that Wopilo might be a perfect match for Kickstarter and of course, for you backers. We’ve designed every detail, including the packaging, with you in mind.

Thank you so much for your support!

Wopilo, sleep in progress!

Il existe deux grandes familles d’oreillers sur lesquelles vous avez probablement déjà dormi. D’un côté les oreillers classiques, carrés ou rectangulaires. Certains sont confortables, d’autres moins ayant tendance à se tasser avec le temps. Ils ne soutiennent pas ou peu les cervicales et sont responsables des douleurs au cou. D’autre part les oreillers ergonomiques, dans des matières élastiques comme le latex ou les mousses à mémoire de forme. Il leur est souvent reproché d’être durs et de manquer de confort. Composés de matières peu respirantes, ils tiennent chaud.

Wopilo va révolutionner vos nuits. Il offre le confort d’un oreiller traditionnel moelleux, le soutien cervical d’un oreiller ergonomique tout en vous laissant le choix d’un confort ferme ou extra-moelleux. 

Avec son design unique qui combine le meilleur de l’oreiller traditionnel et de la mousse à mémoire de forme. Wopilo a été développé avec l’aide d’un médecin ostéopathe.

UN OREILLER SUPER CONFORTABLE EN MICROFIBRES DERNIÈRE GÉNÉRATION

Avec juste 0.8 decitex de diamètres (les plus fines du marché), les microfibres de Wopilo reproduisent l’effet enveloppant du duvet (sans les allergies et l’arrachage des plumes parfois sauvage). Douillet, enveloppant et gonflant, c’est le garnissage synthétique le plus qualitatif du marché. Nous avons également préféré la microfibre au duvet pour sa polyvalence, sa résistance et son entretien.

UN CŒUR EN MOUSSE A MÉMOIRE DE FORME DERNIÈRE GÉNÉRATION

Pour le cœur de Wopilo, nous avons sélectionné la meilleure des mousses à mémoire de forme. Certifiée Oekotex, cette mousse, d’une densité de 40kg/m3 et d’une dureté de 2.0Pa/kg, va relâcher vos tensions et soutenir parfaitement votre cou.

Le cœur de Wopilo est non thermosensible contrairement aux mousses polyuréthane traditionnelles. En général, les mousses sont plus dures quand la pièce est froide et plus molle quand la pièce est chaude.

La mousse à mémoire de forme Wopilo gardera la même fermeté peu importe la chaleur de la pièce, pour le bonheur de vos cervicales ! De plus, elle ne conservera pas la chaleur du corps et évitera don de vous faire transpirer. Enfin, elle dispose d’une durée de vie supérieure aux mousses classiques. 

DEUX CONFORTS DIFFERENTS DANS UN WOPILO

Choisissez votre confort, ferme ou moelleux. Wopilo s’adapte à la sensibilité de votre cou. Il est composé d’une poche de 200 grammes et d’une autre de 450 grammes de microfibres et vous proposera :

  • un confort plus moelleux si vous dormez sur la poche la plus épaisse
  • un confort plus ferme si vous dormez sur la poche plus fine.

TOUT CE QU'UN OREILLER DOIT APPORTER... ET PLUS ENCORE

 

SHARE WOPILO                                

Partagez-nous sur les réseaux sociaux et si vous connaissez quelqu’un qui aime dormir, parlez-lui de Wopilo !

 

Wopilo a été développé avec un médecin ostéopathe, conscient de l’importance majeure de l’oreiller autant pour le dos et les cervicales que pour la qualité du sommeil. D’un point de vue médical, l’oreiller doit tenir deux rôles principaux pendant la nuit.

Le premier est de soutenir la courbure cervicale lorsque nous sommes allongés; ce qui empêche le développement de maux cervicaux allant de la simple cervicalgie à la lordose cervicale, l’inversion de courbure ou même la scoliose. Cela permet également de réduire les symptômes (pouvant être très douloureux et pouvant empêcher de dormir) de nombreux troubles cervicaux et dorsaux comme l’entorse cervicale, le torticolis, la hernie discale, l’arthrose cervicale ou encore des douleurs post AVP (accident voix publique).

Le deuxième est de permettre au dormeur de s’installer dans une position suffisamment relaxante pour qu’il sécrète la sérotonine, hormone du bien–être qui déclenchera la sécrétion de mélatonine, hormone du sommeil…

Par son design, Wopilo tient parfaitement ces deux rôles. Cerise sur le gâteau, il « oblige » le dormeur à se positionner sur le côté ou sur le dos, positions de sommeil les plus réparatrices.

La majorité des français en est consciente puisque disposer d’un bon oreiller est important pour plus de 60% d'entre eux.

BIEN DORMIR SUR WOPILO

Wopilo est un oreiller qui s’adapte au confort de chacun. Pour être sûr de bien l’utiliser et bénéficier du soutien cervical de son cœur en mousse à mémoire de forme, il suffit de se repérer grâce à la griffe Wopilo qui doit toujours se situer en haut de votre oreiller. Son coeur doit être placé sous votre cou.

Wopilo, c’est l’histoire de Thomas, 32 ans aussi, mauvais dormeur et régulièrement sujet aux douleurs matinales.

C’est parce que Thomas n’avait pas trouvé son oreiller idéal qu’il a cherché la solution. Il pliait sans arrêt les oreillers traditionnels qui lui donnaient mal au cou. Et il ne pouvait tout simplement pas dormir sur les oreillers ergonomiques. Avec l’aide d’un spécialiste des troubles ostéopathiques, il a travaillé pendant des mois sur le design et la sélection de matières. C’est ainsi qu’est né Wopilo.

« L’oreiller est assimilé au confort alors que paradoxalement, il est à la base de nombreuses douleurs, notamment au niveau des cervicales. C’est parce que nous aussi nous avions besoin de mieux dormir que nous avons développé Wopilo, un oreiller innovant qui va améliorer le sommeil de milliers de dormeurs. »

UN MESSAGE SPECIAL A NOS CONTRIBUTEURS

Depuis le début de notre aventure, nous avons toujours pensé que Wopilo était parfaitement adapté à un lancement sur Kickstarter et bien sûr à vous. Nous avons désigné chaque détail de notre oreiller fétiche avec un seul et unique objectif : vous faire mieux dormir.

Merci infiniment pour votre soutien.

Wopilo, sleep in progress!

Wopilo s’adapte à la sensibilité de votre cou. Il est composé d’une poche de 200 grammes et d’une autre de 450 grammes de microfibres et vous proposera :
un confort plus moelleux si vous dormez sur la poche la plus épaisse
un confort plus ferme si vous dormez sur la poche plus fine.
TOUT CE QU'UN OREILLER DOIT APPORTER... ET PLUS ENCORE SHARE WOPILO                                Partagez-nous sur les réseaux sociaux et si vous connaissez quelqu’un qui aime dormir, parlez-lui de Wopilo ! Wopilo a été développé avec un médecin ostéopathe, conscient de l’importance majeure de l’oreiller autant pour le dos et les cervicales que pour la qualité du sommeil. D’un point de vue médical, l’oreiller doit tenir deux rôles principaux pendant la nuit.Le premier est de soutenir la courbure cervicale lorsque nous sommes allongés; ce qui empêche le développement de maux cervicaux allant de la simple cervicalgie à la lordose cervicale, l’inversion de courbure ou même la scoliose. Cela permet également de réduire les symptômes (pouvant être très douloureux et pouvant empêcher de dormir) de nombreux troubles cervicaux et dorsaux comme l’entorse cervicale, le torticolis, la hernie discale, l’arthrose cervicale ou encore des douleurs post AVP (accident voix publique).Le deuxième est de permettre au dormeur de s’installer dans une position suffisamment relaxante pour qu’il sécrète la sérotonine, hormone du bien–être qui déclenchera la sécrétion de mélatonine, hormone du sommeil…Par son design, Wopilo tient parfaitement ces deux rôles. Cerise sur le gâteau, il « oblige » le dormeur à se positionner sur le côté ou sur le dos, positions de sommeil les plus réparatrices.La majorité des français en est consciente puisque disposer d’un bon oreiller est important pour plus de 60% d'entre eux.BIEN DORMIR SUR WOPILOWopilo est un oreiller qui s’adapte au confort de chacun. Pour être sûr de bien l’utiliser et bénéficier du soutien cervical de son cœur en mousse à mémoire de forme, il suffit de se repérer grâce à la griffe Wopilo qui doit toujours se situer en haut de votre oreiller. Son coeur doit être placé sous votre cou.Wopilo, c’est l’histoire de Thomas, 32 ans aussi, mauvais dormeur et régulièrement sujet aux douleurs matinales.C’est parce que Thomas n’avait pas trouvé son oreiller idéal qu’il a cherché la solution. Il pliait sans arrêt les oreillers traditionnels qui lui donnaient mal au cou. Et il ne pouvait tout simplement pas dormir sur les oreillers ergonomiques. Avec l’aide d’un spécialiste des troubles ostéopathiques, il a travaillé pendant des mois sur le design et la sélection de matières. C’est ainsi qu’est né Wopilo.« L’oreiller est assimilé au confort alors que paradoxalement, il est à la base de nombreuses douleurs, notamment au niveau des cervicales. C’est parce que nous aussi nous avions besoin de mieux dormir que nous avons développé Wopilo, un oreiller innovant qui va améliorer le sommeil de milliers de dormeurs. »UN MESSAGE SPECIAL A NOS CONTRIBUTEURSDepuis le début de notre aventure, nous avons toujours pensé que Wopilo était parfaitement adapté à un lancement sur Kickstarter et bien sûr à vous. Nous avons désigné chaque détail de notre oreiller fétiche avec un seul et unique objectif : vous faire mieux dormir.Merci infiniment pour votre soutien.Wopilo, sleep in progress!

story:
Cats have always been adorable, loving companions. They are smart, agile, and noble, bringing endless joy to people.

However, our fluffy friends only show the happy side of their lives and don’t express when they are feeling discomfort or in poor health. That is because their wild feline instinct makes them conceal their own illness for self-protection. This often leads to a situation where owners only realize kitties’ sickness when it’s too late for proper care.

Fortunately, a great deal of information about the health condition of a cat can be determined by their weight and litter box behavior. By monitoring and tracking subtle changes in weight and excretion, we are able to know much about the health and wellbeing of our beloved pets.





Measuring a cat’s weight manually and observing litter box behavior is difficult and impractical. Also, the collected data and statistics require careful analysis. Now there is a better way. WeCare allows you to understand the physical condition of your cats in an effortless way, so that they live healthier, happier, longer lives.

  • Accurate Weight Measurement at Each Litter Box Visit

Weighing your cat has never been so easy! With the litter box sitting on WeCare, your cat’s weight will be instantly and accurately collected and shown on the screen while simultaneously uploaded to the app database. You don’t need to hold your cat while you step on a scale anymore!

  • Keep An Eye On Litter Box Behavior

Litter box behavior matters! WeCare records the time, duration, and frequency of visits when your cat is doing his or her own business. It’s of vital importance to monitor this data to know if any potential health issues are indicated.




The data collected will be uploaded to the App on your smartphone automatically. Meanwhile, the fluctuation of key metrics will be shown in statistical charts and diagrams so that you can see in an instant any change in your cat’s condition. You can even follow along in your furry friend’s growth year by year!


 


WeCare reminds you with alerts when shifts of your cat’s health data occur. This can be helpful to prevent disease ahead of time, saving expensive veterinary costs. WeCare provides real-time care for your lovely cuddly mates, so that you know you are giving them the very best care.






  • Recognizes Multiple Cats

WeCare is ideal for multi-cat homes because it can recognize different cats in your family via its highly-precise sensor. Each cat’s health condition can be monitored and tracked separately.



  • Stretchable Sides Fit All Litter Boxes

No matter if your cat has a huge automatic litter box or the classic tray, the stretchable sides of WeCare allow you to put any size litter box on top of it.



  • Infinite Cloud Database

The essential health data of your cats will be uploaded to the WeCare cloud database where powerful analytics learn your cat’s individual profile and watch for trends and changes in their condition.
























CatLink was founded in 2017 by a group of engineers and designers who are passionate about cats and their health. We follow the idea of ‘making cats convenient & people comfortable’. Our mission is to create great products that let everyone enjoy the fun of kitty-keeping with the help of technology. As a new and innovative cat supplies brand, CatLink is dedicated to making cat-raising smart and convenient.

story:
Short Summary

This navigation helps a visually challenged individual to safely negotiate obstacles, whether at home or outside. This capability will add to the confidence of such an individual.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding is needed to develop a low cost but intelligent device. It will be spent on designing the sensors, the processing module hardware and software and the packaging. The packaging will be designed for lightness, flexibility and comfort. The entire product is to be designed keeping in mind the needs of the visually challenged individual. Money will also be spent on creating enough prototypes for field trials and then preparing for volume production. The device will be designed to meet the toughest quality and performance standards.
  • The end result will be a device that will be universally accepted. The market is huge and offers great potential.
  • The funds will be spent in a controlled manner so that we can deliver the product. 

The Impact

  • There are an estimated 295 million visually impaired people in the world and out of these, 39 million people are totally blind. All their lives, they are dependent on others to navigate their way. At present, the only way these people can navigate is by the use of their white cane or seeing eye dogs. Smart canes have been developed but their use is not easy. This device will enable the visually challenged to be able to navigate on their own with ease. A rider though: a white cane would still be recommended so that the others can recognize them! This device can help a vast majority of the visually impaired people in this world.
  • The Team leader for the project has designed a number of products. One of the major products was in the field of medical electronics was a Polysomnography machine used for Sleep disorder diagnosis. Recently, the team has been involved in the development of a smart wristwatch that provides the user with some important information like heart rate, pedometer, skin moisture etc. It has a built-in SIM module for  communication and internet access and a GPS module as well. The same technology will now be adapted for this project for whom funding is being sought.
  • The product will NOT be a communication link per se and will not allow connectivity to social media or messaging. Only automatic emergency messaging will be allowed. This is so that the user does not get confused by a lot of conflicting messages or responses.

Risks & Challenges

  • The major challenge is to design a product that will provide the best value for money. The team behind this project has been designing products that deliver the best value for money while being very easy to use.
  • The challenge will also be to design a product that is easy to use.
  • The challenges mentioned above can be solved by adapting some of the solutions that have already been designed by this team. By using proper packaging material, efficient batteries and battery management circuit, robust processing and tight software coding, a low-cost device can be delivered.
  • The target for the first prototypes is August 2015. However, the volume production will not be possible before December 2015 as we plan to carry out extensive field trials.
  • The target cost of the device is planned to be $ 35. We believe we can do it in this price. However, some overrun can be expected.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • What we are trying to do is help contribute restore dignity to the visually challenged. They need not be always dependent on others for their daily chores. Please do contact any such group who would be willing to share this passion and join us in this effort.
  • We would invite you to use the tools provided by Indiegogo for this!

Timeline

  • Basic Specifications: August 31, 2014
  • Detailed specifications: October 15, 2014
  • Circuit schematics and Selection of components: December 15, 2014
  • PCB layout and prototype assembly: Jan 31, 2015
  • In-house testing: March 31, 2015
  • Rework and final packaging: May 15, 2015
  • Field testing: July 15, 2015
  • Final prototypes: Aug 31, 2015
  • Volume Production: By December 2015

Progress

  • Basic specifications completed
  • Feedback being obtained through discussions with end users.

story:
• ACPV is the prototype project of Advanced Concentrated Photovoltaic system. This alternative energy generation system  provides clean, effective and cheap energy solution.
  • The system has a self-developed controller and algorithm. With sensors set, auto cooling module, insolation concentration mirrors and solar tracking system combined together, the ACPV System provides ultra–high electricity generation efficiency that brings several times more power during the operation year.

The cubic concrete bases are underground, each base is around one cubic meter. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The most advanced SunPower Inc. Maxeon technology solar panel had been used.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

During project's construction time , controller development, sensors calibration, writing program code, making many tests and analyzing operational algorithms, I  can say finally that this is every perspective project ! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

BASICS 

Available Solar Energy

The actual power reaching the ground generally daily averages less than 200 Watts per square meter. Thus the average power intercepted at any time by the earth's surface is around 127.4 x 106 x 106 x 200 = 25.4 x 1015 Watts or 25,400 TeraWatts.

To put this into perspective, the total annual electrical energy consumed in the world from all sources in 2011 was 22,126 TWh (International Energy Agency (IEA)). 

Today, the average conversion efficiency of major solar panels is between 15%  to 20%. The SunPower X21-345 W Solar Panel  using their unique Maxeon ® Solar Cell Technology and Panel’s surface glass geometry provides best, 21.5 % performance efficiency at standard test conditions: 1000 W/m² irradiance, AM 1.5, 25° C).


Physical behavior

The DC circuit current  (I) is directly related to the number of photons absorbed by the panel’s semiconducting material and is thus proportional to light intensity. The conversion efficiency is therefore reasonably constant so that the power output is proportional to the irradiance, however the efficiency is reduced if the cell temperature is allowed to rise. The DC circuit voltage (V) varies only slightly with light intensity. Typically, PV cell power output reduces by about 0.5% (!) with every degree Celsius increase in temperature.

According to any panel’s physical behavior, the maximum energy generation occurs if the two main requirements exist:

The panel’s surface absorb as much perpendicular solar irradiation as possible and the panel’s temperature is low.

The maximum energy generation is what the ACPV project is deal with !


ACPV CORE

How it works


Self-constructed controller with sensors set and self-developed program code with system’s operational Algorithm, alongside autonomic solar tracking module provide maximum energy generation requirements.

Rising up solar panels insolation (Concentration Mirrors), real time, perpendicular solar irradiance tracking (Tracking controller, Sensor and Actuator motor), Solar Panel's parameters state sensing: DC Voltage (V-Volts) , DC Current (I-Amp) and Temperature (C), environment temperature and non-concentrated light level  (W/m2).

According to the sensors parameters, controller analyzes the system’s status and “knows” (Algorithm) when and how cooling module (Water Pump and Ventilators) has to be switched on / off (via Relayed Power Cords) for reasonable time period keeping minimal (Ventilators spent energy, Nozzles and Master Unit / 1.5 bar) resources loss. The most direct data logging made with manufacturers’ calibrated and certified Agilent devices and PC, the parallel data logging and analyze made by controller’s connected terminal logging (PComm ) PC.




AS RESULT THE ACPV SYSTEM PROVIDES  SEVERAL TIMES MORE ENERGY AND FAST INVESTMENT RETURN.








LOCAL 

To make more improvements and optimization of exist ACPV Research prototype, creating of:

1. Auto cleaning component module.

Removing the dust from solar panel’s surface will rise the energy generation during the year.

2. PAN – Private Area Network component module.

Wireless - Wi-Fi ZigBee based  network for project’s sensors, relays and controller’s data exchange and operation.

3. GSM controller’s connectivity module, alongside with SMA – SannyBoy       solution. 

4. Mobile Service Application.

5. Trying explore system operation with other solar panels such as Bosch, LG, Panasonic.

As result of above, creating of one big, industrial, certified, mass production ready ACPV energy booster.

GLOBAL

The Global Goals are same as significant benefits above, some more are present also.

I suppose that with this project’s success and making this idea and system open source, widely common will cause to:

1. Alternative energy popularization, better agenda will help to other entrepreneur to success with their projects.

2. More qualified working places for system’s manufacturing, maintains and service.

3. Cheaper energy to everyone in industrial and private sector will slow down the financial crisis, will boost the economic grow and consumption.

4. Most important, even partly lack of energy raw materials import / purchase, as gas and coal, will produce budgets redistribution, those yearly growing energy profits can reduce budgets debts, improve education and medicine.

I hope and believe that with our success you electricity bill be lower and lower every month as soon as fast as ACPV system entering market widely.


First, drawings, electrical schemes, controllers  and concepts have been changed on the fly during project implementation.


  • Friends, Please HELP to reach the goals.
  • Please make some noise about my project's campaign.
  • Please share it!   

IT WAS GREAT PLEASURE TO INTRODUCE THIS PROJECT.

BEST REGARDS AND HAVE WONDERFUL DAY!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

story:
Send Art. Send Smiles.

The Rocketbook Color works with the free Rocketbook mobile app. Kids create drawings, diagrams or written compositions. Then, using patent-pending image capture technology, our app accurately captures the artwork and sends it directly to loved ones or to a cloud drive.

 

The Cloud-Connected Coloring Book for Your Little Picasso

The seven symbols at the bottom of each page are the magic “buttons” behind Rocketbook’s quick, easy cloud organization. Assign each icon to the destination of your choice, any folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs, iCloud, Box, Slack, OneNote, iMessage, or your email address. When you mark that icon on your page, the Rocketbook app automatically files your art in the right place.

Rocketbook Color Product Specs

We worked hard to engineer the perfect writing surface, formulating special synthetic pages perfect for clean erasing and infinite reuse:

  • Dimensions: 8" x 9.5"
  • Inside Pages: 12 pages of specially-formulated polyester paper
    • 8 blank pages for free-form art
    • 2 dot-grid pages for structured drawings
    • 2 lined pages for handwriting
  • Reusability: Erases with a dry cloth when dry erase drawing implements are used, and a damp cloth with compatible washable drawing products.
  • To maximize your flexibility, The Color Notebook ships without crayons, markers, paints or pens.

 

Recommended Crayons and Markers

Rocketbook Color works with the entire Crayola line of dry-erase and washable products, which are kid-safe and available in stores everywhere. Though other washable and dry-erase products will work, the following Crayola products are the only ones we recommend.

  • Crayola Dry Erase and Washable Crayons
  • Crayola Dry Erase and Washable Markers
  • Crayola Dry Erase and Washable Colored Pencils
  • Crayola Washable Paints
  • Crayola Silly Scents

 

 

 

 

 

See What Superbackers Have to Say!

Rocketbook is the #1 crowdfunded office product of all time, raising more than $4.9M (and counting) for our innovative, cloud-connected notebooks. Our Wave and Everlast notebooks have sold more than 500,000 copies worldwide. 

  • "I really like my Everlast Notebook, but I think I'm going to *love* The Color Notebook! Great idea! :)" - Caroline Marie
  • "I love my Rocketbooks and have given them to friends...I also work in a toy store so would love to be able to introduce this to our customers. I love my iPad but I also get great satisfaction working on paper. Best of both worlds." - Aries J. Galindo
  • "I was a backer for the original my kids and wife took all 4 of my books. I was wondering if you could do a combo deal for the original and the color note book?" - Dave Milne

 

And Check Out These Rad Perks...

No kids? No problem. Rocketbook Color is a great gift for all the kids in your life. Buy a bundle now and always be ready for birthdays and holidays!

 

When It Comes to Risk, Experience is Everything

This is our fifth crowdfunding campaign. We delivered on our first campaign late, which was painful experience, but we learned a ton. Since then we've delivered every campaign early or on time.

With that said, like with any project, there is risk in bringing a new product into the world. It is possible that our reliance on supplier and manufacturing vendors could result in unforeseen delays. Here's what we've done to mitigate risk for our backers:

  1. We conducted 10 months of R&D prior to campaign launch to determine the ideal paper formulation for optimal writing and erasing 
  2. We received a large run of prototypes in August 2017 and are currently testing and socializing the product
  3. We have chosen raw material providers and finalized all quotes for our next production run
  4. We already work with a trusted packing and shipping provider that fulfills orders for our current product line; this outfit will fulfill orders for the Rocketbook Color notebook.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:

http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html
story_txt:
Send Art. Send Smiles.
The Rocketbook Color works with the free Rocketbook mobile app. Kids create drawings, diagrams or written compositions. Then, using patent-pending image capture technology, our app accurately captures the artwork and sends it directly to loved ones or to a cloud drive.

 
The Cloud-Connected Coloring Book for Your Little Picasso
The seven symbols at the bottom of each page are the magic “buttons” behind Rocketbook’s quick, easy cloud organization. Assign each icon to the destination of your choice, any folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs, iCloud, Box, Slack, OneNote, iMessage, or your email address. When you mark that icon on your page, the Rocketbook app automatically files your art in the right place.


Rocketbook Color Product Specs
We worked hard to engineer the perfect writing surface, formulating special synthetic pages perfect for clean erasing and infinite reuse:


Dimensions: 8" x 9.5"

Inside Pages: 12 pages of specially-formulated polyester paper
8 blank pages for free-form art
2 dot-grid pages for structured drawings
2 lined pages for handwriting



Reusability: Erases with a dry cloth when dry erase drawing implements are used, and a damp cloth with compatible washable drawing products.
To maximize your flexibility, The Color Notebook ships without crayons, markers, paints or pens.



 
Recommended Crayons and Markers
Rocketbook Color works with the entire Crayola line of dry-erase and washable products, which are kid-safe and available in stores everywhere. Though other washable and dry-erase products will work, the following Crayola products are the only ones we recommend.

Crayola Dry Erase and Washable Crayons
Crayola Dry Erase and Washable Markers
Crayola Dry Erase and Washable Colored Pencils
Crayola Washable Paints
Crayola Silly Scents



 
 
 

 
 
See What Superbackers Have to Say!
Rocketbook is the #1 crowdfunded office product of all time, raising more than $4.9M (and counting) for our innovative, cloud-connected notebooks. Our Wave and Everlast notebooks have sold more than 500,000 copies worldwide. 

"I really like my Everlast Notebook, but I think I'm going to *love* The Color Notebook! Great idea! :)" - Caroline Marie
"I love my Rocketbooks and have given them to friends...I also work in a toy store so would love to be able to introduce this to our customers. I love my iPad but I also get great satisfaction working on paper. Best of both worlds." - Aries J. Galindo
"I was a backer for the original my kids and wife took all 4 of my books. I was wondering if you could do a combo deal for the original and the color note book?" - Dave Milne

 
And Check Out These Rad Perks...
No kids? No problem. Rocketbook Color is a great gift for all the kids in your life. Buy a bundle now and always be ready for birthdays and holidays!

 
When It Comes to Risk, Experience is Everything
This is our fifth crowdfunding campaign. We delivered on our first campaign late, which was painful experience, but we learned a ton. Since then we've delivered every campaign early or on time.
With that said, like with any project, there is risk in bringing a new product into the world. It is possible that our reliance on supplier and manufacturing vendors could result in unforeseen delays. Here's what we've done to mitigate risk for our backers:

We conducted 10 months of R&D prior to campaign launch to determine the ideal paper formulation for optimal writing and erasing 
We received a large run of prototypes in August 2017 and are currently testing and socializing the product
We have chosen raw material providers and finalized all quotes for our next production run
We already work with a trusted packing and shipping provider that fulfills orders for our current product line; this outfit will fulfill orders for the Rocketbook Color notebook.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS
We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.
Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.
As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.
As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

story:
simpli press makes your coffee press ritual easy from brewing to cleanup, while giving you a richer, smoother, and more complexed brew.

We also hope that you step into the specialty world of coffee a bit, if you haven’t yet. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Brewing with simpli press is easy and brings out more flavor profiles by allowing you to use fine to medium grounds, which also brews in half the time of a regular French press.  

Cleanup is even easier! See how simpli press is French press without the mess!

 

 

All the grounds lift up in the grounds container, along with the filter! You can then just take the grounds container to your compost bin, your plants, or your trash and easily chuck out the grounds! (Note: Disposing all the coffee grounds in the sink is a plumbing no-no so don’t do it!)

By not having to scrape and tamp out your glass carafe to get the grounds out, save not only time but hopefully money by less chances of breaking your carafe!

 

Get more out of your coffee by being able to use fine to medium grounds. With our special filter, you get a richer, smoother taste!

 

 

 

 

 

 

So what does choosing your grind size and an optional paper filter mean to you?

You can tailor your brew to fit your roast and preference *or* just keep it simple by using any available grounds that you have! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 

 

 

 

 

When using fine-medium grinds, you not only get more LOVE and FLAVOR from your coffee but you also get a FASTER BREWING TIME because of the higher extraction rate! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’ve brewed thousands of cups for coffee lovers, roasters, baristas, and coffee events across the country (NY Coffee Festival, Portland Coffee Fest, Coffee Con LA, SCAA Atlanta, etc), and here’s what they had to say about simpli press:

 

We even won a New Product Award at Portland, coffee capital in America andjudged by top coffee industry experts (note: Seattle was full in attendance at this event too)!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Finally, a coffee press that consumers and coffee professionals both love and can use easily!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

simpli press is perfect for sharing or just have it all to yourself - you deserve it!

 

 

 

 

We’re redefining the way people press coffee. We’ve come this far with an incredibly small team and a boot-strapped budget, and we are committed to making simpli press a success. We talked to various manufacturers and created our first prototype in February 2015. We got the second prototype September 2015, where we put it through arduous testing brewing thousands of cups at coffee events, asked other coffee lovers for feedback, and further improved the design. Then in March this year, we ordered our third simpli press prototype from our manufacturing partner and are almost ready for production.

Manufacturing Costs

This is the most capital intensive part of our next phase. We have finalized our design, chosen our manufacturer and created a budget breaking down the costs for producing the initial molds, purchasing supplies, meeting the minimum quantity order, and shipping to consumers. We need your support to get simpli press to the next step.

Creating the 21st Century, Third Wave French press

Our goal is to not only develop a product, but to make great coffee accessible to all in today’s time. To do this, we need your support from this initial campaign to not only fund our production, but also get the word out about what we’re developing around the world.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Simpli Press Mission

To make your coffee ritual more beautiful and easy in every way possible.

We want to make your coffee ritual easy from brewing to cleanup, while giving you the most delicious coffee.

We also want to make it easy and fun for you to try out different ways to make your brew to bring out the best in the roasts and according to your taste. We, as a company, will also incorporate giving back to education and coffee farming communities into our long-term plans.

The Team

 

 

“This journey started over two years ago as a literal dream January 2014. I woke up and started sketching simpli press. With my dad being an inventor, it's just in my genes. The passion project became an obsession. By May 2015, I quit my job as an Executive Recruiter (Manufacturing & Engineering specialties) to focus on developing simpli press full-time. In the last year, Scott and I have been traveling the country showcasing the simpli press at coffee trade shows in New York, Portland, Los Angeles, and Atlanta. So far, the response has been more than encouraging to keep pursuing this crazy dream, this calling.” Jenni Morse

It all started with wanting to drink French press every morning, but between brewing and cleanup time, it just wasn't possible.

We also thought "There has to be a way to get all of those great coffee characteristics: the richness of an espresso, the flavor clarity and smoothness of a pour-over, and thebody of a French press from one device and without a messy cleanup." With simpli press, one can develop an optimized brew in 2-3 minutes (by being able to use fine to medium grinds) plus an easier cleanup makes a difference in our hurried lives.

Then the taste factor came shortly after as our new favorite by being able to get moreflavor out of the coffee beans with the fine to medium grinds (40% more according to the coffee scientist) and brew different roasts (light and medium). The smoothness of the brew is one that everyone always first notice.

We loved brewing at the live coffee events all over the country (see our Kickstarter video and more below) to just see people's reactions and feedback on the difference! We even won a New Product Award (3rd Place) at Portland amongst the established brands and judged by the industry experts (not to mention ultimate coffee snobs)! :)

More than two years, countless hours, personal sacrifice, and three prototypes later, we are introducing the simpli press: a coffee brewer that does just that!

Manufacturing Team

 

 

After six months of research and multiple referrals, we found the perfect manufacturer. Platform 88 has not only worked with major coffee/kitchenware brands, but has also worked with several successful Kickstarter campaigns in the coffee and beverage industry (which have delivered to backers and are a few are now for sale in retail stores).

We have met the owner in person and are in constant communication with the team. We plan to visit the factory and team in person, once the Kickstarter campaign commences.

Behind Our Team

 

 

Special Thanks To

 

 

Thank you so much for checking out simpli press, French press without the mess and oh so much more. We can’t wait for you to make your coffee ritual more beautiful, in every way possible.

story:
Why hello there!

I'm John, just John.  I am here to raise some funds to help jumpstart my popup shop this coming holiday season in Bend, Oregon! I have products lined up and ready to go, but I just need a little help getting there.  

 

What is it?

An indoor houseplant shop! I have loads of popular indoor plants, stylish pots, soil, and more plant goodies if possible.  Anyone that knows me well knows that this has been a dream of mine for many many years and I find it time to take the leap and use my years of experience in retail, horticulture, and theater to create a dream shop.  I now have my community of connections here in Portland and I have my sights set back to Bend! (Surprise!)

 

With your love and support, I could be seeing all you Bendites shortly for the holidays at a pop up in a downtown store.  Obviously, since I'm always extra, there's more to this business, however this is how I've chosen to start and to build from here.  

 

I can't offer much other than a few goodies as thanks, but the payback in the future will make it worthwhile! Love to you all.

story:
BowlTopper Suction Lid with 'See-Thru' Window

XL: 12.0” (305 mm): Fits extra large salad and mixing bowls.

Large: 9.5” (241 mm): Fits large serving bowls.

Original: 6.5” (165 mm): Fits soup and cereal bowls.

mini: 4.5” (114 mm): Fits small bowls and cans.

Top 10 Features and Benefits 

1. Never search for matching plastic lids and containers

2. See-Thru Window let’s you see what you’re storing

3. Keep food fresh with airtight suction

4. Microwave-safe, keeps food warm and prevents splattering

5. Eco-friendly: Use less plastic wrap and aluminum foil

6. 100% BPA Free

7. Fits bowls of all different sizes

8. Easy to find the kitchen cabinet

9. Really easy to use, really

10. Dishwasher-safe (we recommend using the top shelf)

Production Timeline:

Phase 1: Engineering (Complete)

Phase 2: Prototyping (Complete)

Phase 3: Build Injection Molds (Jan - Feb 2014)

Phase 4: Manufacturing / Mass Production: (Feb - March 2014)

Phase 5: Shipping (Late March 2014)


What will BowlTopper do for me?

BowlTopper is the eco-friendly alternative to flimsy plastic containers. Designed to fit bowls of all sizes, you’ll never need to search for matchings plastic lids and containers again. Unlike plastic wrap or aluminum foil, BowlTopper is easy to seal and re-seal. Worry less about creating disposable waste because you can reuse BowlTopper again and again. It’s safe for the environment and 100% BPA Free.


BowlTopper vs. Goliath

Your support will help BowlTopper compete with the giant companies that make plastic containers and plastic wrap

story:
Government must follow the law, and it is my intention to hold the IRS and Tax Court accountable for breaking the law by imposing an unwarranted tax on the pay of everyone, that might only apply to federal workers. Here is an opportunity to stand up.

I have a carefully designed Appellate Court appeal against the IRS and Tax Court who broke rules to avoid answering a narrow and specific question chosen so they can't evade it: “Why is the Court and IRS using the ordinary definition of the term 'compensation' (i.e. payment for service rendered), instead of the statutory definition (which applies only to the pay of federal workers)?” When the “Nonemployee compensation” block is filled out on the 1099 form, the statutory definition of "compensation" must apply. Note: This case does not apply to "wages" which has its own statutory definition.

The Appellate Court would not hear the case and dismissed it because I did not pay a $5,000 fine from a previous appeal ruled to be “frivolous”. I need $6,500 to pay that fine plus interest and funding fees to have this appeal heard, and hold the government accountable to the law. If I don't reach my funding goal, I may be able to acquire funds from other sources. Excess funds will be used to support other efforts in this area. There is a deadline, still indefinite, to reinstate the appeal. For your contribution you can receive copies of my ebooks; larger contributions will receive a water ionizer good for health.

If I win the case, it will establish that "compensation" as statutorily defined only applies to federal workers, not to everyone, and will force the IRS to use the statutory definition, not the ordinary one.

The Rules the IRS and Tax Court Broke

This is a summary; you can see the lengthy brief at http://www.NaturalLawRemedy.com/taxcase.htm.

Issue 1: The IRS and Tax Court used the ordinary meaning of “compensation” instead of the statutory meaning provided by the Classification Act of 1923 which only applies to the pay of federal workers, not to everyone. When the block labeled “compensation” on the 1099 is filled out by a contracting company, the definition of “compensation” also applies, not the ordinary meaning. Since I did not work for any federal entity, by definition my “compensation” was zero.

Nowhere in the briefs or court opinion would the Tax Court or IRS even acknowledge the question, let alone answer it, and claimed the assertion frivolous; yet, the assertion is not on the Secretary's list of frivolous positions and no court has ever ruled on the question. A definition cannot be frivolous.

Issue 2: The Tax Court and IRS Did Not Deny Allegations and Should Lose by Default. They broke Tax Court Rules 36(b) and (c) that require the IRS to either admit or deny that “compensation” has a statutory definition in order to inform the Court and myself of the nature of the defense. The IRS claimed the question was not “material” and would “neither admit nor deny”, which thereby should have been deemed admitted. The Court broke the intended purpose of the rule, to inform the parties of the defense.

Issue 3: Evidence from my contracting company that I received no “compensation” should have been admitted. The IRS and Court broke Federal Rules of Evidence 106 that says “an adverse party may require the introduction” of evidence. The IRS introduced into evidence invoices from my contracting company showing that I received pay, but the Court would not allow a letter from said contracting company who admitted that the pay was not “compensation” as statutorily defined. Having accepted the IRS's evidence, the Court did not have discretion to refuse my adverse evidence.

Conclusion: The Court's ruling was arbitrary in that the Court could just as easily have ruled in my favor since the IRS did not even attempt to rebut the statutory definition of “compensation” or prove it was immaterial, frivolous, or erroneous; the ruling was unreasonable in that no reasoning regarding the definition was provided or cited; and unjust in that the Court broke Rules 36(b) and (c) by allowing the IRS to neither admit nor deny allegations which should have been deemed admitted, and broke FRE 106 by allowing IRS's documents into evidence, but not my related document.

Let us stand together for the rule of law. The hard work has been done; we only need to get it before the 9th Circuit Appellate Court by paying the fine.
