IRS introduced into evidence invoices from my contracting company showing that I received pay, but the Court
would not allow a letter from said contracting company who admitted that the pay
was not “compensation” as statutorily defined. Having accepted the IRS's evidence, the Court did not have discretion
to refuse my adverse evidence.


Conclusion:
The Court's ruling was arbitrary in that the Court could just as easily have
ruled in my favor since the IRS did not even attempt to rebut the
statutory definition of “compensation” or prove it was
immaterial, frivolous, or erroneous; the ruling was unreasonable in
that no reasoning regarding the definition was provided or cited; and
unjust in that the Court broke Rules 36(b) and (c) by allowing the
IRS to neither admit nor deny allegations which should have been
deemed admitted, and broke FRE 106 by allowing IRS's documents into
evidence, but not my related document. 


Let us stand together for the rule of law. The hard work has been done; we only need to get it before the 9th Circuit Appellate Court by paying the fine.

story:
CleverLoop is in production and already shipping! 

Free shipping within the USA and Canada.

Controlled directly from your mobile phone or tablet, CleverLoop is a unique device that uses your Wi-Fi network to connect with indoor and outdoor security cameras, making them truly smart. Experience the peace of mind that having security and  privacy brings.

CleverLoop, smart home security evolved.


Compare CleverLoop with Nest



Why CleverLoop is unique

CleverLoop is available with indoor and outdoor Wi-Fi cameras, which is rare in the smart security world, but what makes CleverLoop truly unique is the way it harnesses the latest video home security technology and lets you customize it to your own safety and privacy requirements.

You decide which events are important, and which ones justify an instant alert sent to your mobile device. Don't need alerts for your pet walking around your home, a shadow moving across a room or cars passing by near a window? Not a problem, CleverLoop learns quickly, so you only see what matters to you:

You also control which footage is stored privately in-home and which goes to the cloud, making it harder for unauthorized people to access your personal video footage.

Meet our wide angle indoor camera...


and our fully weatherproof outdoor camera...


"CleverLoop actually might be onto something. I’m truly blown away by the system...The setup for the CleverLoop system is insanely easy...I truly think that everyone looking to outfit their homes with a security system should look into the CleverLoop." - TalkAndroid (January 2016)

“CleverLoop stands out in a sea of DIY home security systems, because it can actually learn about what it sees—and alert the homeowner accordingly. In other words, this solution is sort of like the Nest for the home security market.” Electronic House (December 2015)

"While Cleverloop shares many characteristics with its competitors, there are things that make it unique. Notably the fact that it is one of the few plug and play camera solutions offering the option to add an outdoor camera. On top of that, the system is 'clever' and learns and adapts over time." SecurityGem (December 2015)

"I’m really blown away with the system. It was quick to setup, easy to use and is as the name suggests - just really clever. I can see its use in many homes and possibly even small businesses over this holiday period. Well done CleverLoop, this is a well designed, cost effective and easy to use smart home security product." NetGuide (November 2015)

"Improve Your Home Security System with Smart Analysis. The era of fixed security cameras and expensive monthly fees for home security systems are now a thing of the past." - TechNode

"There are plenty of security cameras on the market. Not all of them are designed to learn from your feedback to make your life easier." - iphoneness

"This is one of those, 'Gahh, why didn’t I think of that!' applications. [CleverLoop] is a security software that visually recognizes a room and alerts the homeowner of any changes." - eyesFinder

Features


Local footage analysis adds security and personal privacy. CleverLoop analyzes your HD camera video using smart detection algorithms, right there in your home. CleverLoop figures out what's happening, without sending footage to the cloud for external scrutiny.

Choose the right action with CleverLoop's simple storage and alert settings. You decide what alerts you receive, and you control what footage is stored where. With cloud and local storage options, CleverLoop gives you the perfect mix of security and privacy.

With CleverLoop's 'Clever Learning', you decide what's important. Forget about endless false alarms. CleverLoop will quickly sort the important from the unimportant. That way next time something happens, you only receive instant alerts that matter to you.


False alarms cause unnecessary stress and are one of the biggest reasons why people turn off their security system.

What I like about CleverLoop...

                                            —Backer feedback from Annie, California, United States


Making sure your most important people, places, pets and possessions are safe and sound

Whether you’re at the corner store or across the world, CleverLoop puts high definition cameras to work for you.

Right there on your mobile device, you can view live or recorded camera footage of your home, and receive instant alerts about unusual events. And with night-vision cameras, that secure feeling is within reach, both day and night. 

Protecting your privacy, as well as your home 

When it comes to offering privacy and security, CleverLoop is unique.  The innovation comes from how it analyzes video and stores footage.

Some security systems rely on old motion sensor technology to activate video cameras, whilst others don't even use cameras. Other hi-tech, camera based systems send continuous video footage to the cloud for analysis. But how secure is this?

Security breaches are becoming increasingly common, with unscrupulous organizations and individuals accessing  our private information. This is why CleverLoop does the smart analysis in-home, and gives you local and cloud storage options.


An end to false alarms caused by most pets

CleverLoop sees the room you are monitoring as well as the small pets moving around within it, and learns very quickly what you don’t want to be alerted to. 

Regular motion sensors detect small pets, which means false alarms. Even ‘pet immune’ motion sensors are still prone to false alarms. And then there’s the old trick of tilting sensors towards the ceiling to reduce the amount of movement they pick up, which is hardly ideal!

With CleverLoop in action you can leave your house with the peace of mind that comes with having video security and instant alerts, whilst also knowing that your small pet won’t cause you the worry of false alarms.

Plus, from your mobile device you can check in on live footage just to see how your other ‘family member’ is getting on.


Simple to set up & super easy to use

From opening the box through to watching saved footage, CleverLoop is super easy to set up and use.

CleverLoop simply plugs into your Wi-Fi router and wirelessly links to a maximum of three indoor or outdoor security cameras. With built in step-by-step video guides on the iOS or Android app, you can set up CleverLoop in minutes. You can then control every setting and view every important moment directly on your mobile device, no matter where you are in the world. 

Save footage and money

With CleverLoop you can record constant or important footage locally using the 8GB internal SD card. You'll save valuable bandwidth while still having access to free cloud storage for important events. There are no contracts and no fees for 7 days of rolling cloud storage.

Plus, with CleverLoop you can record continuous footage to a connected hard drive or USB Flash drive by simply connecting your storage into the Base Station USB port. Easy!

Motion sensor activated video security systems use passive infra-red motion sensors, which when set off, start a video recording or create some sort of alert. They rely on picking up heat sources and a motion ‘sensitivity’ setting. Set the sensitivity too high, and there can be a lot of false alarms. Set the sensitivity too low, and the sensor might actually miss important events. Plus, it’s often easy to fool the sensors so they don’t pick up body heat.


Lucian Constantin, IDG News Service, July 31 2013, reporting on a Black Hat USA Security Conference presentation.



Perks

With CleverLoop, indoor and outdoor cameras are priced the same, so all you need to focus on is choosing the perk with the combination of indoor and outdoor cameras that meets your security and monitoring needs.
Base Station + 3 Cameras       $399
Base Station + 2 Cameras       $349
Base Station + 1 Camera          $279

Free shipping to the USA and Canada. 

Shipping fees to other countries are:
$20 for Base +1 camera, $30 for Base +2 cameras and $40 for Base +3 cameras.

Specifications

Our story

The CleverLoop idea was born in early 2014 with the Indiegogo campaign launching in September the same year.

On November 7th 2014 we met our funding goal through Indiegogo with backers from across the globe.

Since this time we have delivered the hardware and software required to make the CleverLoop system a success.

The CleverLoop product has now been purchased by, shipped to and used by Indiegogo backers in over twenty countries!

Now is the time to jump on board and get in the Loop! Protect your home today with CleverLoop.


Frequently Asked Questions


1. Purchasing and Setup

What sort of locations can I use CleverLoop in?

CleverLoop is used for home security protection and monitoring, and also provides a great solution for small businesses looking for increased security.

Being quick to install, easy to operate and very cost effective to use, people are using CleverLoop in many locations, from homes and apartments to offices.

What if I buy more than 1 CleverLoop Base Station?

If you purchase multiple CleverLoop Base Stations to use in different locations (i.e. 1 at home and 1 in your office or second home), you can access each of these, and the cameras connected to each, from the same app on your mobile device. The number of CleverLoop devices supported by the CleverLoop app on your phone or tablet is unlimited. Quite a few users have also bought 2 Base Stations for their home, meaning they can use upto 6 cameras in total.

How many cameras can a single CleverLoop Base Station support?

A single CleverLoop Base Station can support a maximum of 3 HD indoor and outdoor cameras.

How many cameras should I buy?

This really depends on the layout of your home or small office, but here are some ideas:

·  1 indoor camera for houses / apartments / offices that have 1 entrance or main hallway.

·  2 or 3 cameras for homes / offices with additional entrances or those that have bedrooms, living rooms or other spaces that have external doors and windows.

· 2 outdoor cameras for both the front and rear door of a home or office and 1 indoor camera for the room with the most valuable items or a garage.

Where should I place CleverLoop in my home / office?

The CleverLoop Base Station can be placed anywhere in your home or office where it can be plugged into a router that has internet connectivity - to operate, the Base Station must always be plugged into a router. Your Wi-Fi cameras also need to be within the signal range of your router. The best place to position your cameras is somewhere they can best see full images of people, for example in the corner of a room or capturing an entire entranceway.

What if I want to move CleverLoop to somewhere else?

You can easily move the CleverLoop Base Station to a different location. Moving to a new house or want to keep an eye on something elsewhere? You simply unplug the Base station and take it to the new location and then set it up again, along with the required camera(s). It will take CleverLoop a little while to learn about the new situation and the new location.

How easy is it to set up CleverLoop?

CleverLoop is super easy to set up. You just need to plug the Base Station and your HD camera into your router and then use your mobile device to scan a QR code which is located on the underside of the Base Station unit. The CleverLoop mobile app will then guide you through a few steps. Done! You can now unplug your camera and place it in the location you want to monitor.


2. Compatibility with Cameras and Phones 

What mobile phones and tablets will support the CleverLoop App?

CleverLoop has two different apps and these will work on any mobile device that runs either:

· iOS version 7.0 and above, or

· Android version 4.0 and above.

Can I use CleverLoop with my PC or MAC?

CleverLoop is only accessible via the iOS and Android apps at the present, but we are working on an in-browser feature.


3. Video Storage Options

Does CleverLoop come with an SD card?

Yes, CleverLoop comes with an 8G SD card. You can use this SD card to store important event footage locally.

What options do I have for storing footage in the cloud?

All users of CleverLoop will receive free use of the CleverLoop cloud service for important events from the last 7 days. This free option will always be available and gives you complete access to store, view and download important footage from the last 7 days. This service is also contract free.

In the future we may provide additional cloud services or premium features.

Can I continuously store footage on an external hard drive or a USB Flash Drive?

Yes! Simply connect an external hard drive or USB Flash drive into the USB port on the back of your Base Station, turn your Base Station off and back on (wait about 10 seconds before re-powering) and continuous storage is activated. 

At present, continuous storage is set to come on when your system is disarmed using either geofencing or scheduling. This means that when you are at home you can continuously record activities taking place around the house without being sent alerts every time a person walks past a camera. This is also useful in small businesses and shops where you want to record continuously during opening hours, but receive alerts about unusual activity after-hours.


4. Technical Information

Can I set up more than one person with the app so they can access my CleverLoop video and also receive alerts?

Yes, if you choose, multiple users can be supported by one CleverLoop device. This means you and your family can all access the CleverLoop system that’s in your home, with each person having their own username and password. There is no additional cost to add additional people to your 'Security Loop'.

With CleverLoop you also set up a 'Master User' who has the ability to view other users of the same Base Station and remove them from the system.

Will I get alarms when I, or my family members, walk around the house?

CleverLoop’s geo-fencing feature means you don’t have to manually turn the system on every time you go out and off every time you come home. It simply detects when your smartphone is near to the Base Station using your location and saves you the hassle.

You can use the scheduling inactive times feature to set working hours for CleverLoop so it automatically turns alarm and/or recording functions on or off, following the time you set.

Will my pets cause false alarm issues?

The short answer is no. CleverLoop quickly sorts important activities from unimportant movements, meaning you only receive instant alerts that matter. You can also teach CleverLoop about your specific envinronment by providing feedback on any alerts you recieve. This rapid learning feature lets you decide what triggers alerts in the future.

What sort of power supply does CleverLoop use?

CleverLoop plugs directly into your home’s power sockets. Each CleverLoop Base Station, and each camera, will be supplied with a power cable that is suitable for use in your country i.e. correct voltage input and correct configuration of pins on the plug.

What happens if there is a power outage or an internet outage?

CleverLoop has a power and internet outage alert function. This means that if there is a power or internet outage, you will receive an instant alert on your mobile phone informing you that CleverLoop is offline.

What is CleverLoop's WiFi Range?

CleverLoop uses the Wi-Fi signal from your router to connect to cameras. This means that it is the strength of your router signal and the proximity of the router to your wireless cameras that is important.

5. Privacy

How private is cloud stored video footage?

CleverLoop uses bank-level security. All communication between your CleverLoop Base Station, the CleverLoop server and your smart phone is encrypted over SSL (HTTPS).

Can I turn off the video recording?

Yes, you can turn off video recording through the app by disabling the cameras or by using various armed and disarmed functions. Or just pull the plug out! :)

Can somebody else gain control of CleverLoop and my cameras?

CleverLoop is super secure and uses high level encryption to make sure it stays secure. The main thing to remember, as with any secured websites that you use, is to choose a strong password, to keep that password safe, and to change it regularly. As mentioned earlier, with CleverLoop you can also set up a 'Master User' who has the ability to view other users of the same Base Station and remove them from the system.

What happens if someone breaks in and steals my CleverLoop Base Station?

If someone breaks in and steals your Base Station then footage will be stored in the cloud of any unusual events that take place within view of your HD cameras and based on the alert setting you choose, you will also receive an instant alert.  An offline / power outage alert will also be generated and sent to your mobile device.


6. Customer support

How do I get more information and support?

For more information and support please check out our website at www.cleverloop.com


— Backer feedback from Dat Chu, Texas, United States

What
happens if there is a power outage or an internet outage?
CleverLoop has a power and internet outage alert function. This means that if there is a power or internet outage, you will receive an instant alert on your mobile phone informing you that CleverLoop is offline.

What
is CleverLoop's WiFi Range?

CleverLoop uses the Wi-Fi signal from your router to connect to cameras.
This means that it is the strength of your router signal and the proximity of the
router to your wireless cameras that is important.

5. Privacy
How
private is cloud stored video footage?
CleverLoop uses bank-level security. All
communication between your CleverLoop Base Station, the CleverLoop server and your smart phone
is encrypted over SSL (HTTPS). 

Can
I turn off the video recording?
Yes, you can turn off video recording through the app by disabling the cameras or by using various armed and disarmed functions. Or just pull the plug out! :)
Can
somebody else gain control of CleverLoop and my cameras?
CleverLoop is super secure and uses high
level encryption to make sure it stays secure. The main thing to remember, as
with any secured websites that you use, is to choose a strong password, to keep
that password safe, and to change it regularly. As mentioned earlier, with CleverLoop you can also set up a 'Master User' who has the ability to view other users of the same Base Station and remove them from the system.

What happens if someone breaks in and steals my CleverLoop Base Station?
If someone breaks in and steals your Base Station then footage will be stored in the cloud of any unusual events that
take place within view of your HD cameras and based on the alert setting you
choose, you will also receive an instant alert. 
An offline / power outage alert will also be generated and sent to your
mobile device.


6. Customer support
How do I get more information and support?
For more information and support please check out our website at www.cleverloop.com

— Backer feedback from Dat Chu, Texas, United States

story:
Digital Trends - "It feels a bit like using the Force to turn your stuff on and off, which is pretty cool by itself."

The Culture Trip - "Imagine being able to turn off the lights with a simple gesture on your bed-side table, or turn on the TV from the bathroom."

Geeky Gadgets - "Nowadays, the interaction with functions/devices is limited to the screens. With Welle, we are going to upgrade it and bring you the newest yet the most nature interaction experience."

Click HERE for Press Kit

 

"The Best Technology 2017" at Global Source Startup Launchpad

 

 

 

 

Introducing Welle 

  

"World's first sonar based gesture control gadget that can make any surface interactive."

Welle is a smart device that instantly turns any surface into a smart controller using embedded Sonar and a highly sensitive gesture algorithm. It gives you the ability to use simple gestures or shortcuts to control your favorite functions or connected devices. 

 

 

 

 

Make Control Simpler

 

As the technology develops, we are currently facing two fundamental problems: 

  • Limited interactive surface
  • Limited input richness

Welle is intend to solve these by expanding input area while increasing input modalities.

 

Change color with one swipe

 

Turn off TV without looking for remote

 

Built for work, play and in between

 

 

Endless Possibilities

 

Welcome to the modern world of intelligent device control. Welle works in the home, office or anywhere with a Bluetooth connection. Welle uses the most advanced gesture control for your household smart appliances that replaces traditional remote controls for a convenient and enjoyable connected home or office experience. Simply place Welle in a convenient location and use hand gestures to control all your smart devices such as: lights, TVs, speakers, doors, thermostats, cameras, curtains, fans, and more.
 
 

 

 

  

How to Setup

 

It’s easy to control devices via Welle. Just set up the gestures in any form, touch, swipe, word, number or anything else. Then draw up the gestures anywhere closed to Welle to control the devices. It looks like you are in a augmented reality. Magic!

Welle is easy-to-setup in just a few minutes.

  • Connect Bluetooth
  • Initial Install
  • App Setup
Welle provides Apps for Android and iOS users.
 
  
 

Technology Behind The Magic

 

Welle uses refined Sonar technology to instantly turn any surface into a smart controller. Sonar is widely used the fields of military, automotive and drones. Sonar transmits signal pulses and collects the reflected energy back from targets. The characteristics of the echoes are extracted and then translated into different instructions to Internet of Things devices using an advanced hardware design and software algorithms.

 

Why ultrasound technology stands out?

 

The ultrasound technology that Welle is using, enables farther detection range, higher tolerance to light condition and lower power consumption.

  • Ultrasound stands out with meter-level detection range, compared to Infrared and capacity with merely centimeter-level detection range. 
  • Ultrasound does not malfunction under dim or no-light condition, while Infrared cannot detect gestures under dim light condition or with black color surface. Optic sensors have very low accuracy under undesired light condition as well. 
  • Ultrasound consumes only mili-watt power and last hours longer than other technology, under the same battery size.

 

Welle uses this same technology to collect and interpret complex information to identify motions and gestures from the echoed signals. Welle tracks your fingers when you touch a surface and it can even recognize handwriting motions and transform them to customized actions with a high degree of accuracy.

 

Patent-Pending Technology

 

Conventional gesture detectors, such as those in smartphones only provide single gesture readings. Welle, in contrast, can provide rich information, such as trajectory data, digitized gestures and even handwriting recognition, enabling a wide variety of control functions for everyday convenience. 

 

 

 

 

 

People Say Wow

 

Our goal was to create convenient control for people at home and at work. We created technology that adds pleasure to life. The feedback has been amazing. The first reaction that people have is “Wow!” then they ask how they can get a Welle for themselves and their friends. We love that!

 

Prof. Song from HKUST

 

Product Hunt

 

CNBC Interview

 

HKUST "Bigly" Demo Day

 

Welle at Global Source Startup Launchpad - Titled "The Best Technology 2017"

 

 

Extend Possibility with API

  

Welle also provides open API for software and hardware developers to redefine gestures, creating infinite possibilities for controlling devices and apps.

  • Well-designed API 
  • Readable documents and example codes 
  • Developer community and support

 

 

 

 

Hardware and Design

 

 

 

 

 

 

Product Specification

 

   

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

Team Behind Welle

 

Our team has spent years developing sensing techniques for smart controls. We are passionate about making tools that solve problems by amplifying human abilities. We hope that you find Welle as compelling, useful and fun as we do and we are excited to share it with the world.

 

Need help?

We are here for you. If you have questions at any time during or after the campaign you can always reach us at: support@getwelle.com

 

Why order now?

Becoming a backer now allows you to enjoy the best exclusive discounts and prices and to receive your reward early to begin enjoying the amazing Welle experience.

story:
Finally a better craft knife for everyone! 

The Ergo Kiwi is an innovative ergonomic cutting tool designed to reduce stress, strain and promote prolonged productivity. The idea came about in my first year of architecture school. Our instructors had us using standard pen knives that kill your fingers after using them for hours.

After a huge success on our Kickstarter, raising more than $62,000 from 1200 backers, we have decided to extend our offering here on Indiegogo.

Changing blades has never been easier, it's almost as easy as the Kiwi is on your hands! 

The shape of the handle eliminates the hyperextension in your distal interphalangeal joint (that’s the first joint in your index finger) and its organic form allows you to hold it in any position that is most natural for you. This reduces the stress and strain of making dozens of cuts allowing you to work for longer periods of time. It’s essentially your hand’s new best friend.

How it works!

Embedded in the handle is a magnet which allows you to pick the blade up off of any surface safely, reducing the risk of injury.

The magnet also holds the blade in place and makes for easy storage. The handle will stick to pretty much any metallic surface (table legs, magnet strips, refrigerators, car doors, etc.). There is also a latch integrated into the handle which utilizes the prefabricated holes in the blades to lock them in place, preventing the blade from getting stuck in thicker materials. This patent pending design also allows for easy blade changes and reduces the amount of moving parts in the handle. No more tightening the blade in place just to have it come undone after a few cuts.

Crafting the Kiwi!

A thoroughly tested design that is the result of more than 100 prototypes!

We spent 2 years and made over 100 prototypes and wanted to make sure the form and function was perfect before we asked for funding. We sketched, carved, and 3D printed more than 100 prototypes to test and refine the ergonomics as well as the magnet and fastening mechanism.

Partnerships!

We've partnered with Excel blades to bring you the highest quality blades on the marketMade in the USA, but all brands work! Quality and craftsmanship are of utmost importance to us and we have endeavored to source all of our components from US-based manufacturing facilities. Each of our rewards comes with a minimum of a 5-pack set of Excel blades.

Choose your Kiwi!

The Kiwi is available in 4 different finishes: injection molded white plastic, plywood, and two exotic woods: Padauk and Bocote. The wooden handles are CNC milled and hand finishedwith the utmost attention to detail and craft ensuring a long life span. Each wooden handle comes in a handmade canvas storage bag along with five Excel blades. All of the materials and components that go into the Kiwi are sourced and manufactured in the United States. The wooden handles are handcrafted in Boston, MA.

Each wooden Kiwi comes with a handmade canvas bag! 

We want to provide both affordable injection molded Kiwis for architecture and design students as well as beautiful solid wood Kiwis for the discerning craftsman.

.Why we need your help!

Despite how awesome the wooden handles are we really want to make the affordable injection molded plastic handles available to every art and architecture student. We've picked out high-quality US-based manufacturers that can produce the injection molded parts but the upfront tooling costs for manufacturing are quite expensive. Your contributions will put the Kiwi into mass production and help us get better tools in the hands of designers, architects, students, artists and makers around the world!

Risks and challenges

We have a team that is experienced in design and digital fabrication and have done as much work as possible in the past 2 years to minimize the risk and maximize the satisfaction for our Kickstarter backers but we are not perfect and unexpected hurdles are not uncommon in manufacturing.

To minimize the risk:

We have built more than 100 prototypes and prior to launch have made more than 40 fully functional CNC carved wooden handles. We have vetted multiple manufacturers for the injection molded handles and elected to go with a leading US-based company known for high quality and the quickest turnaround in the industry to ensure that communication and oversight is maximized. We anticipate that wooden handles should be delivered well ahead of the promised dates but have made conservative estimates so as not to overpromise.

We spent thousands of dollars out of our own pockets to pre-order and 
test all the critical components that will be in your Kiwi so that we could test and improve quality before we make your Kiwi.

Shipping:

Production is already underway and our manufacturing partners are already on the line. We are adding shifts to our production schedule to make sure we hit our delivery dates.

We will keep our backers updated about any delays in the manufacturing or shipping process.

International shipping:

We want Kiwis to be available to designers and makers everywhere but shipping internationally can be costly. If rates fluctuate we will notify you immediately.

story:
Hello and welcome to CITYFRAMES!

We launched our campaign on Kickstarter in January 2020. Together with all supporters we achieved to fund 100% in less than 6 hours and reach over 400% of our goal at the end of the campaign. Now we start to offer pre-orders with a special discount.

 

 

The covered city area for each size is shown under the city. Empty frames will be filled as soon as possible. If you need more detailed information about the covered area, please take a look at our website: https://cityframes.de/cities

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Timetable & Shipping time frames

 

Shipping costs (payed later during city selection) 

Non-EU orders may be subject to import taxes.

 

 

 

If you have any questions, feel free to get in touch. You can simply leave a message here on Kickstarter or write an email to: mail@cityframes.de

Make sure to follow CITYFRAMES on Social Media to stay up to date:

INSTAGRAM: @city.frames 

FACEBOOK:  @CITYFRAMES 

TWITTER:  @CITYFRAMES1 

WEBSITE:  www.cityframes.de

story:
Best gift for Christmas 

 

OVERVIEW

The fastest defrosting tray in the world. Using innovative heat transfer technology, it is 3X faster than the market's thawing plate, which is 6X that of natural thawing.

3in1 feature: Cutting board, Thawing board, Quick-freeze.

No need water, no need electricity, safe and environmentally friendly. Kitchen essential kitchenware

 

“Think about how much time it takes to prepare a steak. You spend over an hour just thawing the meat, and another few hours to actually cook your meal. The Houcy tray was designed to cut the meat thawing time by as much as 75%.                                               —— YANKO DESIGN”

“Thanks to some clever technology, this must-have meal-prep tool can thaw a steak in only 15 minutes. Incredibly, it does it all without power or water.                                       ——GadgetFlow ”

 

Quickly solve your troubles

Natural Thaw - The healthiest way 

 Quick thaw - Keep food delicious without destroying dietary fibre

THE FASTEST 3IN1 DEFROSTING TRAY IN THE WORLD

  1. Innovative technology thawing plate can naturally quick thaw steak

  2. The tray of wheat straw can be used as a cutting board for cutting fruits and vegetables.

  3. Superconducting technology can be used to freeze food quickly.

COMPARISON

Time Test

It includes steak, lamb chops, pork chops, patties and bacon

PS:  Defrosting time depends on food contact area, temperature, humidity and turn-up times. The tests result just for reference.

HOW IT WORKS

Technology from aviation technology,22 micropores design, excellent heat transfer efficiency

Thermal conductivity: Kx>20000W/m. K Ky>5000W/m.k Kz>500W/m.k

Houcy: 22 microporous designs, superconducting gas moving at high speed in the channel, excellent heat transfer efficiency, double-sided contact thawing method, Quick and natural thawing

Other: traditional material heat conduction, single-sided contact thawing, low heat transfer efficiency, natural thawing slow

 

COMPETING COMPARISON

（Steak/200g）

 

HOW IT USE

 

Thaw More Steak 

BEST WAY TO THAW STEAK

ECO-Friendly & Easy To Store

FEATURES

PRODUCTION PROCESS

This is our the production process:  1. adoption of microporous channels aero-aluminium 2. heat seal one of the bottom 3. filling the superconducting medium and cold seal the other bottom of the plate at the same time 4.finally heat seal the bottom 5. Surface treatments on the plate are the last procedure flow 6. Then we assemble two end covers finally. 

TEAM

Houcy, the company we belong to aims to create a good life for everyone. We designed Sublue White Shark Mix and initiated its crowdfunding at INDIEGOGO in 2017, which raised 12,6900 dollars in this campaign. We are a professional design company, and we have a professional supplier to finish the production.

Houcy is a professional design company that has worked with the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Samsung, Huawei and other companies. At the same time, we have professional suppliers and reliable supply and support products for R&D and production.

Like Us

SAVE ENERGY DO MORE MEANINGFUL THINGS

SPECIFICATION

 

PACKAGE

PRICE

A GIFT JUST FOR YOU!!!

For the backers, we prepare a gift; it is a nanosponge cleaner!!

Clean the tray just with water.No detergent! 

TIMELINE

story:
Hi. I'm Terry from Mr. Locksmith.

I'm a third generation locksmith. I have a criminology degree. I've been in the locksmithing business for over 35 years. When I was even in kindergarten I was making sets of picks out of bobby pins. 

I still have my first set of picks that I basically built myself from Alan keys, bits of hack saws, spring steel when I could get it. So, I've been building my own picks my entire life. I've been teaching locksmith's, police, government agencies, for a long time how to open locks. Covert, overt, substitious entry. I've been teaching picking forever. 

I finally decided to put together my own pick set, my own training eBook, as well as a series of videos on how to pick locks. I've just come off a very successful campaign. It was fantastic. It was 650% funded. When we launched this campaign on Kickstarter, it got over $13,000 in funding. I'm very proud of that. I've decided to go ahead with a long term project I've been thinking for a long time. I'm going to have my own set of picks, my own training manuals, and my own training videos on how to pick locks.

The picks that I'm manufacturing for Indiegogo are made of high quality North American made steel. This is the best steel available from Canadian or American manufacturers. We've got the best. The stuff you're buying offshore doesn't last a real locksmith one lock. My picks are high quality steel, they're manufactured in North America and the picks are fantastic. 

The set will include the basic picks, the ball, the rake, the hook. Those are what you have to use as a beginner. The three basic picks that you have to start learning with is the diamond, the hook, and the rake. These are our beginner picks but also some advanced locksmiths just like these picks. These are the basics, however, when you get your skill sets improved, and also as you run across different manufacturers you use specific picks for that. This is one of my favorite picks, the quality here, I can bend this, it just springs right back. It's high quality spring steel as opposed to the offshore made. 

Tension wrenches, same thing, high quality that'll last you a long time. Good, high quality, North American made picks. 

In the past there was a well known, successful Indiegogo campaign, however, they never shipped. I've been in the business 35 years. I have a successful franchise, I've been selling products for years, I will not only have a successful Indiegogo campaign, I will ship the product pretty quick. I already know what I want, I already have my manufacturers. I have everything in place. I just need you to back the project and we will get another successful campaign. 

The pick set will include the basics. Diamond pick, hook pick, rake pick. Those are the most popular. Then, they're going to include some of the more advanced ones. Some people call it the curved diamond or the deforest pick. There's various names given to it. And, a few other specialized picks and I have a really cool pick for picking one of the most popular locks sold out there which they say is unpick-able. So, I have a special pick for that. And, the tension wrenches are really, really important. So, it's not only going to be the pick set but it's going to be the tension sets. As an added bonus, you're not only going to get the pick set, my favourite tension wrenches, my eBook, my videos on how to pick lock, as an added bonus I'm going to include my dumb key force tool from my previous Kickstarter campaign free. It's an extra. It's fantastic. You'll love it. This is going to be a fantastic Indiegogo campaign. It's going to be huge. You're going to love it. It's got excellent value for the dollar.
story_txt:
Hi. I'm Terry from Mr. Locksmith.
I'm a third generation locksmith. I have a criminology degree. I've been in the locksmithing business for over 35 years. When I was even in kindergarten I was making sets of picks out of bobby pins. 
I still have my first set of picks that I basically built myself from Alan keys, bits of hack saws, spring steel when I could get it. So, I've been building my own picks my entire life. I've been teaching locksmith's, police, government agencies, for a long time how to open locks. Covert, overt, substitious entry. I've been teaching picking forever. 
I finally decided to put together my own pick set, my own training eBook, as well as a series of videos on how to pick locks. I've just come off a very successful campaign. It was fantastic. It was 650% funded. When we launched this campaign on Kickstarter, it got over $13,000 in funding. I'm very proud of that. I've decided to go ahead with a long term project I've been thinking for a long time. I'm going to have my own set of picks, my own training manuals, and my own training videos on how to pick locks.
The picks that I'm manufacturing for Indiegogo are made of high quality North American made steel. This is the best steel available from Canadian or American manufacturers. We've got the best. The stuff you're buying offshore doesn't last a real locksmith one lock. My picks are high quality steel, they're manufactured in North America and the picks are fantastic.

The three basic picks that you have to start learning with is the diamond, the hook, and the rake. These are our beginner picks but also some advanced locksmiths just like these picks. These are the basics, however, when you get your skill sets improved, and also as you run across different manufacturers you use specific picks for that. This is one of my favorite picks, the quality here, I can bend this, it just springs right back. It's high quality spring steel as opposed to the offshore made. 
Tension wrenches, same thing, high quality that'll last you a long time. Good, high quality, North American made picks.

story:
Who?

Hi! I'm Erek. I'm a student who lives right outside of Trenton, and who happens to have an air mattress that doesn't work (at all). It has a torn bevel and has become unsleepable so I'm looking for some help to get another air mattress or--gasp!--a new, real bed.

What?

I know the goal up there says $500, but really I only need about $300-$400. I know that's quite a bit but I don't have the ability to get the money on my own, right now, so I'm hoping for a little help. I just need a place to sleep, and a bed would be really really nice--especially for someone who has a history of back trouble. (I bulged a disc about two years ago, but I do a lot of stretches to keep myself healthy!) Anyhow, any and all help is appreciated. Thank you!

Why?

Because the children are the future, and I am 21 and therefore technically still young and childlike and also I'm studying to be a mortician so really I'm in everyone's future. Help me buy a bed!

How?

I figure I'll just order it on Amazon. Two-day shipping, here I come.

Other ways you can help:

Please share this with all of your friends! Tell them to help a poor college student buy a new mattress!!! Please!!!

story:
The MIZSEI Microbubble Showerhead is the newest innovation from one of Japan’s most innovative showerhead companies. It feels fantastic, saves over 6,800 gallons of water per year, and cleans so deep, you don’t even need to use shampoo.

This is NOT your typical mist mode showerhead. MIZSEI envelopes you in 920 million microbubbles per minute for an invigorating and truly refreshing shower experience.

The gentle bursting of MIZSEI’s microbubbles on your skin feels like a warm, soothing massage and pulls dirt deep out of your pores, leaving you feeling clean and fully rejuvenated.

Save over 6,800 gallons of water and up to $200 in utility bills alone per year. The microbubble technology gives you more coverage, more heat, and an amazing shower experience using 30% less water.

By using advanced water technology, MIZSEI helps you significantly reduce your environmental impact and energy bills. Save on water, carbon emissions from your water heater, and money!

MIZSEI provides the benefits of microbubbles without sacrificing water pressure, shower efficacy, or shower enjoyment. Switch seamlessly between mist and stream modes to enjoy the same microbubble power however you like.

The microbubbles from MIZSEI release energy and heat when they gently burst on your skin. This creates a warming sensation that remains even after showering.

The warmth also increases blood flow and relaxes your muscles. Experience relaxing, healing heat and feel warmer, longer.

MIZSEI’s mist spray width covers 60% more surface area than a standard showerhead— that’s 1.6X more coverage!

More coverage means you get a more effective, satisfying shower.

MIZSEI brings spa-quality relaxation into your own home. The atomized microbubble technology provides a soothing, relaxing, healing shower experience while deep cleansing your pores, scalp, and hair.

Start everyday clean, confident, and refreshed.

By using microbubble droplets ⅓ the size of your pores, MIZSEI gives you a much more effective wash than traditional showers.

The cavitation process also ionizes the microbubble droplets, making them molecularly attracted to dirt particles in your skin and hair. The ionized microbubbles enter your pores, draws up dirt, and flushes everything out — giving you an unprecedented deep clean throughout your head and body.

MIZSEI’s gentle microbubbles penetrate deep into the skin, cleaning and moisturizing both skin and hair — letting you save shampoo and skincare products.

By accelerating water through an advanced throttle, MIZSEI systematically regulates pressure changes and generates high-energy cavitation microbubbles that burst upon contact.

These microbubbles are the secret behind MIZSEI’s soothing sensation, cleaning power, and water efficiency. As the bubbles burst on your skin, they release intense energy that generates warming heat, draws dirt out of your pores, and feels amazing. 

The microbubbles use much less water for the same pressure and heating sensation. They can also enter your pores for much deeper cleaning ability.

The MIZSEI Microbubble Showerhead is the winner of Japan’s prestigious Good Design Award. Everything from the technology, the ergonomic design, and the chrome finish was dialed in to ensure beauty, efficiency, efficacy, and ease of use.

MIZSEI is engineered to fit comfortably in your hand. A one-push water stop button lets you conserve water as you soap up, and the showerhead modes can be easily switched even while in use.

The MIZSEI Showerhead is easy to set up. Simply remove your existing showerhead and replace it with MIZSEI. No drills, plumbers, or bathroom reconstruction needed!

It’s time we change the way we shower. Why can’t our showerheads give us a luxury spa experience and incredibly deep clean while saving tons of water? With MIZSEI, you can have it all and experience the future of showering.

Dimensions

  • Showerhead: W 3.5” x H 9” x D 2” 
  • Metal Hose: 5 foot

Technology

  • Hydrodynamic Cavitation — forms millions of energy-packed microbubbles

Features

  • Dual-Layer Construction ensures durability with a long-lasting metal coating
  • Ergonomically designed handle for your hands
  • Relaxing to use
  • Stop button to prevent unnecessary water use during your shower
  • 2 Modes: Shower Mode and Spa Mode
  • Wide Spray Width covers 60% more surface area
  • Chrome Plated Exterior for a clean, modern look

Mizsei is a cutting-edge innovator and manufacturer of home water supply products for the kitchen, bath, and garden. The name, Mizsei, literally means water and life. Because the quality of life and purity of water go hand in hand.

We are nestled within the mountains of Gifu, Japan, a region known as the birthplace of pure water. For over 60 years, our mission has been to enhance the contemporary lifestyle with the region's pure water tradition through state-of-the-art green products that match the aesthetic, health, and lifestyle needs of the consumer.

Our passion is to bring comfort and well-being to everyone with beautiful, durable, and purifying water supply accessories. We are committed to eco-responsible living. We design products that ease our impact on the Earth and add ease to our day.

 

Actus is one of the only Japanese fluent, all-inclusive crowdfunding agencies in the U.S. who have helped Japanese brands re-established in the U.S. market. Based in Manhattan, NY for over 15 years, Actus offers a solid foundation in e-commerce branding, marketing, sales, customer service, and logistics to ensure the successful launch and long-term growth of the brands.

story:
- Introducing - 

dbell™ HD Live Video Doorbell

 

dbell™ is your extra eye on the door. With dbell™, you’re always connected with your home and visitors.

This device contains a 160° wide angle HD video camera with Mic and multiple sensors to help keep you, your family, and your home safe.

 

 

 

The ultimate video doorbell solution.

dbell™ HD live combines the most desired features of a video doorbell and a home security systems. It instantly alerts you when the doorbell is rung or when motion or sound is detected.

 

 

dbell™ HD live enables you to see and interact with visitors from anywhere. It is the only video doorbell that puts you in control with the ability to schedule recording, save footage to your NVR, HDD and view your property on demand at any time without a smartphone. There are no monthly fees to view your own footage!

 

Media Coverage

 

 

 

Connected Crib: dbell HD Live Video Doorbell

Up Wire: Ding, Dong! Dbell HD Live is the Smartest Doorbell Camera

Gadgetify: dbell HD Live: Smart Video Door Bell System

GiGADGETS: dbell live: Smartest Video Doorbell & Security Cam

YANKO DESIGN: Answer your doorbell from anywhere

SNUPDESIGN: dbell live: Smartest Video Doorbell & Security Cam

Gadgetsin: dbell HD Live Video Smart Doorbell with Security Camera

TRENDHUNTER: HD Live-Streaming Doorbells

Geeky Gadgets: dbell Live Smart Doorbell Now $129 Via Indiegogo (video)

TECHABLE: 【目標金額の4倍突破】ホームセキュリティ対策に！HDライブカメラの最新式ドアベル　いつでもどこでもスマホからモニター＆応答可能

techstartups.com: dbell live: Smart video doorbell

The Daily Dot: This little gadget turns your doorbell into a home security system​

fabcross: どこからでも玄関先をモニタリングできる——スマートドアベル｢dbell live｣​


Techvicity: dbell HD Live: A Smart Doorbell and Security Camera

CNBC-TV18: Check out who's ringing your doorbell even when you are not home!​

DIGITAL TRENDS : Keep an eye on the front door no matter where you go with dbell

 

 

 

The dbell™ team have decades of experience designing, engineering, installing and servicing Custom Home Automation Systems. dbell™ HD Live was created out of their desire to make a high quality home security solution that was accessible and affordable for everyone. They have successfully realized this desire with a convenient and affordable solution that enables you to protect your family and your property.

 

Easy Setup

 

 

 
dbell™ HD Live Early Bird Package Unboxing


 

 

Features

 


 


Bring High Technology Home

 

See Visitors in HD

 

With a wide angle view, crisp clear image, dbell is your sentry at the door. 


 

Motion and Audio Sensors

 

With dbell you are in control of your security experience.

  • Interact with visitors or intruders instantly - dbell is your extra eye on the door, with dbell, you’re always connected with your home and visitors.
  • Check in and view your property.
  • You choose whether you wish to view on your smartphone, tablet, PC program, Browsers or all four simultaneously.


 

Stay Safe From Unwanted Visitors

 

At complete darkness dbell HD live night vision can see up to 15' ft away.

 


Now you'll know where that dent in your package came from

 

 


Anywhere, Anytime
 

Instant Alerts

 

When a visitor arrives you will be alerted instantly if your motion alarm is on via i) the dbell™ app on your smartphone and tablet ii) a snapshot taken by dbell™ is saved on your smartphone or tablet’s visitors log with date/time stamp iii) an email with visitor’s photo iv) a 30 second recording clip of the visitors. If there is someone outside your door you will know about it, regardless of whether they want you to or not.


 

Access From Any Device

dbell™ HD live puts you in control with the freedom to be alerted and to view visitors from multiple smartphones and tablets simultaneously. Your data roaming is off? Not to worry! Seamlessly access live views from PC client or IE®, Firefox® and Chrome® Browsers. Talk to them and record in HD!


 

View on Demand and Record

 

Wondering what is going on outside your home or business? View your property on-demand and record and store the footage at no additional charge.


 

Speak With Visitors

 

You can speak to visitors from wherever you are. At work when the delivery person arrives with an important package? Talk to them about where to leave it.

See someone suspicious outside? Let them know that police are on the way.

 


 

 

Security Integration

 

Easy Integration with Leading Security Systems
and Smart Home Automation

 

 

 

Extras

 

dbell™ WiFi Extender/Repeater Indoorbell

 

dbell Wi-Fi Extender Indoor bell with volume control and ringtone selection. Output Power (Max): 50mW(17dBm), Receiver Sensitivity (Max): -96dBm
Frequency: 2.4GHz


 

dbell™ Wireless Premium Indoor bell


 

dbell™ Wireless Push Button

dbell™ Wireless Push Button can be installed on the back door, side door or any other door you may have where a video doorbell may not be necessary. It works with the dbell™ indoor bell. It comes with 2 sided 3-M adhesive outdoor rated tape and screw option. It is battery powered and comes with battery.

 

 

Perks

 

 

 

 

Easy Install

 
Watch how easy it is to install dbell HD Live! 
 

dbell HD live - Onetouch app setup

 

 
 

How dbell™ HD Live replaces existing doorbell

 

How dbell™ HD Live connects without existing doorbell

 

 

Technical Specifications

Technical Details



 

Camera Viewing Angle

The HD Camera with 160° wide angle with night vision gives you a crystal clear view of your visitors on your smartphone, tablet, or PC 24/7.

 

 

Easy Ethernet Installation

 

Easy WiFi Installation


 

 

Specification Comparison 

Disclaimer: All brand names, product names and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Certain trademarks, registered trademarks, and trade names may be used to refer to either the entities claiming the marks and names or their products. dbell disclaims any proprietary interest in the marks and names of others. dbell is not responsible for errors in typography or specifications change. Comparison was done based on publicly available data from respective websites. Part of the comparison was taken from publicly available 3rd party website. dbell disclaims any liability in the accuracy of the specifications of others which are publicly available on their website at the time of this comparison done in January 3rd, 2017

 


 

The Making of dbell™ HD Live

 

dbell HD live PCB

dbell HD Live Tooling

 

dbell HD live packaging

 

What's in the box

 

What customers are saying
about our first generation dbell™

 


Home and Condo Guide, September Issue, 2016

 


Meet the dbell Team

 

The dbell™ team has decades of experience designing, engineering, installing and servicing Custom Home Automation Systems. dbell™ HD Live was created out of their desire to make a high quality home security solution that was accessible and affordable for everyone. They have successfully realized this desire with a convenient and affordable solution that enables you to protect your family and your property.

 

David Parry

Dave Parry has over 35+ years of "hands-on" diversified experience with mechanical design, computers and integration with industrial controls, automation and sensing technology. Dave with with his 3D parametric mechanical design, linear and rotary motion control systems, hydraulics, pneumatics, electrical, electronics, PLC’s, remote and local process control, RS-485 and similar data communications, proximity/ultrasonic sensor technology, thermography made dbell™ HD live a great innovative product.

 

 

Andrew McGee

Bachelor in Economics, Andrew has been the inspiration for dbell™ from its early days of 2014. Has spent months helping design the best user experience for non-technical end user. Perfected easy to understand user manuals. Andrew coming from green energy, medical and manufacturing sales explains, "over the course of the years I have listened closely to what our clients have said and what industry leaders have conveyed.  As a team, we have been able to incorporate many of these ideas into our latest models"

I am proud to be part of the evolution of the dbell™ from the beginning. The hard work and devotion that the inventor has put forth is nothing short of amazing. The commitment towards making the best video doorbell on the market has been endless. The end result is now proof of these efforts. I am so impressed with the final product – I am sure you will be too.

 

Steve Palmer

Steve is a graduate of Ryerson University’s bachelor of commerce program, after which he proceeded directly in the audio visual world.  He first worked in sales for a commercial audio visual integration firm, learning what clients are looking for in today’s always-connected, high definition world.  8 years later Steve is positively enthusiastic about the potential of the dbell™ product and brings a wealth of knowledge to the company from an installer’s perspective, making sure it is as easy to install as it is easy to use.

 

Naz Kawsar

Naz graduated from Polytechnic, studied computer programming in Kuwait University, and attended Sheridan College, Ontario, Canada. Naz started his Audio visual automation design in 2001 by designing Brock University’s theaters. In 2004 Naz became a Crestron® certified programmer. In 2009 when working on a $8 mil smart home implementing an expensive $1850.00 video doorbell to work with a $10k phone system– the first thought came in mind was – “how to make a video doorbell affordable for everyone?” Running a small business and cherishing a new idea - it took little longer to bring the ‘dbell™ HD live’ ideas into life.

 

 

Why We Need You

 

In 2015, we created dbell™ with the goal of making a reliable video doorbell more accessible to the public. In 2015 we launched dbell™ 1st generation through Best Buy across Canada. In the past 2 years, we were truly surprised by the generous support of our customers and thoughtful feedback of the users.

Continuous great feedback from our clients helped us create dbell™ HD Live, an affordable security solution – “The Sentry at the door” – affordable and reliable.

Creating dbell™ HD Live has been a labor of love. We have spent over a year creating and improving our design, making a 3-D prototype, 3-D working model, finalizing molds, testing new cameras after cameras until we were satisfied, adding customer choice features and developing an app that provides the best possible functionality for our customers.

dbell™ HD Live offers the most desired features of video doorbells and home security systems at an affordable price. It is the only video doorbell solution that integrates easily with NVR, allows schedule recording. Also dbell™ integrates with other ONVIF® compatible security products, provides live ‘dual streaming’ 24/7, view from PC client, Browsers, all for one reasonable one time purchase price only.  

dbell HD Live is developed by a team of home automation experts that have used their extensive technical expertise and they’re in-field experiences working with consumers and business to bring to market an amazing home security solution to all at an affordable price.  

Now, after continuous testing and development for 14 months, we are ready to introduce customer choice ‘dbell™ HD Live’ to you. That's where you come in!

We truly believe that more people should experience this amazing smart video doorbell technology at an affordable price. You can help bring a high quality security solution that is accessible and affordable to all!

Oh, and it’s truly affordable! 

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

 

In order to deliver the highest quality to every single backers and keep dbell HD Live truly affordable, we completely redesigned the dbell, listened to 3,000+ feedbacks carefully from our first generation dbell, used best camera, chips and materials, applied much higher quality assurance standard than previous version of dbell SD. We listened to our customers and implemented almost every single viable feature set in dbell HD Live making it customer’s choice true smart video doorbell.

We guarantee every single component of dbell™ HD Live is made by the most experienced manufacturer in their field and top quality.

This is our 3rd generation video doorbell. We're much more experienced in the manufacturing process, logistics, cost management and quality control.

It is our assurance, you will be satisfied with dbell™ HD Live. If dbell™ HD Live doesn’t deliver as specified, we will refund your contribution (conditions apply)

 

Want to sell the dbell in your store? Click here!

 

  1. Login to Indiegogo account
  2. Click on the link next to BACK IT to get personalized link.
  3. Share your link with family, friends or your blog. 
  4. Earn your bonus perks.

A big thank you from dbell team for sharing and spreading the word!

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Q. Do you have a monthly subscription fee?
A. No. We believe in freedom – there is no monthly fees to record, view or monitor dbell™ HD live camera footage.

Q. Can I install dbell™ HD live in an angle?
A. Yes, dbell™ HD live comes with 30º wedge for easy custom install. You can flip the wedge to make it a left 30º angle wedge or right 30º  angle wedge.

Q. How do you view from PC?
A. Just download the dbell™ HD live PC client from dbell™ support website. It’s a small PC program. Installation instructions are included with the download. You will be up and running in a minute. You can view dbell™ HD live streaming using all major browsers, Internet Explorer®, Firefox® and Chrome®. We have the future plan to add Safari® on the list.

Q. Can I record live streaming to PC, NAS drive or NVR 24/7?
A. Yes, you can record live streaming to the PC, NAS drive or NVR on the Network 24/7. You can also record to cloud.

Q. How can I schedule recording?
A. In the PC program you can schedule recording 24/7/365 or for a specific period. For example, you can schedule everything to be recorded when you are away.

Q. Is it possible to integrate dbell HD with other security camera?
A. Damn right you are... you should be in our team! dbell HD Live easily integrates and works with IP-based ONVIF® compatible security products.

Q. Can I use multiple dbell HD around my house?
A. Yes, you can add as many dbell HD live as you want around your property. dbell HD live has rotating easy-mount which allows you to use dbell HD as a regular security camera.

Q. Do you ship worldwide?
A. Yes we do ship to many countries worldwide. If for any reason we are unable to ship to a specific country due to any reason beyond our control, we will provide you 100% refund.

Q. What are the shipping costs?
A. Shipping costs change depending on the chosen perk and your location. Select your country in the checkout process and the shipping costs will be shown instantly.

Q. What kind of material is the dbell™ HD made of?
A. Super strong ABS plastic, Metal, Glass and other composite materials with special coating used in high quality electronics and aircraft manufacturing to protect the PCB.

Q. Does dbell™ HD provides multiple stream?
A. Yes, dbell™ HD live provides multiple video stream. You can have one stream being recorded and other stream being viewed or same stream being viewed or recorded simultaneously.

Q. Can I use dbell™ HD live without existing doorbell power ?
A. Yes, dbell™ HD live works with your existing doorbell power and AC adapter. dbell™ HD comes with worldwide power adapter 120VAC-240VAC,50/60Hz.

Q. For added security I don’t use Wi-Fi outside the door. Can I use dbell HD live without Wi-Fi?
A. Yes, dbell™ HD live has built-in Ethernet port. You can connect CAT5e/CAT6 cable at the back of the dbell™ HD live.

Q. I do not have existing doorbell. How can I install dbell™?
A. Not to worry, dbell™ HD live works with both AC and DC power. It comes with power adapter also. You can use this adapter to supply power incase you don’t have existing doorbell. You can extend the power using 16AWG 2 conductor cable.

Q. How Motion Sensor Works?
A. When motion is detected, i) it sends instant alert to the associated smartphone/tablet,  ii) takes a picture and email the snapshot to you iii) uploads 30 second video clip to the cloud if it was setup. You can also adjust the sensitivity of the sensor.

Q. How much warranty dbell™ provide?
A. All dbell™ products come with one year limited warranty.

Return Policy

30-Day Pre-Order Cancellation Window

You have 30 days from date of purchase to cancel and refund your pre-order. Email orders@dbell.ca to cancel with proof of purchase. IGG fee and Stripe payment processing fee is non-refundable. After that point no refunds will be given and the product will fall under the standard product return policy below.

Product Returns After Shipment

We can only offer exchange or store credit for returned products. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused, unopened, and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase. Please do not send your purchase back without RMA.

Exchanges (if applicable)

We only replace items if they are defective.  If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at support@dbell.ca

Shipping

To return your product, you should mail your product with RMA number to:

USA return address:
dbell Inc. 655 73rd Street, Niagara Falls, NY 14304 USA

Canada and Other countries returns address:
7-2857 Sherwood Heights Drive, Oakville, ON, L6J 7J9 Canada

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you, may vary. If you are shipping an item over $75, you should consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

 

Thank you for your support!

 

 

We can't say it enough. Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to get the dbell HD live in your hands.
story_txt:
- Introducing - dbell™ HD Live Video Doorbell dbell™ is your extra eye on the door. With dbell™, you’re always connected with your home and visitors.This device contains a 160° wide angle HD video camera with Mic and multiple sensors to help keep you, your family, and your home safe. 

 
 The ultimate video doorbell solution.dbell™ HD live combines the most desired features of a video doorbell and a home security systems. It instantly alerts you when the doorbell is rung or when motion or sound is detected.  dbell™ HD live enables you to see and interact with visitors from anywhere. It is the only video doorbell that puts you in control with the ability to schedule recording, save footage to your NVR, HDD and view your property on demand at any time without a smartphone. There are no monthly fees to view your own footage! Media Coverage   Connected Crib: dbell HD Live Video DoorbellUp Wire: Ding, Dong! Dbell HD Live is the Smartest Doorbell CameraGadgetify: dbell HD Live: Smart Video Door Bell SystemGiGADGETS: dbell live: Smartest Video Doorbell & Security CamYANKO DESIGN: Answer your doorbell from anywhereSNUPDESIGN: dbell live: Smartest Video Doorbell & Security CamGadgetsin: dbell HD Live Video Smart Doorbell with Security CameraTRENDHUNTER: HD Live-Streaming DoorbellsGeeky Gadgets: dbell Live Smart Doorbell Now $129 Via Indiegogo (video)TECHABLE: 【目標金額の4倍突破】ホームセキュリティ対策に！HDライブカメラの最新式ドアベル　いつでもどこでもスマホからモニター＆応答可能techstartups.com: dbell live: Smart video doorbellThe Daily Dot: This little gadget turns your doorbell into a home security system​fabcross: どこからでも玄関先をモニタリングできる——スマートドアベル｢dbell live｣​Techvicity: dbell HD Live: A Smart Doorbell and Security CameraCNBC-TV18: Check out who's ringing your doorbell even when you are not home!​DIGITAL TRENDS : Keep an eye on the front door no matter where you go with dbell   The dbell™ team have decades of experience designing, engineering, installing and servicing Custom Home Automation Systems. dbell™ HD Live was created out of their desire to make a high quality home security solution that was accessible and affordable for everyone. They have successfully realized this desire with a convenient and affordable solution that enables you to protect your family and your property. Easy Setup 

 
 dbell™ HD Live Early Bird Package Unboxing  Features 

 
Bring High Technology Home See Visitors in HD With a wide angle view, crisp clear image, dbell is your sentry at the door.  Motion and Audio Sensors With dbell you are in control of your security experience.
Interact with visitors or intruders instantly - dbell is your extra eye on the door, with dbell, you’re always connected with your home and visitors.
Check in and view your property.
You choose whether you wish to view on your smartphone, tablet, PC program, Browsers or all four simultaneously.
 Stay Safe From Unwanted Visitors At complete darkness dbell HD live night vision can see up to 15' ft away. Now you'll know where that dent in your package came from  
Anywhere, Anytime Instant Alerts When a visitor arrives you will be alerted instantly if your motion alarm is on via i) the dbell™ app on your smartphone and tablet ii) a snapshot taken by dbell™ is saved on your smartphone or tablet’s visitors log with date/time stamp iii) an email with visitor’s photo iv) a 30 second recording clip of the visitors. If there is someone outside your door you will know about it, regardless of whether they want you to or not. Access From Any Devicedbell™ HD live puts you in control with the freedom to be alerted and to view visitors from multiple smartphones and tablets simultaneously. Your data roaming is off? Not to worry! Seamlessly access live views from PC client or IE®, Firefox® and Chrome® Browsers. Talk to them and record in HD! View on Demand and Record Wondering what is going on outside your home or business? View your property on-demand and record and store the footage at no additional charge. Speak With Visitors You can speak to visitors from wherever you are. At work when the delivery person arrives with an important package? Talk to them about where to leave it.See someone suspicious outside? Let them know that police are on the way.   Security Integration Easy Integration with Leading Security Systemsand Smart Home Automation   Extras dbell™ WiFi Extender/Repeater Indoorbell dbell Wi-Fi Extender Indoor bell with volume control and ringtone selection. Output Power (Max): 50mW(17dBm), Receiver Sensitivity (Max): -96dBmFrequency: 2.4GHz dbell™ Wireless Premium Indoor bell dbell™ Wireless Push Buttondbell™ Wireless Push Button can be installed on the back door, side door or any other door you may have where a video doorbell may not be necessary. It works with the dbell™ indoor bell. It comes with 2 sided 3-M adhesive outdoor rated tape and screw option. It is battery powered and comes with battery.  Perks    Easy Install Watch how easy it is to install dbell HD Live!  


dbell HD live - Onetouch app setup

 
  
How dbell™ HD Live replaces existing doorbell
 

How dbell™ HD Live connects without existing doorbell  Technical SpecificationsTechnical Details Camera Viewing AngleThe HD Camera with 160° wide angle with night vision gives you a crystal clear view of your visitors on your smartphone, tablet, or PC 24/7.  Easy Ethernet Installation Easy WiFi Installation  Specification Comparison Disclaimer: All brand names, product names and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Certain trademarks, registered trademarks, and trade names may be used to refer to either the entities claiming the marks and names or their products. dbell disclaims any proprietary interest in the marks and names of others. dbell is not responsible for errors in typography or specifications change. Comparison was done based on publicly available data from respective websites. Part of the comparison was taken from publicly available 3rd party website. dbell disclaims any liability in the accuracy of the specifications of others which are publicly available on their website at the time of this comparison done in January 3rd, 2017  The Making of dbell™ HD Live dbell HD live PCBdbell HD Live Tooling dbell HD live packaging What's in the box What customers are sayingabout our first generation dbell™ Home and Condo Guide, September Issue, 2016 
Meet the dbell Team The dbell™ team has decades of experience designing, engineering, installing and servicing Custom Home Automation Systems. dbell™ HD Live was created out of their desire to make a high quality home security solution that was accessible and affordable for everyone. They have successfully realized this desire with a convenient and affordable solution that enables you to protect your family and your property. David ParryDave Parry has over 35+ years of "hands-on" diversified experience with mechanical design, computers and integration with industrial controls, automation and sensing technology. Dave with with his 3D parametric mechanical design, linear and rotary motion control systems, hydraulics, pneumatics, electrical, electronics, PLC’s, remote and local process control, RS-485 and similar data communications, proximity/ultrasonic sensor technology, thermography made dbell™ HD live a great innovative product.  Andrew McGeeBachelor in Economics, Andrew has been the inspiration for dbell™ from its early days of 2014. Has spent months helping design the best user experience for non-technical end user. Perfected easy to understand user manuals. Andrew coming from green energy, medical and manufacturing sales explains, "over the course of the years I have listened closely to what our clients have said and what industry leaders have conveyed.  As a team, we have been able to incorporate many of these ideas into our latest models"I am proud to be part of the evolution of the dbell™ from the beginning. The hard work and devotion that the inventor has put forth is nothing short of amazing. The commitment towards making the best video doorbell on the market has been endless. The end result is now proof of these efforts. I am so impressed with the final product – I am sure you will be too. Steve PalmerSteve is a graduate of Ryerson University’s bachelor of commerce program, after which he proceeded directly in the audio visual world.  He first worked in sales for a commercial audio visual integration firm, learning what clients are looking for in today’s always-connected, high definition world.  8 years later Steve is positively enthusiastic about the potential of the dbell™ product and brings a wealth of knowledge to the company from an installer’s perspective, making sure it is as easy to install as it is easy to use. Naz KawsarNaz graduated from Polytechnic, studied computer programming in Kuwait University, and attended Sheridan College, Ontario, Canada. Naz started his Audio visual automation design in 2001 by designing Brock University’s theaters. In 2004 Naz became a Crestron® certified programmer. In 2009 when working on a $8 mil smart home implementing an expensive $1850.00 video doorbell to work with a $10k phone system– the first thought came in mind was – “how to make a video doorbell affordable for everyone?” Running a small business and cherishing a new idea - it took little longer to bring the ‘dbell™ HD live’ ideas into life.  Why We Need You In 2015, we created dbell™ with the goal of making a reliable video doorbell more accessible to the public. In 2015 we launched dbell™ 1st generation through Best Buy across Canada. In the past 2 years, we were truly surprised by the generous support of our customers and thoughtful feedback of the users.Continuous great feedback from our clients helped us create dbell™ HD Live, an affordable security solution – “The Sentry at the door” – affordable and reliable.Creating dbell™ HD Live has been a labor of love. We have spent over a year creating and improving our design, making a 3-D prototype, 3-D working model, finalizing molds, testing new cameras after cameras until we were satisfied, adding customer choice features and developing an app that provides the best possible functionality for our customers.dbell™ HD Live offers the most desired features of video doorbells and home security systems at an affordable price. It is the only video doorbell solution that integrates easily with NVR, allows schedule recording. Also dbell™ integrates with other ONVIF® compatible security products, provides live ‘dual streaming’ 24/7, view from PC client, Browsers, all for one reasonable one time purchase price only.  dbell HD Live is developed by a team of home automation experts that have used their extensive technical expertise and they’re in-field experiences working with consumers and business to bring to market an amazing home security solution to all at an affordable price.  Now, after continuous testing and development for 14 months, we are ready to introduce customer choice ‘dbell™ HD Live’ to you. That's where you come in!We truly believe that more people should experience this amazing smart video doorbell technology at an affordable price. You can help bring a high quality security solution that is accessible and affordable to all!Oh, and it’s truly affordable!    Timeline   Risks and Challenges In order to deliver the highest quality to every single backers and keep dbell HD Live truly affordable, we completely redesigned the dbell, listened to 3,000+ feedbacks carefully from our first generation dbell, used best camera, chips and materials, applied much higher quality assurance standard than previous version of dbell SD. We listened to our customers and implemented almost every single viable feature set in dbell HD Live making it customer’s choice true smart video doorbell.We guarantee every single component of dbell™ HD Live is made by the most experienced manufacturer in their field and top quality.This is our 3rd generation video doorbell. We're much more experienced in the manufacturing process, logistics, cost management and quality control.It is our assurance, you will be satisfied with dbell™ HD Live. If dbell™ HD Live doesn’t deliver as specified, we will refund your contribution (conditions apply) Want to sell the dbell in your store? Click here! 
Login to Indiegogo account
Click on the link next to BACK IT to get personalized link.

Share your link with family, friends or your blog. 
Earn your bonus perks.
