story:
The Brunt Blind Engine is back!

The Brunt Blind Engine is back!

We will be shipping all purchases weekly! 

Find us also in Amazon Europe (UK, DE, FR, IT, ES)

Check out the official BRUNT website - www.brunt.co/us  

[日本語]   [Press Kit]

 

Rewards

 

 

 

Transform your blinds into smart blinds at an affordable price!

 

 

 

 It’s not hard to see why people are enamored with the thought of having motorized blinds and shades, but motorized blinds are a huge hassle to install, very expensive, and have not made any significant improvements over the years despite their simplistic functions.

(Ex: Electric motor + Remote control (for extended function) + Installation cost + New blind curtain replacement cost = about $300-$1,000)

 

 

 

Welcome, Blind Engine

 

Blind Engine is a device that transforms your home’s standard blinds into smart electric blinds. You can motorize your existing blinds at an affordable price. Blind Engine also connects to your smartphone, enabling remote control and scheduling of your blinds anytime, anywhere.

 

 

Will it work with my blinds?

Blind Engine is designed to be compatible with most roll-type blinds available on the market, and can work with blinds of varying shapes and sizes. The device can be mounted in a window frame or on the wall.

 

  • Blind Types Compatibility

​

 

  • Blind Cords Compatibility

 Blind Engine comes with two different gears that can accommodate normal string cords, small ball chains, and large ball chains.

 

  • Unsupported Blind Types

 

  • The Extension of Blind Size 

 Blind Engine’s max capacity 10ft by 10ft / 15lbs of weight. However, It can be influenced by the variables like type, cloth. so we recommend to use within the stable range.

 

 

Blind Engine Features

 

 

  • Mobile Control

By accessing the Brunt App (Mobile app), users can command Blind Engine to raise and lower their blinds from anywhere in the world. So, whether you’re inside, outside, or even traveling abroad, you can raise and lower your blinds anytime and anywhere.

 

  • Timer Control

Block strong sunlight during the day, and protect your privacy at night. Blind Engine’s timer function allows you to set desired blind heights in advance, and then executes them according to schedule. Create a more relaxed lifestyle by utilizing customizable smart light controls that match your day-to- day activities.

 

  • Multiple Controls

Even if you use multiple blinds in your home, they can all be easily and simultaneously controlled. With the Brunt App’s Welcome & Goodbye feature, you can raise and lower multiple blinds at the same time.

 

  • Location Recognition Control

Blind Engine also allows for convenient auto-run capabilities depending on your current geographic location. Blind Engines that have activated the Welcome & Goodbye function can automatically adjust your blinds when you arrive or leave home.

 

 

Other Remarkable Features:

 

  • Voice Control

For a different lifestyle experience, manage Blind Engine using voice control powered by Amazon Echo (Alexa), Google Home, Apple Homepod, and other compatible programs.

(With the exception of Amazon Echo, voice command compatibility for other devices and services is still under development)

 

  • Share Permission

Brunt App’s Share Permission feature lets you easily extend control of your devices to others who share your living space.

 

  • Emergency Auto-Stop

Blind motor will automatically stop if the line catches, or if Blind Engine detects additional abnormal weight or pressure.

 

 

User-Friendly:

 

  • Three-Minute Installation

 

 
Blind Engine comes with double-sided tape and screws, providing two easy methods to attach and install the device to the wall without the help of an installer. Total installation time takes just 3 minutes, including mobile app connection. (Installation Guide)

 

 

 

  • Globally Certified Quality

 

 

US(FCC), EU(CE), JP(TELEC), KR(KC) certifications are underway and all certifications will be completed before the engine is shipped. Blind Engine’s safety and performance is guaranteed!

 

 

Components & Specifications

 

 

Timeline

 

[2016]

‣ May              Ideation and Design sketch

‣ September   1st Prototyping

[2017]

‣ January          First public debut at CES 2017

‣ April                2nd Prototyping

‣ May                 Mobile App Prototyping

‣ July                  Engineering development (PCBA, Mechanical design)

                            Molding development

                            3rd Prototyping and Field test (in LA and Seoul)

‣ August            Final Prototyping

‣ October        Start Indiegogo In-demand

                            Mobile APP Publishing (iOS, Android)

                            FCC(US), CE(EU), TELEC(JP) certified 

                            Test and packaging

‣ November    Shipping

  

  

About Brunt Team

 Brunt is a compound word coming from ‘Brush’, ‘Paint’, and ‘Technology’. It is with a vision of combining Art and Technology that we have created the product and service. We are confident that Blind Engine will greatly improve convenience and empower you in crafting your own unique lifestyle.

 

  • What We Do We

Create the products that are necessary for a better life. Our essential electronic products combine technology and new lifestyle products for the new digital age.

 

  • How We Work

We find solutions to the problems that make our lives uncomfortable and apply these solutions to our products in order to make a better lifestyle for the digital generation.

 

  • Official SNS

        [Facebook] 

        [Instagram]

        [Official Website]

 

 

Blind Engine Media coverage

 

 

Risks and challenges

Although we set up a shipping schedule based on previous experience with mass production or Indiegogo campaigns, there would be unexpected variables in the process of manufacturing.

We’ve already developed the prototypes, and finished most of mechanical development. We are now communicating with certification organization for US(FCC), EU(CE), JP(TELEC). We will start mass production by predicting the final quantity in the middlie of Indiegogo campaign. The designs of the packages, accessories are yet to be decided. We will share with our backers as soon as it is confirmed.

Blind Engines that have activated the Welcome & Goodbye function can automatically adjust your blinds when you arrive or leave home.  Other Remarkable Features: Voice ControlFor a different lifestyle experience, manage Blind Engine using voice control powered by Amazon Echo (Alexa), Google Home, Apple Homepod, and other compatible programs.(With the exception of Amazon Echo, voice command compatibility for other devices and services is still under development) Share PermissionBrunt App’s Share Permission feature lets you easily extend control of your devices to others who share your living space. Emergency Auto-StopBlind motor will automatically stop if the line catches, or if Blind Engine detects additional abnormal weight or pressure.  User-Friendly: Three-Minute Installation


 

 
Blind Engine comes with double-sided tape and screws, providing two easy methods to attach and install the device to the wall without the help of an installer. Total installation time takes just 3 minutes, including mobile app connection. (Installation Guide)

   Globally Certified Quality  US(FCC), EU(CE), JP(TELEC), KR(KC) certifications are underway and all certifications will be completed before the engine is shipped. Blind Engine’s safety and performance is guaranteed!  Components & Specifications  Timeline [2016]‣ May              Ideation and Design sketch‣ September   1st Prototyping[2017]‣ January          First public debut at CES 2017‣ April                2nd Prototyping‣ May                 Mobile App Prototyping‣ July                  Engineering development (PCBA, Mechanical design)                            Molding development                            3rd Prototyping and Field test (in LA and Seoul)‣ August            Final Prototyping‣ October        Start Indiegogo In-demand                            Mobile APP Publishing (iOS, Android)                            FCC(US), CE(EU), TELEC(JP) certified                             Test and packaging‣ November    Shipping    About Brunt Team Brunt is a compound word coming from ‘Brush’, ‘Paint’, and ‘Technology’. It is with a vision of combining Art and Technology that we have created the product and service. We are confident that Blind Engine will greatly improve convenience and empower you in crafting your own unique lifestyle. What We Do WeCreate the products that are necessary for a better life. Our essential electronic products combine technology and new lifestyle products for the new digital age. How We WorkWe find solutions to the problems that make our lives uncomfortable and apply these solutions to our products in order to make a better lifestyle for the digital generation. Official SNS        [Facebook]         [Instagram]        [Official Website]  Blind Engine Media coverage  Risks and challengesAlthough we set up a shipping schedule based on previous experience with mass production or Indiegogo campaigns, there would be unexpected variables in the process of manufacturing.We’ve already developed the prototypes, and finished most of mechanical development. We are now communicating with certification organization for US(FCC), EU(CE), JP(TELEC). We will start mass production by predicting the final quantity in the middlie of Indiegogo campaign. The designs of the packages, accessories are yet to be decided. We will share with our backers as soon as it is confirmed.

story:
Greetings!

We are in the process of starting a food product business and are ready for a boost of energy to get things really moving! The first product is a line of Paleo Tea Cakes to be sold as pastries to cafes & tea shops. They come in several flavors including Vanilla Maple, Chocolate Hazelnut, Superfruit Cake, and Ginger Spice.

These nutty morsels are part protein bar, part energy drink, and wholly amazing!
The story began as an attempt to increase my omega-3 EFA consumption. I tried several methods and eventually fell in love with chia seeds. And as in any love affair, one thing leads to another and...POW! These beautiful little tea cakes are the result of a few years of experimenting with different mixtures of seeds, nuts, fruits, herbs, spices, roots, berries, and honey formed into small, dense cakes that are uncooked and very rich in nutrients. They are great by themselves, as an addition to trail mix, smeared with jam for a decadent dessert, soaked overnight and added to smoothies, taken on picnics, hikes, backpacking adventures, or intergalactic travel, and of course, they are great with tea and company!

Many thanks to my friends & cohorts in T.N.T Taiko for being grateful test subjects!

Our initial marketing will be aimed towards coffee shops, tea houses, and other interested local Boulder businesses. Our next goal will be internet sales and expanding outside of Boulder. Our final goal is to be in health food stores.

We already have interest from the following Boulder businesses:

 The Unseen Bean coffee shop

Once the tea cakes are rolling, we will begin work on Kozmik Kondiments. Ever order a delicious free-range burger with organic fries and have them put Heinz ketchup on the table? Well, we want to have our Kozmik Ketchup put on the table instead, along with our mustard and picante sauce. We will be producing one basic line of condiments to be sold in bulk to restaurants and a gourmet line to be sold in stores with flavors like Chili Lime Mustard, Mango Sriracha, Curry Catsup, and Pineapple Habanero Salsa.

It is our sincerest goal to make the most nutritious and delicious foods possible and dedicate ourselves to using organic, fair-trade, sustainably harvested ingredients utilizing as many local sources as possible. We also plan on winning competitions with our recipes and continuing our education in nutrition & preparation techniques.

The 5-year plan is to produce these food products from our own food truck and/or restaurant and to supply a good amount of the food from our own farm all of which will be owned & operated by a worker co-op with the aim of becoming an international model for sustainable living & regenerative economics.


What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking capital for some basic start-up needs...

- $1500 will enable us to purchase initial bulk ingredients.
- $3600 will pay for an entire year's rent at a certified kitchen share facility.
- $5000 should be enough to get us a used minivan.
- $200 will pay for licenses, fees, and permits.
- $800 will be enough to purchase some nice grinding equipment.
- $1500 will provide fair wages to helping hands for a few months.
- $500 will enable us to purchase recycled packaging.
- $500 will be enough for some basic marketing.

We know this adds up to $13,600, but we figure that there is no need to pay a full-year's lease up front, nor pay all wages up front. Hence, the nice round starting figure of $10,000.

So, i have heard phrases like "follow your bliss" and "go big or go home" and "strive for your dreams" and many similar tidbits of wisdom. The tea cake & condiment business can easily get off the ground with ten thousand dollars, but what if this campaign goes viral? Then what? Here is what we will do if we exceed our goal. Here is me aiming for the stars...

- $10,000 will be enough to get the condiment business rolling strong.
- $40,000 will get us a NEW delivery van. Possibly even an electric one!
- $30,000 will pay fees & tuition for a Master's degrees in nutrition, permaculture certifications, and a variety of workshops, seminars, and retreats concerning horticulture, community development, economics, and health & wellness...overall, an essential scholarship fund for continuing education of the community.
- $50,000 will get us started on a restaurant or a food truck.
- $100,000 will be enough for a restaurant AND a food truck, staff, and a few months of ingredients and marketing budget.
- $1,000,000 will get us the whole kit-and-kaboodle...farm, restaurant, food truck, supplies, equipment, and starting capital for several cottage industries to be directed and operated by the worker co-operative.


Several benefits will result from your donations...

- You get free food samples and recipes.
- You can be connected to a community of people passionate about health & wellness.
- Our products will promote healthy eating & increase the vitality of people and the community.
- This cottage industry will create jobs, stimulate fair trade, & create opportunities for other entrepreneurs.
- We will be focusing on local markets and economy first & foremost.
- The website www.kozmikfood.com will have an active blog with information & dialogue concerning health & wellness.

 Upon attaining the farm goal, we will be contributing to the organic food supply, invigorating the industrial hemp movement, modelling sustainable & regenerative living, improving the Earth for future generations, cooking amazing food for social gatherings, educating on health & wellness, networking with other like-minded businesses & individuals, and, in short, nourishing the galaxy one bite at a time - body, mind, & spirit.

We are out to thrive and become successful, but not wealthy. We believe that most of the worlds problems are directly connected to lack of education & lack of access to clean air, water, & food. Therefore, we are seeking to ally with a local non-profit or two that work directly with the undernourished and undereducated, especially children. We will commit part of our profits to benefit these organizations.

We also believe that crowd funding is one of the most revolutionary developments in the history of business! If we reach our goal, we will donate up to 10% back to other crowd funding efforts.


The Impact


There are many ways this business model will impact the world. First and foremost, we will be nourishing people! We believe that good, smart nutrition can alleviate many of the world's problems. We will also be creating jobs and entrepreneurial opportunities. Our worker cooperative honors each participant for their time and talents giving fair, livable wages, profit sharing incentives, and encouragement to grow and expand the business into new areas. Our commitment to organic ingredients helps our little spaceship Earth provide sustenance & resources for many future generations. And our commitment to fair trade commerce guarantees that a good portion of your dollar reaches the hands who picked the raw ingredients. Our farm community will be a model of sustainable & regenerative living skills. We will be providing educational experiences (internships, workshops, classes, webinars, etc.) which will spread this vital information to different parts of the globe and generally increase awareness of the interconnectedness between personal health & environmental health.

Risks & Challenges


Not many risks or challenges with the Tea Cake cottage industry. Everyone loves them. Coffee shops want them. We are happy to make them. If we just get off the ground selling Tea Cakes, we would be very happy and so would many others!

The real risks and challenges come in the next stages. Finding a way to make organic condiments inexpensive enough to compete in the restaurant supply business will be quite challenging. But with a focus on the "local" & "organic" marketing strategies, we are certain to get into a few restaurants...enough to give us bulk purchasing discounts. Many more risks come with opening a restaurant. One member of our team is a successful & experienced restaurant manager who will minimize many of the risks, and we are confident that our unique restaurant concept will be a hit in Boulder..."the foodiest town in America." The biggest risk of getting to the farm stage is the cost of property. We do not want to get saddled with an exorbitant mortgage that will keep us working overtime just to afford, and that is a challenge anywhere near Boulder. Hence, the $1 million goal...at least half of which may go towards property purchase unless we find that rare screaming deal. Once we establish the farm, the only risk will be the weather.

Other Ways You Can Help

Folks who are unable to contribute $$ may be able to help us with other things...
- we need a couple of iPads or other tablet for on-site payments
- leads on tea shops, coffee shops, or other vendors who might be interested in selling our tea cakes. Outside-the-box ideas are very welcome. Possible commissioned sales opportunities here.
- a delivery van, preferably a VW Eurovan (plan on selling these door-to-door around the country)
- a hand-operated stainless steel grinder with a stone grinder wheel
- a stainless steel spice grinder
- a stainless steel nut chopper
- a few dozen sterile half-gallon, quart, & pint sized mason jars
- website design help
- film work & photography help
- graphic design help
- online networking help
- encouragement, praise, & feedback

Thanks for reading!

story:
Why Do You Need iTOMO-Cup?

Water is a necessity to live, however, it’s also something we forget about during the day. Do you ever find yourself asking, “Have I had any water today?” or “Did I drink enough water today?” Well, iTOMO-Cup was created to relieve you of having to ask yourself these very questions.

iTOMO-Cup reminds you to drink water every hour using an LED indicator and beeping noise. It also acts a thermometer by showing you your beverage’s temperature when it is over 40 degrees Celsius/ 104 degrees Fahrenheit. Lastly, it is stylish and fun with 5 colors of LED lights that light up when you touch it!

How Much Water Do You Need Everyday?


Here Are 6 Reasons To Make Sure You're Drinking Enough Water:


iTOMO-Cup is made of new bone china and has a unique double-wall structure that helps slow down the natural change of your beverage’s temperature. More so, it will never burn you, or leave those pesky condensation rings!

The cup is battery operated, and a red light will signal when it is time to change them approximately every 3 months. Because the cup is waterproof, the batteries will not be affected during wash or use, however iTOMO-Cup is not dishwasher or microwave safe.

Why we use New Bone China for Smart Cup?

iTOMO-Cup is made of new bone China material which is a higher quality porcelain and helps maintain a beverage’s natural temperature longer than standard porcelain. Existing smart cups or cups with LED lighting are commonly made of toxic materials such as acrylic or plastic. Some heat-resistant chemicals and metals used in smart cups can affect users’ long term health, including some cups marked BPA-free. iTOMO-Cup allows users to consume warm or cold drinks without worrying about the toxins, as well as knowing the iTOMO Cup is more eco-friendly than using plastic or non-reusable cups.


Specification:


The Challenges We’ve Overcome

We went through multiple design steps to create our first working prototype including drawings, structures, and several different molds. This was a very challenging time, and we were also extremely frustrated trying to find a qualified ceramic factory to create our product. 

Most of the ceramic factories we went to refused our designs and told us it was impossible to make iTOMO-Cup and mass produce them. But, finally we found our match! Through all of our successes and failures, we found a method to our madness, and we are now ready to bring our vision of iTOMO-Cup to market with your help!

In our current stage of prototype III, we’ve created about 100 pieces as a sample test run and we are confident the results will be as expected. We will have more iTOMO-Cups for distribution toward the end of June 2015. Hopefully, our final challenge will be how fast we can fulfill backer orders per the projected reward timeline!

story:
Hi, my name is Linn.  Many people in my community also know me as FreaKat.  My mate Nyko and I have been together going on 6 years now and last November he proposed to me.  Now we normally get by pretty well between the two of our jobs, but everyone knows weddings can be very expensive.  Just the same, we are hoping there are some kind-hearted contributors out there who can help us put together the extra funds we will need to finally and legally be a family.

Since we have been together for as long as we have, we have more or less amassed most of the household items and material possesions that we really need, except for the funding.  We are more than happy to accept donations to this fund in lieu of wedding gifts.  Ideally, we want to raise about 10 grand so that we can easily afford the dresses, tuxes, reception hall, rehearsal dinner and honeymoon, but we will truly be happy with whatever amount people are willing to give, even if we don't reach this specific goal.

Of course, anyone contributing will be automatically invited to the wedding even if you're not on our initial list, and anyone contributing $100 or more will also be invited to the rehearsal dinner and show afterwards.

Please share this to anyone you think may want to contribute, and help us to become an official family.

Thanks, everyone for your time and consideration.

 

Sincerely,

Randy Linn 'FreaKat' Russell

story:
Update! 

Only need $770 more!!   I can't manually update the "goal" on the campaign but keep the donations coming!  Thank you! :-)

Short Summary

Many of you may pass this campaign by because it is not some miraculous new invention, doesn't have a dramatic story, or super cool rewards.  I hope you still take a moment to check it out and help either with your donation or by sharing this campaign. :) 

I have a close friend who really wants a Hoyt Carbon Spyder compound bow before hunting season.  He is a very hard worker but let's face it - we all have bills and $1500 doesn't come easy and most of us don't have the luxury of spending $1500 on ourselves.

I'd really like to find a way to help him get it. Hopefully with your help and your donation, even if it is a single dollar, we will be able to get it for him. :-)

What We Need

The goal is $1500.  

    The Impact

    Giving someone something that you know they have a passion for is an amazing feeling.  The impact of your donation will be huge smiles and a very happy man. LOL  


        Other Ways You Can Help

        Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

        • Please share this campaign on your social networking outlets.

story:
What happened?

After an accidental fire in our kitchen, we're now left with having to cover the costs of

  • cleaning
  • repairs
  • paint
  • new stove (update: WE GOT A FREE STOVE!)

We unfortunately were un-insured for our apartment and have no coverage to replace or repair these damages. We're doing our best to work with what we have, but it is not enough. We ask if you'd be able to assist us with the costs of these repairs. 

Where will the money go?

We're aiming to raise funds to cover:

  • cupboards
  • painting walls
  • cleaning materials

    What happens when we reach our goal?

    If we raise more than our initial goal, we intend to donate the extra money to charity.


    We thank you for the support that you give us.

story:
NOW SHIPPING!

Klicke hier (oder scrolle runter) für die deutsche Fassung!

Check our project updates for latest news!

Introducing Shellfire

We believe, that a free and secure access to the internet is a fundamental right for every single person on this planet. That's why we created Shellfire VPN, an easy to use app that safely connects your Windows, Mac OS or Android device to our encrypted vpn network with just a few clicks. We have already helped more than 200,000 users worldwide secure their data and overcome censorship.

Why Is That Not Enough?

If you own many devices, securing all of them can get annoying and most "smart" devices don't even offer the possibility to establish a safe vpn connection, leaving your data exposed. That's why, many of our users have asked us for a simple solution to secure all their devices at once.

Thinking Outside the Box

In an attempt to provide these people with a good solution, we came up with the idea of the Shellfire Box, a tiny box that safely connects all your devices at once to our worldwide vpn network in a matter of seconds:


Unlimited Connectivity

With the Shellfire Box, you can easily secure all your devices, even those that don't offer any vpn capabilities (smart tvs, gaming consoles, bluray players, set top boxes etc. ). This allows you to access blocked content and surf safely, no matter where in the world you are located.

Be Anywhere, Anytime

We have been providing vpn tunnels for 5 years. During that time, we built a world-wide network of servers in 20 countries which allows you to virtually travel almost anywhere in the world within seconds and access content that is restricted to certain countries like websites, tv shows and youtube videos. The Shellfire Box reliably hides your true location and ip address from anyone on the web!

Plug And Play

One big difference between the Shellfire Box and other products is that we are designing it for the average user that does not know much about online security and encryption. Once connected to the internet, it will configure and connect itself automatically, meaning it requires absolutely zero expert knowledge! An easy-to-use web interface will allow you to switch your vpn server anytime. But if you're a true nerd, don't worry, you're also invited to the party! Just switch to the advanced interface and you have the full power of linux network tools at your hands!

No Tricks

Like all our client-side software, the firmware of the Shellfire Box will be published as open source and vpn connections are established using OpenVPN. According to German laws, we are not obliged to keep any traffic / ip logs, so we don't.

The Box In The News

 Geeky Gadgets

VentureBeat

What Do I Get?

- The Shellfire Box
- A 1 or 2 year subscription to Shellfire VPN Premium Plus
- Full access to our high-speed servers in 29 countries

Shipping has begun!

The Shellfire Box is now shipping!


Instructional Videos

Florian has posted a series of instructional videos explaining the functions of the Shellfire Box, check them out on our blog: Shellfire Blog.


FAQ

Who are you?

We are Florian and Max. Together, we have been running Shellfire for more than 12 years, providing different hosting services to the public.


Why are you doing this?

Because we believe that the internet should be a place of freedom while remaining a safe place for private data.

Do I need a Shellfire VPN subscription in order to use the Shellfire Box?

The Shellfire Box comes with a 1 or 2 year subscription, depending on your order (except if you choose the "Returning Customer" perk). However, the box will not become useless if you don't choose to extend your subscription after that period, you will simply be switched to our free vpn service, providing you with a limited download speed and server choice.

Is there a way to use Shellfire VPN without the Shellfire Box?

Of course! Visit https://www.shellfire.net/vpn/ to download our free and easy to use apps for Windows, Mac OS and Android devices! Other devices running iOS, Linux etc. are also supported via 3rd party apps or by using OS-integrated vpn capabilities.

How is the Shellfire Box different from products like anonabox, invizbox etc.?

The Shellfire Box uses vpn (virtual private network) technology, establishing a fast connection to one of our vpn servers. Contrary to other vpn routers, the Shellfire  Box comes pre-configured and setting it up requires absolutely zero nerdy expert knowledge! :) Most similar products use the Tor network instead of vpn. While Tor is a great way to protect your privacy, connections are often painfully slow and it is not easily possible to unblock restricted content that is only available in certain countries.

How can I change the settings of the Shellfire Box?

The Box comes pre-configured and will be immediately ready for use after plugging it in. If you want to switch to another vpn server, just log in to our easy to use web-interface with your browser. For further settings (e.g. for fixed ip networks), an advanced interface will also be available.

When will I get my Shellfire Box?

The Shellfire Box is here! All orders will be shipped within 24h on working days!

Will I be able to use my Shellfire VPN Account already before I get my box?

Yes! You will be able to use your Shellfire VPN account on your computer, smartphone or tablet right after your order.

What are the specs?

The Shellfire Box is based on Nexx WT3020 router hardware and will run a modified openwrt OS.

  • System-On-Chip: MediaTek MT7620n
  • CPU Speed: 580MHz
  • RAM memory: 64 MB DDR
  • Wired network: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps (switched)
  • Ethernet chip: MediaTek MT7530 (SoC)
  • Ethernet switch: MediaTek MT7530 (integrated)
  • Wireless network: 2.4 GHz 802.11b/g/n MiMo 2x2:2
  • Wireless chip: MediaTek RT5390 (SoC)

Which vpn technology will the Shellfire Box be using?

We will be using OpenVPN with AES encryption, widely considered as one of the safest technologies around.

What download speeds should I expect?

We are still optimizing. Currently, we are reaching around 13 Mbit/s under perfect conditions. This is largely enough for streaming videos. We are still working on improving this figure but don't expect 50 Mbit/s, as encryption is pretty hardware intensive.

Are there more pictures/videos/details?

Check back here regularly as we will be releasing updates soon! Also, follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus to be the first ones to know when new stuff is available!

Does the Shellfire Box connect to OpenVPN servers of other providers?

This will definitely be possible for advanced users. However, it requires more technical skills than the regular setup of the Shellfire Box. Our focus with the Shellfire Box is on the easy and intuitive usage. Users of the box don't have to fiddle around with ip-addresses and certificates to go online securely, but only plug the box in and connect to its wifi.

Will I be able to connect to wireless hotspots using the Shellfire Box?

This will unfortunately not be possible as it would require a second wireless chip which our hardware does not have. It would also make setting up the box much more complicated. If you are on the go, you can just use our free apps for Windows, Mac OS or Android to connect your device directly to our servers without having to take the Shellfire Box with you.

Can I use my Shellfire VPN Account before I get the Shellfire Box?

Yes! When this campaign is over, we will activate your account so that you can use Shellfire VPN using our apps already before the Shellfire Box is shipped.

Is Shellfire VPN available for other devices as well?

Yes! We currently have apps for Windows, Mac OS and Android but other devices (linux, iOS etc.) can connect as well using 3rd party apps or using internal vpn capabilities of the OS. Let us know if you have any questions regarding your device!

How can I help the Shellfire Box become reality?

In order to support us, tweet and share this campaign on facebook or Google Plus! Also, obviously, the best support you can give us is by becoming a backer.

Have more questions or a feature request? Let us know in the comments or via https://www.shellfire.net/kontakt/ !


Deutsche Fassung


Über Shellfire

Wir glauben daran, dass ein freier und sicherer Zugang zum Internet für jeden Menschen auf dieser Welt ein Grundrecht ist. Deshalb haben wir Shellfire VPN entwickelt, eine einfache App, die dein WIndows, Mac OS oder Android Gerät mit wenigen Klicks sicher mit unserem weltweiten VPN Netz verbindet. Wir haben bereits über 200.000 Nutzern weltweit dabei geholfen, ihre Daten zu schützen und Zensur zu überwinden.

Warum Ist Das Nicht Genug?

Wenn du viele Geräte besitzt wird es irgendwann lästig, jedes Gerät einzeln abzusichern. Die meisten "smarten" Gerät bieten gar nicht die Möglichkeit, eine sichere VPN Verbindung aufzubauen und verschicken deine Daten somit ungeschützt. Deshalb haben uns viele unserer Nutzer nach einer Möglichkeit gefragt, all ihre Geräte auf einmal abzusichern.

Um Die Ecke Gedacht

Auf der Suche nach einer guten Lösung kamen wir auf die Idee, die Shellfire Box zu entwickeln. Eine kleine Box, die in wenigen Sekunden all deine Geräte gleichzeitig sicher mit unserem weltweiten VPN Netz verbindet:


Uneingeschränkte Konnektiviät

Mit der Shellfire Box kannst du ganz einfach all deine Geräte absichern, selbst solche, die keine VPN Verbindungen aufbauen können (Smart TVs, Spielekonsolen, Bluray Player, Set Top Boxen etc.). Dadurch kannst du auf blockierte Inhalte zugreifen und sicher surfen, ganz egal, wo auf der Welt du dich gerade befindest.

Sei Wo Du Willst, Wann Immer Du Möchtest

Wir hosten seit 5 Jahren VPN Tunnel. In dieser Zeit haben wir ein weltweites Netz mit Servern in 20 Ländern aufgebaut. Das erlaubt dir, in wenigen Sekunden deinen virtuellen Standort fast überall auf die Welt zu verlegen und somit Inhalte anzusehen, die in deinem Land eigentlich nicht verfügbar oder zensiert sind (Video Streams, TV Serien, Youtube Videos etc.). Die Shellfire Box verbirgt zuverlässig deinen tatsächlichen Standort und deine IP Adresse vor neugierigen Augen im Internet!

Plug And Play

Ein großer Unterschied zwischen der Shellfire Box und anderen Produkten ist, dass wir sie für den durchschnittlichen Internetnutzer designen, der nicht viel über Datensicherheit und Verschlüsselung weiß. Einmal mit dem Internet verbunden, konfiguriert sie sich selbst und verbindet sich automatisch. Das heißt, du brauchst absolut Null Expertenwissen, um die Shellfire Box zu nutzen! Ein simples Webinterface erlaubt es dir, jederzeit deinen VPN Server zu wechseln. Auch Nerds brauchen sich jedoch keine Sorgen zu machen. Aktiviere einfach das fortgeschrittene Interface und dir steht die volle Power von Linux Netzwerktools zur Verfügung!

Keine Tricks

Wie all unsere Clientsoftware, wird auch die Firmware der Shellfire Box als Open Source veröffentlicht und alle Verbindungen werden über OpenVPN hergestellt. Laut deutscher Gesetzgebung sind wir nicht zum führen von Daten- / IP-Logs verpflichtet, also tun wir es auch nicht.

Die Shellfire Box in den Medien

 Security Insider

Was Bekomme Ich?

- Die Shellfire Box

- Einen Shellfire VPN Premium Plus Zugang für 1 bzw. 2 Jahre

- Vollen Zugriff auf unsere High Speed Server in 29 Ländern

FAQ

Wer seid ihr?

Wir sind Florian und Max. Zusammen betreiben wir Shellfire seit über 12 Jahren und haben in dieser Zeit verschiedene Hostingservices für Endverbraucher angeboten.


Warum macht ihr das alles?

Weil wir daran glauben, dass das Internet ein Ort der Freiheit und gleichzeitig ein sicherer Platz für private Daten sein sollte.

Brauche ich ein Shellfire VPN Abo, um die Shellfire Box zu nutzen?

Die Shellfire Box kommt inklusive 1 oder 2 Jahren Shellfire VPN PremiumPlus (es sei denn, du wählst den "Returning Customer" Perk). Wenn diese Zeit abläuft und du keine kostenpflichtige Verlängerung möchtest, wird die Shellfire Box jedoch nicht nutzlos. Du wirst in diesem Fall einfach auf unsere kostenlosen Server herabgestuft. Hier sind Downloadgeschwindigkeit und Serverauswahl beschränkt.

Kann man Shellfire VPN auch ohne Shellfire Box nutzen?

Natürlich! Besuche einfach https://www.shellfire.de/vpn/ , um unsere kostenlosen und einfachen Apps für Windows, Mac OS und Android Geräte herunterzuladen! Andere Geräte, auf denen iOS, Linux etc. läuft, werden über Drittanbietersoftware oder im Betriebssystem integrierte VPN Clients unterstützt.

Was ist der Unterschied zwischen der Shellfire Box und anderen Produkten wie der Anonabox, Invizbox etc.?

Die Shellfire Box nutzt VPN (Virtual Private Network) Technologie, um eine schnelle und sichere Verbindung zu unseren Servern herzustellen. Im Gegensatz zu anderen VPN Routern kommt die Shellfire Box vorkonfiguriert und benötigt keinerlei Expertenwissen! :) Die meisten ähnlichen Produkte nutzen das Tor Netzwerk statt VPN. Tor ist zwar eine gute Möglichkeit, seine Privatsphäre zu schützen, allerdings sind die Verbindungen oftmals sehr langsam und es ist nicht immer einfach möglich, zensierte und blockierte Dienste, die nur in bestimmten Ländern verfügbar sind, gezielt zu entsperren.

Wie kann ich die Einstellungen der Shellfire Box ändern?

Die Box kommt vorkonfiguriert und ist sofort nach dem Einstöpseln einsatzbereit. Um zu einem anderen VPN Server zu wechseln, logge dich einfach über deinen Browser ins einfach zu bedienende Webinterface ein. Für Profieinstellungen (z.B. für Netzwerke mit festen IP Adressen), steht ein fortgeschrittenes Webinterface zur Verfügung.

Wann bekomme ich meine Shellfire Box?

Die Shellfire Box ist da! Alle Bestellungen werden an Werktagen innerhalb von 24h verschickt!

Kann ich meinen Shellfire VPN Account auch schon nutzen, bevor ich die Box bekomme?

Ja! Du kannst Shellfire VPN direkt nach der Bestellung auch ohne die Box schon schon auf deinem Computer oder Smartphone/Tablet installieren und nutzen.

Was sind die technischen Daten?

Die Shellfire Box basiert auf Nexx WT3020 Router Hardware und läuft mit einer modifizierten openwrt Firmware.

  • System-On-Chip: MediaTek MT7620n
  • CPU Speed: 580MHz
  • RAM memory: 64 MB DDR
  • Wired network: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps (switched)
  • Ethernet chip: MediaTek MT7530 (SoC)
  • Ethernet switch: MediaTek MT7530 (integrated)
  • Wireless network: 2.4 GHz 802.11b/g/n MiMo 2x2:2
  • Wireless chip: MediaTek RT5390 (SoC)

Welche Verschlüsselungstechnologie nutzt die Shellfire Box?
Wir werden OpenVPN mit AES Verschlüsselung nutzen, Experten betrachten dies als eine der sichersten Technologien, die es gibt.

Mit welchen Downloadgeschwindigkeiten kann ich rechnen?
Wir optimieren hier noch. Derzeit erreichen wir unter perfekten Bedingungen etwa 13 Mbit/s, was für Videostreaming ausreichend ist. Wir versuchen diese Zahl noch zu erhöhen, allerdings solltest du keine 50 Mbit/s erwarten, da Verschlüsselung immer sehr hardwareintensiv ist.

Gibt es mehr Bilder/Videos/Details?
Du solltest regelmäßig auf dieser Seite vorbeischauen, da wir bald weitere Updates posten werden! Folge uns auch auf Facebook, Twitter und Google Plus, um als einer der ersten Bescheid zu wissen, wenn es Neuigkeiten gibt!

Wird es möglich sein, die Shellfire Box auch zu OpenVPN Servern anderer Anbieter zu verbinden?

Dies wird für fortgeschrittene Anwender definitiv möglich sein, erfordert jedoch auch auf der Shellfire Box fortgeschrittene technisches Fähigkeiten. Unser Fokus bei der Shellfire Box liegt auf der ultimativ einfachen Bedienung. Niemand sollte sich mit IP-Adressen und Zertifikaten rumschlagen müssen, um sicher surfen zu können, sondern lediglich die Box einstecken und zum Wlan verbinden.

Kann die Shellfire Box auch per WLAN mit dem Internet verbunden werden?

Das wird leider nicht möglich sein, da wir dafür einen zweiten WLAN Chip bräuchten, der in unserer Hardware nicht vorhanden ist. Es würde außerdem das Setup der Box viel komplizierter machen. Wenn du unterwegs bist, kannst du deine Geräte einfach direkt über unsere kostenlosen Apps für Windows, Mac OS und Android mit Shellfire VPN verbinden. Dann musst du die Shellfire Box nicht immer dabei haben.

Kann ich meinen Shellfire VPN Account nutzen, bevor ich die Shellfire Box bekomme?

Ja! Wenn diese Kampagne abgelaufen ist, werden wir deinen Account aktivieren so dass du Shellfire VPN nutzen kannst, bevor wir die Box verschicken.

Ist Shellfire VPN auch auf anderen Geräten verfügbar?

Ja! Derzeit haben wir eigene Apps für Windows, Mac OS und Android. Andere Geräte (Linux, iOS etc.) können aber ebenfalls verbunden werden, entweder über Apps von Drittanbietern oder über eingebaute VPN Funktionen. Sag uns einfach bescheid, falls du Fragen zu deinem Gerät hast!

Wie kann ich helfen, damit die Shellfire Box Wirklichkeit wird?
Um uns zu unterstützen, poste diese Kampagne bitter bei Facebook, Twitter und Google Plus! Natürlich ist die beste Unterstützung, wenn du dir selbst eine Shellfire Box reservierst.
Hast du weitere Fragen oder Kommentare? Schreib uns einfach in den Kommentaren oder kontaktiere uns via https://www.shellfire.de/kontakt/ !

Natürlich! Besuche einfach https://www.shellfire.de/vpn/ , um unsere kostenlosen und einfachen Apps für Windows, Mac OS und Android Geräte herunterzuladen! Andere Geräte, auf denen iOS, Linux etc. läuft, werden über Drittanbietersoftware oder im Betriebssystem integrierte VPN Clients unterstützt.
Was ist der Unterschied zwischen der Shellfire Box und anderen Produkten wie der Anonabox, Invizbox etc.?
Die Shellfire Box nutzt VPN (Virtual Private Network) Technologie, um eine schnelle und sichere Verbindung zu unseren Servern herzustellen. Im Gegensatz zu anderen VPN Routern kommt die Shellfire Box vorkonfiguriert und benötigt keinerlei Expertenwissen! :) Die meisten ähnlichen Produkte nutzen das Tor Netzwerk statt VPN. Tor ist zwar eine gute Möglichkeit, seine Privatsphäre zu schützen, allerdings sind die Verbindungen oftmals sehr langsam und es ist nicht immer einfach möglich, zensierte und blockierte Dienste, die nur in bestimmten Ländern verfügbar sind, gezielt zu entsperren.
Wie kann ich die Einstellungen der Shellfire Box ändern?
Die Box kommt vorkonfiguriert und ist sofort nach dem Einstöpseln einsatzbereit. Um zu einem anderen VPN Server zu wechseln, logge dich einfach über deinen Browser ins einfach zu bedienende Webinterface ein. Für Profieinstellungen (z.B. für Netzwerke mit festen IP Adressen), steht ein fortgeschrittenes Webinterface zur Verfügung.
Wann bekomme ich meine Shellfire Box?
Die Shellfire Box ist da! Alle Bestellungen werden an Werktagen innerhalb von 24h verschickt!

Kann ich meinen Shellfire VPN Account auch schon nutzen, bevor ich die Box bekomme?
Ja! Du kannst Shellfire VPN direkt nach der Bestellung auch ohne die Box schon schon auf deinem Computer oder Smartphone/Tablet installieren und nutzen.
Was sind die technischen Daten?
Die Shellfire Box basiert auf Nexx WT3020 Router Hardware und läuft mit einer modifizierten openwrt Firmware.



System-On-Chip: MediaTek MT7620n


CPU Speed: 580MHz


RAM memory: 64 MB DDR


Wired network: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps (switched)


Ethernet chip: MediaTek MT7530 (SoC)


Ethernet switch: MediaTek MT7530 (integrated)


Wireless network: 2.4 GHz 802.11b/g/n MiMo 2x2:2

Wireless chip: MediaTek RT5390 (SoC)


Welche Verschlüsselungstechnologie nutzt die Shellfire Box?

Wir werden OpenVPN mit AES Verschlüsselung nutzen, Experten betrachten dies als eine der sichersten Technologien, die es gibt.Mit welchen Downloadgeschwindigkeiten kann ich rechnen?

Wir optimieren hier noch. Derzeit erreichen wir unter perfekten Bedingungen etwa 13 Mbit/s, was für Videostreaming ausreichend ist. Wir versuchen diese Zahl noch zu erhöhen, allerdings solltest du keine 50 Mbit/s erwarten, da Verschlüsselung immer sehr hardwareintensiv ist.Gibt es mehr Bilder/Videos/Details?

Du solltest regelmäßig auf dieser Seite vorbeischauen, da wir bald weitere Updates posten werden! Folge uns auch auf Facebook, Twitter und Google Plus, um als einer der ersten Bescheid zu wissen, wenn es Neuigkeiten gibt!



Wird es möglich sein, die Shellfire Box auch zu OpenVPN Servern anderer Anbieter zu verbinden?
Dies wird für fortgeschrittene Anwender definitiv möglich sein, erfordert jedoch auch auf der Shellfire Box fortgeschrittene technisches Fähigkeiten. Unser Fokus bei der Shellfire Box liegt auf der ultimativ einfachen Bedienung. Niemand sollte sich mit IP-Adressen und Zertifikaten rumschlagen müssen, um sicher surfen zu können, sondern lediglich die Box einstecken und zum Wlan verbinden.

Kann die Shellfire Box auch per WLAN mit dem Internet verbunden werden?
Das wird leider nicht möglich sein, da wir dafür einen zweiten WLAN Chip bräuchten, der in unserer Hardware nicht vorhanden ist. Es würde außerdem das Setup der Box viel komplizierter machen. Wenn du unterwegs bist, kannst du deine Geräte einfach direkt über unsere kostenlosen Apps für Windows, Mac OS und Android mit Shellfire VPN verbinden. Dann musst du die Shellfire Box nicht immer dabei haben.
Kann ich meinen Shellfire VPN Account nutzen, bevor ich die Shellfire Box bekomme?
Ja! Wenn diese Kampagne abgelaufen ist, werden wir deinen Account aktivieren so dass du Shellfire VPN nutzen kannst, bevor wir die Box verschicken.
Ist Shellfire VPN auch auf anderen Geräten verfügbar?
Ja! Derzeit haben wir eigene Apps für Windows, Mac OS und Android. Andere Geräte (Linux, iOS etc.) können aber ebenfalls verbunden werden, entweder über Apps von Drittanbietern oder über eingebaute VPN Funktionen. Sag uns einfach bescheid, falls du Fragen zu deinem Gerät hast!
Wie kann ich helfen, damit die Shellfire Box Wirklichkeit wird?

Um uns zu unterstützen, poste diese Kampagne bitter bei Facebook, Twitter und Google Plus! Natürlich ist die beste Unterstützung, wenn du dir selbst eine Shellfire Box reservierst.

Hast du weitere Fragen oder Kommentare? Schreib uns einfach in den Kommentaren oder kontaktiere uns via https://www.shellfire.de/kontakt/ !

story:
A few months ago, while searching for new office desk lamps, we came upon a (rather disappointing really) fact: although there were some extraordinary modern lamps “out there”, extremely stylish and full of features, there was no affordable and trusted way to acquire them.

Actually, our search bore more fruits than we expected: table lamps solutions perfect for every modern living- & work-space, be it a bedroom, an office or a hotel room. We discovered mass producers of high-quality, low-consumption, eco-friendly LED lamps, which can vary their lighting depending on our needs, and allow us to charge our mobile devices on the same time!

So, the idea of iLux was born: to establish an e-shop and bring the average European (at least) consumer closer to such state-of-the-art lighting solutions. To make it easy to find, explore, and buy modern lamps at low prices, without the fuss of import costs, long transport times and from dubious wholesale resellers. We started searching for a site like ilux, and we ended up developing such a site ourselves for the rest of the world. 

  See the Greek version here >>


iLux is a start-up Company, aiming at bringing innovative Lighting technologies to the mass market of Greece, Europe, and beyond. Our purpose: locate noteworthy advancements in the world lighting industry and make them available at reduced prices to the European consumer. We are not interested in all forms of lamps or lighting technology – iLux focuses on smart, innovative and energy-saving solutions, which work in harmony with other household appliances.

As a matter of hand, we are especially proud of our first choice in a product line, the iLux Smart Lamps. The Smart Desk Lamp line completely embodies iLux philosophy, as they are lighting products designed to promote quality of life and increase work production.


We had the idea, and now we need your contribution to kick off this venture. Your support will ensure the necessary funds, not only to design and build iLux as an appropriate e-commerce platform, but also to make our first extensive wholesale order of Smart Desk Lamps.

Moreover, this campaign will act as an unofficial poll, to let us know if people are actually interested in what we consider super cool –that is, smart lamps- and if so, towards which particular models they gravitate.

Last but not least – we want people to HELP us make iLux into the e-shop they always wanted. We want suggestions, criticism, user input, beta testing – anything that can make iLux better.


We introduce the European and world market to “Smart” Desk Lamps - that is, desk lamps which epitomize everything the contemporary user has come to expect from his or her appliances.

The iLUX Desk Lamps line is based on eco-friendly, high-output LED Lighting, utilizing modern technological advances.

Features include touch panel controls, level of brightness adjustment, variation of modes depending on the current use (reading, studying, relaxing, or sleeping), smart phone charging and docking, multi-pivot flexible positioning to cover every area of a desk (or to fold in an unobtrusive position when not needed).

In short, a “smart” desk lamp, able to correspond to its users’ needs.

All in the form of an elegant, sleek design with a premium finish, exhibiting an impressive built quality.

iLUX Smart Desk Lamps’ Capabilities and Advantages:

  • All iLux Lamps facilitate smartphone charging while you are working or resting: either through a USB port, or by acting as Smartphone docking stations for the most popular smartphones on the market – including iPhone 4 and 5, and all Android phones.


  • The LED lamp colour output can run the whole gamut of “white” light colour, from “warm white” at Correlated Colour Temperature (CCT) of 2700K (Kelvin degrees), up to CCT of 6500K, emulating daylight.  Also, the light brightness can vary from a low 60 Lux to a full 1000 Lux Bright.

  • These particular LED Lamps are so technologically advanced, that they achieve over 90 on the CRI (Colour Rendering Index), regarding the fidelity in portraying Colours as they really are – a value normally reserved for natural sunlight.
  • The  27 LED Lamp is covered with state-of-the-art Diffuser Lens. Looking directly at the desk lamp by mistake while working or reading will no longer produce any glare effect or “white spots” for your eyes.
  • On the other hand, the lamp works at a power input of barely 11 Watts, making it up to 60% more energy efficient as compared to relevant fluorescent desk lamps. In particular, the offered Brightness can be compared with the output of a 100W Incandescent bulb, a 40W Fluorescent bulb or a 20W CFL. But the iLux lamps not only offer huge energy savings in comparison with these lamps, but also have nil flickering (as opposed to the 60Hz of Incandescent and Fluorescent bulbs and 35Hz of CFL) and can last 10 times more, for a lifetime of 50,000 hours (as opposed to the expected 1,000 hours of a normal bulb and the 5,000 hours of Fluorescent bulbs).

iLUX Smart Desk Lamps’ Features analysed:

  • With just a touch on the pad, iLUX Desk Lamps can be switched between four (4) different modes of operation, according to the situation at hand and concurrent user needs. The four preset Modes take adventage of the lamp’s versatility and change the LED Lamp colour and brightness level to the proper values best suited to either Read Mode, Study Mode, Relax Mode, or Sleep (night) Mode:
  1. Read Mode: a natural, brighter White light at a temperature of 4,300K to 5,300K, suitable for easy reading, memorising, computer input, taking notes, and related desk work.
  2. Study Mode: an intense, cool White colour at a temperature of 6,000K to 7,000K, emulating daylight, therefore best suited to concentration, focusing and studying.
  3. Relax Mode: a cosier, warmer White light at a temperature around 3,000K, with the familiar soft glow of indoors lighting, just right for relaxation, light reading and good company.
  4. Sleep Mode: a variation of warm White light at 2,700-3,000K but at a much lower brightness, suitable as a night light or for a bit of reading in bed.


  • Each Lamp stand is designed to facilitate Smartphone charging. You can charge your device either through an included USB port, or –depending on the model- on the dedicated Smartphone charging docks for the most popular Smartphones on the market: Apple iPhone 4, iPhone 5, Samsung Galaxy series, HTC, Sony and all Android smartphones (microUSB port).  The Lamps act as charging docks through seamless and innovative design. Note however, that the USB charging is best suited for smartphones, and not for larger mobile devices like iPads, since its output does not exceed 700mA - they will charge, but very slowly. 
  • User control through an elegant LED touch panel, with one-touch power on/off, timer set, 4 modes control and brightness level slider.
  • 9 steps of lamp brightness (5 steps in iLUX LL01), through a slide touch control. Depending on the Mode (Sleep, Relax, Study, Read), brightness can be set through the touch slider to vary from a mere 60 lux (for night Sleep mode) to an impressive 1000 lux (to read or study modes). 


  • The Timer selection on the LED Panel will turn off the lamp automatically after 60 minutes – works great with the Sleep mode during night time, as the lamp will shut down by itself if you fall asleep!


iLUX LL01

USB power port,  4 modes smart control (study/read/relax/ sleep), 5 steps brightness on led panel,  Timer auto-off, one touch power on/off, anti-glare design by diffuser lens, 90 CRI, 60% power saving compared to fluorescent desk lamps, 50000 hours life span. Available in Piano Black or Satin White.


iLUX LL02

iPhone 4S/3GS & iPod touch docking station (charging only), USB power port,  4 modes smart control (study/read/relax/ sleep), 9 steps brightness slider control,  Timer auto-off, one touch power on/off, anti-glare design by diffuser lens, 90 CRI, 60% power saving compared to fluorescent desk lamps, 50000 hours life span. Available in Piano Black or Satin White.

iLUX LL03

iPhone 5/5S/5C Lighting docking station (charging only), USB power port,  4 modes smart control (study/read/relax/ sleep), 9 steps brightness slider control,  Timer auto-off, one touch power on/off, anti-glare design by diffuser lens, 90 CRI, 60% power saving compared to fluorescent desk lamps, 50000 hours life span. Available in Piano Black or Satin White.


iLUX LL04

Android Micro USB docking station (charging only), USB power port,  4 modes smart control (study/read/relax/ sleep), 9 steps brightness slider control,  Timer auto-off, one touch power on/off, anti-glare design by diffuser lens, 90 CRI, 60% power saving compared to fluorescent desk lamps, 50000 hours life span. Available in Piano Black or Satin White.


Technical Specifications:

Since the input voltage is a universal 100-240V, people living in the UK or the US will only need a simple EU to UK/US plug adapter

Shipping is included for free to all destinations in Greece. All preorder prices include VAT and any other taxes. All desk lamp preorders include the iLux-ious Discount perk coupon (minus €20 on your next buy). 

*When preordering for destinations in Cyprus, the Balkans (Albania, Bulgaria, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Croatia, Montenegro, Romania, Serbia, FYROM) and Turkey, you have to add €10 for extra shipping costs. You can do this either by adding €10 to your pledge when preordering, or (preferred) by sending us the extra cost directly through PayPal.

**When preordering for the rest of Europe (Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, France, Finland, Germany, Great Britain, Holland, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland), you have to add €18 (around £14) for extra shipping costs. You can do this either by adding €18 to your pledge when preordering, or (preferred) by sending us the extra cost directly through PayPal.

***When preordering for the US and the rest of the World, you have to add €20 (around $27) for extra shipping costs and customs declarations. You can do this either by adding €20 to your pledge when preordering, or (preferred) by sending us the extra cost directly through PayPal. This cost does not include any local import taxes.


Angela is an economics major and the lighting expert of iLux. Being an executive manager for a prominent producer of architectural lighting features, she has over 20 years of experience both in the fields of lighting and business management. Her expertise lies in importing and exporting wholesale goods, invaluable for the fulfillment part of this campaign, as well as the logistics of iLux.gr

George is an engineer, and also dabbles in website development. He will be the administrator of iLux.gr running the everyday support of the eshop. He is also the crowdfunding “fanboy” behind the campaign, as he has contributed in 14 campaigns on IndieGogo and supported over 130 campaigns at Kickstarter. His experiences –good and bad- with other campaigns ensure that most things will run smoothly before, during and after this one.

Funds allocation chart:


The project funding will allow iLux to commence its business with the first series of products. We have already secured our domain name (www.ilux.gr), and have ordered multiple samples from the desk lamp manufacturer, which we have tested thoroughly for more than 5 months (!). Now it’s time to ask for your contribution. On the other hand, it's also time to give our future customers from Greece, Europe and all over the world, the chance to participate in formulating out first batch of imports, and be the first to get our iLUX lamps at extremely competitive pricing (check out our Perks!).


This project regards starting a business – and as with any venture, risks are involved. In order for this project to succeed, and for iLux to become a reality, we have tried to identify and take measures for a number of risks:

Overall management issues - the project may fund, but we may mismanage the funds or never launch the eshop: we can only point out to our extensive managerial experience in business, and the fact that we have already been working in the field of wholesale for over 25 years now. We have a healthy business model, a valid fund allocation with room for overhead, and we have already planned all the next steps, like finding a hosting provider, securing the domain name and testing various software.

The project may not fund: we have already accounted for this probability, and while we may reconsider the eshop idea, our supporters will get their rewards no matter what, even if the project relies on “flexible” founding.

Delays: Regarding the reward delivery times, the only delays lie on the supplier, as we do not produce locally. To counter this, we have selected a trustworthy supplier, and we have already ordered many sample products to gauge delivery times. Also, the supplier has huge stock of all the lamps we plan to give as rewards, although the delivery times given on the rewards take into account the worst case scenario of producing from the scratch. Even so, to further tackle shipping delays, we plan on posting orders before the campaign is over, if we have a big enough quantity of orders. As for shipping delays, we have more than 20 years in import and export experience of goods, having faced every possible problems with customs, carriers, shipping methods, logistics, accounting and strict project deadlines – therefore we will send them in time!

Regarding the final iLux launch, we have already taken steps to secure hosting and domain name for the site, so it will launch as soon as we build the appropriate platform.

Product quality: since we do not produce the lamps ourselves in order to run quality assurance, we have ordered six different samples, and tested them thoroughly for 6 months now, to be sure of their quality - and they have performed admirably. However, all the lamps have 1 year guarantee.


You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help us create iLux! 

  • Just tell your friends of our awesome products, if you think they would be interested! Give them a short link for this campaign: http://igg.me/at/ilux/x/4544912
  • Use those icons below to like us on facebook, follow us on twitter and make some noise by sharing!
  • Register your email to our beta website www.ilux.gr to get regular updates and offers!
  • Even choosing the lowest (1 euro) perk will help us gain popularity! (and get you a small discount in the process)
  • Do not hesitate to post any questions you may have to ilux@ilux.gr

measures for a number of risks:

fund, but we may mismanage the funds or never launch the eshop: we
can only point out to our extensive managerial experience in business, and the
fact that we have already been working in the field of wholesale for over 25 years now.
We have a healthy business model, a valid fund allocation with room for
overhead, and we have already planned all the next steps, like finding a
hosting provider, securing the domain name and testing various software.
The project may not fund: we have already accounted for this probability, and while we may reconsider the eshop idea, our
supporters will get their rewards no matter what, even if the project relies on “flexible”
founding.
Delays: Regarding the reward delivery
times, the only delays lie on the supplier, as we do not produce locally. To
counter this, we have selected a trustworthy supplier, and we have already ordered
many sample products to gauge delivery times. Also, the supplier has huge stock
of all the lamps we plan to give as rewards, although the delivery times given on
the rewards take into account the worst case scenario of producing from the
scratch. Even so, to further tackle shipping delays, we plan on posting orders
before the campaign is over, if we have a big enough quantity of orders. As for
shipping delays, we have more than 20 years in import and export experience of
goods, having faced every possible problems with customs, carriers, shipping
methods, logistics, accounting and strict project deadlines – therefore we will
send them in time!
Regarding the final iLux launch, we have
already taken steps to secure hosting and domain name for the site, so it will
launch as soon as we build the appropriate platform.Product quality: since we do not produce the lamps ourselves in order to run quality assurance, we have ordered six different samples, and tested them thoroughly for 6 months now, to be sure of their quality - and they have performed admirably. However, all the lamps have 1 year guarantee.You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help us create iLux! 

Just tell your friends of our awesome products, if you think they would be interested! Give them a short link for this campaign: http://igg.me/at/ilux/x/4544912


Use those icons below to like us on facebook, follow us on twitter and make some noise by sharing!

Register your email to our beta website www.ilux.gr to get regular updates and offers!
Even choosing the lowest (1 euro) perk will help us gain popularity! (and get you a small discount in the process)
Do not hesitate to post any questions you may have to ilux@ilux.gr

story:
Public Press Release:

http://www.geeky-gadgets.com/diizign-adjustable...

http://thegadgetflow.com/portfolio/diizign-fold...

http://www.wafb.com/story/34654467/news

http://www.wbrc.com/story/34654467/news

http://www.newschannel6now.com/story/34654467/news

Please indicate the "color" when ordering!

Risks and challenges

We've successfully created and brought many products to the market from the concept, design, prototyping and managing volume production to final products packaging.

Our teams specialize in product design, mold design, production management and quality control. The entire product cycle has been monitored in-house with production highly controlled at every step. We have spent time refining the processes and finding the best solutions for the highest quality product. Our end product reflects our work and dedication to this cause.

Quality control is our highest priority at all production steps and will never be compromised. From prototyping to small volume production, we have maintained the highest standards from the start.

Finally, we pledge to be transparent to our supporters and customers. We value customer satisfaction and look to provide timely updates about this campaign. We always welcome your feedback and advice.

story:
What is a house without lights, a car not able to blink or a lighthouse with…well just dark bricks? LIGHT STAX brings LED light into the world of bricks like LEGO® and MEGA BLOKS®. Each brick contains a powerful LED. You can use them to build imaginative light creations and you can also use them to light up your own collection of building blocks. LIGHT STAX comes in a wide range of both solid and transparent colors. They work without wires and have multiple lighting modes, but it can also be used with extension cables. Just imagine the possibilities!

LIGHT STAX come to life when you build them onto Power STAX. It may look like a regular 2x4 brick but... look again! It has a micro USB connector and a small switch on the side. Plug in a USB cable and connect it to your smart phone adapter, laptop or power bank. LIGHT STAX has 3 light options: instant on, blinking or glowing. But there is more! In this wireless world we wanted to get rid of cables so we designed a cute little 4x4 stud Lithium Polymer brick. One of these battery bricks will light a STAX for almost 50 hours and can be recharged over and over again. No need for batteries! You can build with LIGHT STAX any way you like. No matter how many studs you connect, the bricks will pass on the light. We offer extension cables as well to reach far and hidden places.

LIGHT STAX is part of the STAX system family and will continue to surprise. The first born was a bigger version of LIGHT STAX (JUNIOR). They were launched in 2014 as LED building bricks on DUPLO® scale. The new smaller offspring will include exciting items like SOUND STAX, SENSOR STAX, MOTOR STAX and more. All of these will become available as fully compatible 2x4 and 4x4 stud bricks. We may also develop other LIGHT STAX brick sizes. Let us know what kind of LIGHT STAX you would like to see as we take your feedback very seriously!

The first in line after LIGHT STAX, will be the SOUND STAX. With SOUND STAX you can record and play real sounds. So, do you want to have a brick dog that barks like your own, a brick car with the sound of a real Ferrari or a brick figure that sounds like your biggest hero? Then hop on the STAX train and extend your brick world.

  • Lights up your brick world - for kids and adults alike
  • No batteries needed (use our LiPo 4x4 brick or USB power)
  • One power source can light up more than 500 LIGHT STAX
  • No wires necessary but with extension cables you can reach far and hidden places.
  • 100% compatible with all major brick brands
  • High quality proven concept (years of development behind us)
  • Great value for money

We created a nice range of backer rewards, but are open to suggestions. We take your feedback very seriously, so when you would like to see another type of reward just let us know!

The LIGHT STAX Starter Pack includes 50 pcs LIGHT STAX served to your liking (free choice of 2x2 and 2x4 STAX in any regular or transparent color - survey @ end of campaign) plus 2 pcs EXTENSION STAX 0.5 m, a USB Cable 0.8 and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. In total you will receive 54 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

Build a beautiful LIGHT STAX Butterfly. This reward includes 74 pcs 2x4 Transparent Stax, a USB Cable 0.8 m and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 76 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

As a special, we will produce a unique LIGHT STAX Street Lamp. This reward includes 4 special LAMP STAX, 50 pcs LIGHT STAX served to your liking (free choice of 2x2 and 2x4 STAX in any regular or transparent color - survey @ end of campaign) plus 4 pcs EXTENSION STAX 0.5 m, a USB Cable 0.8 and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 60 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

This Bulk Pack includes 100 pcs LIGHT STAX served to your liking (free choice of 2x2 and 2x4 STAX in any regular or transparent color - survey @ end of campaign) plus 2 pcs EXTENSION STAX 0.5 m, a USB Cable 0.8 and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 104 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

Build this iconic Rock Guitar in LIGHT STAX. This reward includes 72 pcs 2x4 Regular STAX, 29 pcs 2x4 Transparent STAX, 28 pcs 2x2 Regular STAX, a USB Cable 0.8 m and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 131 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

This Bulk Pack really gets your family started. This reward includes 250 pcs LIGHT STAX served to your liking (free choice of 2x2 and 2x4 STAX in any regular or transparent color - survey @ end of campaign) plus 4 pcs EXTENSION STAX 0.5 m, a USB Cable 0.8 and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 256 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

This Fan Pack includes everything you need to illumunate modular buildings or any other big project you're working on. And when your hunger for light is still not satisfied, feel free to take more Packs! The reward includes 10 unique LAMP STAX, 250 pcs LIGHT STAX served to your liking (free choice of 2x2 and 2x4 STAX in any regular or transparent color - survey @ end of campaign) plus 10 pcs EXTENSION STAX 0.5 m, a USB Cable 0.8 and a 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 272 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

LIGHT STAX works really well for schools. With this reward you can design a STEM project all students will like! The Class Pack includes 1000 pcs LIGHT STAX served to your liking (free choice of 2x2 and 2x4 STAX in any regular or transparent color - survey @ end of campaign) plus 8 pcs EXTENSION STAX 0.5 m, 2 pcs USB Cable 0.8 m and 2 pcs 4x4 Mobile Power STAX. You will receive a total of 1012 Parts. Will be shipped in September.

In 2010 the bright idea for LIGHT STAX is born in the head of Johnny from Taiwan and he has been improving it ever since.

Early 2012 Johnny shows the first prototypes of LIGHT STAX JUNIOR (a DUPLO® size building block) at the world’s biggest Toy Fair in Nürnberg. This is where Arno from Brandtraders in the Netherlands meets Johnny for the first time. They share a passion for LEGO and toy innovation. Thomas from Abanico in Germany, being a friend of Johnny, is asked to help getting LIGHT STAX onto the European market.

In 2014 Johnny, Thomas, Stefan (also from Abanico) and Arno find each other in preparing a launch in Europe. Finally...the market release of LIGHT STAX JUNIOR!

In 2015 and 2016 the team from Taiwan, Germany and the Netherlands works even more closely together to get the new LEGO® scale LIGHT STAX ready. So, here we are! 

 

The original bigger size LIGHT STAX (now usually referred to as LIGHT STAX JUNIOR) already received numerous awards that we are proud of. It’s been a New York Toy Fair favorite and it was nominated Best of Toy Fair. Last year the awards just kept coming in. We think that the new brick scale LIGHT STAX may be an even bigger prize winner!

 

LEGO® and DUPLO® are trademarks of the LEGO Group of companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse Indiegogo or this project.
