story:
Privacy and security is a growing concern for many people. We created Flter to make privacy and security more accessible and easier to use by providing coverage that works seamlessly across all internet connected devices.

Flter is a network device that provides VPN protection, malicious ad blocking, and anonymity networking. Flter works at the router level so you don’t have to install software on every device you use. This is great for devices that don’t support these applications like gaming consoles, smart TVs, and media players. All you have to do is connect to Flter via WiFi or Ethernet.

Our goal was to make a product that anyone can use, not just the tech savvy. With Flter, you can just set it and forget it. Once Flter is set up it can be left alone, and Flter works seamlessly on all the devices in your home. It’s the perfect device for everyone.

A Virtual Private Network (VPN) is a secure connection between your computer and another computer over their internet. This connection encrypts all of your incoming and outgoing web traffic so no one, not even your internet provider, can see your online activity. Our servers act as middlemen that hide your IP address from the websites you visit and the services you use.

“I don’t have anything to hide”

As I've debated this issue around the world, every single time somebody has said to me, 'I don't really worry about invasions of privacy because I don't have anything to hide,' I always say the same thing to them. 

I get out a pen. I write down my email address. I say, 'Here's my email address. What I want you to do when you get home is email me the passwords to all of your email accounts, not just the nice, respectable work one in your name, but all of them, because I want to be able to just troll through what it is you're doing online, read what I want to read and publish whatever I find interesting. After all, if you're not a bad person, if you're doing nothing wrong, you should have nothing to hide.' 

Not a single person has taken me up on that offer. I check that email account religiously all the time. It's a very desolate place.”

-Glenn Greenwald

We believe you shouldn’t have to trade privacy and security for a great user experience. We’ve been working for the past year to integrate our VPN and Flter so that they work seamlessly together. We offer full peer to peer support and unlimited bandwidth. We have servers in over 20 countries to provide near-instant connection and fast speeds. You’ll never notice it’s there. Our service also includes Tor bridge relay and socks5 proxy. Every reward tier comes with a year of our VPN service. You can use our VPN with Flter and on any of your devices while not at home.

We want to emphasize the fact that we don’t keep any logs on user web activity and all of the traffic through our network is encrypted. Read about our stance on privacy.

Flter does however support OpenVPN, OpenConnect, L2TP/IPsec if you prefer to use your own VPN service.

Flter maintains lists of malicious websites, harmful ad networks, trackers, malware, and telemetry services. Flter automatically blocks any incoming connections these services try to make. Infected advertising is a huge threat, but with Flter you’ll never see a malicious ad again. You can create your own lists or whitelist sites to support your favorite content providers. Parents can also create their own lists if they wish to block certain websites from their family network. 

For ease of use all block lists and security features are kept up to date automatically. You can turn this off at anytime. 

The Flter app for iOS and Android, and the web interface, allows you to switch between connection modes or configure more advanced settings. 

Flter couldn’t be easier to set up. Flter works with any router/modem. To run all of your network traffic through Flter, connect it between your modem and router. Plug in the power and you’re all set, Flter will start working automatically and can be configured within the app. To connect to Flter as a separate WiFi access point plug Flter into an ethernet-out port of your router or modem. For easy VPN protection switch between your home router’s WiFi and Flter’s. In relay mode Flter can connect to your home WiFi and extend the range for a stronger WiFi signal.

Once connected you can operate Flter entirely from the app or web interface. Touch the slider and Flter will automatically connect to the closest region. If you want to connect to a specific region to get around geographic restrictions select the region of choice. Flter will connect all of your devices to the selected region.

 

Founded in 2015, our company consists of four talented and passionate team members all with the same vision: providing people with peace-of-mind and security on the internet. As we began digging deeper into problems linked with data collection the primary challenge we tackled was how to make privacy and security simple and protect all internet connected devices. Read more about us here.

We have a great idea, and a great team working to make Flter the best it can be, but we need your help. With your support we’ll be able to bring Flter to market and make it available for everyone. We are raising $50,000 to meet manufacturing requirements and volume in order to mass produce Flter and make it affordable. We have suppliers and manufactures in Shenzhen China ready to start production, all we need is you.

Together, we can make Flter a reality. With your support, we truly believe we can achieve our goal, to make your online experience, yours again.

Pictures of our manufacturer in Shenzhen China:

FAQ

 

Do you allow peer-to-peer torrenting? 

Yes, you can download torrents on every single server!

 

Can I use other VPN providers with my Flter device? 

Yes you can! Flter supports OpenVPN andL2TP/IPsec if you prefer to use your own VPN service.

 

Will your lifetime VPN subscription be available later?

Unfortunately not, the lifetime tier is a special promotion that will not be available for much longer.

 

What are Flter's specs? 

Power: DC 5v/1.2A, Data Transfer: (direct up to 100mbps) (VPN up to 30mbps), WiFi: 802.11n 2.4Ghz, Coverage: 900 square feet.

 

Have more questions? 

Please email us at hello@flter.me 
 

Risks and challenges

Coordinating with manufacturers to bring Flter from prototype to production may be challenging. We have prepared for this by speaking with the manufacturing companies we will be using ahead of time to get a clear idea of what the process will be like so most potential issues have already been assessed. Building computer hardware comes with it’s own inherent risks but we have a ready-to-use mould and our suppliers have already been pre-selected. This guarantees we can stick to our planned timeline.

For our backers that require overseas shipping, we promise to deal with international customs in advance so as to provide you with a clear idea of when you will receive your product.

Being clear and precise with our supporters and backers is important to us. We strive to provide top-notch customer service, so please feel free to reach out to us about any concerns you may have and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Suggestions and feedback are welcome too!

We have prepared for this by speaking with the manufacturing companies we will be using ahead of time to get a clear idea of what the process will be like so most potential issues have already been assessed. Building computer hardware comes with it’s own inherent risks but we have a ready-to-use mould and our suppliers have already been pre-selected. This guarantees we can stick to our planned timeline.For our backers that require overseas shipping, we promise to deal with international customs in advance so as to provide you with a clear idea of when you will receive your product.Being clear and precise with our supporters and backers is important to us. We strive to provide top-notch customer service, so please feel free to reach out to us about any concerns you may have and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Suggestions and feedback are welcome too!

story:
Ocean Wave Technology:-

Hello, my name is John Drake. My professional background is in Marine Design and Construction, but one of my great passions is for Renewable Energy.

I have invented a device to create Clean Renewable Energy from Waves in the Ocean.

My design is particularly ground breaking and unique, in that it also seeks to combine Wave Energy with the existing technology of Offshore Wind Farms, which are becoming increasingly common throughout Europe at present.

Why Wave Energy:-

The Surface of Planet Earth is covered by roughly two thirds in water. All of Australia’s Capital Cities are located close to the coast, as are the great majority of the Worlds Capital Cities. Humans are by their very nature a coastal dwelling species. It makes sense therefore that given the vastness of our coastlines, and our proximity to them that humans should be utilising some of the tremendous energy that is available for use within our oceans for electrical generation.

The idea of harvesting of Wave Energy and Tidal Energy is not a new concept. There are patents for Wave Energy Harvesting devices that date as far back as 1901.

However, despite the enormous potential, a great many of the Wave Energy devices created over the last century were never realised, and of those that did succeed none have so far been successfully harvested on a large scale. It is therefore still the largest untapped source of free natural energy that mankind has available to it.

At Ocean Wave Technology, we see the enormous potential for Wave Energy generation on a worldwide scale, and with our unique WaveTech1 Wave Energy Harvesting device, along with the great marketing opportunity that the Offshore Wind Industry is already bringing; we believe we have the product to be able to break through with Wave Energy on a worldwide scale.

A brief description of how the device works:-

Briefly, we can reveal here that the design involves a platform floating at water level. This platform is able to rotate 360 degrees around the base of an Offshore Wind Tower.

The platform consists of 4 hulls, 2 outer hulls, and 2 inner hulls. In between these hulls there are a total of 12 vertical cylinders, these are suspended in between the hulls, with the water flowing between the hulls, and into each cylinder.

These cylinders operate as a series of pumps, which when driven by the up and down motion of passing waves, work to suck in seawater. This sea water is then directed along a manifold pipe at pressure, and into a turbine, which then turns a generator to produce an electrical current.

What is unique, new and different about our Wave Energy design?:-

Aside from our unique ability to be directly coupled to new and existing Offshore Wind infrastructure, our device has a number of other unique features, these unique features are listed in brief below:-

-       A compact platform style design, thus reducing the area of sea floor required to produce electrical energy.

-          Powerful water driven pump and turbine style design.

-          Features a variety of variable individual shut down mechanisms, so as to better control the input of energy into the system, and thus better regulate the output.

-          Unique 360 degree rotation platform design, ensures the platform will always face onto the oncoming swell.

-          Unique tidal adjustment mechanism ensures the platform will always be floating at the optimum position to produce the optimum electrical energy output.

-          Storm event survivability, with a full emergency storm shutdown capability.

Additional details of these unique advantages are further detailed within the attached document:- An Outline of Ocean Wave Technology.pd

What our immediate financial needs are:-

I order to demonstrate the technological capabilities of the design; I will need to make a scaled demonstration model. However, this will be quite expensive, and I have very little personal funds available.

I have received approximate quotes for manufacturing one of the Wave Cylinders at 1:10 scale to test the design. The costs for the manufacture of this are as follows:-

 Cylinder Scale Demonstration Model Construction at 1:10 scale:-

-          Plastic Parts Manufacture, approximately $4,000

-          Magnetic Parts Manufacture, approximately $4,000

How can you contribute financially:-

If you would like to contribute financially to Ocean Wave Technology’s campaign, we have set up a Pay Pal account. The details of both of which are available upon this site.

As we will be requiring funding to be raised and paid into our account as we go along, rather than waiting for our 40 day campaign deadline to expire, we have decided to use the flexible funding option, on this website.

We would like to request, that we would much prefer that contributors use the Pay Pal account for making their contributions. The reason for this is simple, in that contributions to the Pay Pal account will be deposited to our account instantly, thereby giving us the funding we need to pay for our expense items as we proceed, rather than having to wait all the way till the end of the 60 day campaign to receive the funds, as is the case for the other payment options.  

Other Ways You Can assist:-

We understand that for many people having the spare funds to contribute to a campaign like this is just not financially possible; however this does not mean that you are unable to help. If you still support the idea of creating Clean, Free and Renewable Energy from our Oceans, but are unable to support us financially, then please feel free to spread the word around about this campaign. You can use the share tools on this website to easily do so.

Also, please feel free to leave a comment or to ask a question. It's always great to get feedback, and we love getting messages of support. We will try to respond to them all as best we can.

Finally, thank you for taking the time to consider our Crowd Funding proposal.

Kind Regards,

John Drake.

Ocean Wave Technology

Innovation in Renewable Energy for the 21st Century.

PO Box 847,

Fremantle WA 6959,

Australia

Phone:- +61 8 6102 4894

Email:- john.drake@oceanwavetech.com

Skype:- oceanwavetech

Web:- www.oceanwavetech.com

ABN:- 50 174 385 063

story:
The Scented Toilet Lamp will

* Absorb Unpleasant Odors

* Spread Pleasant Scent

* Light the Room

I'm sure you have encountered a daily phenomenon which is entering a toilet right after someone else exited. The SMELL is rather repellent. And what if you're the one to exit and someone else is to come in..?

Here is the ultimate solution, and what's nice about it is that there is no need to "re-invent the wheel", all it will take is to combine a number of existing components, execute a clever industrial design work, and that's it.

My name is Dave Lowenstein. I have been inventing for the past 30 years. You are welcome to visit patents including a few of my inventions. One of them received international recognition - "Lady Remington Liberty" - A Ladies' Hair Removal Device which can be viewed in this video .

How Will the Scented Toilet Lamp Operate ?

It will be installed in the very same way you install a Bulb in your toilet room today, no changes required. Simply screw the Screw Cup into the Wall Socket.

The Scented Toilet Lamp will be constructed of the following two main sections:

*** REAR SECTION


When you'll turn the light switch on, the Vent Motor will start sucking the air into the Rear Section through the Air Vents (the motor used is suitable for a 5sq.m./54sq.ft room). The Vent Motor will drive the air toward the Air Filter positioned behind it (the Air Filter will be placed in a narrow sliding drawer to enable easy replacement).

The AIR FILTER will be combined of 2 parts:

* The Inner Part (the one closer to the motor) will include high-density Activated Carbon. One known Carbon's characteristic is absorbing odors. The room's air driven toward the Carbon Filter, will "lose" the unpleasant odor molecules to be absorbed by the Carbon.

* The Outer Part will include Slow-Released Scent (alike Lavender). The air flowing through the Carbon will "arrive" clean from odors and will "pick up" the scented molecules on the way out to the room.

Since the Air Filter is one of the most important components, I have decided to complete developing it prior to raising funds. The development outcome is exactly as I have imagined it (and is the only one of its kind), and here it is:



*** FRONT SECTION


This Section includes a Bulb standard socket and a designed Cover.


AN ALL-IN-ONE Toilet Scent Solution

- Insert an Air Filter (supplied) into position.

- Screw the Scented Toilet Lamp into the existing wall socket.

- Screw a Light Bulb of your choice into the socket positioned in the Front Section.

- You are Done.


YOUR SUPPORT

I need your support to launch this new exciting product. The funds raised are for the 0 Production Prototypes, Production File, Packaging, Design, Molds, and overall logistics.

Thank you so much for the support.


MANUFACTURING

I have established a solid relationship with a manufacturer and know they will deliver the highest of quality once funding is completed and production file ready. Your Pledge will go directly into the pre-production, manufacturing and final assembly costs of the Scented Toilet Lamp. If you have any suggestions, or would like to give some feedback, I would love to hear it. YOUR SUPPORT IS GREATLY APPRECIATED, and PLEASE SHARE It with YOUR FRIENDS and FAMILY.

story:
Hands-Free Light - What does it do?

(In addition to a solid  LED light that all lights provide )

Brakes 

Brake light -  automatically activated when you brake and slow down 

Blinking light 

Wave your hand over the face of the phone to start the fast blinking rear light

Laser Lights

Laser guide lines - automatically turn on at night to mark the road and keep traffic away

Turn signals

Turn left (or right) to activate turn signals or hover your palm over the phone.

Security 

Security Alarm - sound when your bike is separated (gets further away) from your phone.

Approaching cars detection

Cars that use hotspot can be detected by Hands-Free. The rear light will start blinking and a notification will appear on the smartphone. 

eBcas (early Bicycle collision avoidance system)

Hands-Free Light is not just a rear light. It also part of eBCAS - Early Bicycle Collision  Avoidance System. With Hands-Free Light,  your bicycle can be detected by cars that use eBCAS  (even if you are out of sight) 

Auto on /Auto off

No more forgetting to turn on or off your bike light. Hands-Free has "auto connect" function. Hands-Free Light turns on when you approach your bike and turns off when you walk away from your bike.

Works seamlessly with other apps

Hands-Free Light can work in the background  so you can toggle viewing Strava, Ride with GPS, Google map or any other bike app without interrupting the Hands-Free Light operation.

The Light

Extremely powerful 100 Lumens LED 

Waterproof level - IPX4

Large  2200mah rechargeable via USB Battery 

ON/OFF button 

 

The free APP (Android and iPhone)

......

.....

How does it work?

Hands-Free Light is mounted under the bike seat on the seat post. Your smartphone will be mounted on the handlebar via supplied universal phone holder. All smartphones have  built-in sensors such as Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer etc.. The App receives and processes the sensors information and based on the rider setup, it sends commands to the Hands-Free Light using Bluetooth (Low Energy). No pairing is needed. The App recognizes your Hands-Free Light automatically .

What is unique about Hands-Free Light ?

Hands-Free Light is already in stock and ready to ship. Both Android and iPhone Apps are available (for free) online and ready for download. Hands-Free Light will be shipped to backers immediately.

Hands-Free Light  has endless capabilities. The Hands-Free App is constantly upgraded in order to improve and expand this Hands-Free Light functionality. We will keep improving the App and the software constantly. Some of the App upgrades will be in direct response to new capabilities that will become available in new smartphones.

 All App upgrades will be available free of charge.

 

 

What's in the box?

  • Rear Led Light
  • Mounting kit
  • Charging cable
  • Rubber strips for the mounting kit
  • Universal smartphone holder
  • User manual

Download user manual

story:
This compact, lightweight, cordless vacuum is a game-changer for small cleaning jobs inside the car, home and beyond. It can be easily stored in the glove compartment and has strong suction to clean up all kinds of messes, including food crumbs, pet hair, dirt and debris in less passes than others. It comes with helpful attachments to clean out all of the nooks and crannies. It is very easy to maneuver, empty and recharge via USB-A port. Capsule keeps your car spotless effortlessly, saving you the time and money otherwise spent on frequent visits to car wash.

 

Capsule weighs only 1.2 lbs and measures 2.5 inches in diameter and 9.2 inches in length. It can be easily stored and quickly grabbed to use as an emergency vacuum to clean car interior, computer keys and places inside the house such as sofa, shelves and window blinds in minutes.

 

 Capsule’s cord-free design adds to its portability and maneuverability. You don’t have to be near an outlet thus will have more freedom of movement when vacuuming. 

Capsule features a pure copper core motor with high continuous force and good heat dissipation. Its suction power is further enhanced by the straight airflow pathway achieved by its innovative capsule-shaped construction. 

The three-stage filtration combination in Capsule captures nearly 100% of the typical dirt and microscopic particles that are too small to be trapped inside the dust cup and can lead to poor air quality and allergy symptoms.

Capsule comes with a long crevice tool that will reach difficult spaces like in between and under car seats, seams, corners and gaps between surfaces, and with a cleaning brush that is thorough and delicate to clean carpets, air intakes and the center console. 

Capsule is lithium battery powered with LED indicators for the remaining power so you are never left guessing. 

 

It can be plugged into any USB-A port for a recharge. Just 3.5-hour charge @5V/2A gives you more than 21-minute of powerful cyclonic suction. 

If quiet is what you aim for, Capsule is your best bet. It has a noise level of around 70dB which won’t be an annoyance to you and anyone else around you.

 

 

 

Capsule, powered by Baseus

Baseus is a technology company composed of a group of skilled and energetic talents who are experts in breaking limitations, excavating ideas from daily life, and bringing the most convenience to everyone. The Baseus team aims to solve those neglected details and helps more and more people achieve the best user experience. Apart from focusing on highly precise technology, the team also pay great attention to stylish design and products with extremely exquisite craftsmanship. We do small things, but we do them perfectly. Make your life easier with the Baseus team.

Opening the Lovebox will display your love note. Send love notes up to 168 characters. Images are worth a thousand words! Your children will love it too.   Who doesn't love a rainfall of hearts? Every person connected to the Lovebox will love it.  Your Lovebox can be placed in your kitchen. In your bathroom! Place it in your children's room to always feel loved!   Every Lovebox is delivered with this playful pixel heart! You can add an extra paper heart if you are a little bit nostalgic for letters. Or a precious heart for your precious loved ones!       The Lovebox is built from a solid piece of beechwood. A last hand polishing and the wooden box is ready to become a real Lovebox! Final assembly takes place to give life to your Lovebox! Every heart is prepared with love! (La Cité de l'Objet Connecté, January 2017) Last year, Melodie (Jean's fiancé) helped us manufacture Loveboxes for Christmas. This year, we are well prepared, but we promise to still have Loveboxes made by your Muse, Melodie! When the LoveTeam brainstorms, love is in the air! Laurent, our CTO, proudly presents our new app to the rest of the LoveTeam! Jean discussing the 3D model with our designer. We spread love everywhere when we are out of the office! (We woke up at 5 AM to fill the streets with heart-shaped balloons)  And now, here we are! Ready to spread love in your home. The Loveboxes are real stars in front of the camera!   Click here to get our press material

story:
Your phone is one of the dirtiest items you own, but it's not the only offender in your daily arsenal. While many devices only focus on cleaning your phone, we wanted to go beyond. Tidie's UVC-LED valet box has ample room so you can refresh multiple items in one go.

 

 

 

 

Being tired of using alcohol wipes to clean our phones and other accessories, we set out to create something that both looked nice and worked. We benchmarked different methods of cleaning to determine the best method of attack for the ultimate clean. We realized they many contenders on the market used UV light with little to no actual UV-C, or would not allow ample space between products and the light for proper coverage.

 

Our solution?

We adopted an 8 UVC-LED system with 120 degrees projection, allowing no blind spots during cleaning process.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tidie’s UVC valet box is also a design that puts users first. It’s an easy-to-adopt device with only one button away from refresh personal items. It’s also easy to set up with only 5 steps.
Step 1: Connect your cable, power adapter, the box and the socket.
Step 2: Open the lid and put your items in the box
Step 3: Close the lid.
Step 4: Press and hold the device button for 2 seconds.
Step 5: Wait for 5 minutes (enjoy a coffee or tea while you wait).
Easy peasy! After a long day of cleaning, you may think your box need some care too. And that’s no problem. The removable bars incorprated in the unique internal rack to ensure optimal sanitization of every inch of your items will make cleaning this device easy.

 

 

 

Blends in with any setting

Place Tidie’s UVC valet box at your entryway, coffee table, bedside table or even bring it to your office. Take yours wherever you need some extra cleaning power. For example, when it's time to head back to the office, you may want to use it on your wireless mouse.

 

 

 

Designed with safety in mind
Power is automatically cut when the lid is removed, ensuring no UV exposure to the user.

 

 

 

 

 

Tidie adopts modern technology for better cleaning with a mission of creating quality life effortlessly. With users in mind, we are guided by safety to create easy-to-adopt devices. At Tidie we believe effectiveness is just as important as good design.

 

 

What’s in store for Tidie? We are currently developing our rFresh Collection to include even more cleaning related products, such as air purifiers, to effortlessly create cleaner homes. As for Tidie's UVC valet box, we are expecting to launch even more colors and materials such as wooden casings to suit our user's unique personal styles.

 

 

Risk and challenges

Every project comes with risks and challenges. While they are expected, we try our best to plan ahead and have plan B ready. As of now, we have our prototype ready and have obtained SGS certificate. We are looking to begin production in October and aim to ship products in November. At this stage, time could be our biggest challenge due to the uncertainty brought on by the global pandemic which can both, directly and indirectly, affect our production and shipping times. To prepare for this challenge, we have worked closely with our suppliers to mitigate the impact as much as possible. We will also keep backers updated about unexpected circumstances.

We benchmarked different methods of cleaning to determine the best method of attack for the ultimate clean. We realized they many contenders on the market used UV light with little to no actual UV-C, or would not allow ample space between products and the light for proper coverage. Our solution?We adopted an 8 UVC-LED system with 120 degrees projection, allowing no blind spots during cleaning process.       Tidie’s UVC valet box is also a design that puts users first. story:
Qube™ LightStrip is the World's Most Affordable Multi-Colored Wi-Fi Smart Light Strip for your home. Qube™ LightStrip creates countless effects for you to build your dream home to live in. Along with the Qube™ App, you can control your lights anytime and anywhere. 

'Revolutionizing smart home lightings for homemakers 
at an affordable price-tag'

 

To thank you for being supporting our Light Strip campaign, we also include Qube Smart Bulb together with our Light Strip campaign. You will save 15% off the current retail price when you order it here together with our Light Strips till the campaign ends. Delivery will be together with the Qube LightStrips.

Features at a glance

  • Share Qube with your friends and family
  • Receive notifications of the lighting changes in your home in real time.
  • Customize the lighting scenes at home
  • Special effects to support your party at home, or even welcoming your friends
  • Wake up to the sunrise with scheduled alarms
  • IFTTT integration to allow 237 other services to notify you with lights
  • Be alerted when your favorite team score a goal
  • Dim your lights from 10pm to 6am
  • Set automation to turn on/off your lights during scheduled time for optimal efficiency
  • Add your wearable devices to turn on/off your lights when you are present
  • Available for iOS and Android smart devices
  • And many more..

We place the switches on the wall to your phone so you can easily create the desired atmosphere easily with a button click. 

Even with your curtains closed, you are able to set schedules to wake up naturally to the hues of the sun. 

You are able to set your lights to dim so that it does not wake your body up from a toilet break at night.

 

Blue wavelength helps you concentrate better during the day, but sleepless at night. Create your own moods to help you sleep better at night.
 

 

Qube senses the users through their phones or Bluetooth wearable and turns on and off your lights automatically. You can also use its IFTTT function to trigger other smart home devices.  

Pair Qube with other Smart Devices using IFTTT. It connects you to more than 250 services, which pairs you up with other devices like Nest and Gmail. 3rd Party Integrations will be completed in March 2017.

 

Connect Qube to your home WIFI to get remote access to your lighting. You have access to your lighting status and receive notifications and your energy consumption anywhere your smart device has internet connectivity. You can turn your lights off too if you have forgotten to do so when you leave home. 

Connect up to 10 Light Strips to reach your desired length (max 11 meters) and snip off the unused length. Our adapter and power supply are able to support up to 10 strips connected together. 

 

 

1. Affordable at only $24 per set for first 1500 Backers.

2. Brighter (1,400 Lumens per two meters)

3. Location-Based Automation (IFTTT and internal in-app automation can be triggered by location)

4. Energy Efficient LED rated 50,000 hours, 22 years

5. Hubless 24/7 connection without needing an external hub

 

Leveraging on the success on Qube Smart Bulb, we want to build more products in the lighting space quickly. Qube Light Strip is chosen as it gives the user the flexibility to easily install in multiple locations without needing any existing installation light socket. Light strips are also commonly found in almost every modern homes and being smart allows you to do much more. We have also completed our first manufacturing batch of the light strip making it very close to completion and delivery and making the risk for low for you. 

By supporting our project and being an early adopter, you are helping us to kickstart our new products and also to make Qube available continually at an affordable pricing. By buying now, you are able to get it at our special pre-order pricing.

To get a perfect table lighting effect

Beautiful your cove lighting with customized colors

Making watching television ever interesting

Enjoy your cooking sessions better

To create the perfect couch experience

Create the perfect mood lighting for your needs

Music Play Mood

Reading Mood

Relax Mood

Energise Mood

Sunrise Mood

Step 1: Stick your light strip to the desired surface. (e.g. cove lighting, under the table or under the cabinet)

Step 2: Connect it to your nearest wall socket and turn it on.

Step 3: Download our app and start creating your desired moods and automation.  

 

We are planning to release a Beta Developer API that will be ready in Q2 2017 (estimated Jun 17). To join our developer program, you can purchase Qube and we will contact you again when the developer kit is ready. 

 
How do you start referring?
1. SHARE our campaign by selecting on one of the various Indiegogo sharing mechanism. You can only see them on DESKTOP view if you are using a mobile browser.
2. For every 3 friends that purchase through your link, they will get to save $10 off our future retail price and you will be receiving 1 Qube Light Strip Extension (worth $15) that will be delivered together with your perk. 

3. 1 winner will also be selected daily who will stand a chance to win X2 the rewards of the amount you purchased for. 

* You can check your referral amount on your contribution page in Indiegogo!
* The X2 rewards will be published on Indiegogo daily!

 

Qube finds that smart home products are too expensive now. Our team put together Qube to be an affordable platform for both end-users and developers to start their first smart home journey. 

Qube smart home products have been designed and prototyped in Singapore, China and in San Francisco. We have already very strong and established manufacturing partners based in Singapore & Shenzhen. We are very excited to have created our own version of Qube Light Strips.  

While completing our first batch of 500 units of 1st batch manufacturing, we are ready to move into mass production. This project aims to collate enough orders to lower our cost enough to make the light strips affordable for the mass market launch. Similar to Qube Smart Bulb, we target to launch our light strip and making them affordable for everyone and we need your help. 

 

Mass Manufacturing

The 1st manufacturing batch of 500 LED Strip Sets are done and we are currently running the LED ageing test. We are in the midst of placing our 2nd/3rd mass manufacturing order of 5,000 units and 10,000 units respectively once it reaches the order milestone. 

FPC Manufacturing

LED SMT onto FPC board 

Soldering of connectors

Installing waterproof protective casing 

Testing of LEDs

Shipping

Where do we ship?
Qube will be shipped worldwide as long as United States Postal Service (USPS), HongKong Post and Singapore Post supports delivery to that location.   

When we start shipping*
We estimated to start and complete shipping of Qube Light Strips by March 2016, based on a first ordered, first received basis. We will keep you notified of your shipping date upon your order.

For customers that have special preferred shipping courier company, please contact us and pay the difference for the faster delivery lead time. 

The Tech - How does it work?

Every Qube Light Strip adapter has an inbuilt Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Smart 4.0 Chip –  making it constantly connected. We built a software layer that allows all Qube bulbs to communicate with one another and auto selecting the optimal bulb/s to act as a hub while serving its primary purpose of smart illumination. This feature is unique to Qube. The built-in Wi-Fi allows maximum connection stability and range.

Qube works with your iOS, Android phones, and your iWatch to allow you the optimal control of your lightings from your phone. Android wearable app will complete by Q2 this year. 

The combination of Wi-Fi and Bluetooth chips within Qube also allows it to sense users within the home via our Qube Sense™ technology and carry out meaningful automation when you are near to the proximity of the bulb.

How long are the Lightstrips in the starter kit set and the extension set?
LightStrip Starter Kit ~ 2 meters
LightStrip Extension ~ 1 meter

How does it save energy and the earth?

Millions of Watts are wasted each day. Qube technology does not only automatically switch off lights when unused, it also monitors usage and keeps your home 'Green.' It also allows you to adjust your lights to optimum brightness and control them at the tap of a finger. In turn, this helps you to save on your electrical bills.

How do I set it up?

Unlike light bulbs which require existing sockets, you can plug Qube Lightstrips directly to your powerpoint socket, and it will work perfectly. You can then download our app on Apple Store or Google Play Store to control it on your smartphone.

How fast does Qube work?

Qube is tested to have a maximum latency of 0.5s, the fastest in the market. It is tested to have 95% efficiency in transmitting light commands and messages. This is only possible because Qube offers both Wi-Fi and BLE, which let you access your bulbs from anywhere, at any time.

How can we make it so affordable?

This goes back to Qube’s experience. Having had years of experience in sourcing and manufacturing, we can keep cost low based on volume. Qube light strip does not require any heavy molding required, hence allowing us to complete manufacturing this new product easily. 

As Qube will focus its initial sales strategy direct to consumers online.  By doing so, there is no need to build in retail margins which add substantially to the purchase cost. We pass the savings directly to you so that your money is well-spent when making your home smart. 

How far are we?

Qube Light Strip 3D design and final manufacturing prototype, and the 1st manufacturing batch are done. They have been ready and tested since December 2016. We are currently raising funds to collate enough orders to lower our manufacturing cost by ordering the components in bulk. After our campaign perks start to ship, we will sell our products via our website and through selected partners. We will continue to maintain the product at a very affordable price-point so that your friends and family will still get to benefit.

How many Qube bulbs do we support in one household?

We have connected our smart beta homes with more than 100 bulbs and light strips meshed together. It has 99% efficiency due to the multi-layered mesh connection. If you have more than 100 bulbs, you can easily form a separate mesh network within itself, still connecting to the same router. 

What voltage of mains does Qube work with?

110 ~ 260V

Is delivery guaranteed?

We cannot guarantee anything as that is the essence of crowdfunding and risks are involved. 

Will you be delivering the plug that is compatible to my country?
Depending on the shipping country, we will be automatically sending the most compatible plug that works within your country. 

How long will the wires for the plug be?
We will be giving a 2-meter long wire. 

Will there be any stretch goals?
We are working with our suppliers to see if it is possible to create a flexible connector between the Strips to be added as a stretch goal so that you can use the same power adapter to manoeuvre the light strips to cover more areas.

story:
Short and Simple

I would like to introduce you to the Kovach Children.  They are missionary Children to Brazil, South America.  They moved to Brazil a little over a year ago, and the older children have already been helping to reach Brazilians for Jesus Christ.  When our family moved to Brazil, it was probably one of the hardest things we have done, but yet, as a father, it was such a joyous thing for me to see my children so selflessly surrender all to serve God in another country.  While traveling and preparing to serve in Brazil, our children never truly had much as we were always on the move.  None-the-less, when the final preparations were made, I can’t truly express the emotions of my heart as I saw my children willingly sell and give away what toys they had to charity.  My heart felt joy to see their level of commitment, even at their young age, to Christ.  At the same time, I felt sorrow for them as they gave away many of their cherished possessions and heartache as the younger children, who did not understand, ran down the sidewalk, crying, as they watched a prized possession given away.  This year, I would like to give my each of my seven children at least one nice present for Christmas, but I need your help.  Being servants on a foreign field often means that we are very tight financially, without extra for things like presents.  We will and always do keep Christ the center of Christmas, but at the same time, as a father, I would like for them to be able to have just a little something at Christmas time and to not have only memories of hardships in a foreign country where Christmas is barely acknowledged.  Often, children are the forgotten ones of Ministry and it is my desire to make this their first “real” Christmas here in Brazil and to ask if you would be willing to help, even just a little…

 Anything above the goal will be used in full for the Children and their Christmas.  Thank you for your Christmas love and Spirit in helping bring a little Christmas joy to these children!

 

 

A Special Christmas Perk!

Personal Time with Santa!

Personal Time with Santa!

story:
Reimagined from the ground up

We took everything we’ve learned from designing the best portable vacuum devices and created the AnchorChef Vacuum Mini 2 with the quality design and useful device you can expect from AnchorChef.

 

Every decibel counts

Do you know how noisy the vacuum machine and vacuum cleaner are?  It’s over 85dB. Our obsession with noise drove us to design Vacuum Mini 2 to reduce the noise to less than sound level 50dB.  You may wonder why you put up with your vacuum machine for so long.

 

Made for everyone

The Vacuum Mini 2 is easy to carry, it will be helpful to you to vacuum anywhere. Mini 2 is simple and useful, it’s good for vacuum food storage with our zipper bags and/or compress luggage during travel.

 

Big on technology, small on size.

The 3.97″ Vacuum Mini 2 can store in kitchen drawer, or carry in backpack and travel suitcase. The minimum air flow rate is over 4L/Min.  It’s portable and powerful for you to use this new device anywhere.

 

Technology

 

Application

Vacuum Silicone Bags for Sous Vide Cooking
We designed the first vacuum silicone bag for people to store the food by isolating water moisture and air in order to cook and clean easily.

 

Vacuum Storage Boxes

Materials are BPA Free. The storage box is good for carrying your delicious healthy food such as your favorite chicken salad.

AnchorChef - Your health diet!

 

Packing personal items for travel

It’s easy and convenient to pack your personal belongings by compressing them.

 

Space saving for luggage

It can save over 50% space of your backpack and suitcase, so you can carry your own pillow and comforter to keep you healthy every day.

AnchorChef - Your healthy life!

 

Development

 

Tech Specs

 

Rewards

 

 

About Us

You can visit our website for more detail https:// anchorchef.com

Or contact us by email for any enquirers support@anchorchef.com
story_txt: Reimagined from the ground upWe took everything we’ve learned from designing the best portable vacuum devices and created the AnchorChef Vacuum Mini 2 with the quality design and useful device you can expect from AnchorChef. Every decibel countsDo you know how noisy the vacuum machine and vacuum cleaner are?  It’s over 85dB. Our obsession with noise drove us to design Vacuum Mini 2 to reduce the noise to less than sound level 50dB.  You may wonder why you put up with your vacuum machine for so long. Made for everyoneThe Vacuum Mini 2 is easy to carry, it will be helpful to you to vacuum anywhere. Mini 2 is simple and useful, it’s good for vacuum food storage with our zipper bags and/or compress luggage during travel. Big on technology, small on size.The 3.97″ Vacuum Mini 2 can store in kitchen drawer, or carry in backpack and travel suitcase. The minimum air flow rate is over 4L/Min.  It’s portable and powerful for you to use this new device anywhere. Technology ApplicationVacuum Silicone Bags for Sous Vide CookingWe designed the first vacuum silicone bag for people to store the food by isolating water moisture and air in order to cook and clean easily. Vacuum Storage BoxesMaterials are BPA Free. The storage box is good for carrying your delicious healthy food such as your favorite chicken salad.AnchorChef - Your health diet! Packing personal items for travelIt’s easy and convenient to pack your personal belongings by compressing them. Space saving for luggageIt can save over 50% space of your backpack and suitcase, so you can carry your own pillow and comforter to keep you healthy every day.AnchorChef - Your healthy life! Development Tech Specs Rewards  About UsYou can visit our website for more detail https:// anchorchef.comOr contact us by email for any enquirers support@anchorchef.com

story:
Ag+ Cup:This breath-taking silver cup is inspired from the beauty of western art, brought to life by ancient eastern craftsmanship. Its pure silver inner was born with the ability to disinfect water to guarantee a healthy drinking experience for you. Its royal deluxe color and fine texture makes the Ag+ cup extremely captivating; you’d want it at a single peek.

 

 

Inspiration from the bluer than bluer hue

The story began with my first encounter with Yves Klein. His unique style of art became an inspiration to many pop artists.

 

Klein had a special liking for blue, which became his preferred signature color. His celebrated bluer-than-blue hue would be recognized as the International Klein Blue (IKB).

The French art-guru lived for only 34 years, spending eight years on his career. Yet, the impact he left with his ground-breaking "Klein Blue" discovery, has made him quite famous for over half of the century.

 

Klein’s impact is still felt in the world of art with his popularity still unmatched. Its extraordinary, charming and challenging color, has evolved and become diversified in different areas such as fashion, art, architecture.

 

 

 

As a potter and fan of Yves Klein, I have always considered applying such amazing color on my ceramics works. The process was a huge challenge and no one had done it before, but I strongly believed their integration would be a revolutionary artwork.

One year, thousands of experiments: Like gambling,

Unpredictable and Infinite possibilities 

 

The color on the ceramics is from a glazing pigment. Its final color, quite different from the original glaze color. The most challenging part is that every detail in the procedure affects the output color. From the glaze ratio, the glazing method, the quality of clay, the temperature of kiln, and the timing of firing, they all have an effect the final color.

 

 

A Lesson from Past, Glory Days of Ceramics History 

When trying to get the perfect shade of blue to apply, I had to review the history of ceramics. I can not ignore an ancient blue pottery in China called the “Qinghua” or “Blue and White vase”. It was one of the most famous valuable oriental ceramics in the world.

 

 

Peak of Blue and White Pottery

– 14th Century, Yuan Dynasty.

In the 14th century (referred to as the Yuan Dynasty) was the most flourishing period of the ceramics industry, and this period recorded the best Blue and White Pottery Art works ever created. It’s fond of domestic or foreign art collectors to have a piece of Yuan Qinghua. The Yuan Qinghua art was one of the most popular and luxury collections for royal nobility.

 

 

Secret of Qinghua – Smalt Blue

The Yuan Quinguha art had a blue pigment on it called smalt; a ground blue potassium glass containing cobalt from ancient Persia. During the 14th century, with the backing of International Trade Policy, smalt was easily imported into China. It became widely used in the production of ceramics. The introduction of smalt into Yuan Qinghua porcelain to brought it to the pinnacle of ceramics art.

 

 

Extinction of Pure Blue on Ceramics

When Ming Dynasty came to power in the 16th century, they stopped the importation of smalt into China. The supply of smalt was placed on hold indefinitely. For hundreds of years, that distinct blue and use of smalt on ceramics stopped.

 

I found that the ancient pigment, smalt, is the closest to getting the classic Klein blue. After year of research, I created our home-made glaze recipe, which can revive the saturation and cleanliness of the famous blue color and ensure the consistence in the mass production.

 

 

A Blend of Luxury and Demure

It got a high level of color saturation, with its matte feature rendering it lustre having a clean mild touch. It was a kind of elegance symbol, to show its user’s premium taste.

 

 

Soft, Delicate and Warm Touch

It’s a handmade ceramic ware yet has a texture that feels soft like suede. An extremely strong product, but still has that warm and delicate feeling when you hold it. 

 

 

 

In ancient times, using silver ware was strictly restricted to royal families. It was scarce and slightly inaccessible to the masses yet it served as a water sterilizer and disinfectant.

 

Water + Silver = Purification

Research has shown that silver can be used successfully to control bacterial growth. When silver is dissolved into water, it releases Ag+. The Ag+ element helps to disinfect 650 kinds of bacteria to get the water sterilized.

 

 

Silver ions only kills harmful bacteria without causing damage to necessary bacteria and normal cells. Becasue most pathogenic bacteria are single-celled micro-organisms, relying solely on the pro-teases in cells to survive. The silver ion combines with the negative charge (SH) in the protease before then effectively piercing the cell’s wall, killing the bacterial protein mutation, and effectively achieving sterilization.

 

Ag+Cup – 99.9% Silver Liner, the Purest Silver Cup Ever

Most silver utensils in the market contain 92.5% of silver. The purer the silver means less impurity of other metal elements present and increases the efficiency of water disinfection.

 

 

 

 

Ag+Cup is not a regular product, it’s an artwork that requires a very skilled craftsman. The production process requires creativity, attention to details, consistency and a desire for perfection. To reach the desired goal, you must be patient.

 

 

 

We’ve analyzed the Qinghua, smalt, silver and ceramic so much it looks like we are re-introducing an antique or vintage product.

ABSOLUTELY NOT!

Ag+ Cup designed with ancient techniques easily blends into our daily modern life.

 

 

 

Using Ag+Cup Everyday

Ag+Cup is a product that fits into all the amazing times of your life; whether you’re working, chating with friends, reading, exercising, watching TV, or even mediating.

 

 

More Colors, More Options

We understand that people have different color preferences, so we made more beautiful colors for you to choose from.

 

 

NOTICE

Because the silver cup is delicate and precious, it cannot be used in microwave or oven,  and also not recommended for dishwashers.

story:
The SMART Purifier for your home's ac/furnace system.

ALVI provides HEPA-class air quality, lowers home energy consumption and provides actionable insights on indoor air quality and filter performance via your smartphone.  

 

Breathe The Difference.

 

HEPA-Class Air Quality.

ALVI uses ACTIVE POLARIZATION to bind the really, really tiny particles together that standard filters let pass through. The result is cleaner air, enhanced air circulation, and significantly lower energy consumption.

 

Enhance Circulation. Reduce Energy.

 ALVI's filter cartridges uses low density media reducing the strain on your home's ac/furnace system compared to standard filters and other high efficiency systems. Your home will heat up and cool down faster while extending the life of your homes ac/furnace system.

 

Monitor Air Quality & Filter Performance.

No more forgetting when to change your filter. ALVI is your homes Virtual Air Assistant that keeps an eye on filter status, and indoor air quality events in your home.  ALVI App available for Android & iOS.

 

Plug N' Play Installation.

DIY installation. Simply remove your standard filter and slide your ALVI SMART Purifier into your home ac/furnace system.

 

Auto-Order New Filters.

No more trips to the hardware store to buy filters! When ALVI senses low remaining filter life, a new ALVI media cartridge will be auto-ordered right to your door.

 

W

Introducing ALVI Air & ALVI SMART!

 

How ALVI Stacks Up.

ALVI outperforms standard MERV rated filters in every category. ALVI media are up to 4x less restrictive, last up to 2x longer, and capture particles that are 40x smaller than standard MERV rated filters.

What ALVI Users Have To Say.

 

 

0.3-0.5 Micron Performance.

ALVI’s performance was tested @ 300fpm @ 0.3 - 0.5 microns in a 2500 cu. ft. clean room built to ANSI/AHAM standards against a HEPA filter & 1” pleated filter. Over a 2-hour period ALVI was able to significantly out performed the standard filter and provide HEPA class performance.

 

0.007 Micron Performance.

At the 0.007 micron range. ALVI was able to significantly outperform both the HEPA & standard filter at removing micro-particulate.

Tested. Certified. Approved.

 

 

Where ALVI Goes.

 

ALVI is made in over 50 sizes.

 

 

 

What's In The Box?

 

 

ALVI App Upcoming Features.

Our next planned update for the ALVI app will allow homeowners to monitor filter performance data & air quality insights via their connected devices. 

 

 

ALVI Unit Walkthrough.

 

 

ALVI Pairing Process.

 

 
 

ALVI Installation Process.

 

 

ALVI Media Are Made Of 70% Recyclable Material.

 

 

ALVI Production Timeline.

 

 

Our Story.

One of our team leaders, Devin, has asthma. He experienced a severe reaction that had him incubated at three years old. During his school years, his asthma affected the hobbies he pursued and his physical health. As he got older, he wanted a solution that would help himself, and other friends and family who had asthma, allergies and other ailments that are directly affected by air quality.

The CleanAir.ai Team.

 

Our Partners.

Made In North America.

Our research and manufacturing teams are all in North America. We’re awake when you are, we sleep when you are, and we use ALVI in our homes, too.

 

Risks & Challenges.

As with any smart hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. We've done our best to minimize risks for backers: We've completed our design for manufacturing (DFM) and have completed seven generations of prototypes. Our electronics and firmware are also at an advanced stage. In addition, the accompanying CleanAir.ai app is being developed and on track.

Our team is experienced in the manufacturing world, and we're confident that we can meet our timelines. However, unexpected delays can occur due due to manufacturing issues, component shortages, and possibly more. We'll do our best to be as transparent as possible and keep you informed, and work hard to resolve any issues as they may arise.

story:
Single-use plastic is bonkers. We produce over 300 million tonnes of plastic every year, 50% of which is single-use. Even when we think we're being good by recycling, only 9% of plastic is repurposed and the rest of it ends up in landfills, our oceans or in toxic flames. Which makes as much sense as Trump photoshopping his head onto the body of Rocky Balboa (remember that?)

There should be better options, but we’re left with little choice. Big corps force single-use plastic on us like your mother-in-law forces soggy sprouts on Christmas Day. Homethings don't do sprouts. We make Keep it Clean kits that come with three refillable glass bottles and dissolvable, non-toxic tabs for your kitchen, bathroom and windows. And when you need a refill, tabs come through the post. Makes sense.

Water makes up 90% of household cleaning products. And nearly all of them are sold in single-use plastic bottles. Bonkers.

We won't sell you water. Or single-use plastic. We've tabletised the cleaning ingredients so that you can get rid of single-use in your home and under your sink (with a glass bottle that’s really good-looking). Makes sense.

The hero here is our ‘Keep it Clean’ kit. Each kit contains three refillable glass bottles and three effervescent cleaning tabs to make our Allthings, Baththings and Shinythings products. Each tab is for a different bit of the house, and has its own unique formula to optimise the cleaning power in those areas.

All rewards include the first refill pack free too. For the heavy cleaners you can have your cleaning needs sorted for a year with multiple refills. And for our super fans, there’s exclusive upcycled Homethings merch.

 

Keep It Clean starter kit will retail at £24.99 and our refill packs will retail at £5.99, or £4.99 on a subscription basis.

Ever needed an Alka Seltzer in the morning? Homethings is effectively that but for your bathroom, kitchen, and your shiny things. First, order your starter pack. You’ll receive your three glass bottles and three tabs. Next, fill up your bottles with your water of choice (we’d recommend lukewarm tap) and drop in one of the tabs. Count the number of selfies on Kim Kardashian’s feed while it dissolves (or just wait two minutes). When it’s done, you can spray away and take your own selfie with your clean surfaces. Refill, reuse, raise the roof.

What do Katie Hopkins’ Twitter Feed and Kim Jung Un’s ballistic missile testing have in common? They’re all toxic. That’s not us. Our ingredients are free from harmful chemicals. Your family, friends and your dog who licks all the surfaces will thank you later. All of our household cleaning sprays are vegan friendly and cruelty free.

Homethings does not contain Water, Chlorine, SLS, Parabens, VOCs, Phthalates, Animal by Products, Ammonia.

“Glass? I’d break it.” Well, the solution is easy – don’t. Luckily for all you butter fingers out there, our glass bottles are made of shatter and heat resistant borosilicate glass and they come with silicone sleeves to help protect them from any knocks, bumps or grazes.

Our bottles are also dishwasher safe so if they ever need a clean up, give them a rinse and a wipe or stick them in the dishwasher. 

We could just tell you that all three of the founding team genuinely use Homethings in their homes, which we do, but that’s not useful information. What you need to know is that it’s been tested and it works. Well. Really well. Yugely well. Better than Trump handling a press conference well. All of our cleaning products are eco-friendly disinfectants and have naturally derived surfactants to help remove grease and grime.

One of our tabs weighs 4.5g and makes 500ml of cleaning solution. A single-use 500ml bottle of cleaning product weighs around 540g. So over 100 of our Homethings tabs is the equivalent weight of 1 standard bottle of household cleaner. That’s a big plus for sustainable distribution. And a big plus for your under-the-sink storage solutions (more room for biscuits, people).

Just like our transparent glass bottles, Homethings has nothing to hide. We are always in conversation about how we can evolve and improve – and welcome chats with our customers to learn how we can do better. Have a suggestion? Let us know.

There are no mythical figures here, just three amigos who want to clean up cleaning. In the red corner we have co-founder Tim, a ‘blue-sky thinker’ and comic overuse of buzzwords (seriously Tim stop with the jargon). In the blue corner, we introduce co-founder Matt, with a passion for thrifted fleeces. Last but not least, we have Lo, our brand guru and Jimmy Carr impersonator (her laugh, not her tax avoidance).

We could tell you we’re changing the way you clean, revolutionising your kitchen sink and transforming the surfaces in your home. But what we’re really doing is creating products that make sense for people who are sick of brands selling them water and single-use plastic while glossing over the environmental impact of their choices. If we get you hyped up about cleaning as we go? Well then that’s win-win.

 

And finally, a big shout out to the champions who have helped us bring our cleaning dreams to life.

Josh Nathanson, Annie Kruntcheva, Steve Duffy, Joe McArdle, Pedro Dias, Sam Narr, Guzzie Armitage, Kate Hamilton, Emily Ames, Tony Clayton, Jess Hudson-Davies and all the other legends who’ve believed in Homethings from the start.

story:
This sofa is the future of furniture. From a studio apartment to a four-bedroom house, Elephant in a Box will function beautifully in any size home. Engineered using honeycomb technology, Elephant in a Box sofas are able to expand and recover their shape after being unpacked.

Perfect for everyone, whether you frequently relocate or live in a small space in the city or suburbs, this high-end piece of furniture will fit into just one small box in your car and make transportation from Point A to Point B stress-free!

 

 
 

 

 

We are here to change your sofa buying experience and offer a solution to the pain that we  have suffered during buying, assembling and moving a sofa.

About two years ago, we decided that we were in need of enhancing our entrepreneurial skills. Mohamed Kamal and myself, Reham Khalifa, moved to Boston and attended MIT and Harvard respectively. As exciting as the move was, our sofa buying experience was painful and consumed a lot of money, energy and time — we were not the first couple to have this experience and certainly not the last. If you have ever lived in Boston or any of the big cities in the US for that matter, it is a common scene for you to expect to see sofas lying on the curbside in the month of June. Those who are moving out find it cheaper to leave their sofas on the curb, rather than to move it with them or dispose of it. Having both witnessed and lived this experience, Mo and I realized a pain point that has never been addressed before. This is when the idea of Elephant in a Box was born.

Together, we became business owners of a company that uses honeycomb technology in a different application (not furniture). Being aware of the properties of this material — the ability of it to fold and retain its original shape — we decided to create the perfect solution to many of the sofa buying and selling problems.

Our team indulged in extensive research to identify the most important parameters when buying a sofa. We conducted market research, interviews and surveys in the US market and were able to use the findings to build our first prototype. We put the prototype to the test in the MIT Martin Trust Lab. The feedback from faculty and students was astonishing and encouraging.  More developments were made based on users’ feedback. 

Mohamed Azab, who was also attending Harvard at the time and has a Harvard Business School Case written under his name “Mohamed Azab and Seha Capital”, shared the same experience. The two Mo’s have known each other for more than seven years. They met through Endeavor, an organization leading the high impact entrepreneurship movement around the world. When we shared the idea and the findings with Azab, he shared the same enthusiasm and excitement for the product. His extensive experience in scaling up businesses, coupled with his interest in the product, complemented our vision of building a global company that would revolutionize the total user experience of sofas and other home furniture. He was a natural addition to the team. 

Today, after more than a year of research and development and working with furniture design experts out of Boston and Germany, we are now ready to launch the Elephant in a Box sofa, the best high end, strongest, foldable sofa that assembles and disassembles instantly.

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

Even if you can’t purchase an Elephant in a Box sofa, you can still help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
FREE U.S. Shipping with every Sud Stud V2 Order | View Our Latest Update: New Sud Stud Soap Line

 

Uniquely Engineered to Clean Deeper.

 

 

With an upgraded design, the Sud Stud V2 makes soaps last longer and clean deeper while helping you save money with your favorite natural and commercial soaps.

 

 

The Sud Stud V2 features over 900 bristles for exfoliation, a 15% larger body to fit even more types and sizes of soaps made with anti-bacterial, stretchy silicone that saves you money in the long run.

 

 

 

The Future of Full Body Skincare

 

New Exfoliating Bristle Side

The new exfoliating bristle side provides a deep cleaning and consistent exfoliation. Featuring fewer holes for soap savings and creating a rich lather while reducing soap surface area exposed.

Body Expands Up to 200%

Made with ultra-soft and stretchy antibacterial silicone, Sud Stud V2 expands to fit artisan or commercials soaps up to 6 oz with ease. A slim entry port keeps soap in longer.

Soap Saving Honeycombs

Sud Stud's honeycomb design reduces the soap friction area by 80% so soap isn't in direct contact with you, reducing the soap's exposure to extend the life of soap and save money.
 
 

 

Real Reviews from Sud Stud V2 Testers:

We tested V2 with real users to make sure it would provide a sensational clean and save money:

 

As Featured In:

 

 

Buy 2, Get 3 for $22
 With FREE Shipping to the US

 

Engineered For

A Satisfying Scrub

 

Your fancy-schmancy soaps are finally worth buying — thanks to Sud Stud V2's design, you'll get a satisfying clean while extending the life of your soaps.

 

Featuring Over 900 Dedicated Bristles

Built to power through the thickest of dirt and grime, the bristle side provides a satisfying scrub.

Our new exfoliating bristle side stimulates soap molecules into creating more suds while also powering through

  • Creates More Lather  — Bristles stimulate soap lather while providing a sensational scrub that gets rid of dirt, grime, and dead skin. 
  • Safe for Everyday Use — Unlike traditional loofahs and plastic poofs, Sud Stud's bristles are safe for everyday use without over-exfoliating and irritating skin.
  • More Robust Cleaning— Use your Sud Stud to clean your favorite pair of sneakers,  dirty dishes, tile, granite, marble, carpet stains and more!

 

Soap-Saving Honeycomb Pattern

Reduces the surface area of soap by up to 80% helping your soap last up to 5 times longer.

The honeycomb pattern allows enough water to create a lather with the soap while also protecting suds from any excess water that washes away cleansing bubbles to keep your soap lasting longer. 

 

Buy 2, Get 3 for $22
 With FREE Shipping to the US

 

 

Eliminate

Soap Waste

 

Sud Stud V2 expands up to 200% to fit your favorite soap brands while effectively limiting the surface area of soap to help it last up to 5 times longer creating less waste over time.

 

A Larger Body to Fit More Soaps

For maximum soap compatibility, the Sud Stud V2 is 15% larger and expands up to 200% its regular size.

We listened to you about the difficulty of installing soaps inside Sud Stud. To make it easier than ever, we increased the size of the Sud Stud V2 by 15% while also trimming down the opening a little bit to help keep soap inside while washing. Sud Stud V2 has been tested with:

  • Sud Stud Soaps — 3.2 oz natural cold-pressed soaps
  • Dr. Squatch — 5 oz natural soaps
  • Oars + Alps— 6 oz natural moisturizing bar soaps
  • Dove Beauty Bar — 4 oz dermatologist-endorsed bar
  • LUSH Outback Mate — *Size may vary, for testing, we used a 5 oz cut of this premium natural soap
  • Harry's Bar Soap — 5 oz soaps made by scientists.
  • Duke Cannon — You can cut the 9oz soap in half extending the life of your soap even further!
  • Old Spice — 4oz soap bars in your favorite scents
  • Irish Spring — 3.7 - 6oz bar soaps available

 

 

Reduced Surface Area for Soaps

To finish one bar of soap with Sud Stud, a regular soap bar user would have used 4-5 bars of soap.

Sud Stud V2's honeycomb pattern reduces the surface area of soap by up to 80%. so that water isn't hitting parts of the soap and washing away unused soap molecules, making your soap last up to 5 times longer. 

 

Long-Term Environmental Benefits.

Made with durable silicone, Sud Stud is built to last 50 times longer than plastic poofs and loofahs.

Natural soap bars can have a smaller impact on the environment over time, especially if the brand practices environmentally sustainable sourcing and material usage. Body washes tend to come in plastic bottles, which depending on who's using it, may or may not make it to the recycling plant. 

*Did You Know? — Pumps sometimes included with plastic body wash bottles are not directly recyclable. They are made from mixed materials that are difficult for most facilities to separate!

 
 
Buy  2, Get 3 for $22
 With FREE Shipping to the US
 

 

Prevent

Bacteria Growth

 

Sud Stud is made with anti-bacterial medical-grade silicone that's BPA free, safe for dishwashers, and designed to help your soap dry quickly in between uses.

 

Medical-Grade Antibacterial Silicone

Unlike traditional loofahs and poofs, Sud Stud is antibacterial and eliminates bacteria build-up often caused in humid environments.

By design, silicone is naturally anti-bacterial. As a completely "sealed" surface, water cannot enter silicone where bacteria and mold can grow over time. This helps keep Sud Stud germ free over time. 

 

Optimized Drain for Quick Drying

When not in use, Sud Stud V2 can be easily hung, draining excess water to help your soap last when not in use.

When not in use, hang Sud Stud with it’s re-engineered tie-hole. This ensures your Sud Stud hangs to dry with drain holes on the bottom of your Sud Stud, which are small enough to keep slivers of soap inside.

 

Easy to Clean and Sanitize

Thanks to the durability of medical-grade silicone, you can sanitize your Sud Stud in minutes. 

Leaving Sud Stud in boiling water for a few minutes is enough to kill any surface-level bacteria that can accumulate over time and know that the bacteria isn't stuck inside your Sud Stud. 

*Dishwasher Safe — Our silicone is BPA-Free and can withstand high-temperature washes and boiling water. Leave in one dishwasher cycle for complete sanitation.

 

Durable and Tear-Resistant

Thanks to the strength of stretchy medical-grade silicone, Sud Stud V2 will last significantly longer than leading bathroom products. 

With a long lifespan, Sud Stud stands up to daily use and performs the same wash after wash. 

 

Five Great Color Options

Match your personal style with Sud Stud including our newly unlocked Cosmic Purple and Green! Thank you to everyone who voted!

At the end of the campaign, all backers will be able to confirm their color choices, along with shipping address.

Help us reach $100,000 raised and we'll unlock a 5th color option. Vote now in the comments!

Thanks to your support, Backers have unlocked the rubber ducky stretch goal at $75k. At the end of the campaign, every backer will receive a rubber duck with their order. At the end of the campaign, you can opt-in to receive the duck!

 

Handmade Natural Cold Pressed Soaps

Made in the USA, Sud Stud Bar Soaps are made with all-natural vegan ingredients through artisan cold-processing. We've chosen six incredible scents to choose from, each bar of soap is optimally sized to fit inside your Sud Stud V2.

  • Cup of Joe — Start the day with a strong, caffeinated cup of Joe! Featuring a rich coffee fragrance and coffee grounds for a simulation exfoliation. 
    Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Soybean Oil, Corn Oil, Sunflower Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Water, Lye, Coffee Grounds, Fragrance

  • Galactic Scrub — WARNING: This soap may feel like it's from another planet, star, or galaxy. It's not. Featuring Lemongrass, patchouli, and white tea Galactic Scrub smells as fun as it looks!
    Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Soybean Oil, Corn Oil, Sunflower Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Sea Salt, Water, Lye, Fragrance, Colorant

  • Tripping in the Desert — Dude...do you smell that sage? After a long day in the dirt, this soap features warming sage and few other choice greens to perfect to get rid of the toughest of dirt.
    Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Soybean Oil, Corn Oil, Sunflower Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Water, Lye, Fragrance, Colorant

  • Purple Craze — Yup - you can already smell this soap just by looking at it. Calming lavender and oakmoss come together in this bright soap. Blended with sea salt for gentle exfoliation.
    Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Soybean Oil, Corn Oil, Sunflower Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Water, Lye, Sea Salt, Fragrance, Colorant

  • Kraken’s Wreck — Rising from the deep comes one heck of a scent that combines beachy sandalwood with the burnt remains of charred pirate wrecks (activated charcoal for exfoliation).
    ​Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Soybean Oil, Corn Oil, Hemp Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Water, Lye, Activated Charcoal, Fragrance

  • Earthy Cookies & Cream — While this soap looks delicious, it smells even better! A strong earthy fragrance from cedarwood, patchouli, and more to brighten your day as a milkshake would. 
    Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Soybean Oil, Corn Oil, Sunflower Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Water, Lye, Sea Salt, Activated Charcoal, Fragrance

 

 

 

Compared to Leading Bathroom Products:

The next evolution to shower products, Sud Stud improves on some of the common issues faced with Loofahs, Brushes and poofs.

 

 

Sud Stud V2

Up Close.

 

 

*Measurements redacted to protect IP.

  • Size — Optimally sized to fit the most common soap bar sizes up to 6oz with the ability to adapt without much effect on the overall efficiency of Sud Stud V2's features. 
  • Shape — Hexagonal shape is the optimal design for compatibility with the most popular rectangle and square-shaped soap bars while also being compatible with round, or other irregular shaped soap bars.
  • Pillars — Internally, there are 6 pillars that provide support for the edges and holds the soap in place while also allowing SudStud to maintain form as the bather grips or squeezes while scrubbing.
  • Bristles — To maximize the cleaning power behind Sud Stud V2, over 900 bristles provide gentle exfoliation while still effectively removing dirt, grime and bacteria.
  • Combs — Patented Honeycomb design reduces friction between soap and skin by 80% that allows one single bar of soap to last 5x longer.
  • Tie-Hole — Optimally placed to hang your Sud Stud to dry, the larger tie-hole makes it easy to install the included strap while allowing the drain holes to remove excess water.
  • Materials —  Antimicrobial medical-grade silicone out-performs other materials and remains flexible, durable, fast to dry, easy to clean for our users.
  • Slimmer Entry Point— Allows for soaps near the end of their extended life to stay inside Sud Stud while washing while also providing traction to hold onto large bars of soap.

 

Easy for Anyone to Use
 

 

 

Meet Dale of Sud Stud

 

Hi, I'm Dale Lin, Inventor of Sud Stud and the Sud Stud V2.

I'm an inventor and entrepreneur with a proven track record in creating fun and unique products. My first campaign, "Revoq" delivered to over 1,700 backers in 2017. As a soap connoisseur, I created Sud Stud as a way to not only help great smelling soaps last longer but to create a better cleaning experience. 

In 2019, we launched Sud Stud, which has delivered to over 10,000 customers worldwide! We've since expanded into offering high-quality soaps made with natural ingredients through an artisanal cold-press process here in the United States and more. 

I'm coming back to crowdfund the Sud Stud V2, the ultimate cleaning experience. 

 

Why We Made a V2

After listening to customers on their experience with Sud Stud, we knew we needed to make some adjustments. The V1, a smaller sleeve, is best for popular soaps like Irish Spring and Zest, but not optimally sized for larger brands and sizes. With the Sud Stud V2, we improve on the sizing as well as introduce a new bristle side for all-around cleaning efficiency. We can't wait to see what you think!

 

Sud Stud V2 Roadmap

 

 

 

Share the Suds!!!

Buy 2, Get 3 for $22
 With FREE Shipping to the US
