story:
Our Story

We are Nestiv, an online architectural marketplace.  We were founded to provide architects with additional work options and clients with the best designs. Our mission is to improve the quality of housing for everyone.  This is not merely a statement, but a vital part of our business plan.


A part of this, we are sponsoring an architecture competition, Nestiv's Housing Values. This is a nationwide competition whose deadline is March 31st.


The Impact

Our Indie Go Go campaign is designed to help give work and hope to architects who are at risk of being left behind due to the recession.  According to a recent study, architecture graduates have the highest rate of unemployment of any major.  While the housing market recovery is thought to have started in late 2011, young graduates will 


What We Need & What You Get

Since we are a small, self-financed startup, we need our help launching this competition.  Let us know what people like you want out of home designs, sign up to become a judge today!  This Indie Go Go campaign isn't just about raising money, its about finding out what people want, engaging design enthusiasts, and spreading the word.  


If we do not raise our goal, Nestiv will still carry out the competition to the best of their ability, but we may have to lessen the number of awards.  Any excess money raised will be dedicated to increasing to prize money, towards a future competition, or be used in another way that directly assists architects.  None of the funds will ever be put into operational funds for Nestiv, all funds raised will go towards struggling architects.  If, for some reason, the competition does not happen, all pledges will be fully refunded.


Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends, acquaintances, and colleges about us!  We are always looking to get the word out to architects, potential supporters, and prospective clients.
story_txt:
Our Story
We are Nestiv, an online architectural marketplace.  We were founded to provide architects with additional work options and clients with the best designs. Our mission is to improve the quality of housing for everyone.  This is not merely a statement, but a vital part of our business plan.

A part of this, we are sponsoring an architecture competition, Nestiv's Housing Values. This is a nationwide competition whose deadline is March 31st.

story:
"We Created The World's First Professional Frozen Drinks Machine Custom Built for Homes, At The World's Most Affordable Price" 



As Featured On



Hi Backers!

Dan here,  Co-Founder of the iSlush  and the World's Most Passionate Slushy Lover! 


My Partners and I at The Slushy Guys Pty Ltd are absolutely pumped to finally unveil the World's First, World's Most Compact, World's Most Attractive, World's Lightest and the World's "Most Affordable" Professional Grade Slushy Machine to market!  


First came the kettle, then came the toaster, followed by the coffee machine and finally the iSlush! The natural evolution of home appliances for the kitchen!

The iSlush Blows The Competition out of the Water!

 

Take a look at how we weigh up against the industry standard:-



We are selling at WHOLESALE so you can save BIG $$$ 

The iSlush is a 24/7 Party on your kitchen bench loved by Adults, Children, Family & Friends and is the WOW factor at any event!

Here's the FUN PART ! Which colour best suits Your home or business??

Black Pearl

Ruby Red

Sapphire Blue

Diamond Yellow

Sterling Silver

Sunstone Orange

Moonstone White

What about our mouthwatering flavours?

Check-out our awesome range & score massive discounts on your first order!

 http://product.theislush.com/index.php#Flavors


Join nearly 8,000 fans and follow us on facebook 

at https://www.facebook.com/THEiSlush/



So you are impressed and want to order, so what do you get?


Now That's Value at its Best ! 


We also provide a  Warranty: 12 Months Parts & Workmanship !

HAPPY DAYS !

Perfect for the Home AND  Business Environment ! 

HOPE TO SEE YOU ON BOARD !

THANKS - Team iSlush




Risks & Challenges

We all know that poor preparation results in poor performance, so the team at T.S.G have made it our number one priority, to be focused solely on executing a well planned, and well prepared campaign.

We needed to invest a huge amount of time, endure a lot of trial and error and commitment along our journey to Indiegogo, and there's a lot of positives to report. On that note, here is a few Risks & Challenges we have addressed and continue to keep a rock solid eye on:-

MANUFACTURING: Tooling, iSlush mold creation, engineering and design are all very costly necessities in bringing our product to life. We have been working closely with our supplier to ensure all components, compliance and procedures are super tight, and as per our specification requirements. We will continue to monitor this daily whilst we move into our volume production stage.

AESTHETIC MODIFICATIONS: We are continuously working with our design partners to levitate their ideas into the iSlush. There may be some visual and internal operational adjustments to come which are in place to ensure our machine hits the market with the most simplistic, and visually appealing areas completely covered off.

FULFILLMENT: Nothing worse than ordering your very own iSlush, waiting teeth-grit to crack open the box and get slushing, but become disheartened when you find out its going to be delayed by 3 months! 
That's why we have partnered with an internationally recognized powerhouse to take care of our end-to-end delivery requirements. Our fulfillment partner works within incredibly strict time frames, and have an impressive track record in sea and air freight transportation. Slight delays may be expected based on total volume of sales, so we do ask for some flexibility.

There is always, however, the unforeseeable, like natural disasters or machinery breakdowns which cause your iSlush to be delayed. If this does happen, you will be updated fast and efficiently to avoid concern, and with that comes a detailed understanding as to why your iSlush was delayed, accompanied by an honest, future date of expectation to reach your door-step. Transparency is key, and you can expect nothing less from us.

Any pledge amount means the world to us. When you back this project, you are making an investment not just in a slushy machine for your home or business, but a commitment to bring millions of people around the world true happiness, and to us, that's what its all about.

story:
WHAT IS FlipFlic™?

FlipFlic™ is the smart blinds controller that automates ordinary window blinds in seconds and with no tools.


FlipFlic™ is the smart blinds controller that automates ordinary window blinds in seconds and with no tools.

“It could be one of the best deals in the smart-blinds industry.” - CNET

“FlipFlic, at its core, works.” - The Verge

“Fantastic and affordable example of home automation.” - Inhabitat

"FlipFlic wants to make our homes more comfortable and technologically advanced." - MacSources

"Imagine you didn’t have to get up to adjust your blinds anymore."  - eeDesignIT

"I am jealous that I did not think of that to keep rooms cool and workable." - Connectivist

"For anyone familiar with the with the concept of the passive solar design, FlipFlic’s usefulness should be clear: for comfort’s sake, a home should take advantage of the sun when advantageous (mainly in winter), and not be overheated when sunlight is over-abundant (mainly in summer). " SolarChoice

"FlipFlic looks simple at first until you consider the work that takes place mechanically and in the control system." - Engineering.com

"It is compact, solar-powered, and easy-to-install." - HomeToys

"Many of us may find ourselves walking around our homes twisting and opening them and some of us have already given up doing that." -  Neowin

"Sometimes even a simple flick of the wrist involves more effort than a task truly requires."  Digital Trends


FlipFlic: KEY FEATURES


PRODUCT DETAILS

FlipFlic fills the gap offering a smart, easy-to-install, affordable solution for window coverings. Set it and forget it!

Easy 3 Steps Installation

Installation of FlipFlic takes seconds. In one click, the small device attaches to your window blinds magnetically. No tools needed!

Horizontal and Vertical Blinds

FlipFlic for Horizontal Blinds fits horizontal Venetian blinds, where the twist / rod / tilting wand can be detached. Please check your blinds beforehand. FlipFlic works with 1''/25mm/ mini blinds up to 78'' (200 cm) wide and 2''/50 mm/ blinds up to 60'' (152 cm) wide.

NOTE: Are your horizontal blinds tilted by pulling cords/strings? We are launching a different design for them soon, get into waitlist here: http://eepurl.com/bVIgo1.


FlipFlic for Vertical Blinds has the same features. It works with vertical blinds with either wand- or chain- control of the slats position. It is super easy to install. Snap FlipFlic from either side of the headrail right on the rotating shaft. It also detaches easily. Make sure you have 2 inches to the wall from either side of the headrail to fit the device.

Automatic Control

Wouldn't it be great if your blinds could adjust by themselves? No need to take out your phone. We fitted FlipFlic with a timer, light and temperature sensors. We developed default software algorithms to keep the amount of sunlight and heat at your comfort level. FlipFlic makes sure it is never too hot or too cold.

Solar-Powered

 App in Action

Smart Home Integration

FlipFlic can be integrated into your pre-existing smart home systems via BLE and ZigBee:

and counting... FlipFlic will accommodate new smart home integrations by one step firmware updates installed using the mobile app.

We are members of Icontrol Labs, which ensures the ZigBee firmware in FlipFlic will be Icontrol-certified and available to users of supported smart home solutions powered by Icontrol Networks. This means Flipflic will be compatible with other Icontrol-supported products (like ADT Pulse, Xfinity Home, PEQ, Piper) and eligible for distribution through their service provider channels.

  • 3-6 V Motor rotates tilting mechanism of blinds up to 60'' (152 cm) wide.
  • Temperature sensor triggers opening/closing if it gets too hot or too cold.
  • Ambient light sensor detects indoor light levels and is used for managing sunlight and optionally triggering night automations for privacy.
  • Timer allows scheduling, sleep mode at night, wake-up in the morning.
  • Rechargeable LiPo battery more than 500 mAh.
  • Magnets for tools-free installation.
  • TI CC2650 SoC Bluetooth 4.0 connects FlipFlic to the app (iOS, Android) on your mobile device. ZigBee connects FlipFlic to your smart home system.
  • MicroUSB port for standard USB charging.
  • ON/OFF Switch
  • LED indicates power status (on/off), Bluetooth connectivity status, and battery recharging status.

FlipFlic Full-Pack:
  • FlipFlic device
  • Micro USB cable
  • Solar panel
  • Rod adaptors
  • Custom brackets for the valance

PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT AND MANUFACTURING

The FlipFlic's design is set. We are now moving into integrations and pre-production. This means we expect to see only minor changes before product release. Our next phase will be focused on testing for design validation, PCB, and design updates after tests, completing the required certifications, packaging design, and spinning up our production lines. 


 

PROJECT HISTORY

The First Prototype

The first proof-of-concept prototype was Wi-Fi connected and worked on 6 AA batteries. It was called Jalousier. It got lots of attention in 2014. It also secured our selection to Buildit Hardware Accelerator where we became the company and started working on the project full-time. The FlipFlic team moved to Estonia, where in 9 months, we built a sellable and scalable prototype, took first pre-orders, and raised a small angel round

The Second Prototype

Comfee, our next prototype already had a custom PCB. A two-module system allowed for installation on the right and left sides of blinds. It was a fully functioning BLE beta. We soft-molded it in silicon and made 100 beta-units. Getting to this stage allowed us to secure angel funding and get selected to Highway1 Accelerator in San Francisco, USA. We also learned a lot about delivering a hardware product and all the hidden costs.

We shipped over 100 units of our beta design.

The Final Prototype and Vertical Version

It has taken a while! The team relocated the company and business to the US in August 2015. During the three-month program, leading hardware experts and founders of other smart home companies advised us.

A trip to China, Shenzhen to establish the connection to Chinese manufacturers brought FlipFlic to the next level. Now the team is ready to ramp up mass production.

We are proud to present to the Kickstarter community our final generation of FlipFlic Horizontal and its new version: FlipFlic Vertical. But, there is more to come!


We believe new products should be born from the needs and wishes of the consumer.

Where do your funds go?

  • Setting up tooling for production 
  • Ordering the components for the first production run 
  • CE and FCC certification costs 
  • Android and iOS app development and testing

ABOUT US

 We are alumni and proud members of Hardware Accelerators community:

Follow us!

Twitter

Facebook

Special thanks for their help and support to:

  • FlipFlic first testers, supporters, and first extremely patient backers, especially Sebastien, Tasos, Frank, Kyle, Yoann, Ramon, Phil, Steven, Murat Tepecik, Martin, Gordon, Andrew, and John! 
  • Sven, Aleksander, Toomas, and Indrek @Buildit.ee 
  • Brady, Kaethe, Marcus, Cilian, Ryan, Daniel, Jon @Highway1.io
  • Chad, David, Joe @PCHIntl
  • Kuido Lepik, Rene Tonnisson, Ivar Dembovski, Dewang Nerrala, Kaushal Chokshi, Mandar Gadkari, Marta Emerson for making it happen!
  • Lucas, Agne @HWTrek
  • Alice, Irene @SVIEF
  • Eugene Zhukov JoonJuly.com 
  • Latelier-Marketing.com for the great video 
  • Aleksander Nesterenko and artkb.net team 
  • Ivaylo Kalburdzhiev from dayonefunding.com 
  • Maksim Zubkov
  • Mark from birdi.io
  • Ivan O'Neil @iControl Networks 
  • Mauro and his team @Marinello Tende, Italy
  • Yoann from Mariton AS, France

This is where we need you, the Indiegogo community. Your support and feedback are essential for FlipFlic success!

THANK YOU!

SHARING IS CARING

Get $10 on Amazon Gift Card per each FlipFlic your friends buy FlipFlic using your personal URL. That means you could earn your FlipFlic for free!

Here’s how:

  1. Login to your Indiegogo account.

  2. Go to our campaign page, and click on the link button.

  3. Copy your personal URL link.

  4. Share it with your friends and family!

How To Track Your Referrals

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.

  2. Click on your username on the top right of the page.

  3. Select the “My Profile” option.

  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of Referrals and Contributions.

  5. Referral credits will be gifted as an Amazon Gift Cards every two months since May 16th.


GET PRESS KIT

Without the solar panel, we estimate that recharging may be required approximately once every 30 days of average use. 
*The final form-factor (squared or long and thin) shall be defined in Backer Survey.FlipFlic App
With FlipFlic, app users can program all settings individually. You can instantly open/close the blinds, or simply let FlipFlic use its light and temperature sensors and adjust automatically.

story:
Introducing Silvon Cleancloth®

A premium kitchen towel engineered to permanently eliminate harmful bacteria like E.coli and Salmonella*. It's woven with pure silver and organic cotton, providing revolutionary protection, and unmatched softness and absorbency.  

 

The Problem:

Constantly used and rarely washed, kitchen towels are a breeding ground for bacteria and primary source of cross contamination. (Cross contamination is when bacteria is unintentionally transferred from one surface to another )

There are an estimated 582 million cases of food-borne diseases, and 351,000 associated deaths worldwide. And 28% were a result of cross contamination.

Our Solution

Our Micro-fine fibers are carefully coated with pure silver, and proven to prevent the growth of bacteria like Salmonella and E.coli on the towel. By twisting these silver fibers with organic cotton, the Silvon Towel stops this bacterial growth while remaining lusciously soft and absorbent.

All natural, no chemicals

We use advanced yarn made with pure silver right here in the USA. Similar products rely on cheaper, synthetic alternatives that wash out over time.

Backed by real science

We’ve partnered with one of the world’s leading microbiology labs to test our towels. Where they expose our towels to E.coli and Salmonella and after 4 hours found E.coli was reduced by 96.8% and Salmonella by 92.5%.

Lab Report

Certifications: The international standard (ISO) 20743, is the test method used on Silvon products. This method is designed to test the ability of fabrics to prevent microbial growth. Simply put, fabric samples are exposed to bacteria, and the antimicrobial activity is closely monitored and measured.

How it works

Silvon relies on the oligodynamic effects of natural silver, a well regarded antibacterial property that destroys bacteria cells. This technology has been verified by more than a decade of testing at research institutions including Pennsylvania State University and Cornell University.  

The result is a 99% reduction in bacteria on the fabric surface, drastically reducing the risk of cross contamination.

Rewards:

Why us:

Over the past year we’ve launched the world famous bed sheets and bath towels. We’ve raised over $2 million from 16,000+ backers. This is just the beginning of our journey to revolutionize the fabrics that are part of our everyday lives.

We pored over research, studies and customer feedback to see what other products could benefit from our advanced silver yarn. From there, we set out to take this research and design another product that could help everyone. After months of prototypes and lab tests, we've created a kitchen towel that we know you'll love.

Production Timeline

  1. Product Design - June
  2. Product Testing - July
  3. Sample Creation - July
  4. Material Testing - August
  5. Campaign Creation - September/October
  6. Campaign Begins - November
  7. Funding Closes - January
  8. Antimicrobial Materials Ordered - January
  9. Organic Cotton Ordered - January
  10. Materials Arrive At Factory - February
  11. Production Start - March
  12. Material Asembly - April
  13. Final Production Delivery - May/June/July

PRESS KIT
story_txt:
Introducing Silvon Cleancloth®A premium kitchen towel engineered to permanently eliminate harmful bacteria like E.coli and Salmonella*. It's woven with pure silver and organic cotton, providing revolutionary protection, and unmatched softness and absorbency.   The Problem:Constantly used and rarely washed, kitchen towels are a breeding ground for bacteria and primary source of cross contamination. (Cross contamination is when bacteria is unintentionally transferred from one surface to another )There are an estimated 582 million cases of food-borne diseases, and 351,000 associated deaths worldwide. And 28% were a result of cross contamination.Our SolutionOur Micro-fine fibers are carefully coated with pure silver, and proven to prevent the growth of bacteria like Salmonella and E.coli on the towel. By twisting these silver fibers with organic cotton, the Silvon Towel stops this bacterial growth while remaining lusciously soft and absorbent.All natural, no chemicalsWe use advanced yarn made with pure silver right here in the USA. Similar products rely on cheaper, synthetic alternatives that wash out over time.Backed by real scienceWe’ve partnered with one of the world’s leading microbiology labs to test our towels. Where they expose our towels to E.coli and Salmonella and after 4 hours found E.coli was reduced by 96.8% and Salmonella by 92.5%.Lab ReportCertifications: The international standard (ISO) 20743, is the test method used on Silvon products. This method is designed to test the ability of fabrics to prevent microbial growth. Simply put, fabric samples are exposed to bacteria, and the antimicrobial activity is closely monitored and measured.How it worksSilvon relies on the oligodynamic effects of natural silver, a well regarded antibacterial property that destroys bacteria cells. This technology has been verified by more than a decade of testing at research institutions including Pennsylvania State University and Cornell University.  The result is a 99% reduction in bacteria on the fabric surface, drastically reducing the risk of cross contamination.Rewards:Why us:Over the past year we’ve launched the world famous bed sheets and bath towels. We’ve raised over $2 million from 16,000+ backers. This is just the beginning of our journey to revolutionize the fabrics that are part of our everyday lives.We pored over research, studies and customer feedback to see what other products could benefit from our advanced silver yarn. From there, we set out to take this research and design another product that could help everyone. After months of prototypes and lab tests, we've created a kitchen towel that we know you'll love.Production Timeline
Product Design - June

Product Testing - July

Sample Creation - July

Material Testing - August

Campaign Creation - September/October

Campaign Begins - November

Organic Cotton Ordered - January

Materials Arrive At Factory - February

Production Start - March

Material Asembly - April

Final Production Delivery - May/June/July

story:
Rich, Danielle, Ellis, Oona, and Madeline

On the evening of Saturday, January 26, 2013, The Cooks pulled into the driveway of their Colchester, Vermont house to find it on fire. Their home has been gutted and their possessions destroyed.  The family is safe and staying in a local hotel until they can find a suitable and affordable two bedroom, dog-friendly, apartment or house. (Anyone??)

Help us reach $15,000!! The $2,500 goal was set up low, so minimal fees would be charged  and The Cook's would receive more cash.


Before:

After:


At the moment, The Cooks are striving to maintain normalcy in the lives of their girls, while juggling the bits and pieces of an interim plan for the next 6-12 months and the long-term plan.

Click here to see video of the damage

 They have been stripped of everything that they did not have with them when they had left the house a few hours earlier. Their daughters have lost all of their toys and clothing. Rich's fabulous collection of Mid-Century furniture has been destroyed. Please help these wonderful people rebuild their lives. Donate here online, OR:


This Just IN...... Trattoria Delia and Sotto Enoteca         

Thursday, February 6, 2014 

... wonderful evening of food and wine at another Burlington restaurant offering a percentage of their sales to The Cooks. 


15% of Sales Donated to Cook Family 

Danielle Miller-Cook a dear friend to us all and former employee at Trattoria Delia of nine years is dealing with the shock and aftermath of loosing her home to a fire. Danielle, her husband Richard and the girls are fine. To help them piece their lives back together we will be donating 15% of sales at Trattoria Delia and Sotto Enoteca to the Cook family.

Trattoria Delia 152 St Paul St, Burlington, VT 05401 (802) 864-5253 http://www.trattoriadelia.com

Sotto Enoteca Next Door to Trattoria Delia on St. Paul St in Burlington  Read about the new wine bar here in 7Days





HEN OF THE WOOD, Fundraiser

Thursday, January 30, 2013

Danielle's employer, Hen of the Wood, Burlington, VT has announced a benefit night for The Cooks at BOTH Hen of the Wood Restaurants in Burlington and Waterbury. 15% of their sales on that night will go to The Cooks.

Checks made out to Danielle Cook may be sent directly to:

Hen of The Wood 55 Cherry Street, Burlington, Vermont 05401 https://www.facebook.com/henofthewoodburlington


Let's surpass the goal we have set here!

It is actually lower than we think they deserve, but if we hit the goal, then more cash will go to The Cooks. Let's do this!!!!

story:
Thank you for helping us bring our first product to life. We want to give you a free Woerden apron as a gift. We'll send you one apron for each rolling pin pledged :)

Woerden Designs

We help you build your 5-star quality kitchen! Let's start with your rolling pin:

 

Wooden rolling pins absorb moisture and flavors. The best solution is to use a metal rolling pin, but stainless steel can leave a metallic aftertaste. Titanium is the perfect metal, because it's the most biocompatible metal on the planet, plus it doesn't leave any taste on your food. 

The Woerden SolidTi Rolling Pin is the first rolling pin made of a single piece of solid 100% Titanium in the world. Highly polished, tapered design for perfect results every time! The solid construction makes it easy to roll cookies, pies, fondant, biscuits, pizza crusts, ravioli, tortillas, dumplings, roti and more. If you are looking for 5-star results and want an heirloom tool that will last through the generations, this belongs in your kitchen.

What's so special about Titanium?

  • Remains the original taste of any food, used extensively in high end kitchenware
  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body 
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum 
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength
  • Less than half the density of steel, perfectly weighted for a quality feel

The shape makes it really easy to get a completely flat circle of dough. Never absorb any odors, colors or flavors like maple or mahogany wood rolling pins can,  Woerden Rolling Pin is also the most hygienic, since it can be completely cleaned with ease.

Tapered at the ends, it's comfortable to use.

A perfectly weighted rolling pin, beautiful balanced brings a delight to use and gives you a  solid feeling to it. 

Highly polished finish, no sticky issues! The high polished surface makes for a great showpiece in any kitchen.

Simple to clean by hand or in the dishwasher.

653 grams. A solid feeling! 

Pledge now and help us bring this solid Titanium rolling pin to life!

Thank you to BackerPoints for supporting our campaign, they are awesome!

story:
Enabling a Healthier Lifestyle

Higher consumption of white rice is associated with a significantly increased risk of type 2 diabetes, especially in Asian populations.

The Story

When my dad was diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes, his response was to assure me that this was a blessing which opened up a path for us to help others going through the same challenges. So when the doctor recommended that significant dietary changes needed to be made, we turned to science to find a solution. According to the American Diabetes Association, starches cooked "al-dente" are healthier than starches cooked until soft. Using this knowledge, my family discovered that the nutritional value of our traditional staple food, rice, could also be improved by using the "al-dente" cooking process, where rice is boiled in excess water and the water is drained out before the rice is fully soft. The nutritional effects of the change in cooking method were validated by a food lab, which found that samples of rice that were cooked "al-dente" had 25% fewer carbs and calories than rice cooked in a rice cooker, which means that "al-dente" rice is not only healthier for diabetics, but it is healthier for everyone!

However, the manual "al-dente" cooking process is a significant time sink and cannot compete with the automation and convenience provided by rice cookers. This is why Simple Kitchen developed Al-Dente, a kitchen appliance that automates the draining of water during cooking, thereby providing the convenience of rice cookers with the health benefits of "al-dente" cooking.

The Ask

I am asking for $5000 in order to take a proof of concept prototype and develop five alpha version rice cookers that I can get into people's hands. The money will go towards:

  • Product development and design expenses, including engineering consulting time
  • Product testing to ensure reliability
With the progress that has been made so far, it is my firm belief that this product deserves to see the light of day. Your help will make this possible and enable the product to reach market readiness. 

Your support is critical to designing a product that has the following features:

  • Simplicity of use: design for a user experience that enables simplest possible use, namely "insert ingredients and press a button"
  • Ease of maintenance: making the product easy to clean
  • Reliability: assessing points of failure and ensuring product lifetime
As an engineer with experience in robotics, I have full faith that these challenges can be solved with a little tinkering. Thank you!

The Impact

Al-Dente has the potential to improve health outcomes globally. Rice is one of the most consumed foods in the world, with over 50 countries that consume at least 47 grams of rice per capita per day. 

Imagine if every cup of rice consumed had a lower glycemic index, lower carbohydrate content, and fewer calories, how much healthier the world would be!

The Future Vision

Al-Dente has the potential to automate the cooking of any food that is cooked by boiling and draining water, including:

  • Potatoes
  • Vegetables
  • Noodles
  • Quinoa
  • Couscous
  • Pasta
  • Beans
  • Lentils
At Simple Kitchen, we believe that humanity is too precious to be wasted on waiting for water to boil

story:
Individual and Family tickets for the Summer 2014 Briarwood Pool Fundraising Event are $50 for families, $25 for individuals. Pay for your tickets here or make alternative/additional contributions. You will get food and refreshments, see live music by Scot Albert Johnson and Chalmers Davis, T B Ledford, and Joe Carroll, take part in a raffle, and spend a great evening with friends and family.

Friends of the Briarwood Pool partnered with the YMCA in 2014 to help keep a valuable community resource open and serving members of the community. Our initial fundraising effort was highly successful and provided the funds needed to make updates and repairs, both large and small, to the facility and enable the YMCA to open the pool for the 2014 season. It brought together a diverse group of people who wanted to ensure that individuals and families would have a cool place to go during the hot summer. The Briarwood Dolphins Swim Team registration was 93 this year, up from 63 in 2013. 

Additional repairs and upgrades, such as a new roof on the poolhouse, are still in the works, and we need to maintain capital reserves that are sufficient to respond to unforeseen events.

Let's make 2015 another great year at the Briarwood Pool!!!

story:
This Campaign has been successfully funded and you can order directly on ettitude website now!

Bedding Reinvented to Fight Unwanted Odour and Bacteria

There is no better feeling than crawling into clean fresh sheets at the end of a busy day. However, sometimes fitting in time to wash your sheets regularly can be a struggle. We have created a technologically advanced bedding range that offers all the advantages of bamboo lyocell fabric but with the added benefit of bamboo charcoal.

This miracle natural ingredient enables the sheets to remain fresh for longer. The excellent deodorising and bacteria fighting abilities mean you don't need to wash them as often. Save time, water and electricity! They also feel as soft and luxurious as silk, but at half the price. You will love these sheets and they will love you back.

 

Why You Want to Sleep With Bamboo Charcoal

 

This Is How Your New Favourite Bedding Looks

 

What Is Bamboo Charcoal?

Bamboo charcoal is produced from burning organic bamboo at 800°C then grinding and filtering it into nano-sized powder. Organic bamboo charcoal is 100% safe to use in fabric and directly on our skin. In fact, bamboo charcoal has already been widely used with great success in beauty products, water filters, even foods and medicines! It eliminates odours, absorbs excess moisture and purifies water.

 

 

What Is Bamboo Lyocell?

Bamboo lyocell is a fabric that consists of fibre made from dissolving organic bamboo pulp. We are the FIRST company in the world to make 100% bamboo lyocell bedding. This fabric is superior to any other bamboo products on the market right now which uses the old fashioned viscose/rayon process. 

Lyocell fabrication process is the most sustainable fabrication process, using a closed-loop system. 99% of the organic solvent and water in the process is recycled and reused up to 200 times. This process has minimal environmental impact,  with economical use of both energy and water. Bamboo lyocell fabric is incredibly soft, silky and super breathable. 

 

 

Bamboo Charcoal + Lyocell

Bamboo charcoal powder is added in the bamboo lyocell fabrication process to create the world's healthiest bedding fabric.

 

 

Why Organic Bamboo Charcoal Powder Works?

Bamboo charcoal powder's ultra-fine structure contains millions of tiny gaps, which allows 1 gram of bamboo charcoal powder to cover a surface area of 600 square meters. This super porous structure of bamboo charcoal powder absorbs bacteria, unwanted odour and wicks away sweat up to 50% quicker than cotton. 

According to research, bamboo charcoal can absorb formaldehyde at a rate of 16% ~ 19.39%; as for benzene, the rate is 8.69% ~ 10.08%; as for toluene, the rate is 5.65% ~ 8.42%; ammonia with the rate of 22.73% ~ 30.65%; chloroform with the high rate of 40.68%. Bamboo Charcoal fiber also effectively decomposes the micro-organisms attached to its surface and in the air around it. According to ASTME2149 (The American Association for Testing and Materials) test method and standards, bamboo charcoal fiber has an antimicrobial rate of 84%.

 

We are giving your bedsheets additional anti-microbial properties by fusing bamboo lyocell fabric with bamboo charcoal. 

 

The Most Sustainable Bedding Fabric To Date

Organic bamboo charcoal lyocell is a cruelty-free, vegan-friendly, 100% plant derived fabric that has all the softness and smoothness of silk or high count Egyptian cotton. It is also more sustainable and eco-friendly than any other new types of functional textiles such as silver ion fabric. 

Bamboo fabric is 100% biodegradable, whereas silver is either infused or woven directly into the fabric, it ends up in the landfill and then enters the water system at the end of the product cycle. Silver nanoparticles are antimicrobial because they release silver ‘ions’ – charged molecules of silver – which interfere with processes in living cells. As a result, they have the potential to damage ecologically important bacteria and other microorganisms in soils and aquatic environments, or to accumulate through food chains, which could damage the health of larger creatures including humans.

All our products are made with FSC-certified organic bamboo and pass the Oeko-Tex Standard 100 test to make sure no harmful substances remained in the products at the end of the manufacturing process.

 

We also work closely with our manufacturing partners to make sure all our products are ethically made. Our factory is certified by Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP), which is awarded based upon both internationally and nationally accepted humane workplace standards, safety, and ethical manufacturing regulations.

 

 

 

Enjoy Luxury For Less

By simplifying the traditional retail process and selling directly online to you, we eliminate brick-and-mortar expenses and retail markups and pass these savings onto you. 

Since we are manufacturing and delivering the product directly to you, we are pleased to offer these premium quality bedding to you at up to 40% less than the price of other luxury brands. We also offer FREE DELIVERY for all U.S. and Australia orders.

 

 

Size and Design

We offer simple, elegant designs that will work in any home. Our designs feature neutral colours and patterns. We will email you two weeks after you had pledged to get your selections regarding bedding size, colour and pattern.

There are Dove Grey, Dove Grey with White Grid, Indigo, Mustard & Apricot 5 colour options available.

Dove Grey

Close Up of The Fabric
 
Grid Pattern and Additional Colours 

White Grid Pattern on Dove Grey

 

U.S. Size: Twin, Full, Queen, King, Cali King

 

 

 Australian Size: Single, Double, Queen, King

 

 

 

 

Care Instructions

Bamboo charcoal lyocell bedding is super easy to care for. Just machine wash cold separately and line dry or tumble dry low and you are all set to enjoy them and the long lasting freshness for years to come! We do not recommend using bleaches, as they are usually packed with toxic chemicals. Fabric softener is also not necessary with bamboo sheets – they are already super soft and will stay that way wash after wash.

 

Perks

We offer pillow case, flat/top sheet and duvet cover separately so you can mix and match your bedding essentials.

The Sheet Set (with one fitted sheet and two pillow cases) is the starter kit to complete your bed. You can also add extra flat/top sheet and duvet cover for extra layers of comfort.

 

 

 

 

Add-ons and Adjusting Your Pledge

If you’d like to upgrade your perk to a higher-priced perk, you can do so by following the steps in the link below:

How to Upgrade Your Perk

Or you can pledge multiple perks follow the instructions in the link below:

Add a Perk

 

 

Project Timeline

We manufacture with our long-term manufacturing partners. Our partners helped make the production of our existing product line with thousands of raving customer reviews. We're in safe hands, and confident of a timely delivery.  We have everything lined up––the prototypes have proved successful, our warehouse staff is trained and ready.
 
  • July  Pre-order on IndieGoGo Indemand
  • November All rewards delivered

 

Why Ettitude?

 

 

Ettitude is a sustainable bedding brand offering high quality, modern, minimalistic bedding at accessible prices with a focus on innovative fabric technology. Ettitude is created on the belief that bedding should be healthy, good quality and affordable as we spend 1/3 of our lives in bed. A healthy and comfortable sleep environment is so critical to sleep quality and life quality. We constantly research and develop new sustainable bedding materials that can provide additional health benefits because it's our mission to help everyone have the best night's sleep possible.

We care about doing good from start to finish. So that's why we spend more than a year to create, test and perfect these bamboo charcoal lyocell sheets that start from organic plants, using a highly eco-friendly fabrication process and will completely biodegrade after they provide you with years of comfortable and healthy sleep!

 

What Our Customers Say About Our Original Bamboo Lyocell Sheets

Whether you sleep solo or with your partner you can enjoy the most comfortable night's sleep with our organic bamboo sheets. Here's what our customers think about our existing products...

 

 

You can read more reviews here.  

 

 

Help Us Spread The Word! 

After you support us, we would love it if you helped spread the word. Whether you tell your friends and family via E-mail, Facebook, or Twitter, you’ll be helping us share our brand and get the word out.

Share on Facebook!

 

 

Share on Twitter!      

 

 

Don't forget to follow us on Instagram, Twitter, like us on Facebook for further updates; and if you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us at hello@ettitude.com.au.

 

Risks and challenges

Timely fulfilment of rewards is extremely important to us.

The good news is that Ettitude Bamboo Charcoal Lyocell Collection is the result of a collaboration between us, our long-term manufacturer and fabric suppliers. They've participated at every stage of the development process and have produced many prototypes leading to the final ones you see in our video and on this page.

We have done our best to make realistic projections of the amount of raw materials and the time needed to manufacture the sheets. Based on our past experience, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 10–12 weeks. But we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.

We partnered with the right people, completed all sampling, and sourced the best fabrics, so we're confident to ship the “perfect” sheets that will exceed all your expectations. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about any unplanned hurdles or delays, although, at this point in the project, they are highly unlikely.
 

 

Get Your Project Funded Today!
 

Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

What Is Bamboo Charcoal?
Bamboo charcoal is produced from burning organic bamboo at 800°C then grinding and filtering it into nano-sized powder. Organic bamboo charcoal is 100% safe to use in fabric and directly on our skin. In fact, bamboo charcoal has already been widely used with great success in beauty products, water filters, even foods and medicines! It eliminates odours, absorbs excess moisture and purifies water.
 
 
What Is Bamboo Lyocell?
Bamboo lyocell is a fabric that consists of fibre made from dissolving organic bamboo pulp. We are the FIRST company in the world to make 100% bamboo lyocell bedding. This fabric is superior to any other bamboo products on the market right now which uses the old fashioned viscose/rayon process. 
Lyocell fabrication process is the most sustainable fabrication process, using a closed-loop system. 99% of the organic solvent and water in the process is recycled and reused up to 200 times. This process has minimal environmental impact,  with economical use of both energy and water. Bamboo lyocell fabric is incredibly soft, silky and super breathable. 
 
 
Bamboo Charcoal + Lyocell
Bamboo charcoal powder is added in the bamboo lyocell fabrication process to create the world's healthiest bedding fabric.

 
 
Why Organic Bamboo Charcoal Powder Works?
Bamboo charcoal powder's ultra-fine structure contains millions of tiny gaps, which allows 1 gram of bamboo charcoal powder to cover a surface area of 600 square meters. This super porous structure of bamboo charcoal powder absorbs bacteria, unwanted odour and wicks away sweat up to 50% quicker than cotton. 
According to research, bamboo charcoal can absorb formaldehyde at a rate of 16% ~ 19.39%; as for benzene, the rate is 8.69% ~ 10.08%; as for toluene, the rate is 5.65% ~ 8.42%; ammonia with the rate of 22.73% ~ 30.65%; chloroform with the high rate of 40.68%. Bamboo Charcoal fiber also effectively decomposes the micro-organisms attached to its surface and in the air around it. According to ASTME2149 (The American Association for Testing and Materials) test method and standards, bamboo charcoal fiber has an antimicrobial rate of 84%.
 

We are giving your bedsheets additional anti-microbial properties by fusing bamboo lyocell fabric with bamboo charcoal. 

 
The Most Sustainable Bedding Fabric To Date
Organic bamboo charcoal lyocell is a cruelty-free, vegan-friendly, 100% plant derived fabric that has all the softness and smoothness of silk or high count Egyptian cotton. It is also more sustainable and eco-friendly than any other new types of functional textiles such as silver ion fabric. 
Bamboo fabric is 100% biodegradable, whereas silver is either infused or woven directly into the fabric, it ends up in the landfill and then enters the water system at the end of the product cycle. Silver nanoparticles are antimicrobial because they release silver ‘ions’ – charged molecules of silver – which interfere with processes in living cells. As a result, they have the potential to damage ecologically important bacteria and other microorganisms in soils and aquatic environments, or to accumulate through food chains, which could damage the health of larger creatures including humans.

All our products are made with FSC-certified organic bamboo and pass the Oeko-Tex Standard 100 test to make sure no harmful substances remained in the products at the end of the manufacturing process. 
We also work closely with our manufacturing partners to make sure all our products are ethically made. Our factory is certified by Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP), which is awarded based upon both internationally and nationally accepted humane workplace standards, safety, and ethical manufacturing regulations.
 




 
 
Enjoy Luxury For Less
By simplifying the traditional retail process and selling directly online to you, we eliminate brick-and-mortar expenses and retail markups and pass these savings onto you. 
Since we are manufacturing and delivering the product directly to you, we are pleased to offer these premium quality bedding to you at up to 40% less than the price of other luxury brands. We also offer FREE DELIVERY for all U.S. and Australia orders. 
 
Size and Design
We offer simple, elegant designs that will work in any home. Our designs feature neutral colours and patterns. We will email you two weeks after you had pledged to get your selections regarding bedding size, colour and pattern.
There are Dove Grey, Dove Grey with White Grid, Indigo, Mustard & Apricot 5 colour options available.

Dove Grey


Close Up of The Fabric
 
Grid Pattern and Additional Colours 



White Grid Pattern on Dove Grey


 



U.S. Size: Twin, Full, Queen, King, Cali King
 
  
 Australian Size: Single, Double, Queen, King
 
  
 
 
Care Instructions
Bamboo charcoal lyocell bedding is super easy to care for. Just machine wash cold separately and line dry or tumble dry low and you are all set to enjoy them and the long lasting freshness for years to come! We do not recommend using bleaches, as they are usually packed with toxic chemicals. Fabric softener is also not necessary with bamboo sheets – they are already super soft and will stay that way wash after wash.
 
Perks
We offer pillow case, flat/top sheet and duvet cover separately so you can mix and match your bedding essentials.
The Sheet Set (with one fitted sheet and two pillow cases) is the starter kit to complete your bed. You can also add extra flat/top sheet and duvet cover for extra layers of comfort.
 
 
  
Add-ons and Adjusting Your Pledge
If you’d like to upgrade your perk to a higher-priced perk, you can do so by following the steps in the link below:
How to Upgrade Your Perk
Or you can pledge multiple perks follow the instructions in the link below:
Add a Perk
 
 
Project Timeline
We manufacture with our long-term manufacturing partners. Our partners helped make the production of our existing product line with thousands of raving customer reviews. We're in safe hands, and confident of a timely delivery.  We have everything lined up––the prototypes have proved successful, our warehouse staff is trained and ready.

 


July  Pre-order on IndieGoGo Indemand

November All rewards delivered


 
Why Ettitude?
 
 
Ettitude is a sustainable bedding brand offering high quality, modern, minimalistic bedding at accessible prices with a focus on innovative fabric technology. Ettitude is created on the belief that bedding should be healthy, good quality and affordable as we spend 1/3 of our lives in bed. A healthy and comfortable sleep environment is so critical to sleep quality and life quality. We constantly research and develop new sustainable bedding materials that can provide additional health benefits because it's our mission to help everyone have the best night's sleep possible.
We care about doing good from start to finish. So that's why we spend more than a year to create, test and perfect these bamboo charcoal lyocell sheets that start from organic plants, using a highly eco-friendly fabrication process and will completely biodegrade after they provide you with years of comfortable and healthy sleep!
 
What Our Customers Say About Our Original Bamboo Lyocell Sheets
Whether you sleep solo or with your partner you can enjoy the most comfortable night's sleep with our organic bamboo sheets. Here's what our customers think about our existing products...
 
  
You can read more reviews here.  
 
 
Help Us Spread The Word! 
After you support us, we would love it if you helped spread the word. Whether you tell your friends and family via E-mail, Facebook, or Twitter, you’ll be helping us share our brand and get the word out.
Share on Facebook!
 
 
Share on Twitter!      
 
 
Don't forget to follow us on Instagram, Twitter, like us on Facebook for further updates; and if you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us at hello@ettitude.com.au.
 
Risks and challenges
Timely fulfilment of rewards is extremely important to us.
The good news is that Ettitude Bamboo Charcoal Lyocell Collection is the result of a collaboration between us, our long-term manufacturer and fabric suppliers. They've participated at every stage of the development process and have produced many prototypes leading to the final ones you see in our video and on this page.
We have done our best to make realistic projections of the amount of raw materials and the time needed to manufacture the sheets. Based on our past experience, we anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 10–12 weeks. But we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.We partnered with the right people, completed all sampling, and sourced the best fabrics, so we're confident to ship the “perfect” sheets that will exceed all your expectations. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about any unplanned hurdles or delays, although, at this point in the project, they are highly unlikely.  

Get Your Project Funded Today!
 


Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

story:
The Organization

Founded in 1970 under SNO organization and reorganized in 2004 under SOB organization, ZEI Scouts is a group of SOB that serves approximately 200 students or "scholars" in Beirut, Lebanon in Ashrafieh Site. Its budget is 25,000 USD yearly and its team is a current Leaders of 45 and members of 155. With the assistance of those volunteer mentors and leaders social services and missions are made for the Lebanese society on different scale such as Helping the poor , the ill people , the orphans , the homeless people , the old people , help building youth on Christian Ethics and Patriotic traditions contributing in making this world a better place by working on our selves and the people around us. In summary help MAKING A DIFFERENCE.


 In 2006, Z.E.I. has started a Christmas tradition in which we pick a Mission to do for the Holy days.  From helping a homeless Old Lady on LBCI and providing her a liveable shelter and good food , to making a Christmas journey for orphan kids so that they know they are not alone in this world with Mission de La vie organization...etc



Christmas Mission : DONATE, MAKE A DIFFERENCE

Z.E.I. Scouts & INSAN ASSOCIATION

This year , 2014-2015 , Chief Christelle El Helou & Chief Maroun Abou Chaaya, Lead Chiefs of the Rovers and Caravels, Z.E.I Group and responsible for this event, have decided to collaborate with INSAN ASSOCIATION www.insanassociation.com in order to MAKE A DIFFERENCE.

How ?
Insan Association is an organization that has a mission of defending Humans right.
There are a lot of small Syrian Refugees and Iranian Refugees and lebanese kids without Identity or civil rights (age between 4 and 14) in Lebanon .... What INSAN Association do is raise these kids , provide them a shelter , food , education etc. They try to make them live a normal kids life as far as they can.

Z.E.I. SCOUTS will be making A LONG KERMESS for the 75 child participating from INSAN ASSOCIATION for a whole day on the 28th of December in which there will be :

1- INFLATABLE GAMES AND KERMESS GAMES for all kids in a huge football court.
2- BREAKFAST FOR ALL KIDS.
3- CHRISTMAS TURKEY 'LUNCH MEAL' FOR ALL KIDS.
4- 4 SHOWS TO BE PERFORMED FOR ALL KIDS , 2 DURING THE FORDAY AND 2 DURING THE AFTERNOON.
5- CHRISTMAS GIFTS TO ALL 75 KID. 

We're already starting to get into the Christmas spirit... Help us spread cheer & give back during the Holiday Season and give those kids laughter, hope and a day to remember. 

How can YOU be part of this good deed mission that will ....
How can YOU make a difference ?
DONATE online or Contact us 
Chief Maroun Abou Chaaya   03/945 125 
Chief Christelle El Helou         03/875 318


HELP US ACHIEVE OUR TARGET BY DONATING TO MAKE THIS MISSION POSSIBLE FOR THOSE KIDS.

“He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.”   
                                                    – Roy L. Smith

EVERYONE DESERVES A CHRISTMAS

story:
Blending Organic Forms With Technology Using Wood

Jenny Wong-Stanley has been blending art and science with Art of Plants in her Oakland art studio for several years, and after nearly a year prototyping her lighting for Elliptic Designs, she is ready for production (Follow our progress on Instagram @ellipticdesigns!).

We think very highly of our medium of choice – wood. Each wood species has a "personality" that we respect and cherish. Our inspiration for these lights are the fascinating patterns that analytic geometry produces when modeled and fabricated precisely.  For example, Styles 1-3 of the 'Wave' series design all stem from the same damped sine wave with exponential decay:  1/2 ^(x/h) * a* sin(2* π *( x/w) ).  We realize that it's a bit nerdy but we love this stuff.

Each screen is a tiled pattern that can expand infinitely to fill any two dimensional plane, and the lattice hinges formed by the laser kerfs transform a rigid wooden panel into a single curved developable surface. Carl Friedrich Gauss' (also the name of her shop dog) work on differential geometry also suggests that double curved surfaces are possible, though this is something we are still testing and prototyping. 


By Nicoguaro - Own work, CC0, Link

From left to right: a surface of negative Gaussian curvature (hyperboloid), a surface of zero Gaussian curvature (cylinder), and a surface of positive Gaussian curvature (sphere).

This campaign for the first three styles is a pre-sale to fund a first production run for as many of these new lighting designs as we can secure minimum orders for. This in turn allows us to negotiate better deals with local mills and lumber yards for the highest quality sustainable lumber possible as well as precision manufacturing from a range of local businesses. All the details and finishing are still performed in house.

 

Bulk Materials and Specialized Manufacturing

Most of the $40,000 will go to material, tooling and production costs:

  • Lighting is a fundamental part of the spaces where you spend the most time, and these pieces are designed to blend form and function between modern fabrication and the natural warmth and beauty of wood.
  • Retail outlets typically charge producers a 50% premium, require constant bulk discounts and generally encourage cost over quality: Wal-Mart, IKEA, Target, you name it. Selling directly allows us to charge only 10-20% over the cost of raw materials, operations and fabrication.
  • No matter how much money we raise, every sponsor at every level will receive their light within 90 days after the campaign closes: March-May, 2019.

 

 

Local Economies, Healthy Forests

 

We live here, we work here, and most of our friends do the same.  When we can create something successful, we can contribute to our peers: sawmills, lumber yards and fabricators. 

  • Creating jobs locally starts with locally produced items. Here in Oakland, we have access to excellent raw materials, talented technicians and experienced traditional woodworkers.  
  • Art of Plants has already created a market for locally produced home goods that bring beauty and healthy plant life into any room, and these lamps can increase our sustainable lumber purchases and contracts with other local makers. 
  • We would love to provide each sponsor with something unique that will brighten their space and stay with them for many years. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Waste is our primary challenge, and we risk not being able to secure adequate materials if orders are low. Wood is a natural material and has textures, colors and shaping properties that will be apparent in the finished piece and will occasionally result in something that will end up in the scrap bin. 

  • We can minimize waste by using larger stock on newly available equipment with larger production capacities and by using more than one local supplier to mill, cut and assemble orders.
  • Many suppliers and fabricators have minimum order requirements and offer discounts for larger volumes, so the more material we can buy and have machined, the higher quality we'll get for the lowest price.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any words of encouragement and recommendations to others who might be interested are always graciously welcomed!

story:
Help Start the Movement!

Update: We made it to the front page of hacker news!

StallTalk is a toilet based social network founded by Northwestern Computer Science students and avid toilet users. It allows toileteers to anonymously leave messages to a message board at that particular stall. Think of it as the evolution of bathroom graffiti. The message board is accessed by scanning a unique QR code pasted in the stall. You simply scan the code, and then leave a message that can be seen by anybody who will ever use that stall.

We have set up the application, and taken care of all the crazy technical stuff. All we need you to do is help us distribute the stickers around the world. Put the stickers in any bathrooom, and they automatically link up to our website. Toileteers (YOU) are buying stickers to become part of the StallTalk movement. Be the slick guy at work, the envy of your peers, and invite your friends into the StallTalk movement. As part of the first StallTalk push, toileteers are the ambassadors that will bring StallTalk to their communities. 

Our Team

The StallTalk team consists of a group of Northwestern Computer Science students dedicated to living life to the fullest. Our team has a combined 25 years of programming experience, 3 successful companies, and are toilet experts.

Our Story So Far

We have turtled a prototype application that is currently being used on the Northwestern Evanston campus. You can access our second version at www.stalltalk.info. In just three months on 20 stickers, we have had over 700 vistors and 400 posts! Think what we can do with the Indiegogo bump! 

We need money to print more QR code stickers, and expand our reach.

 

What People Are Saying On StallTalk

"My poops can do the kessel run in under 12 parsecs. #MilleniumShitter"

"Prospective student here. Very much considering Northwestern cause of this. BRILLIANT"

"Captains poop log: stall date 20120501. Discovered an anomaly circling Uranus. Sent a couple of philangies in to investigate. Things got messy and we took heavy losses. The cleanup was a disaster."

Our Future

The future of StallTalk is completely decided by you. It is completely open source, and you can checkout the code here:

https://github.com/jontonsoup/StallTalk

We have a big goals-- some of which include ShatRoulette, an extension that lets you live chat with someone else at stall, or ShitterTwitter, a live twitter feed of the posts on StallTalk. Let's get to 50,000 stickers, and Start The Movement!

NOTE!!!*

We will not ship international. If you want stickers and are outside the United States, please contact us at vladamirpoopin@stalltalk.info.

story:
INTRODUCE ROOME

Roome is a smart lamp designed for convenience. It is a truly intuitive lamp, one that lights up automatically through motion detection. It uses the latest in motion-sensor technology, and turns on or off depending on whether it is needed.

Roome on Media:

 

 LIGHT UP YOUR LIFE

Roome knows when you are home. It senses when you enter the room and turns itself on. If there is no activity in the area, it turns itself off to save energy. Using special ambient light sensing technology Roome will automatically choose the perfect level of brightness for any time of day. Very quickly, Roome learns the habits of you and your family to continuously perfect itself for service in your home.

ROOME HELP YOU REST

 If your afternoon reading session turns into a well-deserved nap, Roome lets you rest by silently turning off when not needed. Don’t worry, when you wake up so does Roome. It will sense your movement and turn on to greet you.

NO MORE FUMBLING IN THE DARK 

Nightlights are handy but not energy efficient. Never worry about fumbling in the dark again. If you wake and need to get up, Roome will light the way. Gentle, helpful lighting when you need it the most. Roome is your ever-ready nighttime companion.

SIMPLE GESTURE-CONTROL OPERATION

Mechanical switches, buttons and chains are unreliable and outdated ways to control a lamp. We knew we could use technology for better, more convenient operation. Now, you can intelligently control your lighting with simple intuitive hand motions.

  • Brightness Adjustment

Simply place your hand over the top of Roome and move it vertically up or down to adjust the brightness.

  • At the Wave of Your Hand

Like magic, a simple pass of the hand over Roome turns it on or off silently.

SMART FEATURES FOR A SMART HOME

  • Soothing LED Light

Flicker-free, warm, and pleasing…Roome’s LED lighting is designed to be easy on the eyes and aesthetically pleasing with optimized color temperature and spectrum. The LED bulb is of the highest quality and certified for more than 20,000 hours of service life.

  • Dawn to Dusk Light Sensor

When enabled, Roome will automatically turn on when it senses the dark, perfect for coming home to a well-lit room in the evening. It also senses when ambient light is sufficient and can turn itself off to save power.

  • Sound-activated Lighting 

Roome can be set to detect a loud noise and automatically turn on. It will remain on while needed then turn itself off again. This can be helpful at night or used as a crime deterrent. It is recommended for quiet times or when no one is at home.

  • Power Where You Need It

Like you, we rely on several essential mobile devices. Why not have them charged up and available when and where you need them? Roome has Dual USB Ports for fast, efficient 5V-1A device power or charging. 

  • APP Control at Your Fingertips

The Roome app is compatible with Android and iOS and will allow you to program features, adjust settings and control Roome with your smartphone.

Check us out on Gadget Flow

 

THOUGHTFUL PRODUCT DESIGN

Our product designers know that if you are choosing something for your home it has to be beautiful. In this case, form is as important as function. We chose a clean modern aesthetic that feels at home in any room. It complements other home furnishings and adds beauty to your home.

 

 

Specifications:

PROJECT TIMELINE

Brightness Adjustment
Simply place your hand over the top of Roome and move it vertically up or down to adjust the brightness.





At the Wave of Your Hand
Like magic, a simple pass of the hand over Roome turns it on or off silently. 





SMART FEATURES FOR A SMART HOME
Soothing LED Light
Flicker-free, warm, and pleasing…Roome’s LED lighting is designed to be easy on the eyes and aesthetically pleasing with optimized color temperature and spectrum. The LED bulb is of the highest quality and certified for more than 20,000 hours of service life.





Dawn to Dusk Light Sensor
When enabled, Roome will automatically turn on when it senses the dark, perfect for coming home to a well-lit room in the evening. It also senses when ambient light is sufficient and can turn itself off to save power. 





Sound-activated Lighting 
Roome can be set to detect a loud noise and automatically turn on. It will remain on while needed then turn itself off again. This can be helpful at night or used as a crime deterrent. It is recommended for quiet times or when no one is at home. 
Power Where You Need It
Like you, we rely on several essential mobile devices. Why not have them charged up and available when and where you need them? Roome has Dual USB Ports for fast, efficient 5V-1A device power or charging. 





APP Control at Your Fingertips
The Roome app is compatible with Android and iOS and will allow you to program features, adjust settings and control Roome with your smartphone. 





Check us out on Gadget Flow





 

THOUGHTFUL PRODUCT DESIGN
Our product designers know that if you are choosing something for your home it has to be beautiful. In this case, form is as important as function. We chose a clean modern aesthetic that feels at home in any room. It complements other home furnishings and adds beauty to your home. 





 





 





Specifications:





PROJECT TIMELINE

story:
Our Story

If you have seen current key and device finders, you have probably felt our frustration: The key finders are bulky and impossible to use on small gadgets like iPod clips, reading glasses, remote controls, etc. Even worse, they have a very low range and lack the ability to track devices effectively.

That's why we designed The Gadget Hound - Simple to use, aesthetically-pleasing and with no large FOB-like devices.  Its range surpasses anything like it on the market, the receivers are small and built to last years attached to your various devices and the transmitter can be plugged in or used with the rechargeable battery and mounted to a refrigerator by magnets.

Usage is a breeze. Just depress the transmitter button, corresponding to the device you wish to find.  Listen for the loud beeps and find your device.

 Our Team

 We have the most experienced team members in their areas of expertise. 

Carla Miaule, Managing Member: Carla is the creator and founder of The Gadget Hound and serves as the Managing Member of the Company.  She worked 10 years as Managing Director and VP of Diligence to privately-held organizations.  She also taught intellectual property for several colleges.  Carla received her Executive MBA from Pepperdine University’s Grazadio School of Business.

Edgar Ellsworth, Chief Designer and Electrical Engineer:  Ed is an engineer, business development and general management professional with experience in bringing new technologies and products to market. Highly versatile with a collaborative cross functional focus, he has proven capabilities for investing, developing, commercializing, and advancing technology with large, small and start-up companies. Ed holds a Bachelor of Science in Engineering Technology, Electronics with a Minor in Computer Science and a Master of Science in Business Administration with emphasis on new venture creation, all from California State Polytechnic University, Pomona.

John Anderson, Project Manager: John is CEO of Belcon Industries and leads a multi-disciplined advanced technology management group that oversees startups and provides consulting services to existing companies to remove barriers to technology implementation.  Their resources include technical expertise in science, applications development, systems engineering, software engineering and manufacturing. Prior to that he was Director, Corporate Strategic Technology Investments and Director, Advanced Technology Program Management for Beckman Coulter, Inc. and was responsible for corporate wide technology planning. In this role he focused on substantially integrating and expanding Beckman Coulter’s technology portfolio value and accelerating corporate growth. He holds a Bachelor of Science and Master of Science in Genetics from the University of Arizona.

John Silzel Ph.D, Systems Engineers and Acoustics design:  John serves at Biola University as Professor of Chemistry. In addition, he teaches electronic circuits & instrumentation and does research on musical instrument physics. John has 18 years industry experience developing new technologies for biomedical research and diagnostics and he is a proven systems engineering technical expert and innovator of complex products spanning hardware, software, chemistry, optics, and algorithms for use in the analytical sciences and musical arts. John received his Ph.D. and Bachelor of Science from University of California, Irvine.

Kyle Chrystal, Mechanical Engineer & Packaging: Kyle is Sr. Engineer for Phasiks, Inc. developing innovative thermal management technologies used for microfluidic control systems. Prior to that, he worked with Toyota Racing on design and development of NASCAR engines.  Kyle has a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering from California Institute of Technology and Master of Science in Astronautical Engineering from the University of Southern California.

Usage

Large home? Doesn't matter. The Gadget Hound works like nothing like it on the market.  We have paid careful attention to the ability to use The Gadget Hound in a large 3,000 sf home, taking into consideration walls, seat cushions, etc.  The transmitter has a small exposed sleek antenna that relates to the various tiny receivers on your devices.  The ability to find a device easily is so simple.

I Live in a Small Apartment.  Do I Really Need The Gadget Hound? What many people don't realize is that each wall in your home accounts for approximately 100 sf (due to the wall constructs) that must be transmitted through (think about how many walls and rooms you have in your home).  Additionally, stairs, cushions and any other possible obstacle can prevent the transmitter from properly connecting with a receiver, so it's important to have a powerful, effective device that can be relied upon when needed.

Small devices?  It doesn’t matter.  The Gadget Hound is designed to be used with some of the smallest devices, including the ability to adhere to the smallest iPod™, phone, wallets, glasses, etc.

Design Features and Benefits

Obsessive attention to Quality.  We paid close attention to quality. The Gadget Hound was designed to resolve many outstanding issues with similar products by making it the last retrieval device that you will need.  The design resolves the current issues with range, size/bulkiness and aesthetics as well as usage issues on a wide array of everyday gadgets. 

The Gadget Hound is made with a soft, rubberized material that complements any gadget.  The transmitter also looks sleek and elegant, mounted on your refrigerator or in a wall socket.  The receivers are soft to the touch, but are strong, durable and look gorgeous.

More Useful Features and Benefits.

* Bright flashing light on the transmitter warns of a low battery, which will then prompt you to recharge the device with the included flip-up, plug-in component

* Loud distinctive sound that can be heard for hundreds of feet

* Micropower technology provides long battery life

* Compact, extremely durable, and lightweight, so you’ll forget it’s attached to your device – until you need it

* Responds over distances up to 3,000 square feet. 

* Easy to use and activate.  Just depress the button corresponding to the object you are trying to find.  Wait a few seconds and the receiver will activate and signal where the object is located – even under cushions, behind walls, doors, etc. 

* Prevents time wasting and frustration – Imagine being able to find anything within seconds!!

* Durable enough to use every day -- Its rubberized, sturdy outer-coating protects and is sleek and durable – think of the cool rubber coatings used for Apple iPhones.

* Incredibly easy to use making it great for everyone of all ages – The Gadget Hound’s simplicity is perfect for the young and elderly alike. 

* Most discrete, reliable and sensitive gadget finding device ever developed of its kind

* Makes an ideal gift that will be greatly appreciated ... again and again.  * The Gadget Hound is patent pending and is unique in its design to all other competitive products. 

Will this really work?  I’m a Skeptic.

If you’re like us, you’ve probably used similar products that promised you’ll never lose your (insert gadget here) again.  And, when you needed it, you were sorely disappointed.  We’ve done a lot of research when we created The Gadget Hound.  In fact, Amazon.com™ was our favorite “go-to” because it gave us great feedback from everyday consumers about their likes and dislikes on product capabilities.  We focused on these comments and created a product that would surpass expectations and addressed shortcomings and inaccurate claims from competitive products.  We really want to make sure that we “wow-ed” you.

Why Are You Raising Funds?

We are raising money to contribute to sizeable first manufacturing run, which brings the retail cost down significantly.  This in turn allows us to thank our Indiegogo contributors with gifts while also allowing us to build our inventory for sales.

story: -

About

中文網站

Have you ever slept for over 8 hours, but still felt quite exhausted after waking up? Studies find that, of all sleep stages, the Deep Sleep Stage provides the most restorative sleep. As long as you can get 2 hours of deep sleep at night, a refreshing morning can be yours.

 

A key factor of good-quality sleep is your PILLOW. The importance is no less than choosing the partner that sleeps beside you.

 

 

The World’s First Pillow with Cutting Edge Structure Design that Enables You to Drift Off to Sleep Comfortably and Quickly.

According to our joint research with the Nightform Lab, four crucial elements were identified and incorporated into the design of The Cubes to meet the needs for a good night’s sleep.


Did you know that you can roll over more than 20 times during sleep each night? Before, there was no pillow that could satisfy so many different sleeping positions, until The Cubes: A pillow that can adjust its structure to conform to your positions and support your weight no matter how you roll at night.

The patented hinged structure on both sides of the surface elevates the level of support from two-dimensional to three-dimensional. Each cube functions as a spring structure that can individually support weight when pressure is applied and subsequently bounce back to its original shape when depressed.

 

No matter which position you prefer the most, The Cubes will adjust itself to fit you and will relieve you of your muscular tension and stiffness. Fall asleep easier with the The Cubes and wake up feeling more refreshed than before!

Snoring often occurs when sleeping flat, with the neck inadequately supported, creating the airway to narrow or close completely.

The Cubes is designed to provide support with its hinged structure, to respond to your breathing movements when sleeping flat thus keeping your airway open and your breathing smooth and quiet.

With the unique design of different thickness and cutting depth to the two sides of the foam, The Cubes offers both a firm and a soft double-sided pillow for all needs.
A stomach sleeper or one who enjoys a fairly flat pillow, the Soft side is for you.
If you prefer a fluffy or thicker pillow, then the Firm side is for you.

Memory foam was invented to protect the astronauts from the extreme pressure experiences during launch and landing. The Cubes utilizes memory foam to automatically conform to your sleeping position and gently support your head.
A zero gravity sleeping experience, total relaxation for your sleep.

There are five stages in sleep and stage 3 and 4 are considered deep sleep stages. Deep sleep provides the most restorative sleep of sleep stages. During this stage, human growth hormones are released to restore body muscles and nerves, and at the same time the immune system repairs itself. 

Based on our experiments, The Cubes can effectively extend the duration of your deep sleep stage.

 

We’ve been through,
over 900 Indentation tests,
over 1300 support surface tests,
over 160 geometric structure design tests,
over 50 elasticity and sensory tests,
and over 900 thermoregulation tests.

People with:...

  • Countless sleeping positions
  • Snoring issue
  • Insomnia problem
  • The desire of a sweet dream

Package :The Cubes x1 and Modal fiber sleeve x1
Weight : 500 grams
Pillow : 100% Polyurethane
Pillowcase : 95% modal jersey fabric and 5% spandex

Care Instructions:
The pillow - do not wash
The pillowcase - machine wash and dry

The fast pace of life and the stress of work causes sleeping troubles, this is our concern and we’re devoted to finding a solution to better sleep.
 

F1F2 was founded in 2010; we are a dedicated team that strives to bring you a whole new level of the sleeping experience by applying the latest technology and materials to redesign the structure of a pillow. After more than 2 years of collaboration with the Nightform Lab and with their attention to detail that is unsurpassed in the apparel industry, we stand strongly behind our Craftsmanship Standard.
