story:
Inirv React is the first device that lets you control your stove from your smartphone and helps to protect you and your loved ones from the devastating effects of house fires. Its combination of sensors and electronics enable it to not only detect high levels of smoke, natural gas, and lack of motion (or, you in the kitchen), but also react and turn your stove off to keep you safe. 

It also allows you to monitor your stove remotely and modulate the burner temperature. With Inirv React, you never have to worry about leaving your stove on again!

 

 

All of our homes have smoke detectors that detect high levels of smoke and warn us if there is a hazard. However, they don’t intervene and prevent the situation from getting worse. We knew a better solution was needed so we designed a revolutionary product that not only prevents hazardous situations but reacts to prevent them from escalating. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

           

 

Inirv React provides you with peace of mind knowing that your home, family and belongings are safe, no matter what you’re whipping up in your kitchen.

There is a lot of technology that goes into our small, but mighty, device. Learn how Inirv React keeps your home safe!

 

 

 

The sensor unit houses the gas, smoke and motion detectors that monitor your kitchen’s environment. If it senses high levels of smoke or gas, or if the motion sensor recognizes that the stove was left on accidentally, this unit signals the knob units via Bluetooth technology to turn off your burners.

 

 

The knob units turn your burners off when a hazard is detected by the sensor unit. Attach these units to your stove and use them as your new knobs, or simply attach your existing knobs back onto these units with the supplied adapter. 

 

 

 

 

The smartphone app allows you to easily monitor your kitchen environment and status of your stove. You will also receive real-time alerts if a hazard is detected or if you left the house with your stove on. But you don’t just get alerts! You can turn your stove off or change the temperature right from your phone!

 

  

 

 

 

Once in place, Inirv React not only recognizes dangerous situations, but also reacts to them by turning your burners off to keep you and your home safe.

 

 

 

Inirv React is equipped with a motion sensor and timer that identify and react to periods of prolonged absence. A default timer setting of 15 minutes is automatically set when you turn your stove on. So, what does this mean? After 15 minutes of no activity in your kitchen with the stove left on, the timer will expire and the knob unit will activate to turn your burner off. To prevent the timer from expiring and your stove from turning off, just check on it every 15 minutes. Each time you enter your kitchen and the sensor unit detects motion, the timer is reset. Need to adjust the timer? Simply tap the touch sensor to cycle through the settings. There are 4 to choose from for maximum flexibility! You can also set each knob unit to have a different timer setting.

 

Made with safe, high quality materials to ensure durability, Inirv React is sure to help keep you and your family safe from harmful conditions for years to come. It is also heat, chemical, and water resistant, so don’t worry about what you spill on it!

 

With its universal stove adapter, Inirv React works on any gas or electric stove. Even better, it doesn’t require professional installation! You can install it yourself in just a few minutes and know your home is protected.

We want Inirv React to look great in your home! Choose from our white, black or stainless steel color options to match the decor of your kitchen when we send out a survey at the end of the campaign. 

 

 

 

Use your stove like you normally do! As soon as you turn it on, Inirv React automatically activates and monitors your kitchen for dangerous conditions. The bright blue glow of the LED rings on the sensor and knob units indicate that you and your home are protected.

 

 

You rely on your smartphone for everything else, why not use it to check on your kitchen? The smartphone app will allow you to monitor the environment of your kitchen and receive alerts in real-time even if you are miles away from home. Even more, you can turn off your stove and change the temperature of your burners right from your phone - no need to rush home! 

 

 

Installation is easy and requires just a few minutes. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Inirv React comes as a kit with 4 knob units and 1 sensor unit. If you have more than 4 burners, add additional knob units to provide complete protection. Each sensor unit can pair with up to 8 knob units.

 

 

The best products are those that are born from personal experience and have the potential to improve the lives of others. Our inspiration came from a situation I bet most if not all of you have faced before. One night, my mom and I went for a late night movie after dinner. We were running late as usual and quickly scrambled to get out of the door. A few minutes into the movie, my mom suddenly gripped my arm and almost shouted, “I can’t remember if I turned the stove off!” With my puppy at home (not to mention townhomes on either side), I knew we had to rush back as soon as possible. We practically ran out of the theater and got home only to open the door to thick black smoke. While we were fortunate to return before a fire started, we were still faced with thousands of dollars in smoke damage. After some research, we knew a solution was needed to combat the tens of thousands of house fires that occur every year due to cooking equipment. We not only realized that stoves today don’t have any safety features, but also that smoke detectors only serve as an alarm and don’t intervene when a hazard arises. Because of this, we created Inirv React.

As we started development, we realized that this device could not only make homes safer, but smarter too! Through Inirv React, we hope to revolutionize the way you interact with your stove while providing you the peace of mind we know you deserve.

- Akshita, Cofounder

Inirv React has undergone numerous rounds of prototyping and we have finalized the device design. We have come a long way and have worked hard to make the device as small and attractive as possible. In the coming months we will start device testing, acquire certifications, conduct in-home tests, begin tooling, and develop a beta version of the Inirv app for iOS and Android.

 

 

Our mission is to get Inirv React into every home and onto every stove so that we can help to keep you and your loved ones safe. Your pledge will help us achieve this, and allow us to not only complete development and manufacturing of our revolutionary device, but also continue our work towards creating products that make your home smarter and safer. We are ready to make Inirv React a reality and can’t wait to get it into your home - now all we need is you!

 

  

Here at Inirv, we are passionate about creating novel solutions to problems that affect your safety and well-being every day. Our vision is to make your home smarter and safer so that you have the peace of mind you deserve. Our team not only has previous startup experience, but is also comprised of talented and passionate engineers. We've partnered with a top engineering firm, Enventys Partners, that has brought an experienced group of engineers, industrial designers, and manufacturing experts to help us make Inirv React a reality.

Passionate about safety or technology, and interested in joining the Inirv team? Email us at contact@inirv.com!

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Inirv React a success.

We’ve set out to design a product that not only improves home safety, but also enhances your cooking experience like never before. You’re helping us achieve that goal! We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t purchase your own Inirv React, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Download the Inirv React Press Kit

If it senses high levels of smoke or gas, or if the motion sensor recognizes that the stove was left on accidentally, this unit signals the knob units via Bluetooth technology to turn off your burners.  The knob units turn your burners off when a hazard is detected by the sensor unit. Attach these units to your stove and use them as your new knobs, or simply attach your existing knobs back onto these units with the supplied adapter.     The smartphone app allows you to easily monitor your kitchen environment and status of your stove. You will also receive real-time alerts if a hazard is detected or if you left the house with your stove on. But you don’t just get alerts! You can turn your stove off or change the temperature right from your phone!      Once in place, Inirv React not only recognizes dangerous situations, but also reacts to them by turning your burners off to keep you and your home safe. The LED rings on the knob units glow bright red when high levels of smoke or gas have been detected. The knob units then activate to turn your burner(s) off.  The LED rings on the knob units glow bright orange one minute before the timer expires due to lack of activity in the kitchen. If no motion is detected in that one minute, the knob unit activates and turns your burner off.Inirv React is equipped with a motion sensor and timer that identify and react to periods of prolonged absence. A default timer setting of 15 minutes is automatically set when you turn your stove on. So, what does this mean? After 15 minutes of no activity in your kitchen with the stove left on, the timer will expire and the knob unit will activate to turn your burner off. To prevent the timer from expiring and your stove from turning off, just check on it every 15 minutes. Each time you enter your kitchen and the sensor unit detects motion, the timer is reset. Need to adjust the timer? Simply tap the touch sensor to cycle through the settings. There are 4 to choose from for maximum flexibility! You can also set each knob unit to have a different timer setting. Made with safe, high quality materials to ensure durability, Inirv React is sure to help keep you and your family safe from harmful conditions for years to come. It is also heat, chemical, and water resistant, so don’t worry about what you spill on it! With its universal stove adapter, Inirv React works on any gas or electric stove. Even better, it doesn’t require professional installation! You can install it yourself in just a few minutes and know your home is protected.We want Inirv React to look great in your home! Choose from our white, black or stainless steel color options to match the decor of your kitchen when we send out a survey at the end of the campaign.    Use your stove like you normally do! As soon as you turn it on, Inirv React automatically activates and monitors your kitchen for dangerous conditions. The bright blue glow of the LED rings on the sensor and knob units indicate that you and your home are protected.  You rely on your smartphone for everything else, why not use it to check on your kitchen? The smartphone app will allow you to monitor the environment of your kitchen and receive alerts in real-time even if you are miles away from home. Even more, you can turn off your stove and change the temperature of your burners right from your phone - no need to rush home!   Installation is easy and requires just a few minutes.                      Inirv React comes as a kit with 4 knob units and 1 sensor unit. If you have more than 4 burners, add additional knob units to provide complete protection. Each sensor unit can pair with up to 8 knob units.  The best products are those that are born from personal experience and have the potential to improve the lives of others. Our inspiration came from a situation I bet most if not all of you have faced before. One night, my mom and I went for a late night movie after dinner. We were running late as usual and quickly scrambled to get out of the door. A few minutes into the movie, my mom suddenly gripped my arm and almost shouted, “I can’t remember if I turned the stove off!” With my puppy at home (not to mention townhomes on either side), I knew we had to rush back as soon as possible. We practically ran out of the theater and got home only to open the door to thick black smoke. While we were fortunate to return before a fire started, we were still faced with thousands of dollars in smoke damage. After some research, we knew a solution was needed to combat the tens of thousands of house fires that occur every year due to cooking equipment. We not only realized that stoves today don’t have any safety features, but also that smoke detectors only serve as an alarm and don’t intervene when a hazard arises. Because of this, we created Inirv React.As we started development, we realized that this device could not only make homes safer, but smarter too! Through Inirv React, we hope to revolutionize the way you interact with your stove while providing you the peace of mind we know you deserve.- Akshita, CofounderInirv React has undergone numerous rounds of prototyping and we have finalized the device design. We have come a long way and have worked hard to make the device as small and attractive as possible. In the coming months we will start device testing, acquire certifications, conduct in-home tests, begin tooling, and develop a beta version of the Inirv app for iOS and Android.  Our mission is to get Inirv React into every home and onto every stove so that we can help to keep you and your loved ones safe. Your pledge will help us achieve this, and allow us to not only complete development and manufacturing of our revolutionary device, but also continue our work towards creating products that make your home smarter and safer. We are ready to make Inirv React a reality and can’t wait to get it into your home - now all we need is you!   Here at Inirv, we are passionate about creating novel solutions to problems that affect your safety and well-being every day. Our vision is to make your home smarter and safer so that you have the peace of mind you deserve. Our team not only has previous startup experience, but is also comprised of talented and passionate engineers. We've partnered with a top engineering firm, Enventys Partners, that has brought an experienced group of engineers, industrial designers, and manufacturing experts to help us make Inirv React a reality.Passionate about safety or technology, and interested in joining the Inirv team? Email us at contact@inirv.com!We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Inirv React a success.We’ve set out to design a product that not only improves home safety, but also enhances your cooking experience like never before. You’re helping us achieve that goal! We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t purchase your own Inirv React, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!           Download the Inirv React Press Kit

story:
When the Orb glows, it means someone you love has sent you pictures.

 

 

 

 


Hale Orb is a whole system, beyond the device.

 

 

You don't use social media? That's no problem. Just use our mobile app, a desktop browser, or even e-mail to send photos directly to the Hale Orb. These are the simplest ways to share what is already on your smartphone or the PC hard drive. 

 

You can connect Facebook, Instagram, Google, or Dropbox. It's really easy to setup and it will automatically scan for updates and bring new photos and videos to our Hale Central Cloud. You can just keep using your favorite app as usual, without a need for another app!

 

No signing up is required if you want to just view the photos and videos with the Orb! Mom can start enjoying the photos without a hassle.

 

There is an option to only share your photos with a particular hashtag (ie. #family) to Hale Orb. We all love our moms but maybe she doesn't need to see EVERYTHING.

 

You choose who will be members of your channel, and you choose which photos are shared. Hale Orb is a private place reserved for the family.

There's no need to charge the Orb every night. It can stay on your coffee table, and when it needs to be charged, the Orb will light up to let you know.

When each of your family members has her own Hale Orb, everyone can see the same photos and videos shared within the family!

All the images are stored on your Hale Central Cloud and can be downloaded or deleted. 

 

Hale Orb was created to re-invent the photo and video sharing experience for the whole family. It will be a great gift for Mom and Dad to stay connected. 

 

Keep the best parts of your daily life in a special place, no matter which social media you initially post them to. View everything on your TV, automatically laid out beautifully just like a well-organized photo album, with virtually no effort.

slideshow feature

When guests are over, you will have instant access to your best photos and videos on TV. This is much more convenient than passing around your phone or tablet with ALL of your photos in it. 

 

- Orb  (remote)
- Stick (HDMI computer stick for the TV)
- Charging cable (for the Orb)
- Power cable and AC adaptor (for the Stick)
- Quick User Guide
- 6 months warranty
- Free Hale Central Cloud account (unlimited photo space. 5GB of video space)

Dimensions: 80mm x 80mm x 80mm
Weight: 200g (TBD)

Dimensions: 85mm x 34mm x 13mm (TBD)
Weight: 34g (TBD)

 

We plan to support multiple channels with different members. That way you may have separate channels for your parents and your in-laws.

 

 You will be able to say, "Pictures from the beach last weekend!" to the Orb and display them. The microphone turns off as soon as you are done with it.

* Shipment schedule has changed to Feb 2017*

* Shipment schedule has changed to Feb 2017*

Our team includes specialists in user interfaces, server, web design, embedded systems, electrical circuits, product design, mechanical design, and manufacturing and come from places like Stanford, MIT, UCLA, University of Tokyo, Carnegie Mellon, Sony, and Silicon Valley startups.

 

Your help is needed to prove that there are people excited about the Hale Orb as much as we are. Our outside funding has gotten us this far, but your support and passion will help us go even farther and faster! We hope you can join us on our journey.

 

We made sure to wait until we were sufficiently far along with development (18 months) before asking you to back our project. Hardware manufacturing entails unforeseen road blocks along the way. The good news is that we are a passionate and experienced team working hard to make this a reality and are already working with our manufacturing partners for mass production. We are almost there and your help will make this possible!

story:
Video doorbells have been around for a while. However, the current video doorbells on the market present more problems than solutions

Screw the complicated installation. With the Soliom doorbell, you only need to screw the mount wherever you want the doorbell or use a highly adhesive 3M sticker to secure it.

Soliom creates a wire-free, hassle-free, and headache-free with a one-step installation process, you do not need to worry anymore about how to connect the wires to your doorbell.

No maintenance required. Soliom is completely self-sustainable with its built-in solar power panel and a 5000mAh lithium battery. Just set it up and power the Soliom doorbell with the most natural energy, mother nature. Even on cloudy days or when direct sunlight is not available, it can still charge.

Got caught up with something or stuck in traffic? See exactly when a friend or family drops by with Soliom’s 1080P HD quality live streaming feature. Even better? Let them know you’ll be home soon with the two-way talk feature.

 Simply download “Soliom” phone App through Play Store or App Store, and follow the simple direction to set up the device. The easily App installation allows you to share with your family and friends to use, and create a more safe, convenient life for your own. 

Soliom’s video lens offers a 165º wide angle to give you a comprehensive view of your entire front yard. The video records with both day and night vision to give you the best quality footages of your front yard at all times.

The Soliom app notifies the homeowner every time someone is at your front door when they trigger the motion sensor. Easily check to see who’s there whether it’s a friend, the delivery man, or someone unknown. Take a quick snapshot of anyone acting suspiciously through the app and protect your home from thieves.

 The Soliom App puts your front door at your fingertips. Since Soliom runs off of your home Wi-Fi, you’ll always have a secure connection from your smartphone to your Soliom anywhere with a network connection. The built-in microphone and speaker even provides you with direct communication to whoever’s at your doorsteps.

The motion sensor alerts you when someone approaches your door, it protects your home with live recording. If someone tries to rip the video doorbell from where it is, an alert will be sent to you in real time.

The sturdy housing prevents Soliom doorbell from shattering. The anti-shatter housing improves the structural integrity of the doorbell, and it is unlikely to smash open with a hammer. 

Designed to protect your home as well as your wallet, the Soliom doorbell is a one-time purchase that combines security with convenience and affordability. Micro SD card storage can be unlimited saved up video recordings at any moments. Each owner can save up to 20 recorded videos to the Cloud storage free of charge. Soliom even does routine system maintenance to protect user privacy.

With its truly waterproof IP65, the Soliom Video Doorbell can handle all weather conditions. Soliom is made to withstand extreme weather and temperatures between -4℉ to 176℉(-20°C～+80°C). No matter where you are, Soliom will always serve you the best.

Soliom is committed to providing consumers with low maintenance, green powered, and cost-effective surveillance device. After two years of R&D, we finally designed a solar-powered video doorbell with all the features we wanted. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.

The mission of Soliom is to bring on the smart advanced surveillance device and overthrow the traditional security cameras. Now we’re ready to manufacture it and deliver it to your doorstep.

                                             

Soliom was established in 2016 when there were no good solar video security products in the market. With old security cameras, people had to deal with complicated wiring and weekly camera charging. To solve these problems, we formed a team of experienced engineers and professional designers who have been in the industry for 10+ years. Soliom is dedicated to making advanced surveillance devices low maintenance, green powered, and cost-effective. After 2 years spent in research and development, we finally designed a solar-powered camera with all the features we wanted. Soliom is the world’s first solar-powered video doorbell. With the Soliom Video Doorbell, live your life in peace and let Soliom keep you safe. Soliom, Always On, Always Ready!

story:
Our Mission

Buying products online is not the future anymore, it is NOW!  True there are plenty of e-commerce solutions out there, however most of them are very limited, hard to setup, and hard to use.  eCommPHP PRO will be designed with both small companies and large companies in mind.  Ease of use is going to be one of the high focal points of the design without hindering the power of advanced features from within the software.  The software is already in beta stage, a foundation to work from is already in place.  You can see a demonstration on what has been worked on so far here: http://demostore.ecommphppro.com

Creating Jobs

eCommPHP PRO is a sophisticated e-commerce and content management system.  So far I have done all of the development myself however, developing software of this caliber is very extensive.  I will be hiring more software developers experienced in HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL, Java, jQuery, and Ajax to achieve my goals adding many great features.  I will also hire a team of graphic designers experienced in Adobe Photoshop to design the software to be both visually appealing and easy to understand.  Video tutorials will also be designed to help users with the more advanced features of the software.  Overall, I plan on making eCommPHP PRO the top of the line e-commerce software package!

Features

  • A complete product, order, and content management system will be the key with this software.  Users will be able to edit every aspect of their products such as product categories, titles, descriptions, pricing, shipping rates, inventory tracking, uploading product photos, and search engine optimization (SEO).  Special product options will also be available as well such as product variation options, bulk pricing, and listing products as media downloads.   With the rising popularity of auction sites, users will also be able to auction their products with this software.
  • Product categories will have a sophisticated configuration system as well, allowing users to customize their products by categories page.  Category name, description, and search engine optimization options will be provided to maximize potential regarding website content and Google / search engine rankings. 
  • The order management system will keep track of all orders made online.  Users will be able to manually add orders, edit existing orders, add order notes, e-mail customers, change shipping status, retrieve and display tracking information, and manage refunds or returns.  This will also allow users to do point of sale transactions online.
  • Complete website layouts will be available to design online stores.  Users will be able to edit these layouts to their liking or design custom website layouts.  An online HTML editing and tools will be available in the control panel of eCommPHP PRO with a WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get) editor.  This will eliminate the need to hire a professional web designer to start an online store, however, the option will be available for web designers to customize online stores any way they want.
  • eCommPHP PRO will also include a user / employee management system.  Administrative users will have the ability to manage employee logins and permissions, assigning them to specific sections of the control panel.  An optional commission system will also be implemented to allow employees who post products online to receive a commission on their sales.
  • Third party applications are a necessity at times.  Users will be able to export data from eCommPHP PRO into comma delimited format (.CSV) for shipping applications such as UPS Worldship or other applications that track product data and orders.
  • Customers who shop on eCommPHP PRO stores will be able to create their own login and profile. Users will be able to manage their customers in the control panel.  Managing options such as store credit, customer orders, customer information, coupons, gift certificates, and contact information.

Future Plans

A desktop application will be designed for in house point of sale transactions that will integrate with online inventory tracking for real time website updates.  An employee management system will be added to track commissions and even employee time sheets.  Accounting features will be added to this application and will also communicate with third party applications such as Quickbooks.

This software will grow with technology, application development for new devices such as mobile phones and tablets will be essential.  eCommPHP PRO will be the end all be all solution for e-commerce!

story:
It is our (Solar Community Housing Association) goal to raise 3,700 dollars to finish building a quality, durable greywater system built by and for residents of Baggins End (aka The Domes) at the University of California, Davis (see our website here). Our cooperative community, consisting of 26 students, has already received funds from UC Davis Dining Services’ Go Green Grant, which helped us to start the initial phases of construction. Building a community laundry facility is necessary due to the imminent demolition of our current facilities at the Orchard Park Apartments due to University expansion. This is an opportunity for our community to meets its own needs while doing it "Domes style" by demonstrating a creative and sustainable alternative to standard laundry systems. 

As the first greywater system on the UC Davis campus to be implemented during California’s worst drought since records started, this project provides the opportunity to educate the UC Davis campus and greater Davis and Yolo county communities the benefits of greywater, which includes growing a garden without supplemental watering and groundwater recharge!

(What is greywater? Greywater is "wastewater" from bathroom sinks, showers, and washing machines. It can, and will in this project, be diverted from sewage treatment plants to water our plants and gardens. It's estimated that our system will divert about 27,000 gallons of water per year!)

This project is expensive, and to increase our transparency we wanted to provide an outline for where the costs are going.

First and foremost, we ask for about $2600 for an industrial sized washer/dryer machines and their hookups. Due to the 208 volt industrial/commercial electrical hook up for the Domes property, we have limited options for which dryers we can buy. We are looking to buy a nice set of industrial sized and ADA accessible washer/dryer that will last for years to come. 

Secondly, about $1100 is going to bring a much needed subpanel and new electrical work to Herb Hall, which includes the labor of a licensed electrical contractor and materials. From the new subpanel, we will be able to connect, with correct voltage, to our washer and dryer just outside of Herb Hall.

Third, about $500 is going to be used for plumbing work and materials (not including the actual greywater plumbing). A licensed plumber will bring a domestic water line to the washer, so we can wash our clothes with water! The greywater system will also need a maintenance/emergency diverter to the sanitary sewer line just east of Dome 4. The contractor will connect our washer to this line. This cost includes the contractor's labor and materials for the plumbing work. 

Fourth, about $300 is to be used for the actual greywater plumbing. We are using the "branched drain" system and will be using a 3-way diverter valve, double ells, and ABS pipe. We'll do all the digging!

Fifth, about $600 is going to buy the materials for a Herb Hall Annex to house the washer and dryer (see the Gallery for a video of the proposed annex) and to build a nice clothes line for drying clothes. A licensed contractor has agreed to help us build this structure at a extremely reduced rate!

Lastly, we want this greywater system to have a component of education to it. We hope to raise about $300 dollars for weather resistant educational signage and metal posts to hold them up.



Thank you for supporting our project!! We are excited to offer a variety of community-made rewards from patches to dance lessons! If we don’t reach our goal, the funds will be used to the extent possible to complete the greywater system. Any additional funds beyond our goal will be used to support other amazing projects happening at the Domes!

We are looking for all forms of support and involvement! If you want to learn more about greywater systems, we welcome donations of time or professional skills during the installation process. Additionally, the finished system will be landscaped as a garden, so any time or plant donations would be much appreciated. Lastly, spreading the word about our project to friends and family is much appreciated by using the Indiegogo share tools!

If you have any questions at all, please email Brett Webber at btwebber@ucdavis.edu.
story_txt:
It is our (Solar Community Housing
Association) goal to raise 3,700 dollars to finish building a quality, durable
greywater system built by and for residents of Baggins End (aka The Domes) at
the University of California, Davis (see our website here). Our cooperative community, consisting of 26 students, has already received
funds from UC Davis Dining Services’ Go Green Grant, which helped us to start
the initial phases of construction. Building a community laundry facility
is necessary due to the imminent demolition of our current facilities
at the Orchard Park Apartments due to University expansion. This is an opportunity for our community to meets
its own needs while doing it "Domes style" by demonstrating a creative and sustainable alternative to
standard laundry systems. As the first greywater system on the UC
Davis campus to be implemented during California’s worst drought since records
started, this project provides the opportunity to educate the UC Davis campus
and greater Davis and Yolo county communities the benefits of greywater, which
includes growing a garden without supplemental watering and groundwater
recharge! (What is greywater? Greywater is "wastewater" from bathroom sinks, showers, and washing machines. It can, and will in this project, be diverted from sewage treatment plants to water our plants and gardens. It's estimated that our system will divert about 27,000 gallons of water per year!)
This project is expensive, and to increase our transparency we wanted to provide an outline for where the costs are going. First and foremost, we ask for about $2600 for an industrial sized washer/dryer machines and their hookups. Due to the 208 volt industrial/commercial electrical hook up for the Domes property, we have limited options for which dryers we can buy. We are looking to buy a nice set of industrial sized and ADA accessible washer/dryer that will last for years to come. Secondly, about $1100 is going to bring a much needed subpanel and new electrical work to Herb Hall, which includes the labor of a licensed electrical contractor and materials. From the new subpanel, we will be able to connect, with correct voltage, to our washer and dryer just outside of Herb Hall. Third, about $500 is going to be used for plumbing work and materials (not including the actual greywater plumbing). A licensed plumber will bring a domestic water line to the washer, so we can wash our clothes with water! The greywater system will also need a maintenance/emergency diverter to the sanitary sewer line just east of Dome 4. The contractor will connect our washer to this line. This cost includes the contractor's labor and materials for the plumbing work. Fourth, about $300 is to be used for the actual greywater plumbing. We are using the "branched drain" system and will be using a 3-way diverter valve, double ells, and ABS pipe. We'll do all the digging!Fifth, about $600 is going to buy the materials for a Herb Hall Annex to house the washer and dryer (see the Gallery for a video of the proposed annex) and to build a nice clothes line for drying clothes. A licensed contractor has agreed to help us build this structure at a extremely reduced rate!Lastly, we want this greywater system to have a component of education to it. We hope to raise about $300 dollars for weather resistant educational signage and metal posts to hold them up. Thank you for
supporting our project!! We are excited to offer a variety of community-made
rewards from patches to dance lessons! If we don’t reach our goal, the funds
will be used to the extent possible to complete the greywater system. Any
additional funds beyond our goal will be used to support other amazing projects
happening at the Domes!
We are looking for all forms of support
and involvement! If you want to learn more about greywater systems, we welcome
donations of time or professional skills during the installation process.
Additionally, the finished system will be landscaped as a garden, so any time
or plant donations would be much appreciated. Lastly, spreading the word about
our project to friends and family is much appreciated by using the Indiegogo
share tools!If you have any questions at all, please email Brett Webber at btwebber@ucdavis.edu.

story:
I'm a PhD student studying high bandwidth optical communications and one of my life-long hobbies is electronics. Something I have been working on for a long time is a home automation system: I want every light switch and appliance in my house to have WiFi in it in order to control and monitor it. It also needs to be "plug 'n play".

Arduino is a step in the right direction, but it doesn't really come with WiFi by default... I love the idea of a small, cheap and easy to use "brain" board, and so my solution is to do what I do best: design and build my own, and then provide it to others when it's done. 

The Quark One is an Arduino compatible board with an Atmel XMEGA at it's heart, an efficient switch mode power supply for maximum flexibility and most importantly, an integrated ESP-01 WiFi module for connectivity.

This campaign aims to fund the initial costs of building some prototypes, covering the minimum order quantities of the components and getting a few working Quark One's into the wild. Once Quark One is fully functional, I plan to run another campaign to mass produce them in order to supply them to you!

What's the Deal?

In order to make Quark One a reality, I need to manufacture a few prototypes and polish the software before they are ready for general purpose proliferation. This process doesn't really cost an arm and a leg, but as a student I don't have a lot of cash to spare!

The electronic design is complete - but if you suggest something that you would really like to see on the Quark One before the end of the campaign, I'll do my best to incorporate your ideas. 

Besides bringing Quark One into physical reality using the funds raised by this campaign (I'm hoping that as you read this you are considering making a donation!), the firmware and other software needs work... Various projects exist on the Internet to individually get the ESP-01 WiFi, Atmel XMEGA, Arduino IDE's and Web Interfaces up and running, but they all need integration, tweaking and packaging for maximum "maker" and of course user friendliness.

Hardware Specifications:

Board Size: 22.9 x 38.7 mm (For comparison, the Arduino Nano is 45 x 18 mm).
Power Supply: Anywhere between 5 to 30 V DC or Micro-USB powered.
Microcontroller: Atmel XMEGA 16A4U-AU (16 kB Flash) XMEGA 128A4U-AU with 128 kB flash and 8 kB RAM! (The Arduino Nano has 16 kB flash but runs at 16 MHz compared to 32 MHz!)
Awesome Peripherals: The XMEGA has a suite of advanced peripherals. A 2 MSa/s ADC with 12 bit resolution is one of them!
USB: Micro-USB Device (up to 32 endpoints).
External I/O: 25 (XMEGA A1-A7, B0-B3, C0-C7, D0-D5) (Arduino Nano has 14).
Other External Pins: DC In, 3.3V Out, Ground, Reset.
WiFi: ESP-01 Module based on ESP8266.
LEDs: One power LED and one LED connected to port B1 for testing or other convenient indications.
Clean ADC Power Supply: A power supply filter for the XMEGA analog power is present to enable accurate 12 bit analog measurements with Omega One.
Snug Fit XMEGA ICSP Port: No pin header will be fitted to the In Circuit Serial Programming port for the XMEGA. This keeps the board cost down, and also because most of the time the bootloader will be used via USB. In the event that you would like to flash custom firmware, I have staggered the holes so that a header will fit and make electrical contact temporarily with no soldering required!


Firmware / Software Specifications:

Bootloader: The Arduino bootloader for XMEGA will be used, allowing simple and convenient programming from the Arduino IDE.
Bootloader Pass-Through Mode: The bootloader will be modified to allow pass-through of the serial connection (via the Micro-USB port) to the ESP-01 WiFi module. This will enable easy programming of the ESP8266 firmware with new web pages, for example.
Web Interface: I have some cool ideas on how to implement a sexy, interactive web interface using technologies such as Bootstrap and AngularJS without you, the developer, having to know anything about web development! No ESP8266 firware development will be required - just standard Arduino IDE development to get a functional interface for your IoT projects.


Here is a rough breakdown of the components and other things that will be paid for by your funding:

  • Fabrication of at least 10, 2 layer PCBs (I decided to put in some extra design effort and avoid using more expensive, 4 layer PCBs.)
  • Atmel XMEGA16A4U-AU microcontrollers (These cheaper 16 kB models can easily be swapped for 32 or even 64 kB versions.)
  • ESP-01 WiFi modules (I decided that these are so mass produced and well used that it's not worth going custom for this!)
  • Micro USB connectors (Why use Mini USB when we all have heaps of Micro USB cables lying around from our mobile phones?)
  • 3.3 V switch mode buck converter chips
  • A handful of inductors, resistors, capacitors and diodes
  • Assembly (I plan on hand soldering the prototypes to save money - but it's still something that's required!)
  • Bootloader modifications (XMEGA Arduino bootloaders already exist, but I plan to make modifications to also allow flashing the ESP WiFi module via the USB interface.)
  • WiFi module web interface development (I would like every Quark One to be accessible via it's IP address just like an internet router to perform actions or monitor it.)

The Impact

In short: no more WiFi breakout boards for your network enabled projects!

Currently, Arduino and other similar boards are an immensely popular hobbyist (and sometimes commercial) product. This is most likely due to their low barrier to entry and large community. I feel that network connectivity is vital to enabling infinitely more possible projects (such as my home automation system) and existing boards typically don't have this by default.

We all have WiFi in our homes, offices and perhaps even our vehicles! You are probably reading this over a WiFi connection right now... Why not leverage this existing infrastructure for Internet of Things projects, made possible by the Quark One? Standards such as Zigbee and also custom protocols over ISM radio bands require additional hardware to make them visible to the Internet, mobile devices or computers. WiFi just makes sense.

I plan on making the designs and source code open source, but until it's done it's not really fit for public consumption!

When Quark One is working I hope to launch a larger campaign to fund their mass production. If it so happens that this campaign is really popular, I may fast track that dream!

Risks & Challenges

As with all engineering projects, there are potential risks and challenges. 

Luckily, being an avid electronics hobbyist and a qualified electronic engineer with several years experience, the technical aspects of the electronic design are of no concern. Likewise, the firmware should pose no serious challenges. I have ample experience with microcontroller firmware development and as mentioned, Arduino bootloaders already exist for the XMEGA. I have done part time work as a web application developer and I plan on using my HTML, CSS and AngularJS skills to make an epic default web interface for Quark One!

It may transpire that there is an bug that I missed on the PCB design, and this may require another batch of PCBs. This waste of money is something I would prefer to avoid and so I am spending a lot of time double and triple checking my designs. There are stories online that some ESP-01 modules are faulty or not quite "as advertised". I believe this is unlikely if I purchase them from somewhere reputable. The WiFi performance (such as range) is something that is hard to predict and so I may need to iterate the design with a different module or a different layout.

All in all, the risks are low and the challenges are not severe. The success of Quark One is likely, if I can raise capital to produce prototypes. You may not be in a position to contribute funds, but please read on in case you have other skills that the Quark One project could use!

Conclusion

Please tell your friends if you think they may be interested in Quark One! Please go ahead and share this on social media too...

If you are keen to help with the development in terms of electronics, firmware or the web interface, please contact me.

Imagine a world where everything is connected... Have you ever been camping in the middle of nowhere, and had a solar panel you wanted to align to get maximum power to keep the 12V portable fridge cold, but you weren't sure which patch of sun and what angle was best? Probably not - but when I was once in that situation, I wished I had a Quark One hooked up to the solar charge controller with an app on my mobile phone giving me real time statistics on power generation over WiFi!

Thanks for your time and please donate at least $1 towards the Quark One if you would like to support my efforts to make a more connected, compact, powerful and cost effective Arduino-like device than is currently available on the market.

story:
Say hello  !

                            A domestic security robot with face recognition...



Introduction..

We've created the world's first home security system that integrates face recognition.  Unlike other security systems that simply capture video and send an alert, Gadget captures a faceprint... a facial equivalent of the fingerprint.  Our software instantly analyzes the width, size and shape of the nose, the wideness of the eyes, the depth of the jaw, the height of the cheekbones, the distance between eyes and more. Everything is turned into a numerical code which can then be compared with other photos in the Gadget database. Gadget can recognize family members and loved ones to grant access.  More importantly,  Gadget will let you know when someone else enters the house and will instantly send an email or text alert right to your phone.
The applications for iCaptura go beyond the home.  For example, it can be used to take attendance at school or control authorised parking. It can  monitor temperature, humidity and air quality.  It can even detect unusual movements like fire and robbery.

iCaptura in a glance.. 

    

                                    Why this robo ?

 Your single security companion


Whether you're at home, office, or travelling, Gadget will always be keeping a watch for you. Gadget not only recognizes unauthorized persons but also unusual movements such as fire, robbery and the like. It can provide effective protection to your entire house/ office, day and night, without any additional sensor installations on other rooms/ floors.

No More False Alarms !

With its two dedicated cameras and intelligent notification technologies, it not only alerts you when something's wrong. You can even set safety parameters so certain activities are ignored for a period of time. 

Complete Control

Gadget alerts you when something is wrong and lets you control the response. Gadget sends instant email and MMS messages to connected personals along with the unauthorised person's image / unusual video clip, date, time and location, calling their attention. If required, iCaptura can alert your neighbours through email and MMS when you are away.

Your Workplace Attendance Record System

Gadget automatically registers the attendance when an employee or student enters the institution premises through its integrated facial recognition system. It will also send the absentees record to the designated person through email and MMS.

Ultimate New - Age Auto Cop

Managing unauthorised parking and thefts are increasingly becoming a nightmare. Using Gadget you can now detect unauthorised vehicles through its integrated register number recognition facility. It will alert you when an unrecognised vehicle enters your premises. 


Cost - Effective Integrated Security Solution

The Gadget’s robust security features enables it to be integrated with your existing surveillance systems, making your private space hundred times more secure. When the normal surveillance system demands your continuous monitoring, Gadget's smart technology reacts to suspicious situations spontaneously. 

Innovative Design, Easy Installation


Security cameras fail to deter crime today by being very visible and intimidating. Unlike other electronic devices, Gadget’s innovative and delightful design makes it gel with the background keeping an eye on the action for you. 

There's a lot more in store !

Live Streaming

Gadget provides live video streaming faster, easier and better than existing CCTV’s. The iCaptura secure mobile app enables you to keep a check on your home or office from anywhere in the world.

Auto Tracking

Gadget lets you prevent robbery in shops, supermarkets and the like, by alerting the concerned personals at the counter with unusual movements that Gadget is programmed to detect. 

iCaptura Won't Fail You Even If Your Internet Does

Gadget will always be on high alert and lets you know instantly when anything unusual happens, even if you’re not connected to the Internet! If Gadget is installed in the countries, where citizen details are recorded, then iCaptura can even tell who the intruder is with available details enabling Police to locate the offender easily.

We were recently featured in Your Story.com!

                                     

How does it work ?  

Setup

1. Connect power cable.

2. Follow Gadget's instructions to set Gadget according to your requirement. You can easily set your requirement as prevent unauthorized entry, attendance management etc through Gadget’s user friendly settings. 

3. Train Gadget to recognize faces by adding faces into the DATABASE( you will get help instructions).

4.  Mount Gadget’s head in the Most suitable area. You can keep the body with enclosed dummy head as a show piece anywhere in your house.

5. Provide email, id's & Mobile #’s of the people to contact (Primary and secondary)

Gadget will take care of the rest ...

Connect to devices...

Your Gadget network can include

    Mobile

    Personal Computer

    Alarm Bell

 Features of iCaptura: 


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

SIZE

Approx 10'' tall,6'' base

WEIGHT

Approx 3 lbs

SENSORS

Motion Sensor,Light Sensor,Temaprature Sensor,

Humidity Sensor,Air Qulaity Sensors

LIGHTNING

full-spectrum ambient LED

MATERIAL

ABS plastic,aluminum,glass

POWER

AC adapter & battery-ready 

CONNECT

WiFi

PROCESSOR

i5


 Where we are in development


We have a working prototype and we're now focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Designing packaging
  • Getting product certifications
  • Designing the supply chain process
  • Tooling
  • Materials procurement
  • Production

We have harnessed the best-in-class technology and design to make your premises smart and safe and a passionate and dedicated team in place. We are now ready to live test iCaptura with different cameras and sensors. 

Risks & Challenges 

We have been working to customize the algorithm to generate a perfect result. Our prototype is ready for final production. Our partners are ready to start. However, we understand that mass production of the product may encounter problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks involved and have enlisted expert mentors who can guide us in our pursuit to break all the barriers. 

Manufacturing

We need to create tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex, time consuming and expensive. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we have selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

Software

The software prototype is ready and functional. We are now building all additional features that we want to include in iCaptura software. We trust our team to overcome all the challenges and keep moving forward. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it on time.



Who we are ? 

GenioCode, Inc is an emerging IT company with a group of passionate individuals based out of Palo Alto, CA, United States . We dream of a world, where technology can provide solid solutions for a smarter and safer life. Our passion to support the public by bringing them the positive aspects of technology led to long days of brainstorming about an idea that culminated as  a product which works under the principle of FLNS (Face Locating and Notifying System) which we have filed a patent for.

We were initially focused on developing innovative games and apps for mobile platforms such as Incredible Finn and Kerala Kitchen, but something was missing.

 Just turn on the news, crime is on the rise ... terrorist attacks, kidnappings, abduction – it’s more common place than ever before.  With this increase in terror around the world, we knew something needed to be done.  It was time to create something to make our world smarter and safer.  After much research and discussion, this "Robot" was born.


The Team Behind...


   

                 “With the increase in terror and insecurity around the world, 

                                   we knew something needs to be done.

                                         And thus was born…The security Robot


How Can You Be A Part

                                                         

We've come a long way in our pursuit to provide a smart, effective and revolutionary solution to address all security concerns. 

We have been working on Gadget for around 2 years and now need your support to initiate tooling and manufacturing. 

Why support us?

  • Be the first to experience a revolutionary security solution
  • Enjoy a smart and safe home/office like never before 
  • You will be the first to own an Gadget (and we mean it).

Get involved and join us in our endeavor to make our communities safer, our homes and premises smarter, and our lives more peaceful. 


                                        

                                       click here for FAQ

Complete Control

 Gadget alerts you when something is wrong and lets you control the response.  Gadget sends instant email and MMS messages to connected personals along with the unauthorised person's image / unusual video clip, date, time and location, calling their attention. If required, iCaptura can alert your neighbours through email and MMS when you are away.

Your Workplace Attendance Record System




 Gadget automatically registers the attendance when an employee or student enters the institution premises through its integrated facial recognition system. It will also send the absentees record to the designated person through email and MMS.

Ultimate New - Age Auto Cop


Managing unauthorised parking and thefts are increasingly becoming a nightmare. Using Gadget you can now detect unauthorised vehicles through its integrated register number recognition facility. It will alert you when an unrecognised vehicle enters your premises. 

Cost - Effective Integrated Security Solution


The Gadget’s robust security features enables it to be integrated with your existing surveillance systems, making your private space hundred times more secure. When the normal surveillance system demands your continuous monitoring, Gadget's smart technology reacts to suspicious situations spontaneously. 
Innovative Design, Easy Installation




Security cameras fail to deter crime today by being very visible and intimidating. Unlike other electronic devices, Gadget’s innovative and delightful design makes it gel with the background keeping an eye on the action for you. 

There's a lot more in store !




Live Streaming





 Gadget provides live video streaming faster, easier and better than existing CCTV’s. The iCaptura secure mobile app enables you to keep a check on your home or office from anywhere in the world.



Auto Tracking




 Gadget lets you prevent robbery in shops, supermarkets and the like, by alerting the concerned personals at the counter with unusual movements that Gadget is programmed to detect. 


iCaptura Won't Fail You Even If Your Internet Does

 Gadget will always be on high alert and lets you know instantly when anything unusual happens, even if you’re not connected to the Internet! If Gadget is installed in the countries, where citizen details are recorded, then iCaptura can even tell who the intruder is with available details enabling Police to locate the offender easily.
We were recently featured in Your Story.com!


                                     

How does it work ?  



Setup
1. Connect power cable.
2. Follow  Gadget's instructions to set Gadget according to your requirement. You can easily set your requirement as prevent unauthorized entry, attendance management etc through  Gadget’s user friendly settings. 
3. Train Gadget to recognize faces by adding faces into the DATABASE( you will get help instructions).
4.  Mount  Gadget’s head in the Most suitable area. You can keep the body with enclosed dummy head as a show piece anywhere in your house.
5. Provide email, id's & Mobile #’s of the people to contact (Primary and secondary)
 Gadget will take care of the rest ...


Connect to devices...


Your  Gadget network can include
    Mobile
    Personal Computer
    Alarm Bell

 Features of iCaptura: 


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS




SIZE


Approx 10'' tall,6'' base




WEIGHT


Approx 3 lbs




SENSORS



Motion Sensor,Light Sensor,Temaprature Sensor,
Humidity Sensor,Air Qulaity Sensors




LIGHTNING


full-spectrum ambient LED




MATERIAL


ABS plastic,aluminum,glass




POWER


AC adapter & battery-ready 




CONNECT


WiFi




PROCESSOR


i5






 Where we are in development





We have a working prototype and we're now focused on:

Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app

We will soon begin the process of:

Designing packaging
Getting product certifications
Designing the supply chain process
Tooling
Materials procurement
Production




We have harnessed the best-in-class technology and design to make your premises smart and safe and a passionate and dedicated team in place. We are now ready to live test iCaptura with different cameras and sensors. 
Risks & Challenges 
We have been working to customize the algorithm to generate a perfect result. Our prototype is ready for final production. Our partners are ready to start. However, we understand that mass production of the product may encounter problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks involved and have enlisted expert mentors who can guide us in our pursuit to break all the barriers. 
Manufacturing
We need to create tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex, time consuming and expensive. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we have selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
Software
The software prototype is ready and functional. We are now building all additional features that we want to include in iCaptura software. We trust our team to overcome all the challenges and keep moving forward. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it on time.







  

Who we are ? 
GenioCode, Inc is
 an emerging IT company with a group of passionate individuals based out
 of Palo Alto, CA, United States . We dream of a world, where technology
 can provide solid solutions for a smarter and safer life. Our passion 
to support the public by bringing them the positive aspects of 
technology led to long days of brainstorming about an idea that 
culminated as  a product which works under the principle of FLNS (Face Locating and Notifying System) which we have filed a patent for.
We were initially focused on developing innovative games and apps for
 mobile platforms such as Incredible Finn and Kerala Kitchen, but 
something was missing.
 Just turn on the news, crime is on the rise ... terrorist attacks, 
kidnappings, abduction – it’s more common place than ever before.  With 
this increase in terror around the world, we knew something needed to be
 done.  It was time to create something to make our world smarter and 
safer.  After much research and discussion, this "Robot" was born.
The Team Behind...





                    “With the increase in terror and insecurity around the world, 
                                   we knew something needs to be done.
                                         And thus was born…The security Robot



How Can You Be A Part
                                                         



We've come a long way in our pursuit to provide a smart, effective and revolutionary solution to address all security concerns. 
We have been working on Gadget for around 2 years and now need your support to initiate tooling and manufacturing. 
Why support us?

Be the first to experience a revolutionary security solution
Enjoy a smart and safe home/office like never before 


You will be the first to own an  Gadget (and we mean it).

Get involved and join us in our endeavor to make our communities safer, our homes and premises smarter, and our lives more peaceful. 
                                                                               click here for FAQ

story:
Summary

The founder of our company, Marvin Philip, hurt his back while working.  This not only caused Marvin to miss work, but it also made it difficult to do things at home such as bending over to empty his laundry hamper.

His injury lead him to search for a hamper that would not cause additional strain on his back.  Marvin searched everywhere in hopes of finding a product that would fulfill his needs.  He even solicited help from family members to find a hamper that would work for him.

Unfortunately, there was not a product found on the market to help Marvin.  Last year, Marvin decided that he would create a product to help fill the need that he saw existing in the marketplace.

Over the course of the past 15 months, Marvin has dedicated all of his time and financial resources into creating the Lifter Hamper™.  The product has gone through multiple designs and toolings.  It has been put through rigorus tests so that it can be a quality product.  Patents have been filed and engineers have fine tuned the Lifter Hamper™ so that the hamper will be unique and do exactly what Marvin has envisioned it would do.

You may know someone who is elderly, suffers from back pain, is pregnant, or struggles to bend over for whatever reason.  They probably dread the task of doing laundry.  The Lifter Hamper™ is a product that has been designed to simply help these people! 
 
The Lifter Hamper™ doesn't have to be just for those who have problems bending over. It can benefit anyone and everyone who does their laundy.  Why should anyone put a strain on your back when you don't have to??? 
 
You now have the limited time opportunity to become one of the first owners of the new Lifter Hamper™ by participating now.  Your contribution will help us bring this improved product to market.  For your contribution, you will receive the following:
 
$5 Donation - Coupon Good for 25% off a Lifter Hamper™ - good through 12/31/2013.
$30 Donation - One Lifter Hamper™ - includes shipping.
$55 Donation - Two Lifter Hampers™ - includes shipping.
$100 Donation - Four Lifter Hampers™ - includes shipping.
 
*The color of the Lifter Hamper™ will be a special limited crowd funding edition black, with the Lifter Hamper™ logo embroidered in gold lettering.  All future editions will include the Lifter Hamper™ logo embroidered in our silver lettering, similar to the one shown in the picture on this site.  

If for any reason you cannot contribute financially, we would appreciate your support by helping us get the word out about our product.  You can simply let other people know about the Lifter Hamper™ by using the tools in this listing to share this others.

We sincerely appreciate your support!!!

story:
The most beautiful way to grow herbs, house plants or flowers indoor while using the same plants to clean aquarium water with ease!

Already a Kickstarter success!

We just need 150 more EcoQube orders to add the lightning functions (for both Kickstarter AND Indiegogo backers) that everyone's been asking for!

(Image from National Geographic)

How does the EcoQube work?

The heart of the EcoQube is the aquaponics filter which uses plants, the world’s best and most natural filter, to keep your aquarium clean.

Why EcoQube?

WELL DESIGNED - Built from scratch and 3D printed with every aspect examined and every detail refined. We worked extremely hard to build this from the ground up with a bigger purpose. So that we can scale this same filter for purposes like water sewage treatment, waste water clean-up and even filters for aquaculture.

And integrated into the EcoQube!

NEVER CHANGE OR REPLACE FILTERS AGAIN!- LOW MAINTENANCE

INNOVATIVE - First ever: compact UV, filter with LED and 2" filter that pump 100 gallons per hour

BEAUTIFUL - Nature’s most exquisite decoration for any space.

Our Story

Our names are Eric and Kevin. We’re UC San Diego students and aquarium geeks who met in high school and instantly became intrigued by planted aquatic ecosystems. As we got older, we realized the bigger challenges humanity as a whole faces in terms of food and water shortages so we decided to use our knowledge of aquariums to deliver the concept of aquaponics and the impact it can have to as many people as possible. Here's some background on us and what we've done:

We started out working in various stores. Kevin actually served as a biologist assistant at the Steinhart Aquarium (California Academy of Sciences) where he managed and maintained 100,000 gallon systems as well as serve as the operations manager at Aquatic Central, the largest aquarium specific store in San Francisco. Eric was one of the first employees at Archaea International Corporation (DBA Aqua Forest Aquarium) also based in San Francisco where he focused on sales, customer relations and product user interface development.

                Kevin's Garage at age 16.                             Our walk-in closet in college.

Eventually, we decided to start our own online aquarium store.

And continued our passion for connecting people with nature through aquatic ecosystem installations. This installation was performed earlier this year in a restaurant where over 1000 people see and interact with it EVERYDAY.


We brought our love of aquatic ecosystems with us to college, going from keeping aquariums in a garage in SF to a closet in San Diego. We decided against on-campus housing because we couldn't bear to part from our passion for aquariums. Right now, we create unique aquatic ecosystems for people in SF and SD, but we'd like to expand our reach to you through the EcoQube!

Solutions Farms (Vista, California)

One of the LARGEST aquaponics farms in the US. Also where Kevin performed research on the sustainable cycle of Aquaponics.

Please support our mission by sharing the EcoQube with as many people as you know! You can learn more about us and see our story in pictures here:http://on.fb.me/17iU7oe

Our Goal

So WHY is our food still grown in soil?

WHY are we throwing out billions of gallons of water every year from fish farming?

WHY do we need pesticides in our vegetables, antibiotics and hormones in our fish?! And whatever we don't consume, flush it out into the rivers and oceans?

1. Plant farmers are not familiar with fish. Spraying pesticides, fungicides and utilizing GMOs to maximize crop yield is much easier than transitioning to aquaponics.

2. Fish farmers are not familiar with growing plants. Using antibiotics, flushing out billions of gallons of waste filled water raising fish in a desert is much easier than aquaponics.

With easy access to anything we want whenever we want, we have lost connection with our food, the way it's grown, and the rest of the world. 

OUR FOUNDERS MESSAGE TO YOU:

Aquaponics is a clear solution to address many issues of water and food shortages all over the world and we hope the EcoQube can help bring this incredible yet simple solution into our everyday lives and influence the way we perceive the larger issues in the world today. We know there are these horrific things happening but we've been so disconnected with our environment and the negative impacts we make with our everyday decisions.

We know all these problems can't be solved immediately. We can't solve it with a fish tank no matter how beautiful it is, but we want to make an effort using what we're good at to take the first steps in influencing you to make the world a better place. We want to use the EcoQube as a vehicle to deliver the concept and beauty of aquaponics to as many people's lives as possible. To touch the minds and hearts of as many people as possible.

Because the crazy ones who think they can change the world are the ones who do. –Apple

-Kevin and Eric

Support Us!

Please support this project, share it with your friends! Spread the word! Join our mission to start a revolution from the bottom up and make our world a better place!

Featured in

Read the Treehugger article here.

Read the NextShark article here.

Read the MakobiScribe article here.

Read the Crowdlifted article here.

Read the WellDoneStuff article here.

Disclaimer

Herbs and micro-greens can be extremely great filters and will thrive with the EcoQube, but for that same reason, it is EXTREMELY unsafe for food consumption. Chemicals used for aquariums are NOT safe for human consumption and the plants WILL soak these chemicals up. Consumption of the plants grown in the EcoQube is NOT recommended for humans.

International backers will NOT receive plant seeds or fish food as these are items regulated by customs strictly in many countries.

Risks and Challenges

We've spent most of the last year working with our partners to mitigate as many risks as possible, yet we know there will still be hurdles along the way. We will always be transparent with our community about challenges, including these:

The biggest risk is having users eat the herbs they've grown in their EcoQube. This is because professional aquaponics farms do not use regular aquarium chemicals for their water treatments. It is entirely unknown if chemicals from regular water treatments will find their way into the herbs. Also, aquariums with frogs, turtles, snails and other more disease-prone animals should not be eaten from. There are simply too many unknowns, and nobody wants a case of salmonella poisoning! It is not recommended to eat anything you produce through the EcoQube.

Ship date: We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned.

Product changes: As we refine the EcoQube based on additional community feedback and more product testing, slight changes may be made. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience. From feedback we've received, we already know that the light will be upgraded from a triangle to a rectangle with more LEDs to make it brighter for your ecosystem.

Supplier coordination: We work with a variety of suppliers to source the best materials and ensure the product is developed correctly. Each supplier has its own challenges, which may affect its partners, including us.

Maintenance: As hard as we've worked to make this AS LOW MAINTENANCE AS POSSIBLE, it is still a living ecosystem. As with all ecosystems, there can be imbalances like when your kids throw in a bag of fish food thinking the fish will grow faster, or if the aquarium is placed in the sun even though it comes with a beautiful bright light. Imbalances will cause algae growth and will require a tiny bit of wiping.

FAQ

What material is the aquarium in the EcoQube and what is the size?

The dimensions of the tank you see are ~9.5"x7". We are working on finalizing the dimensions based on YOUR feedback! We will post an update where you guys can vote by commenting towards the end of the campaign. We'd like the tank to be a 7x7 cube but we want to hear what you all think!

The tank you guys see is hand made from acrylic. For the final one, we are deciding between acrylic and polycarbonate for several reasons:
          1. Polycarbonate and acrylic are generally optically more clear than any glass that exists on the market right now.
          2. To go along with our goal of beauty and perfection, we chose those 2 types of materials because they will not require silicone to be mended together (less obtrusive material, and more beauty). It will actually likely cost more than glass because we would have to use more material since polycarbonate and acrylic is less rigid than glass.
          3. With our goal of being sustainable, we wanted to reuse as much material as possible and eliminate waste (like packaging). So our goal is actually to use the AQUARIUM as the PACKAGING. You can imagine glass to not be the best packaging during shipments when things are stacked. Here's a photo of what it would look like with the aquarium as packaging: http://on.fb.me/1aDoTat
Message us and let us know what you think!


Is the compact UV sterilizer needed?

We originally built the Aquaponics filter in the EcoQube with commercial use in mind so it can be scaled for food production and run clean water through plants we harvest from the filter but a typical small aquarium will not require UV sterilization although it helps keep the water extra clear and clean by acting as a buffer for mistakes such as over feeding or too much light which can cause bacterial and algae blooms.

The compact UV sterilizer can be added on as an attachment as well!


What plants are included and recommended for the best filtration?

We're testing out different seeds right now and will likely package it with a type of small flower since that's not often seen in a living area. We are still working on finding the perfect seed.

If you're wondering what to plant, the easiest thing we've been using has been mint and basil. It brings an AMAZING aroma into the room as well.

But if you want to please the ladies, tropaeolum majus is a beautiful flower we're still testing.

Keep in mind seeds can only be shipped domestically.


How long does the compact UV sterilizer last?

The UV light is the first ever 265 nano meter LED used for water sterilization in aquarium filters and is rated for over 10,000 hours! It also only needs to be on 1 hour/day to clean your EcoQube. So it should last a lifetime.


How many fish can this tank hold? What types? Can I put more fish in?

We recommend white cloud minnows and zebra fish for starters but you can definitely get a bit creative getting into more tropical fish (like we did) in warmer room temperatures.

The internet generally suggests 10 gallons mainly because 10 gallons of water generally stays cleaner longer than say 5 gallons of water, but to put it in perspective, typical aquariums have little to no filtration. Think, would the fish prefer a larger tank like a mansion filled with their own feces or would they prefer a smaller environment with plants and the cleanest water they have ever been in? The aquaponics filter turns around a whopping 100 gallons of water per hour!

It's VERY hard to come up with a fine line or minimum gallon amount from our experience. It's all relative to the filtration capacity (mass of plants filtering the water).

What we would suggest is start with 2 small zebra fish or minnows and see how they like it and then slowly add more as the plants grow if you'd like. If you're placing it in a warmer area (75* room temperature), you can easily keep smaller fish like guppies, scarlet badis (really cool!) and many others like we have. But again, for starters, we suggest sticking with minnows and zebra fish.

If you're looking to put more fish in, please do not cramp them in the little EcoQube. Simply purchase a larger aquarium and place the aquaponics filter on the aquarium for optimal filtration!
